00034 #ifndef SAM3S_H
00035 #define SAM3S_H
00036 
00037 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_definitions SAM3S definitions
00038   This file defines all structures and symbols for SAM3S:
00039     - registers and bitfields
00040     - peripheral base address
00041     - peripheral ID
00042     - PIO definitions
00043 */
00044 /*@{*/
00045 
00046 #ifdef __cplusplus
00047  extern "C" {
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
00051 #include <stdint.h>
00052 #ifndef __cplusplus
00053 typedef volatile const uint32_t RoReg; /**< Read only 32-bit register (volatile const unsigned int) */
00054 #else
00055 typedef volatile       uint32_t RoReg; /**< Read only 32-bit register (volatile const unsigned int) */
00056 #endif
00057 typedef volatile       uint32_t WoReg; /**< Write only 32-bit register (volatile unsigned int) */
00058 typedef volatile       uint32_t RwReg; /**< Read-Write 32-bit register (volatile unsigned int) */
00059 #define CAST(type, value) ((type *) value)
00060 #define REG_ACCESS(type, address) (*(type*)address) /**< C code: Register value */
00061 #else
00062 #define CAST(type, value) (value)
00063 #define REG_ACCESS(type, address) (address) /**< Assembly code: Register address */
00064 #endif
00065 
00066 /* ************************************************************************** */
00067 /*   CMSIS DEFINITIONS FOR SAM3S */
00068 /* ************************************************************************** */
00069 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_cmsis CMSIS Definitions */
00070 /*@{*/
00071 
00072 /**< Interrupt Number Definition */
00073 typedef enum IRQn
00074 {
00075 /******  Cortex-M3 Processor Exceptions Numbers ******************************/
00076   NonMaskableInt_IRQn   = -14, /**<  2 Non Maskable Interrupt                */
00077   MemoryManagement_IRQn = -12, /**<  4 Cortex-M3 Memory Management Interrupt */
00078   BusFault_IRQn         = -11, /**<  5 Cortex-M3 Bus Fault Interrupt         */
00079   UsageFault_IRQn       = -10, /**<  6 Cortex-M3 Usage Fault Interrupt       */
00080   SVCall_IRQn           = -5,  /**< 11 Cortex-M3 SV Call Interrupt           */
00081   DebugMonitor_IRQn     = -4,  /**< 12 Cortex-M3 Debug Monitor Interrupt     */
00082   PendSV_IRQn           = -2,  /**< 14 Cortex-M3 Pend SV Interrupt           */
00083   SysTick_IRQn          = -1,  /**< 15 Cortex-M3 System Tick Interrupt       */
00084 /******  SAM3S specific Interrupt Numbers *********************************/
00085 
00086   SUPC_IRQn            =  0, /**<  0 SAM3S Supply Controller (SUPC) */
00087   RSTC_IRQn            =  1, /**<  1 SAM3S Reset Controller (RSTC) */
00088   RTC_IRQn             =  2, /**<  2 SAM3S Real Time Clock (RTC) */
00089   RTT_IRQn             =  3, /**<  3 SAM3S Real Time Timer (RTT) */
00090   WDT_IRQn             =  4, /**<  4 SAM3S Watchdog Timer (WDT) */
00091   PMC_IRQn             =  5, /**<  5 SAM3S Power Management Controller (PMC) */
00092   EFC_IRQn             =  6, /**<  6 SAM3S Enhanced Embedded Flash Controller (EFC) */
00093   UART0_IRQn           =  8, /**<  8 SAM3S UART 0 (UART0) */
00094   UART1_IRQn           =  9, /**<  9 SAM3S UART 1 (UART1) */
00095   SMC_IRQn             = 10, /**< 10 SAM3S Static Memory Controller (SMC) */
00096   PIOA_IRQn            = 11, /**< 11 SAM3S Parallel I/O Controller A (PIOA) */
00097   PIOB_IRQn            = 12, /**< 12 SAM3S Parallel I/O Controller B (PIOB) */
00098   PIOC_IRQn            = 13, /**< 13 SAM3S Parallel I/O Controller C (PIOC) */
00099   USART0_IRQn          = 14, /**< 14 SAM3S USART 0 (USART0) */
00100   USART1_IRQn          = 15, /**< 15 SAM3S USART 1 (USART1) */
00101   HSMCI_IRQn           = 18, /**< 18 SAM3S Multimedia Card Interface (HSMCI) */
00102   TWI0_IRQn            = 19, /**< 19 SAM3S Two Wire Interface 0 (TWI0) */
00103   TWI1_IRQn            = 20, /**< 20 SAM3S Two Wire Interface 1 (TWI1) */
00104   SPI_IRQn             = 21, /**< 21 SAM3S Serial Peripheral Interface (SPI) */
00105   SSC_IRQn             = 22, /**< 22 SAM3S Synchronous Serial Controler (SSC) */
00106   TC0_IRQn             = 23, /**< 23 SAM3S Timer/Counter 0 (TC0) */
00107   TC1_IRQn             = 24, /**< 24 SAM3S Timer/Counter 1 (TC1) */
00108   TC2_IRQn             = 25, /**< 25 SAM3S Timer/Counter 2 (TC2) */
00109   TC3_IRQn             = 26, /**< 26 SAM3S Timer/Counter 3 (TC3) */
00110   TC4_IRQn             = 27, /**< 27 SAM3S Timer/Counter 4 (TC4) */
00111   TC5_IRQn             = 28, /**< 28 SAM3S Timer/Counter 5 (TC5) */
00112   ADC_IRQn             = 29, /**< 29 SAM3S Analog To Digital Converter (ADC) */
00113   DACC_IRQn            = 30, /**< 30 SAM3S Digital To Analog Converter (DACC) */
00114   PWM_IRQn             = 31, /**< 31 SAM3S Pulse Width Modulation (PWM) */
00115   CRCCU_IRQn           = 32, /**< 32 SAM3S CRC Calculation Unit (CRCCU) */
00116   ACC_IRQn             = 33, /**< 33 SAM3S Analog Comparator (ACC) */
00117   UDP_IRQn             = 34  /**< 34 SAM3S USB Device Port (UDP) */
00118 } IRQn_Type;
00119 
00120 /**
00121  * \brief Configuration of the Cortex-M3 Processor and Core Peripherals
00122  */
00123 
00124 #define __MPU_PRESENT          1 /**< $product does provide a MPU */
00125 #define __NVIC_PRIO_BITS       4 /**< $product uses 4 Bits for the Priority Levels */
00126 #define __Vendor_SysTickConfig 0 /**< Set to 1 if different SysTick Config is used */
00127

00129  * \brief CMSIS includes
00130  */
00131 
00132 #include "cmsis/core_cm3.h"
00133 
00134 /*@}*/
00135 
00136 /* ************************************************************************** */
00137 /**  SOFTWARE PERIPHERAL API DEFINITION FOR SAM3S */
00138 /* ************************************************************************** */
00139 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_api Peripheral Software API */
00140 /*@{*/
00141 /* ============================================================================= */
00142 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Analog Comparator Controller */
00143 /* ============================================================================= */
00144 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_ACC Analog Comparator Controller */
00145 /*@{*/
00146 
00147 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
00148 /** \brief Acc hardware registers */
00149 typedef struct {
00150   WoReg ACC_CR;        /**< \brief (Acc Offset: 0x00) Control Register */
00151   RwReg ACC_MR;        /**< \brief (Acc Offset: 0x04) Mode Register */
00152   RwReg Reserved1[7];
00153   WoReg ACC_IER;       /**< \brief (Acc Offset: 0x24) Interrupt Enable Register */
00154   WoReg ACC_IDR;       /**< \brief (Acc Offset: 0x28) Interrupt Disable Register */
00155   RoReg ACC_IMR;       /**< \brief (Acc Offset: 0x2C) Interrupt Mask Register */
00156   RoReg ACC_ISR;       /**< \brief (Acc Offset: 0x30) Interrupt Status Register */
00157   RwReg Reserved2[24];
00158   RwReg ACC_ACR;       /**< \brief (Acc Offset: 0x94) Analog Control Register */
00159   RwReg Reserved3[19];
00160   RwReg ACC_WPMR;      /**< \brief (Acc Offset: 0xE4) Write Protect Mode Register */
00161   RoReg ACC_WPSR;      /**< \brief (Acc Offset: 0xE8) Write Protect Status Register */
00162 } Acc;
00163 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
00164 /* -------- ACC_CR : (ACC Offset: 0x00) Control Register -------- */
00165 #define ACC_CR_SWRST (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ACC_CR) SoftWare ReSeT */
00166 /* -------- ACC_MR : (ACC Offset: 0x04) Mode Register -------- */
00167 #define ACC_MR_SELMINUS_Pos 0
00168 #define ACC_MR_SELMINUS_Msk (0x7u << ACC_MR_SELMINUS_Pos) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) SELection for MINUS comparator input */
00169 #define   ACC_MR_SELMINUS_TS (0x0u << 0) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) SelectTS */
00170 #define   ACC_MR_SELMINUS_ADVREF (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Select ADVREF */
00171 #define   ACC_MR_SELMINUS_DAC0 (0x2u << 0) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Select DAC0 */
00172 #define   ACC_MR_SELMINUS_DAC1 (0x3u << 0) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Select DAC1 */
00173 #define   ACC_MR_SELMINUS_AD0 (0x4u << 0) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Select AD0 */
00174 #define   ACC_MR_SELMINUS_AD1 (0x5u << 0) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Select AD1 */
00175 #define   ACC_MR_SELMINUS_AD2 (0x6u << 0) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Select AD2 */
00176 #define   ACC_MR_SELMINUS_AD3 (0x7u << 0) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Select AD3 */
00177 #define ACC_MR_SELPLUS_Pos 4
00178 #define ACC_MR_SELPLUS_Msk (0x7u << ACC_MR_SELPLUS_Pos) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) SELection for PLUS comparator input */
00179 #define   ACC_MR_SELPLUS_AD0 (0x0u << 4) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Select AD0 */
00180 #define   ACC_MR_SELPLUS_AD1 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Select AD1 */
00181 #define   ACC_MR_SELPLUS_AD2 (0x2u << 4) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Select AD2 */
00182 #define   ACC_MR_SELPLUS_AD3 (0x3u << 4) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Select AD3 */
00183 #define   ACC_MR_SELPLUS_AD4 (0x4u << 4) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Select AD4 */
00184 #define   ACC_MR_SELPLUS_AD5 (0x5u << 4) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Select AD5 */
00185 #define   ACC_MR_SELPLUS_AD6 (0x6u << 4) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Select AD6 */
00186 #define   ACC_MR_SELPLUS_AD7 (0x7u << 4) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Select AD7 */
00187 #define ACC_MR_ACEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Analog Comparator ENable */
00188 #define   ACC_MR_ACEN_DIS (0x0u << 8) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Analog Comparator Disabled. */
00189 #define   ACC_MR_ACEN_EN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Analog Comparator Enabled. */
00190 #define ACC_MR_EDGETYP_Pos 9
00191 #define ACC_MR_EDGETYP_Msk (0x3u << ACC_MR_EDGETYP_Pos) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) EDGE TYPe */
00192 #define   ACC_MR_EDGETYP_RISING (0x0u << 9) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) only rising edge of comparator output */
00193 #define   ACC_MR_EDGETYP_FALLING (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) falling edge of comparator output */
00194 #define   ACC_MR_EDGETYP_ANY (0x2u << 9) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) any edge of comparator output */
00195 #define ACC_MR_INV (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) INVert comparator output */
00196 #define   ACC_MR_INV_DIS (0x0u << 12) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Analog Comparator output is directly processed. */
00197 #define   ACC_MR_INV_EN (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Analog Comparator output is inverted prior to being processed. */
00198 #define ACC_MR_SELFS (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) SELection of Fault Source */
00199 #define   ACC_MR_SELFS_CF (0x0u << 13) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) the CF flag is used to drive the FAULT output. */
00200 #define   ACC_MR_SELFS_OUTPUT (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) the output of the Analog Comparator flag is used to drive the FAULT output. */
00201 #define ACC_MR_FE (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) Fault Enable */
00202 #define   ACC_MR_FE_DIS (0x0u << 14) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) the FAULT output is tied to 0. */
00203 #define   ACC_MR_FE_EN (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (ACC_MR) the FAULT output is driven by the signal defined by SELFS. */
00204 /* -------- ACC_IER : (ACC Offset: 0x24) Interrupt Enable Register -------- */
00205 #define ACC_IER_CE (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ACC_IER) Comparison Edge */
00206 /* -------- ACC_IDR : (ACC Offset: 0x28) Interrupt Disable Register -------- */
00207 #define ACC_IDR_CE (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ACC_IDR) Comparison Edge */
00208 /* -------- ACC_IMR : (ACC Offset: 0x2C) Interrupt Mask Register -------- */
00209 #define ACC_IMR_CE (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ACC_IMR) Comparison Edge */
00210 /* -------- ACC_ISR : (ACC Offset: 0x30) Interrupt Status Register -------- */
00211 #define ACC_ISR_CE (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ACC_ISR) Comparison Edge */
00212 #define ACC_ISR_SCO (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (ACC_ISR) Synchronized Comparator Output */
00213 #define ACC_ISR_MASK (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (ACC_ISR)  */
00214 /* -------- ACC_ACR : (ACC Offset: 0x94) Analog Control Register -------- */
00215 #define ACC_ACR_ISEL (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ACC_ACR) Current SELection */
00216 #define   ACC_ACR_ISEL_LOPW (0x0u << 0) /**< \brief (ACC_ACR) low power option. */
00217 #define   ACC_ACR_ISEL_HISP (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ACC_ACR) high speed option. */
00218 #define ACC_ACR_HYST_Pos 1
00219 #define ACC_ACR_HYST_Msk (0x3u << ACC_ACR_HYST_Pos) /**< \brief (ACC_ACR) HYSTeresis selection */
00220 #define ACC_ACR_HYST(value) ((ACC_ACR_HYST_Msk & ((value) << ACC_ACR_HYST_Pos)))
00221 /* -------- ACC_WPMR : (ACC Offset: 0xE4) Write Protect Mode Register -------- */
00222 #define ACC_WPMR_WPEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ACC_WPMR) Write Protect Enable */
00223 #define ACC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos 8
00224 #define ACC_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk (0xffffffu << ACC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos) /**< \brief (ACC_WPMR) Write Protect KEY */
00225 #define ACC_WPMR_WPKEY(value) ((ACC_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk & ((value) << ACC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos)))
00226 /* -------- ACC_WPSR : (ACC Offset: 0xE8) Write Protect Status Register -------- */
00227 #define ACC_WPSR_WPROTERR (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ACC_WPSR) Write PROTection ERRor */
00228 
00229 /*@}*/
00230 
00231 /* ============================================================================= */
00232 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Analog-to-digital Converter */
00233 /* ============================================================================= */
00234 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_ADC Analog-to-digital Converter */
00235 /*@{*/
00236 
00237 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
00238 /** \brief Adc hardware registers */
00239 typedef struct {
00240   WoReg ADC_CR;        /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x00) Control Register */
00241   RwReg ADC_MR;        /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x04) Mode Register */
00242   RwReg ADC_SEQR1;     /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x08) Channel Sequence Register 1 */
00243   RwReg ADC_SEQR2;     /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x0C) Channel Sequence Register 2 */
00244   WoReg ADC_CHER;      /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x10) Channel Enable Register */
00245   WoReg ADC_CHDR;      /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x14) Channel Disable Register */
00246   RoReg ADC_CHSR;      /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x18) Channel Status Register */
00247   RwReg Reserved1[1];
00248   RoReg ADC_LCDR;      /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x20) Last Converted Data Register */
00249   WoReg ADC_IER;       /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x24) Interrupt Enable Register */
00250   WoReg ADC_IDR;       /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x28) Interrupt Disable Register */
00251   RoReg ADC_IMR;       /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x2C) Interrupt Mask Register */
00252   RoReg ADC_ISR;       /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x30) Interrupt Status Register */
00253   RwReg Reserved2[2];
00254   RoReg ADC_OVER;      /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x3C) Overrun Status Register */
00255   RwReg ADC_EMR;       /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x40) Extended Mode Register */
00256   RwReg ADC_CWR;       /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x44) Compare Window Register */
00257   RwReg ADC_CGR;       /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x48) Channel Gain Register */
00258   RwReg ADC_COR;       /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x4C) Channel Offset Register */
00259   RoReg ADC_CDR[16];   /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x50) Channel Data Register */
00260   RwReg Reserved3[1];
00261   RwReg ADC_ACR;       /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x94) Analog Control Register */
00262   RwReg Reserved4[19];
00263   RwReg ADC_WPMR;      /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0xE4) Write Protect Mode Register */
00264   RoReg ADC_WPSR;      /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0xE8) Write Protect Status Register */
00265   RwReg Reserved5[5];
00266   RwReg ADC_RPR;       /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register */
00267   RwReg ADC_RCR;       /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register */
00268   RwReg ADC_TPR;       /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register */
00269   RwReg ADC_TCR;       /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register */
00270   RwReg ADC_RNPR;      /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register */
00271   RwReg ADC_RNCR;      /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register */
00272   RwReg ADC_TNPR;      /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register */
00273   RwReg ADC_TNCR;      /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register */
00274   WoReg ADC_PTCR;      /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register */
00275   RoReg ADC_PTSR;      /**< \brief (Adc Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register */
00276 } Adc;
00277 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
00278 /* -------- ADC_CR : (ADC Offset: 0x00) Control Register -------- */
00279 #define ADC_CR_SWRST (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_CR) Software Reset */
00280 #define ADC_CR_START (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (ADC_CR) Start Conversion */
00281 /* -------- ADC_MR : (ADC Offset: 0x04) Mode Register -------- */
00282 #define ADC_MR_TRGEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Trigger Enable */
00283 #define   ADC_MR_TRGEN_DIS (0x0u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Hardware triggers are disabled. Starting a conversion is only possible by software. */
00284 #define   ADC_MR_TRGEN_EN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Hardware trigger selected by TRGSEL field is enabled. */
00285 #define ADC_MR_TRGSEL_Pos 1
00286 #define ADC_MR_TRGSEL_Msk (0x7u << ADC_MR_TRGSEL_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Trigger Selection */
00287 #define   ADC_MR_TRGSEL_ADC_TRIG0 (0x0u << 1) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) External trigger */
00288 #define   ADC_MR_TRGSEL_ADC_TRIG1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) TIO Output of the Timer Counter Channel 0 */
00289 #define   ADC_MR_TRGSEL_ADC_TRIG2 (0x2u << 1) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) TIO Output of the Timer Counter Channel 1 */
00290 #define   ADC_MR_TRGSEL_ADC_TRIG3 (0x3u << 1) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) TIO Output of the Timer Counter Channel 2 */
00291 #define   ADC_MR_TRGSEL_ADC_TRIG4 (0x4u << 1) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) PWM Event Line 0 */
00292 #define   ADC_MR_TRGSEL_ADC_TRIG5 (0x5u << 1) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) PWM Event Line 1 */
00293 #define ADC_MR_LOWRES (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Resolution */
00294 #define   ADC_MR_LOWRES_BITS_12 (0x0u << 4) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) 12-bit resolution */
00295 #define   ADC_MR_LOWRES_BITS_10 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) 10-bit resolution */
00296 #define ADC_MR_SLEEP (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Sleep Mode */
00297 #define   ADC_MR_SLEEP_NORMAL (0x0u << 5) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Normal Mode: The ADC Core and reference voltage circuitry are kept ON between conversions */
00298 #define   ADC_MR_SLEEP_SLEEP (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Sleep Mode: The ADC Core and reference voltage circuitry are OFF between conversions */
00299 #define ADC_MR_FWUP (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Fast Wake Up */
00300 #define   ADC_MR_FWUP_OFF (0x0u << 6) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Normal Sleep Mode: The sleep mode is defined by the SLEEP bit */
00301 #define   ADC_MR_FWUP_ON (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Fast Wake Up Sleep Mode: The Voltage reference is ON between conversions and ADC Core is OFF */
00302 #define ADC_MR_FREERUN (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Free Run Mode */
00303 #define   ADC_MR_FREERUN_OFF (0x0u << 7) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Normal Mode */
00304 #define   ADC_MR_FREERUN_ON (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Free Run Mode: Never wait for any trigger. */
00305 #define ADC_MR_PRESCAL_Pos 8
00306 #define ADC_MR_PRESCAL_Msk (0xffu << ADC_MR_PRESCAL_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Prescaler Rate Selection */
00307 #define ADC_MR_PRESCAL(value) ((ADC_MR_PRESCAL_Msk & ((value) << ADC_MR_PRESCAL_Pos)))
00308 #define ADC_MR_STARTUP_Pos 16
00309 #define ADC_MR_STARTUP_Msk (0xfu << ADC_MR_STARTUP_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Start Up Time */
00310 #define   ADC_MR_STARTUP_SUT0 (0x0u << 16) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) 0 periods of ADCClock */
00311 #define   ADC_MR_STARTUP_SUT8 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) 8 periods of ADCClock */
00312 #define   ADC_MR_STARTUP_SUT16 (0x2u << 16) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) 16 periods of ADCClock */
00313 #define   ADC_MR_STARTUP_SUT24 (0x3u << 16) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) 24 periods of ADCClock */
00314 #define   ADC_MR_STARTUP_SUT64 (0x4u << 16) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) 64 periods of ADCClock */
00315 #define   ADC_MR_STARTUP_SUT80 (0x5u << 16) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) 80 periods of ADCClock */
00316 #define   ADC_MR_STARTUP_SUT96 (0x6u << 16) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) 96 periods of ADCClock */
00317 #define   ADC_MR_STARTUP_SUT112 (0x7u << 16) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) 112 periods of ADCClock */
00318 #define   ADC_MR_STARTUP_SUT512 (0x8u << 16) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) 512 periods of ADCClock */
00319 #define   ADC_MR_STARTUP_SUT576 (0x9u << 16) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) 576 periods of ADCClock */
00320 #define   ADC_MR_STARTUP_SUT640 (0xAu << 16) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) 640 periods of ADCClock */
00321 #define   ADC_MR_STARTUP_SUT704 (0xBu << 16) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) 704 periods of ADCClock */
00322 #define   ADC_MR_STARTUP_SUT768 (0xCu << 16) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) 768 periods of ADCClock */
00323 #define   ADC_MR_STARTUP_SUT832 (0xDu << 16) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) 832 periods of ADCClock */
00324 #define   ADC_MR_STARTUP_SUT896 (0xEu << 16) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) 896 periods of ADCClock */
00325 #define   ADC_MR_STARTUP_SUT960 (0xFu << 16) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) 960 periods of ADCClock */
00326 #define ADC_MR_SETTLING_Pos 20
00327 #define ADC_MR_SETTLING_Msk (0x3u << ADC_MR_SETTLING_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Analog Settling Time */
00328 #define ADC_MR_SETTLING(value) ((ADC_MR_SETTLING_Msk & ((value) << ADC_MR_SETTLING_Pos)))
00329 #define ADC_MR_ANACH (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Analog Change */
00330 #define   ADC_MR_ANACH_NONE (0x0u << 23) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) No analog change on channel switching: DIFF0, GAIN0 and OFF0 are used for all channels */
00331 #define   ADC_MR_ANACH_ALLOWED (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Allows different analog settings for each channel. See ADC_CGR and ADC_COR Registers */
00332 #define ADC_MR_TRACKTIM_Pos 24
00333 #define ADC_MR_TRACKTIM_Msk (0xfu << ADC_MR_TRACKTIM_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Tracking Time */
00334 #define ADC_MR_TRACKTIM(value) ((ADC_MR_TRACKTIM_Msk & ((value) << ADC_MR_TRACKTIM_Pos)))
00335 #define ADC_MR_TRANSFER_Pos 28
00336 #define ADC_MR_TRANSFER_Msk (0x3u << ADC_MR_TRANSFER_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_MR)  */
00337 #define ADC_MR_TRANSFER(value) ((ADC_MR_TRANSFER_Msk & ((value) << ADC_MR_TRANSFER_Pos)))
00338 #define ADC_MR_USEQ (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Use Sequence Enable */
00339 #define   ADC_MR_USEQ_NUM_ORDER (0x0u << 31) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) Normal Mode: The controller converts channels in a simple numeric order. */
00340 #define   ADC_MR_USEQ_REG_ORDER (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (ADC_MR) User Sequence Mode: The sequence respects what is defined in ADC_SEQR1 and ADC_SEQR2 registers. */
00341 /* -------- ADC_SEQR1 : (ADC Offset: 0x08) Channel Sequence Register 1 -------- */
00342 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH1_Pos 0
00343 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH1_Msk (0x7u << ADC_SEQR1_USCH1_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_SEQR1) User Sequence Number 1 */
00344 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH1(value) ((ADC_SEQR1_USCH1_Msk & ((value) << ADC_SEQR1_USCH1_Pos)))
00345 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH2_Pos 4
00346 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH2_Msk (0x7u << ADC_SEQR1_USCH2_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_SEQR1) User Sequence Number 2 */
00347 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH2(value) ((ADC_SEQR1_USCH2_Msk & ((value) << ADC_SEQR1_USCH2_Pos)))
00348 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH3_Pos 8
00349 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH3_Msk (0x7u << ADC_SEQR1_USCH3_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_SEQR1) User Sequence Number 3 */
00350 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH3(value) ((ADC_SEQR1_USCH3_Msk & ((value) << ADC_SEQR1_USCH3_Pos)))
00351 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH4_Pos 12
00352 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH4_Msk (0x7u << ADC_SEQR1_USCH4_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_SEQR1) User Sequence Number 4 */
00353 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH4(value) ((ADC_SEQR1_USCH4_Msk & ((value) << ADC_SEQR1_USCH4_Pos)))
00354 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH5_Pos 16
00355 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH5_Msk (0x7u << ADC_SEQR1_USCH5_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_SEQR1) User Sequence Number 5 */
00356 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH5(value) ((ADC_SEQR1_USCH5_Msk & ((value) << ADC_SEQR1_USCH5_Pos)))
00357 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH6_Pos 20
00358 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH6_Msk (0x7u << ADC_SEQR1_USCH6_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_SEQR1) User Sequence Number 6 */
00359 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH6(value) ((ADC_SEQR1_USCH6_Msk & ((value) << ADC_SEQR1_USCH6_Pos)))
00360 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH7_Pos 24
00361 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH7_Msk (0x7u << ADC_SEQR1_USCH7_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_SEQR1) User Sequence Number 7 */
00362 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH7(value) ((ADC_SEQR1_USCH7_Msk & ((value) << ADC_SEQR1_USCH7_Pos)))
00363 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH8_Pos 28
00364 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH8_Msk (0x7u << ADC_SEQR1_USCH8_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_SEQR1) User Sequence Number 8 */
00365 #define ADC_SEQR1_USCH8(value) ((ADC_SEQR1_USCH8_Msk & ((value) << ADC_SEQR1_USCH8_Pos)))
00366 /* -------- ADC_SEQR2 : (ADC Offset: 0x0C) Channel Sequence Register 2 -------- */
00367 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH9_Pos 0
00368 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH9_Msk (0x7u << ADC_SEQR2_USCH9_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_SEQR2) User Sequence Number 9 */
00369 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH9(value) ((ADC_SEQR2_USCH9_Msk & ((value) << ADC_SEQR2_USCH9_Pos)))
00370 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH10_Pos 4
00371 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH10_Msk (0x7u << ADC_SEQR2_USCH10_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_SEQR2) User Sequence Number 10 */
00372 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH10(value) ((ADC_SEQR2_USCH10_Msk & ((value) << ADC_SEQR2_USCH10_Pos)))
00373 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH11_Pos 8
00374 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH11_Msk (0x7u << ADC_SEQR2_USCH11_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_SEQR2) User Sequence Number 11 */
00375 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH11(value) ((ADC_SEQR2_USCH11_Msk & ((value) << ADC_SEQR2_USCH11_Pos)))
00376 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH12_Pos 12
00377 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH12_Msk (0x7u << ADC_SEQR2_USCH12_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_SEQR2) User Sequence Number 12 */
00378 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH12(value) ((ADC_SEQR2_USCH12_Msk & ((value) << ADC_SEQR2_USCH12_Pos)))
00379 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH13_Pos 16
00380 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH13_Msk (0x7u << ADC_SEQR2_USCH13_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_SEQR2) User Sequence Number 13 */
00381 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH13(value) ((ADC_SEQR2_USCH13_Msk & ((value) << ADC_SEQR2_USCH13_Pos)))
00382 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH14_Pos 20
00383 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH14_Msk (0x7u << ADC_SEQR2_USCH14_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_SEQR2) User Sequence Number 14 */
00384 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH14(value) ((ADC_SEQR2_USCH14_Msk & ((value) << ADC_SEQR2_USCH14_Pos)))
00385 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH15_Pos 24
00386 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH15_Msk (0x7u << ADC_SEQR2_USCH15_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_SEQR2) User Sequence Number 15 */
00387 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH15(value) ((ADC_SEQR2_USCH15_Msk & ((value) << ADC_SEQR2_USCH15_Pos)))
00388 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH16_Pos 28
00389 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH16_Msk (0x7u << ADC_SEQR2_USCH16_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_SEQR2) User Sequence Number 16 */
00390 #define ADC_SEQR2_USCH16(value) ((ADC_SEQR2_USCH16_Msk & ((value) << ADC_SEQR2_USCH16_Pos)))
00391 /* -------- ADC_CHER : (ADC Offset: 0x10) Channel Enable Register -------- */
00392 #define ADC_CHER_CH0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_CHER) Channel 0 Enable */
00393 #define ADC_CHER_CH1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (ADC_CHER) Channel 1 Enable */
00394 #define ADC_CHER_CH2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (ADC_CHER) Channel 2 Enable */
00395 #define ADC_CHER_CH3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (ADC_CHER) Channel 3 Enable */
00396 #define ADC_CHER_CH4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (ADC_CHER) Channel 4 Enable */
00397 #define ADC_CHER_CH5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (ADC_CHER) Channel 5 Enable */
00398 #define ADC_CHER_CH6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (ADC_CHER) Channel 6 Enable */
00399 #define ADC_CHER_CH7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (ADC_CHER) Channel 7 Enable */
00400 #define ADC_CHER_CH8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (ADC_CHER) Channel 8 Enable */
00401 #define ADC_CHER_CH9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (ADC_CHER) Channel 9 Enable */
00402 #define ADC_CHER_CH10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (ADC_CHER) Channel 10 Enable */
00403 #define ADC_CHER_CH11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (ADC_CHER) Channel 11 Enable */
00404 #define ADC_CHER_CH12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (ADC_CHER) Channel 12 Enable */
00405 #define ADC_CHER_CH13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (ADC_CHER) Channel 13 Enable */
00406 #define ADC_CHER_CH14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (ADC_CHER) Channel 14 Enable */
00407 #define ADC_CHER_CH15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (ADC_CHER) Channel 15 Enable */
00408 /* -------- ADC_CHDR : (ADC Offset: 0x14) Channel Disable Register -------- */
00409 #define ADC_CHDR_CH0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_CHDR) Channel 0 Disable */
00410 #define ADC_CHDR_CH1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (ADC_CHDR) Channel 1 Disable */
00411 #define ADC_CHDR_CH2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (ADC_CHDR) Channel 2 Disable */
00412 #define ADC_CHDR_CH3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (ADC_CHDR) Channel 3 Disable */
00413 #define ADC_CHDR_CH4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (ADC_CHDR) Channel 4 Disable */
00414 #define ADC_CHDR_CH5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (ADC_CHDR) Channel 5 Disable */
00415 #define ADC_CHDR_CH6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (ADC_CHDR) Channel 6 Disable */
00416 #define ADC_CHDR_CH7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (ADC_CHDR) Channel 7 Disable */
00417 #define ADC_CHDR_CH8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (ADC_CHDR) Channel 8 Disable */
00418 #define ADC_CHDR_CH9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (ADC_CHDR) Channel 9 Disable */
00419 #define ADC_CHDR_CH10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (ADC_CHDR) Channel 10 Disable */
00420 #define ADC_CHDR_CH11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (ADC_CHDR) Channel 11 Disable */
00421 #define ADC_CHDR_CH12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (ADC_CHDR) Channel 12 Disable */
00422 #define ADC_CHDR_CH13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (ADC_CHDR) Channel 13 Disable */
00423 #define ADC_CHDR_CH14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (ADC_CHDR) Channel 14 Disable */
00424 #define ADC_CHDR_CH15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (ADC_CHDR) Channel 15 Disable */
00425 /* -------- ADC_CHSR : (ADC Offset: 0x18) Channel Status Register -------- */
00426 #define ADC_CHSR_CH0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_CHSR) Channel 0 Status */
00427 #define ADC_CHSR_CH1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (ADC_CHSR) Channel 1 Status */
00428 #define ADC_CHSR_CH2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (ADC_CHSR) Channel 2 Status */
00429 #define ADC_CHSR_CH3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (ADC_CHSR) Channel 3 Status */
00430 #define ADC_CHSR_CH4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (ADC_CHSR) Channel 4 Status */
00431 #define ADC_CHSR_CH5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (ADC_CHSR) Channel 5 Status */
00432 #define ADC_CHSR_CH6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (ADC_CHSR) Channel 6 Status */
00433 #define ADC_CHSR_CH7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (ADC_CHSR) Channel 7 Status */
00434 #define ADC_CHSR_CH8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (ADC_CHSR) Channel 8 Status */
00435 #define ADC_CHSR_CH9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (ADC_CHSR) Channel 9 Status */
00436 #define ADC_CHSR_CH10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (ADC_CHSR) Channel 10 Status */
00437 #define ADC_CHSR_CH11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (ADC_CHSR) Channel 11 Status */
00438 #define ADC_CHSR_CH12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (ADC_CHSR) Channel 12 Status */
00439 #define ADC_CHSR_CH13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (ADC_CHSR) Channel 13 Status */
00440 #define ADC_CHSR_CH14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (ADC_CHSR) Channel 14 Status */
00441 #define ADC_CHSR_CH15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (ADC_CHSR) Channel 15 Status */
00442 /* -------- ADC_LCDR : (ADC Offset: 0x20) Last Converted Data Register -------- */
00443 #define ADC_LCDR_LDATA_Pos 0
00444 #define ADC_LCDR_LDATA_Msk (0xfffu << ADC_LCDR_LDATA_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_LCDR) Last Data Converted */
00445 #define ADC_LCDR_CHNB_Pos 12
00446 #define ADC_LCDR_CHNB_Msk (0xfu << ADC_LCDR_CHNB_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_LCDR) Channel Number */
00447 /* -------- ADC_IER : (ADC Offset: 0x24) Interrupt Enable Register -------- */
00448 #define ADC_IER_EOC0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) End of Conversion Interrupt Enable 0 */
00449 #define ADC_IER_EOC1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) End of Conversion Interrupt Enable 1 */
00450 #define ADC_IER_EOC2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) End of Conversion Interrupt Enable 2 */
00451 #define ADC_IER_EOC3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) End of Conversion Interrupt Enable 3 */
00452 #define ADC_IER_EOC4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) End of Conversion Interrupt Enable 4 */
00453 #define ADC_IER_EOC5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) End of Conversion Interrupt Enable 5 */
00454 #define ADC_IER_EOC6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) End of Conversion Interrupt Enable 6 */
00455 #define ADC_IER_EOC7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) End of Conversion Interrupt Enable 7 */
00456 #define ADC_IER_EOC8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) End of Conversion Interrupt Enable 8 */
00457 #define ADC_IER_EOC9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) End of Conversion Interrupt Enable 9 */
00458 #define ADC_IER_EOC10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) End of Conversion Interrupt Enable 10 */
00459 #define ADC_IER_EOC11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) End of Conversion Interrupt Enable 11 */
00460 #define ADC_IER_EOC12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) End of Conversion Interrupt Enable 12 */
00461 #define ADC_IER_EOC13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) End of Conversion Interrupt Enable 13 */
00462 #define ADC_IER_EOC14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) End of Conversion Interrupt Enable 14 */
00463 #define ADC_IER_EOC15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) End of Conversion Interrupt Enable 15 */
00464 #define ADC_IER_DRDY (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) Data Ready Interrupt Enable */
00465 #define ADC_IER_GOVRE (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) General Overrun Error Interrupt Enable */
00466 #define ADC_IER_COMPE (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) Comparison Event Interrupt Enable */
00467 #define ADC_IER_ENDRX (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) End of Receive Buffer Interrupt Enable */
00468 #define ADC_IER_RXBUFF (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (ADC_IER) Receive Buffer Full Interrupt Enable */
00469 /* -------- ADC_IDR : (ADC Offset: 0x28) Interrupt Disable Register -------- */
00470 #define ADC_IDR_EOC0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) End of Conversion Interrupt Disable 0 */
00471 #define ADC_IDR_EOC1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) End of Conversion Interrupt Disable 1 */
00472 #define ADC_IDR_EOC2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) End of Conversion Interrupt Disable 2 */
00473 #define ADC_IDR_EOC3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) End of Conversion Interrupt Disable 3 */
00474 #define ADC_IDR_EOC4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) End of Conversion Interrupt Disable 4 */
00475 #define ADC_IDR_EOC5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) End of Conversion Interrupt Disable 5 */
00476 #define ADC_IDR_EOC6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) End of Conversion Interrupt Disable 6 */
00477 #define ADC_IDR_EOC7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) End of Conversion Interrupt Disable 7 */
00478 #define ADC_IDR_EOC8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) End of Conversion Interrupt Disable 8 */
00479 #define ADC_IDR_EOC9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) End of Conversion Interrupt Disable 9 */
00480 #define ADC_IDR_EOC10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) End of Conversion Interrupt Disable 10 */
00481 #define ADC_IDR_EOC11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) End of Conversion Interrupt Disable 11 */
00482 #define ADC_IDR_EOC12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) End of Conversion Interrupt Disable 12 */
00483 #define ADC_IDR_EOC13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) End of Conversion Interrupt Disable 13 */
00484 #define ADC_IDR_EOC14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) End of Conversion Interrupt Disable 14 */
00485 #define ADC_IDR_EOC15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) End of Conversion Interrupt Disable 15 */
00486 #define ADC_IDR_DRDY (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) Data Ready Interrupt Disable */
00487 #define ADC_IDR_GOVRE (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) General Overrun Error Interrupt Disable */
00488 #define ADC_IDR_COMPE (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) Comparison Event Interrupt Disable */
00489 #define ADC_IDR_ENDRX (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) End of Receive Buffer Interrupt Disable */
00490 #define ADC_IDR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (ADC_IDR) Receive Buffer Full Interrupt Disable */
00491 /* -------- ADC_IMR : (ADC Offset: 0x2C) Interrupt Mask Register -------- */
00492 #define ADC_IMR_EOC0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) End of Conversion Interrupt Mask 0 */
00493 #define ADC_IMR_EOC1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) End of Conversion Interrupt Mask 1 */
00494 #define ADC_IMR_EOC2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) End of Conversion Interrupt Mask 2 */
00495 #define ADC_IMR_EOC3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) End of Conversion Interrupt Mask 3 */
00496 #define ADC_IMR_EOC4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) End of Conversion Interrupt Mask 4 */
00497 #define ADC_IMR_EOC5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) End of Conversion Interrupt Mask 5 */
00498 #define ADC_IMR_EOC6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) End of Conversion Interrupt Mask 6 */
00499 #define ADC_IMR_EOC7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) End of Conversion Interrupt Mask 7 */
00500 #define ADC_IMR_EOC8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) End of Conversion Interrupt Mask 8 */
00501 #define ADC_IMR_EOC9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) End of Conversion Interrupt Mask 9 */
00502 #define ADC_IMR_EOC10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) End of Conversion Interrupt Mask 10 */
00503 #define ADC_IMR_EOC11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) End of Conversion Interrupt Mask 11 */
00504 #define ADC_IMR_EOC12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) End of Conversion Interrupt Mask 12 */
00505 #define ADC_IMR_EOC13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) End of Conversion Interrupt Mask 13 */
00506 #define ADC_IMR_EOC14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) End of Conversion Interrupt Mask 14 */
00507 #define ADC_IMR_EOC15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) End of Conversion Interrupt Mask 15 */
00508 #define ADC_IMR_DRDY (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) Data Ready Interrupt Mask */
00509 #define ADC_IMR_GOVRE (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) General Overrun Error Interrupt Mask */
00510 #define ADC_IMR_COMPE (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) Comparison Event Interrupt Mask */
00511 #define ADC_IMR_ENDRX (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) End of Receive Buffer Interrupt Mask */
00512 #define ADC_IMR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (ADC_IMR) Receive Buffer Full Interrupt Mask */
00513 /* -------- ADC_ISR : (ADC Offset: 0x30) Interrupt Status Register -------- */
00514 #define ADC_ISR_EOC0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) End of Conversion 0 */
00515 #define ADC_ISR_EOC1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) End of Conversion 1 */
00516 #define ADC_ISR_EOC2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) End of Conversion 2 */
00517 #define ADC_ISR_EOC3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) End of Conversion 3 */
00518 #define ADC_ISR_EOC4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) End of Conversion 4 */
00519 #define ADC_ISR_EOC5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) End of Conversion 5 */
00520 #define ADC_ISR_EOC6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) End of Conversion 6 */
00521 #define ADC_ISR_EOC7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) End of Conversion 7 */
00522 #define ADC_ISR_EOC8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) End of Conversion 8 */
00523 #define ADC_ISR_EOC9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) End of Conversion 9 */
00524 #define ADC_ISR_EOC10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) End of Conversion 10 */
00525 #define ADC_ISR_EOC11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) End of Conversion 11 */
00526 #define ADC_ISR_EOC12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) End of Conversion 12 */
00527 #define ADC_ISR_EOC13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) End of Conversion 13 */
00528 #define ADC_ISR_EOC14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) End of Conversion 14 */
00529 #define ADC_ISR_EOC15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) End of Conversion 15 */
00530 #define ADC_ISR_DRDY (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) Data Ready */
00531 #define ADC_ISR_GOVRE (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) General Overrun Error */
00532 #define ADC_ISR_COMPE (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) Comparison Error */
00533 #define ADC_ISR_ENDRX (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) End of RX Buffer */
00534 #define ADC_ISR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (ADC_ISR) RX Buffer Full */
00535 /* -------- ADC_OVER : (ADC Offset: 0x3C) Overrun Status Register -------- */
00536 #define ADC_OVER_OVRE0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_OVER) Overrun Error 0 */
00537 #define ADC_OVER_OVRE1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (ADC_OVER) Overrun Error 1 */
00538 #define ADC_OVER_OVRE2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (ADC_OVER) Overrun Error 2 */
00539 #define ADC_OVER_OVRE3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (ADC_OVER) Overrun Error 3 */
00540 #define ADC_OVER_OVRE4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (ADC_OVER) Overrun Error 4 */
00541 #define ADC_OVER_OVRE5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (ADC_OVER) Overrun Error 5 */
00542 #define ADC_OVER_OVRE6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (ADC_OVER) Overrun Error 6 */
00543 #define ADC_OVER_OVRE7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (ADC_OVER) Overrun Error 7 */
00544 #define ADC_OVER_OVRE8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (ADC_OVER) Overrun Error 8 */
00545 #define ADC_OVER_OVRE9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (ADC_OVER) Overrun Error 9 */
00546 #define ADC_OVER_OVRE10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (ADC_OVER) Overrun Error 10 */
00547 #define ADC_OVER_OVRE11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (ADC_OVER) Overrun Error 11 */
00548 #define ADC_OVER_OVRE12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (ADC_OVER) Overrun Error 12 */
00549 #define ADC_OVER_OVRE13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (ADC_OVER) Overrun Error 13 */
00550 #define ADC_OVER_OVRE14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (ADC_OVER) Overrun Error 14 */
00551 #define ADC_OVER_OVRE15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (ADC_OVER) Overrun Error 15 */
00552 /* -------- ADC_EMR : (ADC Offset: 0x40) Extended Mode Register -------- */
00553 #define ADC_EMR_CMPMODE_Pos 0
00554 #define ADC_EMR_CMPMODE_Msk (0x3u << ADC_EMR_CMPMODE_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_EMR) Comparison Mode */
00555 #define   ADC_EMR_CMPMODE_LOW (0x0u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_EMR) Generates an event when the converted data is lower than the low threshold of the window. */
00556 #define   ADC_EMR_CMPMODE_HIGH (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_EMR) Generates an event when the converted data is higher than the high threshold of the window. */
00557 #define   ADC_EMR_CMPMODE_IN (0x2u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_EMR) Generates an event when the converted data is in the comparison window. */
00558 #define   ADC_EMR_CMPMODE_OUT (0x3u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_EMR) Generates an event when the converted data is out of the comparison window. */
00559 #define ADC_EMR_CMPSEL_Pos 4
00560 #define ADC_EMR_CMPSEL_Msk (0xfu << ADC_EMR_CMPSEL_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_EMR) Comparison Selected Channel */
00561 #define ADC_EMR_CMPSEL(value) ((ADC_EMR_CMPSEL_Msk & ((value) << ADC_EMR_CMPSEL_Pos)))
00562 #define ADC_EMR_CMPALL (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (ADC_EMR) Compare All Channels */
00563 #define ADC_EMR_TAG (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (ADC_EMR) TAG of ADC_LDCR register */
00564 /* -------- ADC_CWR : (ADC Offset: 0x44) Compare Window Register -------- */
00565 #define ADC_CWR_LOWTHRES_Pos 0
00566 #define ADC_CWR_LOWTHRES_Msk (0xfffu << ADC_CWR_LOWTHRES_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CWR) Low Threshold */
00567 #define ADC_CWR_LOWTHRES(value) ((ADC_CWR_LOWTHRES_Msk & ((value) << ADC_CWR_LOWTHRES_Pos)))
00568 #define ADC_CWR_HIGHTHRES_Pos 16
00569 #define ADC_CWR_HIGHTHRES_Msk (0xfffu << ADC_CWR_HIGHTHRES_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CWR) High Threshold */
00570 #define ADC_CWR_HIGHTHRES(value) ((ADC_CWR_HIGHTHRES_Msk & ((value) << ADC_CWR_HIGHTHRES_Pos)))
00571 /* -------- ADC_CGR : (ADC Offset: 0x48) Channel Gain Register -------- */
00572 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN0_Pos 0
00573 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN0_Msk (0x3u << ADC_CGR_GAIN0_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CGR) Gain for channel 0 */
00574 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN0(value) ((ADC_CGR_GAIN0_Msk & ((value) << ADC_CGR_GAIN0_Pos)))
00575 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN1_Pos 2
00576 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN1_Msk (0x3u << ADC_CGR_GAIN1_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CGR) Gain for channel 1 */
00577 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN1(value) ((ADC_CGR_GAIN1_Msk & ((value) << ADC_CGR_GAIN1_Pos)))
00578 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN2_Pos 4
00579 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN2_Msk (0x3u << ADC_CGR_GAIN2_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CGR) Gain for channel 2 */
00580 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN2(value) ((ADC_CGR_GAIN2_Msk & ((value) << ADC_CGR_GAIN2_Pos)))
00581 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN3_Pos 6
00582 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN3_Msk (0x3u << ADC_CGR_GAIN3_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CGR) Gain for channel 3 */
00583 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN3(value) ((ADC_CGR_GAIN3_Msk & ((value) << ADC_CGR_GAIN3_Pos)))
00584 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN4_Pos 8
00585 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN4_Msk (0x3u << ADC_CGR_GAIN4_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CGR) Gain for channel 4 */
00586 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN4(value) ((ADC_CGR_GAIN4_Msk & ((value) << ADC_CGR_GAIN4_Pos)))
00587 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN5_Pos 10
00588 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN5_Msk (0x3u << ADC_CGR_GAIN5_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CGR) Gain for channel 5 */
00589 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN5(value) ((ADC_CGR_GAIN5_Msk & ((value) << ADC_CGR_GAIN5_Pos)))
00590 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN6_Pos 12
00591 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN6_Msk (0x3u << ADC_CGR_GAIN6_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CGR) Gain for channel 6 */
00592 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN6(value) ((ADC_CGR_GAIN6_Msk & ((value) << ADC_CGR_GAIN6_Pos)))
00593 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN7_Pos 14
00594 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN7_Msk (0x3u << ADC_CGR_GAIN7_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CGR) Gain for channel 7 */
00595 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN7(value) ((ADC_CGR_GAIN7_Msk & ((value) << ADC_CGR_GAIN7_Pos)))
00596 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN8_Pos 16
00597 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN8_Msk (0x3u << ADC_CGR_GAIN8_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CGR) Gain for channel 8 */
00598 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN8(value) ((ADC_CGR_GAIN8_Msk & ((value) << ADC_CGR_GAIN8_Pos)))
00599 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN9_Pos 18
00600 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN9_Msk (0x3u << ADC_CGR_GAIN9_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CGR) Gain for channel 9 */
00601 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN9(value) ((ADC_CGR_GAIN9_Msk & ((value) << ADC_CGR_GAIN9_Pos)))
00602 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN10_Pos 20
00603 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN10_Msk (0x3u << ADC_CGR_GAIN10_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CGR) Gain for channel 10 */
00604 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN10(value) ((ADC_CGR_GAIN10_Msk & ((value) << ADC_CGR_GAIN10_Pos)))
00605 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN11_Pos 22
00606 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN11_Msk (0x3u << ADC_CGR_GAIN11_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CGR) Gain for channel 11 */
00607 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN11(value) ((ADC_CGR_GAIN11_Msk & ((value) << ADC_CGR_GAIN11_Pos)))
00608 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN12_Pos 24
00609 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN12_Msk (0x3u << ADC_CGR_GAIN12_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CGR) Gain for channel 12 */
00610 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN12(value) ((ADC_CGR_GAIN12_Msk & ((value) << ADC_CGR_GAIN12_Pos)))
00611 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN13_Pos 26
00612 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN13_Msk (0x3u << ADC_CGR_GAIN13_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CGR) Gain for channel 13 */
00613 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN13(value) ((ADC_CGR_GAIN13_Msk & ((value) << ADC_CGR_GAIN13_Pos)))
00614 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN14_Pos 28
00615 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN14_Msk (0x3u << ADC_CGR_GAIN14_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CGR) Gain for channel 14 */
00616 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN14(value) ((ADC_CGR_GAIN14_Msk & ((value) << ADC_CGR_GAIN14_Pos)))
00617 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN15_Pos 30
00618 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN15_Msk (0x3u << ADC_CGR_GAIN15_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CGR) Gain for channel 15 */
00619 #define ADC_CGR_GAIN15(value) ((ADC_CGR_GAIN15_Msk & ((value) << ADC_CGR_GAIN15_Pos)))
00620 /* -------- ADC_COR : (ADC Offset: 0x4C) Channel Offset Register -------- */
00621 #define ADC_COR_OFF0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Offset for channel 0 */
00622 #define ADC_COR_OFF1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Offset for channel 1 */
00623 #define ADC_COR_OFF2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Offset for channel 2 */
00624 #define ADC_COR_OFF3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Offset for channel 3 */
00625 #define ADC_COR_OFF4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Offset for channel 4 */
00626 #define ADC_COR_OFF5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Offset for channel 5 */
00627 #define ADC_COR_OFF6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Offset for channel 6 */
00628 #define ADC_COR_OFF7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Offset for channel 7 */
00629 #define ADC_COR_OFF8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Offset for channel 8 */
00630 #define ADC_COR_OFF9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Offset for channel 9 */
00631 #define ADC_COR_OFF10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Offset for channel 10 */
00632 #define ADC_COR_OFF11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Offset for channel 11 */
00633 #define ADC_COR_OFF12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Offset for channel 12 */
00634 #define ADC_COR_OFF13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Offset for channel 13 */
00635 #define ADC_COR_OFF14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Offset for channel 14 */
00636 #define ADC_COR_OFF15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Offset for channel 15 */
00637 #define ADC_COR_DIFF0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Differential inputs for channel 0 */
00638 #define ADC_COR_DIFF1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Differential inputs for channel 1 */
00639 #define ADC_COR_DIFF2 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Differential inputs for channel 2 */
00640 #define ADC_COR_DIFF3 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Differential inputs for channel 3 */
00641 #define ADC_COR_DIFF4 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Differential inputs for channel 4 */
00642 #define ADC_COR_DIFF5 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Differential inputs for channel 5 */
00643 #define ADC_COR_DIFF6 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Differential inputs for channel 6 */
00644 #define ADC_COR_DIFF7 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Differential inputs for channel 7 */
00645 #define ADC_COR_DIFF8 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Differential inputs for channel 8 */
00646 #define ADC_COR_DIFF9 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Differential inputs for channel 9 */
00647 #define ADC_COR_DIFF10 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Differential inputs for channel 10 */
00648 #define ADC_COR_DIFF11 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Differential inputs for channel 11 */
00649 #define ADC_COR_DIFF12 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Differential inputs for channel 12 */
00650 #define ADC_COR_DIFF13 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Differential inputs for channel 13 */
00651 #define ADC_COR_DIFF14 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Differential inputs for channel 14 */
00652 #define ADC_COR_DIFF15 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (ADC_COR) Differential inputs for channel 15 */
00653 /* -------- ADC_CDR[16] : (ADC Offset: 0x50) Channel Data Register -------- */
00654 #define ADC_CDR_DATA_Pos 0
00655 #define ADC_CDR_DATA_Msk (0x3ffu << ADC_CDR_DATA_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_CDR[16]) Converted Data */
00656 /* -------- ADC_ACR : (ADC Offset: 0x94) Analog Control Register -------- */
00657 #define ADC_ACR_TSON (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (ADC_ACR) Temperature Sensor On */
00658 #define ADC_ACR_IBCTL_Pos 8
00659 #define ADC_ACR_IBCTL_Msk (0x3u << ADC_ACR_IBCTL_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_ACR) ADC Bias Current Control */
00660 #define ADC_ACR_IBCTL(value) ((ADC_ACR_IBCTL_Msk & ((value) << ADC_ACR_IBCTL_Pos)))
00661 /* -------- ADC_WPMR : (ADC Offset: 0xE4) Write Protect Mode Register -------- */
00662 #define ADC_WPMR_WPEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_WPMR) Write Protect Enable */
00663 #define ADC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos 8
00664 #define ADC_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk (0xffffffu << ADC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_WPMR) Write Protect KEY */
00665 #define ADC_WPMR_WPKEY(value) ((ADC_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk & ((value) << ADC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos)))
00666 /* -------- ADC_WPSR : (ADC Offset: 0xE8) Write Protect Status Register -------- */
00667 #define ADC_WPSR_WPVS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_WPSR) Write Protect Violation Status */
00668 #define ADC_WPSR_WPVSRC_Pos 8
00669 #define ADC_WPSR_WPVSRC_Msk (0xffffu << ADC_WPSR_WPVSRC_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_WPSR) Write Protect Violation Source */
00670 /* -------- ADC_RPR : (ADC Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register -------- */
00671 #define ADC_RPR_RXPTR_Pos 0
00672 #define ADC_RPR_RXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << ADC_RPR_RXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_RPR) Receive Pointer Register */
00673 #define ADC_RPR_RXPTR(value) ((ADC_RPR_RXPTR_Msk & ((value) << ADC_RPR_RXPTR_Pos)))
00674 /* -------- ADC_RCR : (ADC Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register -------- */
00675 #define ADC_RCR_RXCTR_Pos 0
00676 #define ADC_RCR_RXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << ADC_RCR_RXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_RCR) Receive Counter Register */
00677 #define ADC_RCR_RXCTR(value) ((ADC_RCR_RXCTR_Msk & ((value) << ADC_RCR_RXCTR_Pos)))
00678 /* -------- ADC_TPR : (ADC Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register -------- */
00679 #define ADC_TPR_TXPTR_Pos 0
00680 #define ADC_TPR_TXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << ADC_TPR_TXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_TPR) Transmit Counter Register */
00681 #define ADC_TPR_TXPTR(value) ((ADC_TPR_TXPTR_Msk & ((value) << ADC_TPR_TXPTR_Pos)))
00682 /* -------- ADC_TCR : (ADC Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register -------- */
00683 #define ADC_TCR_TXCTR_Pos 0
00684 #define ADC_TCR_TXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << ADC_TCR_TXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_TCR) Transmit Counter Register */
00685 #define ADC_TCR_TXCTR(value) ((ADC_TCR_TXCTR_Msk & ((value) << ADC_TCR_TXCTR_Pos)))
00686 /* -------- ADC_RNPR : (ADC Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register -------- */
00687 #define ADC_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos 0
00688 #define ADC_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << ADC_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_RNPR) Receive Next Pointer */
00689 #define ADC_RNPR_RXNPTR(value) ((ADC_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << ADC_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos)))
00690 /* -------- ADC_RNCR : (ADC Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register -------- */
00691 #define ADC_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos 0
00692 #define ADC_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << ADC_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_RNCR) Receive Next Counter */
00693 #define ADC_RNCR_RXNCTR(value) ((ADC_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << ADC_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos)))
00694 /* -------- ADC_TNPR : (ADC Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register -------- */
00695 #define ADC_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos 0
00696 #define ADC_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << ADC_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_TNPR) Transmit Next Pointer */
00697 #define ADC_TNPR_TXNPTR(value) ((ADC_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << ADC_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos)))
00698 /* -------- ADC_TNCR : (ADC Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register -------- */
00699 #define ADC_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos 0
00700 #define ADC_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << ADC_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (ADC_TNCR) Transmit Counter Next */
00701 #define ADC_TNCR_TXNCTR(value) ((ADC_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << ADC_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos)))
00702 /* -------- ADC_PTCR : (ADC Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register -------- */
00703 #define ADC_PTCR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
00704 #define ADC_PTCR_RXTDIS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (ADC_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Disable */
00705 #define ADC_PTCR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (ADC_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
00706 #define ADC_PTCR_TXTDIS (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (ADC_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Disable */
00707 /* -------- ADC_PTSR : (ADC Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register -------- */
00708 #define ADC_PTSR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (ADC_PTSR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
00709 #define ADC_PTSR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (ADC_PTSR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
00710 
00711 /*@}*/
00712 
00713 /* ============================================================================= */
00714 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Chip Identifier */
00715 /* ============================================================================= */
00716 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_CHIPID Chip Identifier */
00717 /*@{*/
00718 
00719 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
00720 /** \brief Chipid hardware registers */
00721 typedef struct {
00722   RoReg CHIPID_CIDR; /**< \brief (Chipid Offset: 0x0) Chip ID Register */
00723   RoReg CHIPID_EXID; /**< \brief (Chipid Offset: 0x4) Chip ID Extension Register */
00724 } Chipid;
00725 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
00726 /* -------- CHIPID_CIDR : (CHIPID Offset: 0x0) Chip ID Register -------- */
00727 #define CHIPID_CIDR_VERSION_Pos 0
00728 #define CHIPID_CIDR_VERSION_Msk (0x1fu << CHIPID_CIDR_VERSION_Pos) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) Version of the Device */
00729 #define CHIPID_CIDR_EPROC_Pos 5
00730 #define CHIPID_CIDR_EPROC_Msk (0x7u << CHIPID_CIDR_EPROC_Pos) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) Embedded Processor */
00731 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_EPROC_ARM946ES (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) ARM946ES */
00732 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_EPROC_ARM7TDMI (0x2u << 5) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) ARM7TDMI */
00733 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_EPROC_CM3 (0x3u << 5) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) Cortex-M3 */
00734 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_EPROC_ARM920T (0x4u << 5) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) ARM920T */
00735 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_EPROC_ARM926EJS (0x5u << 5) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) ARM926EJS */
00736 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_EPROC_CA5 (0x6u << 5) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) Cortex-A5 */
00737 #define CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ_Pos 8
00738 #define CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ_Msk (0xfu << CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ_Pos) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) Nonvolatile Program Memory Size */
00739 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ_NONE (0x0u << 8) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) None */
00740 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ_8K (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 8K bytes */
00741 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ_16K (0x2u << 8) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 16K bytes */
00742 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ_32K (0x3u << 8) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 32K bytes */
00743 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ_64K (0x5u << 8) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 64K bytes */
00744 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ_128K (0x7u << 8) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 128K bytes */
00745 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ_256K (0x9u << 8) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 256K bytes */
00746 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ_512K (0xAu << 8) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 512K bytes */
00747 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ_1024K (0xCu << 8) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 1024K bytes */
00748 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ_2048K (0xEu << 8) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 2048K bytes */
00749 #define CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ2_Pos 12
00750 #define CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ2_Msk (0xfu << CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ2_Pos) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR)  */
00751 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ2_NONE (0x0u << 12) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) None */
00752 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ2_8K (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 8K bytes */
00753 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ2_16K (0x2u << 12) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 16K bytes */
00754 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ2_32K (0x3u << 12) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 32K bytes */
00755 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ2_64K (0x5u << 12) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 64K bytes */
00756 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ2_128K (0x7u << 12) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 128K bytes */
00757 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ2_256K (0x9u << 12) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 256K bytes */
00758 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ2_512K (0xAu << 12) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 512K bytes */
00759 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ2_1024K (0xCu << 12) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 1024K bytes */
00760 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPSIZ2_2048K (0xEu << 12) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 2048K bytes */
00761 #define CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_Pos 16
00762 #define CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_Msk (0xfu << CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_Pos) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) Internal SRAM Size */
00763 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_48K (0x0u << 16) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 48K bytes */
00764 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_1K (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 1K bytes */
00765 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_2K (0x2u << 16) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 2K bytes */
00766 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_6K (0x3u << 16) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 6K bytes */
00767 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_112K (0x4u << 16) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 112K bytes */
00768 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_4K (0x5u << 16) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 4K bytes */
00769 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_80K (0x6u << 16) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 80K bytes */
00770 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_160K (0x7u << 16) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 160K bytes */
00771 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_8K (0x8u << 16) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 8K bytes */
00772 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_16K (0x9u << 16) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 16K bytes */
00773 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_32K (0xAu << 16) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 32K bytes */
00774 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_64K (0xBu << 16) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 64K bytes */
00775 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_128K (0xCu << 16) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 128K bytes */
00776 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_256K (0xDu << 16) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 256K bytes */
00777 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_96K (0xEu << 16) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 96K bytes */
00778 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_SRAMSIZ_512K (0xFu << 16) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) 512K bytes */
00779 #define CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_Pos 20
00780 #define CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_Msk (0xffu << CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_Pos) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) Architecture Identifier */
00781 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_AT91SAM9xx (0x19u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) AT91SAM9xx Series */
00782 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_AT91SAM9XExx (0x29u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) AT91SAM9XExx Series */
00783 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_AT91x34 (0x34u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) AT91x34 Series */
00784 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_CAP7 (0x37u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) CAP7 Series */
00785 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_CAP9 (0x39u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) CAP9 Series */
00786 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_CAP11 (0x3Bu << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) CAP11 Series */
00787 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_AT91x40 (0x40u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) AT91x40 Series */
00788 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_AT91x42 (0x42u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) AT91x42 Series */
00789 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_AT91x55 (0x55u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) AT91x55 Series */
00790 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_AT91SAM7Axx (0x60u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) AT91SAM7Axx Series */
00791 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_AT91SAM7AQxx (0x61u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) AT91SAM7AQxx Series */
00792 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_AT91x63 (0x63u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) AT91x63 Series */
00793 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_AT91SAM7Sxx (0x70u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) AT91SAM7Sxx Series */
00794 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_AT91SAM7XCxx (0x71u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) AT91SAM7XCxx Series */
00795 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_AT91SAM7SExx (0x72u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) AT91SAM7SExx Series */
00796 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_AT91SAM7Lxx (0x73u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) AT91SAM7Lxx Series */
00797 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_AT91SAM7Xxx (0x75u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) AT91SAM7Xxx Series */
00798 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_AT91SAM7SLxx (0x76u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) AT91SAM7SLxx Series */
00799 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_SAM3UxC (0x80u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) SAM3UxC Series (100-pin version) */
00800 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_SAM3UxE (0x81u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) SAM3UxE Series (144-pin version) */
00801 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_SAM3AxC (0x83u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) SAM3AxC Series (100-pin version) */
00802 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_SAM3XxC (0x84u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) SAM3XxC Series (100-pin version) */
00803 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_SAM3XxE (0x85u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) SAM3XxE Series (144-pin version) */
00804 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_SAM3XxG (0x86u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) SAM3XxG Series (208/217-pin version) */
00805 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_SAM3SxA (0x88u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) SAM3SxA Series (48-pin version) */
00806 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_SAM3SxB (0x89u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) SAM3SxB Series (64-pin version) */
00807 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_SAM3SxC (0x8Au << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) SAM3SxC Series (100-pin version) */
00808 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_AT91x92 (0x92u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) AT91x92 Series */
00809 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_SAM3NxA (0x93u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) SAM3NxA Series (48-pin version) */
00810 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_SAM3NxB (0x94u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) SAM3NxB Series (64-pin version) */
00811 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_SAM3NxC (0x95u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) SAM3NxC Series (100-pin version) */
00812 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_SAM3SDxA (0x98u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) SAM3SDxA Series (48-pin version) */
00813 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_SAM3SDxB (0x99u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) SAM3SDxB Series (64-pin version) */
00814 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_SAM3SDxC (0x9Au << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) SAM3SDxC Series (100-pin version) */
00815 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_SAM5A (0xA5u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) SAM5A */
00816 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_ARCH_AT75Cxx (0xF0u << 20) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) AT75Cxx Series */
00817 #define CHIPID_CIDR_NVPTYP_Pos 28
00818 #define CHIPID_CIDR_NVPTYP_Msk (0x7u << CHIPID_CIDR_NVPTYP_Pos) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) Nonvolatile Program Memory Type */
00819 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPTYP_ROM (0x0u << 28) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) ROM */
00820 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPTYP_ROMLESS (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) ROMless or on-chip Flash */
00821 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPTYP_FLASH (0x2u << 28) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) Embedded Flash Memory */
00822 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPTYP_ROM_FLASH (0x3u << 28) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) ROM and Embedded Flash MemoryNVPSIZ is ROM size NVPSIZ2 is Flash size */
00823 #define   CHIPID_CIDR_NVPTYP_SRAM (0x4u << 28) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) SRAM emulating ROM */
00824 #define CHIPID_CIDR_EXT (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (CHIPID_CIDR) Extension Flag */
00825 /* -------- CHIPID_EXID : (CHIPID Offset: 0x4) Chip ID Extension Register -------- */
00826 #define CHIPID_EXID_EXID_Pos 0
00827 #define CHIPID_EXID_EXID_Msk (0xffffffffu << CHIPID_EXID_EXID_Pos) /**< \brief (CHIPID_EXID) Chip ID Extension */
00828 
00829 /*@}*/
00830 
00831 /* ============================================================================= */
00832 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Cyclic Redundancy Check Calculation Unit */
00833 /* ============================================================================= */
00834 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_CRCCU Cyclic Redundancy Check Calculation Unit */
00835 /*@{*/
00836 
00837 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
00838 /** \brief Crccu hardware registers */
00839 typedef struct {
00840   RwReg CRCCU_DSCR;    /**< \brief (Crccu Offset: 0x00000000) CRCCU Descriptor Base Register */
00841   RwReg Reserved1[1];
00842   WoReg CRCCU_DMA_EN;  /**< \brief (Crccu Offset: 0x00000008) CRCCU DMA Enable Register */
00843   WoReg CRCCU_DMA_DIS; /**< \brief (Crccu Offset: 0x0000000C) CRCCU DMA Disable Register */
00844   RoReg CRCCU_DMA_SR;  /**< \brief (Crccu Offset: 0x00000010) CRCCU DMA Status Register */
00845   WoReg CRCCU_DMA_IER; /**< \brief (Crccu Offset: 0x00000014) CRCCU DMA Interrupt Enable Register */
00846   WoReg CRCCU_DMA_IDR; /**< \brief (Crccu Offset: 0x00000018) CRCCU DMA Interrupt Disable Register */
00847   RoReg CRCCU_DMA_IMR; /**< \brief (Crccu Offset: 0x0000001C) CRCCU DMA Interrupt Mask Register */
00848   RoReg CRCCU_DMA_ISR; /**< \brief (Crccu Offset: 0x00000020) CRCCU DMA Interrupt Status Register */
00849   RwReg Reserved2[4];
00850   WoReg CRCCU_CR;      /**< \brief (Crccu Offset: 0x00000034) CRCCU Control Register */
00851   RwReg CRCCU_MR;      /**< \brief (Crccu Offset: 0x00000038) CRCCU Mode Register */
00852   RoReg CRCCU_SR;      /**< \brief (Crccu Offset: 0x0000003C) CRCCU Status Register */
00853   WoReg CRCCU_IER;     /**< \brief (Crccu Offset: 0x00000040) CRCCU Interrupt Enable Register */
00854   WoReg CRCCU_IDR;     /**< \brief (Crccu Offset: 0x00000044) CRCCU Interrupt Disable Register */
00855   RoReg CRCCU_IMR;     /**< \brief (Crccu Offset: 0x00000048) CRCCU Interrupt Mask Register */
00856   RoReg CRCCU_ISR;     /**< \brief (Crccu Offset: 0x0000004C) CRCCU Interrupt Status Register */
00857 } Crccu;
00858 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
00859 /* -------- CRCCU_DSCR : (CRCCU Offset: 0x00000000) CRCCU Descriptor Base Register -------- */
00860 #define CRCCU_DSCR_DSCR_Pos 9
00861 #define CRCCU_DSCR_DSCR_Msk (0x7fffffu << CRCCU_DSCR_DSCR_Pos) /**< \brief (CRCCU_DSCR) Descriptor Base Address */
00862 #define CRCCU_DSCR_DSCR(value) ((CRCCU_DSCR_DSCR_Msk & ((value) << CRCCU_DSCR_DSCR_Pos)))
00863 /* -------- CRCCU_DMA_EN : (CRCCU Offset: 0x00000008) CRCCU DMA Enable Register -------- */
00864 #define CRCCU_DMA_EN_DMAEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (CRCCU_DMA_EN) DMA Enable Register */
00865 /* -------- CRCCU_DMA_DIS : (CRCCU Offset: 0x0000000C) CRCCU DMA Disable Register -------- */
00866 #define CRCCU_DMA_DIS_DMADIS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (CRCCU_DMA_DIS) DMA Disable Register */
00867 /* -------- CRCCU_DMA_SR : (CRCCU Offset: 0x00000010) CRCCU DMA Status Register -------- */
00868 #define CRCCU_DMA_SR_DMASR (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (CRCCU_DMA_SR) DMA Status Register */
00869 /* -------- CRCCU_DMA_IER : (CRCCU Offset: 0x00000014) CRCCU DMA Interrupt Enable Register -------- */
00870 #define CRCCU_DMA_IER_DMAIER (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (CRCCU_DMA_IER) Interrupt Enable register */
00871 /* -------- CRCCU_DMA_IDR : (CRCCU Offset: 0x00000018) CRCCU DMA Interrupt Disable Register -------- */
00872 #define CRCCU_DMA_IDR_DMAIDR (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (CRCCU_DMA_IDR) Interrupt Disable register */
00873 /* -------- CRCCU_DMA_IMR : (CRCCU Offset: 0x0000001C) CRCCU DMA Interrupt Mask Register -------- */
00874 #define CRCCU_DMA_IMR_DMAIMR (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (CRCCU_DMA_IMR) Interrupt Mask Register */
00875 /* -------- CRCCU_DMA_ISR : (CRCCU Offset: 0x00000020) CRCCU DMA Interrupt Status Register -------- */
00876 #define CRCCU_DMA_ISR_DMAISR (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (CRCCU_DMA_ISR) Interrupt Status register */
00877 /* -------- CRCCU_CR : (CRCCU Offset: 0x00000034) CRCCU Control Register -------- */
00878 #define CRCCU_CR_RESET (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (CRCCU_CR) CRC Computation Reset */
00879 /* -------- CRCCU_MR : (CRCCU Offset: 0x00000038) CRCCU Mode Register -------- */
00880 #define CRCCU_MR_ENABLE (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (CRCCU_MR) CRC Enable */
00881 #define CRCCU_MR_COMPARE (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (CRCCU_MR) CRC Compare */
00882 #define CRCCU_MR_PTYPE_Pos 2
00883 #define CRCCU_MR_PTYPE_Msk (0x3u << CRCCU_MR_PTYPE_Pos) /**< \brief (CRCCU_MR) Primitive Polynomial */
00884 #define   CRCCU_MR_PTYPE_CCIT8023 (0x0u << 2) /**< \brief (CRCCU_MR) Polynom 0x04C11DB7 */
00885 #define   CRCCU_MR_PTYPE_CASTAGNOLI (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (CRCCU_MR) Polynom 0x1EDC6F41 */
00886 #define   CRCCU_MR_PTYPE_CCIT16 (0x2u << 2) /**< \brief (CRCCU_MR) Polynom 0x1021 */
00887 #define CRCCU_MR_DIVIDER_Pos 4
00888 #define CRCCU_MR_DIVIDER_Msk (0xfu << CRCCU_MR_DIVIDER_Pos) /**< \brief (CRCCU_MR) Request Divider */
00889 #define CRCCU_MR_DIVIDER(value) ((CRCCU_MR_DIVIDER_Msk & ((value) << CRCCU_MR_DIVIDER_Pos)))
00890 /* -------- CRCCU_SR : (CRCCU Offset: 0x0000003C) CRCCU Status Register -------- */
00891 #define CRCCU_SR_CRC_Pos 0
00892 #define CRCCU_SR_CRC_Msk (0xffffffffu << CRCCU_SR_CRC_Pos) /**< \brief (CRCCU_SR) Cyclic Redundancy Check Value */
00893 /* -------- CRCCU_IER : (CRCCU Offset: 0x00000040) CRCCU Interrupt Enable Register -------- */
00894 #define CRCCU_IER_ERRIER (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (CRCCU_IER) CRC Error Interrupt Enable */
00895 /* -------- CRCCU_IDR : (CRCCU Offset: 0x00000044) CRCCU Interrupt Disable Register -------- */
00896 #define CRCCU_IDR_ERRIDR (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (CRCCU_IDR) CRC Error Interrupt Disable */
00897 /* -------- CRCCU_IMR : (CRCCU Offset: 0x00000048) CRCCU Interrupt Mask Register -------- */
00898 #define CRCCU_IMR_ERRIMR (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (CRCCU_IMR) CRC Error Interrupt Mask */
00899 /* -------- CRCCU_ISR : (CRCCU Offset: 0x0000004C) CRCCU Interrupt Status Register -------- */
00900 #define CRCCU_ISR_ERRISR (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (CRCCU_ISR) CRC Error Interrupt Status */
00901 
00902 /*@}*/
00903 
00904 /* ============================================================================= */
00905 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Digital-to-Analog Converter Controller */
00906 /* ============================================================================= */
00907 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_DACC Digital-to-Analog Converter Controller */
00908 /*@{*/
00909 
00910 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
00911 /** \brief Dacc hardware registers */
00912 typedef struct {
00913   WoReg DACC_CR;       /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x00) Control Register */
00914   RwReg DACC_MR;       /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x04) Mode Register */
00915   RwReg Reserved1[2];
00916   WoReg DACC_CHER;     /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x10) Channel Enable Register */
00917   WoReg DACC_CHDR;     /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x14) Channel Disable Register */
00918   RoReg DACC_CHSR;     /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x18) Channel Status Register */
00919   RwReg Reserved2[1];
00920   WoReg DACC_CDR;      /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x20) Conversion Data Register */
00921   WoReg DACC_IER;      /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x24) Interrupt Enable Register */
00922   WoReg DACC_IDR;      /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x28) Interrupt Disable Register */
00923   RoReg DACC_IMR;      /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x2C) Interrupt Mask Register */
00924   RoReg DACC_ISR;      /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x30) Interrupt Status Register */
00925   RwReg Reserved3[24];
00926   RwReg DACC_ACR;      /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x94) Analog Current Register */
00927   RwReg Reserved4[19];
00928   RwReg DACC_WPMR;     /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0xE4) Write Protect Mode register */
00929   RoReg DACC_WPSR;     /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0xE8) Write Protect Status register */
00930   RwReg Reserved5[5];
00931   RwReg DACC_RPR;      /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register */
00932   RwReg DACC_RCR;      /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register */
00933   RwReg DACC_TPR;      /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register */
00934   RwReg DACC_TCR;      /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register */
00935   RwReg DACC_RNPR;     /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register */
00936   RwReg DACC_RNCR;     /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register */
00937   RwReg DACC_TNPR;     /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register */
00938   RwReg DACC_TNCR;     /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register */
00939   WoReg DACC_PTCR;     /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register */
00940   RoReg DACC_PTSR;     /**< \brief (Dacc Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register */
00941 } Dacc;
00942 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
00943 /* -------- DACC_CR : (DACC Offset: 0x00) Control Register -------- */
00944 #define DACC_CR_SWRST (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (DACC_CR) Software Reset */
00945 /* -------- DACC_MR : (DACC Offset: 0x04) Mode Register -------- */
00946 #define DACC_MR_TRGEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) Trigger Enable */
00947 #define   DACC_MR_TRGEN_DIS (0x0u << 0) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) External trigger mode disabled. DACC in free running mode. */
00948 #define   DACC_MR_TRGEN_EN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) External trigger mode enabled. */
00949 #define DACC_MR_TRGSEL_Pos 1
00950 #define DACC_MR_TRGSEL_Msk (0x7u << DACC_MR_TRGSEL_Pos) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) Trigger Selection */
00951 #define DACC_MR_TRGSEL(value) ((DACC_MR_TRGSEL_Msk & ((value) << DACC_MR_TRGSEL_Pos)))
00952 #define DACC_MR_WORD (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) Word Transfer */
00953 #define   DACC_MR_WORD_HALF (0x0u << 4) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) Half-Word transfer */
00954 #define   DACC_MR_WORD_WORD (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) Word Transfer */
00955 #define DACC_MR_SLEEP (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) Sleep Mode */
00956 #define DACC_MR_FASTWKUP (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) Fast Wake up Mode */
00957 #define DACC_MR_REFRESH_Pos 8
00958 #define DACC_MR_REFRESH_Msk (0xffu << DACC_MR_REFRESH_Pos) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) Refresh Period */
00959 #define DACC_MR_REFRESH(value) ((DACC_MR_REFRESH_Msk & ((value) << DACC_MR_REFRESH_Pos)))
00960 #define DACC_MR_USER_SEL_Pos 16
00961 #define DACC_MR_USER_SEL_Msk (0x3u << DACC_MR_USER_SEL_Pos) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) User Channel Selection */
00962 #define   DACC_MR_USER_SEL_CHANNEL0 (0x0u << 16) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) Channel 0 */
00963 #define   DACC_MR_USER_SEL_CHANNEL1 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) Channel 1 */
00964 #define DACC_MR_TAG (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) Tag Selection Mode */
00965 #define   DACC_MR_TAG_DIS (0x0u << 20) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) Tag selection mode disabled. Using USER_SEL to select the channel for the conversion */
00966 #define   DACC_MR_TAG_EN (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) Tag selection mode enabled */
00967 #define DACC_MR_MAXS (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) Max Speed Mode */
00968 #define DACC_MR_STARTUP_Pos 24
00969 #define DACC_MR_STARTUP_Msk (0x3fu << DACC_MR_STARTUP_Pos) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) Startup Time Selection */
00970 #define   DACC_MR_STARTUP_0 (0x0u << 24) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) 0 periods of DACClock */
00971 #define   DACC_MR_STARTUP_8 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) 8 periods of DACClock */
00972 #define   DACC_MR_STARTUP_16 (0x2u << 24) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) 16 periods of DACClock */
00973 #define   DACC_MR_STARTUP_24 (0x3u << 24) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) 24 periods of DACClock */
00974 #define   DACC_MR_STARTUP_64 (0x4u << 24) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) 64 periods of DACClock */
00975 #define   DACC_MR_STARTUP_80 (0x5u << 24) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) 80 periods of DACClock */
00976 #define   DACC_MR_STARTUP_96 (0x6u << 24) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) 96 periods of DACClock */
00977 #define   DACC_MR_STARTUP_112 (0x7u << 24) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) 112 periods of DACClock */
00978 #define   DACC_MR_STARTUP_512 (0x8u << 24) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) 512 periods of DACClock */
00979 #define   DACC_MR_STARTUP_576 (0x9u << 24) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) 576 periods of DACClock */
00980 #define   DACC_MR_STARTUP_640 (0xAu << 24) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) 640 periods of DACClock */
00981 #define   DACC_MR_STARTUP_704 (0xBu << 24) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) 704 periods of DACClock */
00982 #define   DACC_MR_STARTUP_768 (0xCu << 24) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) 768 periods of DACClock */
00983 #define   DACC_MR_STARTUP_832 (0xDu << 24) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) 832 periods of DACClock */
00984 #define   DACC_MR_STARTUP_896 (0xEu << 24) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) 896 periods of DACClock */
00985 #define   DACC_MR_STARTUP_960 (0xFu << 24) /**< \brief (DACC_MR) 960 periods of DACClock */
00986 /* -------- DACC_CHER : (DACC Offset: 0x10) Channel Enable Register -------- */
00987 #define DACC_CHER_CH0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (DACC_CHER) Channel 0 Enable */
00988 #define DACC_CHER_CH1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (DACC_CHER) Channel 1 Enable */
00989 /* -------- DACC_CHDR : (DACC Offset: 0x14) Channel Disable Register -------- */
00990 #define DACC_CHDR_CH0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (DACC_CHDR) Channel 0 Disable */
00991 #define DACC_CHDR_CH1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (DACC_CHDR) Channel 1 Disable */
00992 /* -------- DACC_CHSR : (DACC Offset: 0x18) Channel Status Register -------- */
00993 #define DACC_CHSR_CH0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (DACC_CHSR) Channel 0 Status */
00994 #define DACC_CHSR_CH1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (DACC_CHSR) Channel 1 Status */
00995 /* -------- DACC_CDR : (DACC Offset: 0x20) Conversion Data Register -------- */
00996 #define DACC_CDR_DATA_Pos 0
00997 #define DACC_CDR_DATA_Msk (0xffffffffu << DACC_CDR_DATA_Pos) /**< \brief (DACC_CDR) Data to Convert */
00998 #define DACC_CDR_DATA(value) ((DACC_CDR_DATA_Msk & ((value) << DACC_CDR_DATA_Pos)))
00999 /* -------- DACC_IER : (DACC Offset: 0x24) Interrupt Enable Register -------- */
01000 #define DACC_IER_TXRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (DACC_IER) Transmit Ready Interrupt Enable */
01001 #define DACC_IER_EOC (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (DACC_IER) End of Conversion Interrupt Enable */
01002 #define DACC_IER_ENDTX (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (DACC_IER) End of Transmit Buffer Interrupt Enable */
01003 #define DACC_IER_TXBUFE (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (DACC_IER) Transmit Buffer Empty Interrupt Enable */
01004 /* -------- DACC_IDR : (DACC Offset: 0x28) Interrupt Disable Register -------- */
01005 #define DACC_IDR_TXRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (DACC_IDR) Transmit Ready Interrupt Disable. */
01006 #define DACC_IDR_EOC (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (DACC_IDR) End of Conversion Interrupt Disable */
01007 #define DACC_IDR_ENDTX (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (DACC_IDR) End of Transmit Buffer Interrupt Disable */
01008 #define DACC_IDR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (DACC_IDR) Transmit Buffer Empty Interrupt Disable */
01009 /* -------- DACC_IMR : (DACC Offset: 0x2C) Interrupt Mask Register -------- */
01010 #define DACC_IMR_TXRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (DACC_IMR) Transmit Ready Interrupt Mask */
01011 #define DACC_IMR_EOC (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (DACC_IMR) End of Conversion Interrupt Mask */
