01012 #define DACC_IMR_ENDTX (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (DACC_IMR) End of Transmit Buffer Interrupt Mask */
01013 #define DACC_IMR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (DACC_IMR) Transmit Buffer Empty Interrupt Mask */
01014 /* -------- DACC_ISR : (DACC Offset: 0x30) Interrupt Status Register -------- */
01015 #define DACC_ISR_TXRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (DACC_ISR) Transmit Ready Interrupt Flag */
01016 #define DACC_ISR_EOC (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (DACC_ISR) End of Conversion Interrupt Flag */
01017 #define DACC_ISR_ENDTX (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (DACC_ISR) End of DMA Interrupt Flag */
01018 #define DACC_ISR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (DACC_ISR) Transmit Buffer Empty */
01019 /* -------- DACC_ACR : (DACC Offset: 0x94) Analog Current Register -------- */
01020 #define DACC_ACR_IBCTLCH0_Pos 0
01021 #define DACC_ACR_IBCTLCH0_Msk (0x3u << DACC_ACR_IBCTLCH0_Pos) /**< \brief (DACC_ACR) Analog Output Current Control */
01022 #define DACC_ACR_IBCTLCH0(value) ((DACC_ACR_IBCTLCH0_Msk & ((value) << DACC_ACR_IBCTLCH0_Pos)))
01023 #define DACC_ACR_IBCTLCH1_Pos 2
01024 #define DACC_ACR_IBCTLCH1_Msk (0x3u << DACC_ACR_IBCTLCH1_Pos) /**< \brief (DACC_ACR) Analog Output Current Control */
01025 #define DACC_ACR_IBCTLCH1(value) ((DACC_ACR_IBCTLCH1_Msk & ((value) << DACC_ACR_IBCTLCH1_Pos)))
01026 #define DACC_ACR_IBCTLDACCORE_Pos 8
01027 #define DACC_ACR_IBCTLDACCORE_Msk (0x3u << DACC_ACR_IBCTLDACCORE_Pos) /**< \brief (DACC_ACR) Bias Current Control for DAC Core */
01028 #define DACC_ACR_IBCTLDACCORE(value) ((DACC_ACR_IBCTLDACCORE_Msk & ((value) << DACC_ACR_IBCTLDACCORE_Pos)))
01029 /* -------- DACC_WPMR : (DACC Offset: 0xE4) Write Protect Mode register -------- */
01030 #define DACC_WPMR_WPEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (DACC_WPMR) Write Protect Enable */
01031 #define DACC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos 8
01032 #define DACC_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk (0xffffffu << DACC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos) /**< \brief (DACC_WPMR) Write Protect KEY */
01033 #define DACC_WPMR_WPKEY(value) ((DACC_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk & ((value) << DACC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos)))
01034 /* -------- DACC_WPSR : (DACC Offset: 0xE8) Write Protect Status register -------- */
01035 #define DACC_WPSR_WPROTERR (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (DACC_WPSR) Write protection error */
01036 #define DACC_WPSR_WPROTADDR_Pos 8
01037 #define DACC_WPSR_WPROTADDR_Msk (0xffu << DACC_WPSR_WPROTADDR_Pos) /**< \brief (DACC_WPSR) Write protection error address */
01038 /* -------- DACC_RPR : (DACC Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register -------- */
01039 #define DACC_RPR_RXPTR_Pos 0
01040 #define DACC_RPR_RXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << DACC_RPR_RXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (DACC_RPR) Receive Pointer Register */
01041 #define DACC_RPR_RXPTR(value) ((DACC_RPR_RXPTR_Msk & ((value) << DACC_RPR_RXPTR_Pos)))
01042 /* -------- DACC_RCR : (DACC Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register -------- */
01043 #define DACC_RCR_RXCTR_Pos 0
01044 #define DACC_RCR_RXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << DACC_RCR_RXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (DACC_RCR) Receive Counter Register */
01045 #define DACC_RCR_RXCTR(value) ((DACC_RCR_RXCTR_Msk & ((value) << DACC_RCR_RXCTR_Pos)))
01046 /* -------- DACC_TPR : (DACC Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register -------- */
01047 #define DACC_TPR_TXPTR_Pos 0
01048 #define DACC_TPR_TXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << DACC_TPR_TXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (DACC_TPR) Transmit Counter Register */
01049 #define DACC_TPR_TXPTR(value) ((DACC_TPR_TXPTR_Msk & ((value) << DACC_TPR_TXPTR_Pos)))
01050 /* -------- DACC_TCR : (DACC Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register -------- */
01051 #define DACC_TCR_TXCTR_Pos 0
01052 #define DACC_TCR_TXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << DACC_TCR_TXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (DACC_TCR) Transmit Counter Register */
01053 #define DACC_TCR_TXCTR(value) ((DACC_TCR_TXCTR_Msk & ((value) << DACC_TCR_TXCTR_Pos)))
01054 /* -------- DACC_RNPR : (DACC Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register -------- */
01055 #define DACC_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos 0
01056 #define DACC_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << DACC_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (DACC_RNPR) Receive Next Pointer */
01057 #define DACC_RNPR_RXNPTR(value) ((DACC_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << DACC_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos)))
01058 /* -------- DACC_RNCR : (DACC Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register -------- */
01059 #define DACC_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos 0
01060 #define DACC_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << DACC_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (DACC_RNCR) Receive Next Counter */
01061 #define DACC_RNCR_RXNCTR(value) ((DACC_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << DACC_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos)))
01062 /* -------- DACC_TNPR : (DACC Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register -------- */
01063 #define DACC_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos 0
01064 #define DACC_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << DACC_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (DACC_TNPR) Transmit Next Pointer */
01065 #define DACC_TNPR_TXNPTR(value) ((DACC_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << DACC_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos)))
01066 /* -------- DACC_TNCR : (DACC Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register -------- */
01067 #define DACC_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos 0
01068 #define DACC_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << DACC_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (DACC_TNCR) Transmit Counter Next */
01069 #define DACC_TNCR_TXNCTR(value) ((DACC_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << DACC_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos)))
01070 /* -------- DACC_PTCR : (DACC Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register -------- */
01071 #define DACC_PTCR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (DACC_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
01072 #define DACC_PTCR_RXTDIS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (DACC_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Disable */
01073 #define DACC_PTCR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (DACC_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
01074 #define DACC_PTCR_TXTDIS (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (DACC_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Disable */
01075 /* -------- DACC_PTSR : (DACC Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register -------- */
01076 #define DACC_PTSR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (DACC_PTSR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
01077 #define DACC_PTSR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (DACC_PTSR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
01078 
01079 /*@}*/
01080 
01081 /* ============================================================================= */
01082 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Embedded Flash Controller */
01083 /* ============================================================================= */
01084 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_EFC Embedded Flash Controller */
01085 /*@{*/
01086 
01087 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
01088 /** \brief Efc hardware registers */
01089 typedef struct {
01090   RwReg EEFC_FMR; /**< \brief (Efc Offset: 0x00) EEFC Flash Mode Register */
01091   WoReg EEFC_FCR; /**< \brief (Efc Offset: 0x04) EEFC Flash Command Register */
01092   RoReg EEFC_FSR; /**< \brief (Efc Offset: 0x08) EEFC Flash Status Register */
01093   RoReg EEFC_FRR; /**< \brief (Efc Offset: 0x0C) EEFC Flash Result Register */
01094 } Efc;
01095 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
01096 /* -------- EEFC_FMR : (EFC Offset: 0x00) EEFC Flash Mode Register -------- */
01097 #define EEFC_FMR_FRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (EEFC_FMR) Ready Interrupt Enable */
01098 #define EEFC_FMR_FWS_Pos 8
01099 #define EEFC_FMR_FWS_Msk (0xfu << EEFC_FMR_FWS_Pos) /**< \brief (EEFC_FMR) Flash Wait State */
01100 #define EEFC_FMR_FWS(value) ((EEFC_FMR_FWS_Msk & ((value) << EEFC_FMR_FWS_Pos)))
01101 #define EEFC_FMR_FAM (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (EEFC_FMR) Flash Access Mode */
01102 /* -------- EEFC_FCR : (EFC Offset: 0x04) EEFC Flash Command Register -------- */
01103 #define EEFC_FCR_FCMD_Pos 0
01104 #define EEFC_FCR_FCMD_Msk (0xffu << EEFC_FCR_FCMD_Pos) /**< \brief (EEFC_FCR) Flash Command */
01105 #define EEFC_FCR_FCMD(value) ((EEFC_FCR_FCMD_Msk & ((value) << EEFC_FCR_FCMD_Pos)))
01106 #define EEFC_FCR_FARG_Pos 8
01107 #define EEFC_FCR_FARG_Msk (0xffffu << EEFC_FCR_FARG_Pos) /**< \brief (EEFC_FCR) Flash Command Argument */
01108 #define EEFC_FCR_FARG(value) ((EEFC_FCR_FARG_Msk & ((value) << EEFC_FCR_FARG_Pos)))
01109 #define EEFC_FCR_FKEY_Pos 24
01110 #define EEFC_FCR_FKEY_Msk (0xffu << EEFC_FCR_FKEY_Pos) /**< \brief (EEFC_FCR) Flash Writing Protection Key */
01111 #define EEFC_FCR_FKEY(value) ((EEFC_FCR_FKEY_Msk & ((value) << EEFC_FCR_FKEY_Pos)))
01112 /* -------- EEFC_FSR : (EFC Offset: 0x08) EEFC Flash Status Register -------- */
01113 #define EEFC_FSR_FRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (EEFC_FSR) Flash Ready Status */
01114 #define EEFC_FSR_FCMDE (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (EEFC_FSR) Flash Command Error Status */
01115 #define EEFC_FSR_FLOCKE (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (EEFC_FSR) Flash Lock Error Status */
01116 /* -------- EEFC_FRR : (EFC Offset: 0x0C) EEFC Flash Result Register -------- */
01117 #define EEFC_FRR_FVALUE_Pos 0
01118 #define EEFC_FRR_FVALUE_Msk (0xffffffffu << EEFC_FRR_FVALUE_Pos) /**< \brief (EEFC_FRR) Flash Result Value */
01119 
01120 /*@}*/
01121 
01122 /* ============================================================================= */
01123 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR General Purpose Backup Register */
01124 /* ============================================================================= */
01125 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_GPBR General Purpose Backup Register */
01126 /*@{*/
01127 
01128 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
01129 /** \brief Gpbr hardware registers */
01130 typedef struct {
01131   RwReg SYS_GPBR0; /**< \brief (Gpbr Offset: 0x0) General Purpose Backup Register 0 */
01132   RwReg SYS_GPBR1; /**< \brief (Gpbr Offset: 0x4) General Purpose Backup Register 1 */
01133   RwReg SYS_GPBR2; /**< \brief (Gpbr Offset: 0x8) General Purpose Backup Register 2 */
01134   RwReg SYS_GPBR3; /**< \brief (Gpbr Offset: 0xC) General Purpose Backup Register 3 */
01135   RwReg SYS_GPBR4; /**< \brief (Gpbr Offset: 0x10) General Purpose Backup Register 4 */
01136   RwReg SYS_GPBR5; /**< \brief (Gpbr Offset: 0x14) General Purpose Backup Register 5 */
01137   RwReg SYS_GPBR6; /**< \brief (Gpbr Offset: 0x18) General Purpose Backup Register 6 */
01138   RwReg SYS_GPBR7; /**< \brief (Gpbr Offset: 0x1C) General Purpose Backup Register 7 */
01139 } Gpbr;
01140 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
01141 /* -------- SYS_GPBR0 : (GPBR Offset: 0x0) General Purpose Backup Register 0 -------- */
01142 #define SYS_GPBR0_GPBR_VALUE0_Pos 0
01143 #define SYS_GPBR0_GPBR_VALUE0_Msk (0xffffffffu << SYS_GPBR0_GPBR_VALUE0_Pos) /**< \brief (SYS_GPBR0) Value of GPBR x */
01144 #define SYS_GPBR0_GPBR_VALUE0(value) ((SYS_GPBR0_GPBR_VALUE0_Msk & ((value) << SYS_GPBR0_GPBR_VALUE0_Pos)))
01145 /* -------- SYS_GPBR1 : (GPBR Offset: 0x4) General Purpose Backup Register 1 -------- */
01146 #define SYS_GPBR1_GPBR_VALUE1_Pos 0
01147 #define SYS_GPBR1_GPBR_VALUE1_Msk (0xffffffffu << SYS_GPBR1_GPBR_VALUE1_Pos) /**< \brief (SYS_GPBR1) Value of GPBR x */
01148 #define SYS_GPBR1_GPBR_VALUE1(value) ((SYS_GPBR1_GPBR_VALUE1_Msk & ((value) << SYS_GPBR1_GPBR_VALUE1_Pos)))
01149 /* -------- SYS_GPBR2 : (GPBR Offset: 0x8) General Purpose Backup Register 2 -------- */
01150 #define SYS_GPBR2_GPBR_VALUE2_Pos 0
01151 #define SYS_GPBR2_GPBR_VALUE2_Msk (0xffffffffu << SYS_GPBR2_GPBR_VALUE2_Pos) /**< \brief (SYS_GPBR2) Value of GPBR x */
01152 #define SYS_GPBR2_GPBR_VALUE2(value) ((SYS_GPBR2_GPBR_VALUE2_Msk & ((value) << SYS_GPBR2_GPBR_VALUE2_Pos)))
01153 /* -------- SYS_GPBR3 : (GPBR Offset: 0xC) General Purpose Backup Register 3 -------- */
01154 #define SYS_GPBR3_GPBR_VALUE3_Pos 0
01155 #define SYS_GPBR3_GPBR_VALUE3_Msk (0xffffffffu << SYS_GPBR3_GPBR_VALUE3_Pos) /**< \brief (SYS_GPBR3) Value of GPBR x */
01156 #define SYS_GPBR3_GPBR_VALUE3(value) ((SYS_GPBR3_GPBR_VALUE3_Msk & ((value) << SYS_GPBR3_GPBR_VALUE3_Pos)))
01157 /* -------- SYS_GPBR4 : (GPBR Offset: 0x10) General Purpose Backup Register 4 -------- */
01158 #define SYS_GPBR4_GPBR_VALUE4_Pos 0
01159 #define SYS_GPBR4_GPBR_VALUE4_Msk (0xffffffffu << SYS_GPBR4_GPBR_VALUE4_Pos) /**< \brief (SYS_GPBR4) Value of GPBR x */
01160 #define SYS_GPBR4_GPBR_VALUE4(value) ((SYS_GPBR4_GPBR_VALUE4_Msk & ((value) << SYS_GPBR4_GPBR_VALUE4_Pos)))
01161 /* -------- SYS_GPBR5 : (GPBR Offset: 0x14) General Purpose Backup Register 5 -------- */
01162 #define SYS_GPBR5_GPBR_VALUE5_Pos 0
01163 #define SYS_GPBR5_GPBR_VALUE5_Msk (0xffffffffu << SYS_GPBR5_GPBR_VALUE5_Pos) /**< \brief (SYS_GPBR5) Value of GPBR x */
01164 #define SYS_GPBR5_GPBR_VALUE5(value) ((SYS_GPBR5_GPBR_VALUE5_Msk & ((value) << SYS_GPBR5_GPBR_VALUE5_Pos)))
01165 /* -------- SYS_GPBR6 : (GPBR Offset: 0x18) General Purpose Backup Register 6 -------- */
01166 #define SYS_GPBR6_GPBR_VALUE6_Pos 0
01167 #define SYS_GPBR6_GPBR_VALUE6_Msk (0xffffffffu << SYS_GPBR6_GPBR_VALUE6_Pos) /**< \brief (SYS_GPBR6) Value of GPBR x */
01168 #define SYS_GPBR6_GPBR_VALUE6(value) ((SYS_GPBR6_GPBR_VALUE6_Msk & ((value) << SYS_GPBR6_GPBR_VALUE6_Pos)))
01169 /* -------- SYS_GPBR7 : (GPBR Offset: 0x1C) General Purpose Backup Register 7 -------- */
01170 #define SYS_GPBR7_GPBR_VALUE7_Pos 0
01171 #define SYS_GPBR7_GPBR_VALUE7_Msk (0xffffffffu << SYS_GPBR7_GPBR_VALUE7_Pos) /**< \brief (SYS_GPBR7) Value of GPBR x */
01172 #define SYS_GPBR7_GPBR_VALUE7(value) ((SYS_GPBR7_GPBR_VALUE7_Msk & ((value) << SYS_GPBR7_GPBR_VALUE7_Pos)))
01173 
01174 /*@}*/
01175 
01176 /* ============================================================================= */
01177 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR High Speed MultiMedia Card Interface */
01178 /* ============================================================================= */
01179 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_HSMCI High Speed MultiMedia Card Interface */
01180 /*@{*/
01181 
01182 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
01183 /** \brief Hsmci hardware registers */
01184 typedef struct {
01185   WoReg HSMCI_CR;        /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x00) Control Register */
01186   RwReg HSMCI_MR;        /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x04) Mode Register */
01187   RwReg HSMCI_DTOR;      /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x08) Data Timeout Register */
01188   RwReg HSMCI_SDCR;      /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x0C) SD/SDIO Card Register */
01189   RwReg HSMCI_ARGR;      /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x10) Argument Register */
01190   WoReg HSMCI_CMDR;      /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x14) Command Register */
01191   RwReg HSMCI_BLKR;      /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x18) Block Register */
01192   RwReg HSMCI_CSTOR;     /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x1C) Completion Signal Timeout Register */
01193   RoReg HSMCI_RSPR[4];   /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x20) Response Register */
01194   RoReg HSMCI_RDR;       /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x30) Receive Data Register */
01195   WoReg HSMCI_TDR;       /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x34) Transmit Data Register */
01196   RwReg Reserved1[2];
01197   RoReg HSMCI_SR;        /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x40) Status Register */
01198   WoReg HSMCI_IER;       /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x44) Interrupt Enable Register */
01199   WoReg HSMCI_IDR;       /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x48) Interrupt Disable Register */
01200   RoReg HSMCI_IMR;       /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x4C) Interrupt Mask Register */
01201   RwReg Reserved2[1];
01202   RwReg HSMCI_CFG;       /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x54) Configuration Register */
01203   RwReg Reserved3[35];
01204   RwReg HSMCI_WPMR;      /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0xE4) Write Protection Mode Register */
01205   RoReg HSMCI_WPSR;      /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0xE8) Write Protection Status Register */
01206   RwReg Reserved4[5];
01207   RwReg HSMCI_RPR;       /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register */
01208   RwReg HSMCI_RCR;       /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register */
01209   RwReg HSMCI_TPR;       /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register */
01210   RwReg HSMCI_TCR;       /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register */
01211   RwReg HSMCI_RNPR;      /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register */
01212   RwReg HSMCI_RNCR;      /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register */
01213   RwReg HSMCI_TNPR;      /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register */
01214   RwReg HSMCI_TNCR;      /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register */
01215   WoReg HSMCI_PTCR;      /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register */
01216   RoReg HSMCI_PTSR;      /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register */
01217   RwReg Reserved5[54];
01218   RwReg HSMCI_FIFO[256]; /**< \brief (Hsmci Offset: 0x200) FIFO Memory Aperture0 */
01219 } Hsmci;
01220 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
01221 /* -------- HSMCI_CR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x00) Control Register -------- */
01222 #define HSMCI_CR_MCIEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CR) Multi-Media Interface Enable */
01223 #define HSMCI_CR_MCIDIS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CR) Multi-Media Interface Disable */
01224 #define HSMCI_CR_PWSEN (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CR) Power Save Mode Enable */
01225 #define HSMCI_CR_PWSDIS (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CR) Power Save Mode Disable */
01226 #define HSMCI_CR_SWRST (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CR) Software Reset */
01227 /* -------- HSMCI_MR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x04) Mode Register -------- */
01228 #define HSMCI_MR_CLKDIV_Pos 0
01229 #define HSMCI_MR_CLKDIV_Msk (0xffu << HSMCI_MR_CLKDIV_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_MR) Clock Divider */
01230 #define HSMCI_MR_CLKDIV(value) ((HSMCI_MR_CLKDIV_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_MR_CLKDIV_Pos)))
01231 #define HSMCI_MR_PWSDIV_Pos 8
01232 #define HSMCI_MR_PWSDIV_Msk (0x7u << HSMCI_MR_PWSDIV_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_MR) Power Saving Divider */
01233 #define HSMCI_MR_PWSDIV(value) ((HSMCI_MR_PWSDIV_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_MR_PWSDIV_Pos)))
01234 #define HSMCI_MR_RDPROOF (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (HSMCI_MR)  */
01235 #define HSMCI_MR_WRPROOF (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (HSMCI_MR)  */
01236 #define HSMCI_MR_FBYTE (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (HSMCI_MR) Force Byte Transfer */
01237 #define HSMCI_MR_PADV (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (HSMCI_MR) Padding Value */
01238 #define HSMCI_MR_PDCMODE (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (HSMCI_MR) PDC-oriented Mode */
01239 #define HSMCI_MR_BLKLEN_Pos 16
01240 #define HSMCI_MR_BLKLEN_Msk (0xffffu << HSMCI_MR_BLKLEN_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_MR) Data Block Length */
01241 #define HSMCI_MR_BLKLEN(value) ((HSMCI_MR_BLKLEN_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_MR_BLKLEN_Pos)))
01242 /* -------- HSMCI_DTOR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x08) Data Timeout Register -------- */
01243 #define HSMCI_DTOR_DTOCYC_Pos 0
01244 #define HSMCI_DTOR_DTOCYC_Msk (0xfu << HSMCI_DTOR_DTOCYC_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_DTOR) Data Timeout Cycle Number */
01245 #define HSMCI_DTOR_DTOCYC(value) ((HSMCI_DTOR_DTOCYC_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_DTOR_DTOCYC_Pos)))
01246 #define HSMCI_DTOR_DTOMUL_Pos 4
01247 #define HSMCI_DTOR_DTOMUL_Msk (0x7u << HSMCI_DTOR_DTOMUL_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_DTOR) Data Timeout Multiplier */
01248 #define   HSMCI_DTOR_DTOMUL_1 (0x0u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_DTOR) DTOCYC */
01249 #define   HSMCI_DTOR_DTOMUL_16 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_DTOR) DTOCYC x 16 */
01250 #define   HSMCI_DTOR_DTOMUL_128 (0x2u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_DTOR) DTOCYC x 128 */
01251 #define   HSMCI_DTOR_DTOMUL_256 (0x3u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_DTOR) DTOCYC x 256 */
01252 #define   HSMCI_DTOR_DTOMUL_1024 (0x4u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_DTOR) DTOCYC x 1024 */
01253 #define   HSMCI_DTOR_DTOMUL_4096 (0x5u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_DTOR) DTOCYC x 4096 */
01254 #define   HSMCI_DTOR_DTOMUL_65536 (0x6u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_DTOR) DTOCYC x 65536 */
01255 #define   HSMCI_DTOR_DTOMUL_1048576 (0x7u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_DTOR) DTOCYC x 1048576 */
01256 /* -------- HSMCI_SDCR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x0C) SD/SDIO Card Register -------- */
01257 #define HSMCI_SDCR_SDCSEL_Pos 0
01258 #define HSMCI_SDCR_SDCSEL_Msk (0x3u << HSMCI_SDCR_SDCSEL_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SDCR) SDCard/SDIO Slot */
01259 #define   HSMCI_SDCR_SDCSEL_SLOTA (0x0u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SDCR) Slot A is selected. */
01260 #define   HSMCI_SDCR_SDCSEL_SLOTB (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SDCR) - */
01261 #define   HSMCI_SDCR_SDCSEL_SLOTC (0x2u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SDCR) - */
01262 #define   HSMCI_SDCR_SDCSEL_SLOTD (0x3u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SDCR) - */
01263 #define HSMCI_SDCR_SDCBUS_Pos 6
01264 #define HSMCI_SDCR_SDCBUS_Msk (0x3u << HSMCI_SDCR_SDCBUS_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SDCR) SDCard/SDIO Bus Width */
01265 #define   HSMCI_SDCR_SDCBUS_1 (0x0u << 6) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SDCR) 1 bit */
01266 #define   HSMCI_SDCR_SDCBUS_4 (0x2u << 6) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SDCR) 4 bit */
01267 #define   HSMCI_SDCR_SDCBUS_8 (0x3u << 6) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SDCR) 8 bit */
01268 /* -------- HSMCI_ARGR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x10) Argument Register -------- */
01269 #define HSMCI_ARGR_ARG_Pos 0
01270 #define HSMCI_ARGR_ARG_Msk (0xffffffffu << HSMCI_ARGR_ARG_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_ARGR) Command Argument */
01271 #define HSMCI_ARGR_ARG(value) ((HSMCI_ARGR_ARG_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_ARGR_ARG_Pos)))
01272 /* -------- HSMCI_CMDR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x14) Command Register -------- */
01273 #define HSMCI_CMDR_CMDNB_Pos 0
01274 #define HSMCI_CMDR_CMDNB_Msk (0x3fu << HSMCI_CMDR_CMDNB_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Command Number */
01275 #define HSMCI_CMDR_CMDNB(value) ((HSMCI_CMDR_CMDNB_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_CMDR_CMDNB_Pos)))
01276 #define HSMCI_CMDR_RSPTYP_Pos 6
01277 #define HSMCI_CMDR_RSPTYP_Msk (0x3u << HSMCI_CMDR_RSPTYP_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Response Type */
01278 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_RSPTYP_NORESP (0x0u << 6) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) No response. */
01279 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_RSPTYP_48_BIT (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) 48-bit response. */
01280 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_RSPTYP_136_BIT (0x2u << 6) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) 136-bit response. */
01281 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_RSPTYP_R1B (0x3u << 6) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) R1b response type */
01282 #define HSMCI_CMDR_SPCMD_Pos 8
01283 #define HSMCI_CMDR_SPCMD_Msk (0x7u << HSMCI_CMDR_SPCMD_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Special Command */
01284 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_SPCMD_STD (0x0u << 8) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Not a special CMD. */
01285 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_SPCMD_INIT (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Initialization CMD:74 clock cycles for initialization sequence. */
01286 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_SPCMD_SYNC (0x2u << 8) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Synchronized CMD:Wait for the end of the current data block transfer before sending the pending command. */
01287 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_SPCMD_CE_ATA (0x3u << 8) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) CE-ATA Completion Signal disable Command.The host cancels the ability for the device to return a command completion signal on the command line. */
01288 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_SPCMD_IT_CMD (0x4u << 8) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Interrupt command:Corresponds to the Interrupt Mode (CMD40). */
01289 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_SPCMD_IT_RESP (0x5u << 8) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Interrupt response:Corresponds to the Interrupt Mode (CMD40). */
01290 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_SPCMD_BOR (0x6u << 8) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Boot Operation Request.Start a boot operation mode, the host processor can read boot data from the MMC device directly. */
01291 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_SPCMD_EBO (0x7u << 8) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) End Boot Operation.This command allows the host processor to terminate the boot operation mode. */
01292 #define HSMCI_CMDR_OPDCMD (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Open Drain Command */
01293 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_OPDCMD_PUSHPULL (0x0u << 11) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Push pull command. */
01294 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_OPDCMD_OPENDRAIN (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Open drain command. */
01295 #define HSMCI_CMDR_MAXLAT (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Max Latency for Command to Response */
01296 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_MAXLAT_5 (0x0u << 12) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) 5-cycle max latency. */
01297 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_MAXLAT_64 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) 64-cycle max latency. */
01298 #define HSMCI_CMDR_TRCMD_Pos 16
01299 #define HSMCI_CMDR_TRCMD_Msk (0x3u << HSMCI_CMDR_TRCMD_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Transfer Command */
01300 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_TRCMD_NO_DATA (0x0u << 16) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) No data transfer */
01301 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_TRCMD_START_DATA (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Start data transfer */
01302 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_TRCMD_STOP_DATA (0x2u << 16) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Stop data transfer */
01303 #define HSMCI_CMDR_TRDIR (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Transfer Direction */
01304 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_TRDIR_WRITE (0x0u << 18) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Write. */
01305 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_TRDIR_READ (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Read. */
01306 #define HSMCI_CMDR_TRTYP_Pos 19
01307 #define HSMCI_CMDR_TRTYP_Msk (0x7u << HSMCI_CMDR_TRTYP_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Transfer Type */
01308 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_TRTYP_SINGLE (0x0u << 19) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) MMC/SDCard Single Block */
01309 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_TRTYP_MULTIPLE (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) MMC/SDCard Multiple Block */
01310 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_TRTYP_STREAM (0x2u << 19) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) MMC Stream */
01311 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_TRTYP_BYTE (0x4u << 19) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) SDIO Byte */
01312 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_TRTYP_BLOCK (0x5u << 19) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) SDIO Block */
01313 #define HSMCI_CMDR_IOSPCMD_Pos 24
01314 #define HSMCI_CMDR_IOSPCMD_Msk (0x3u << HSMCI_CMDR_IOSPCMD_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) SDIO Special Command */
01315 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_IOSPCMD_STD (0x0u << 24) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Not an SDIO Special Command */
01316 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_IOSPCMD_SUSPEND (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) SDIO Suspend Command */
01317 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_IOSPCMD_RESUME (0x2u << 24) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) SDIO Resume Command */
01318 #define HSMCI_CMDR_ATACS (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) ATA with Command Completion Signal */
01319 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_ATACS_NORMAL (0x0u << 26) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Normal operation mode. */
01320 #define   HSMCI_CMDR_ATACS_COMPLETION (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) This bit indicates that a completion signal is expected within a programmed amount of time (HSMCI_CSTOR). */
01321 #define HSMCI_CMDR_BOOT_ACK (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CMDR) Boot Operation Acknowledge. */
01322 /* -------- HSMCI_BLKR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x18) Block Register -------- */
01323 #define HSMCI_BLKR_BCNT_Pos 0
01324 #define HSMCI_BLKR_BCNT_Msk (0xffffu << HSMCI_BLKR_BCNT_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_BLKR) MMC/SDIO Block Count - SDIO Byte Count */
01325 #define   HSMCI_BLKR_BCNT_MULTIPLE (0x0u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_BLKR) MMC/SDCARD Multiple BlockFrom 1 to 65635: Value 0 corresponds to an infinite block transfer. */
01326 #define   HSMCI_BLKR_BCNT_BYTE (0x4u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_BLKR) SDIO ByteFrom 1 to 512 bytes: Value 0 corresponds to a 512-byte transfer.Values from 0x200 to 0xFFFF are forbidden. */
01327 #define   HSMCI_BLKR_BCNT_BLOCK (0x5u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_BLKR) SDIO BlockFrom 1 to 511 blocks: Value 0 corresponds to an infinite block transfer.Values from 0x200 to 0xFFFF are forbidden. */
01328 #define HSMCI_BLKR_BLKLEN_Pos 16
01329 #define HSMCI_BLKR_BLKLEN_Msk (0xffffu << HSMCI_BLKR_BLKLEN_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_BLKR) Data Block Length */
01330 #define HSMCI_BLKR_BLKLEN(value) ((HSMCI_BLKR_BLKLEN_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_BLKR_BLKLEN_Pos)))
01331 /* -------- HSMCI_CSTOR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x1C) Completion Signal Timeout Register -------- */
01332 #define HSMCI_CSTOR_CSTOCYC_Pos 0
01333 #define HSMCI_CSTOR_CSTOCYC_Msk (0xfu << HSMCI_CSTOR_CSTOCYC_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CSTOR) Completion Signal Timeout Cycle Number */
01334 #define HSMCI_CSTOR_CSTOCYC(value) ((HSMCI_CSTOR_CSTOCYC_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_CSTOR_CSTOCYC_Pos)))
01335 #define HSMCI_CSTOR_CSTOMUL_Pos 4
01336 #define HSMCI_CSTOR_CSTOMUL_Msk (0x7u << HSMCI_CSTOR_CSTOMUL_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CSTOR) Completion Signal Timeout Multiplier */
01337 #define   HSMCI_CSTOR_CSTOMUL_1 (0x0u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CSTOR) CSTOCYC x 1 */
01338 #define   HSMCI_CSTOR_CSTOMUL_16 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CSTOR) CSTOCYC x 16 */
01339 #define   HSMCI_CSTOR_CSTOMUL_128 (0x2u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CSTOR) CSTOCYC x 128 */
01340 #define   HSMCI_CSTOR_CSTOMUL_256 (0x3u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CSTOR) CSTOCYC x 256 */
01341 #define   HSMCI_CSTOR_CSTOMUL_1024 (0x4u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CSTOR) CSTOCYC x 1024 */
01342 #define   HSMCI_CSTOR_CSTOMUL_4096 (0x5u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CSTOR) CSTOCYC x 4096 */
01343 #define   HSMCI_CSTOR_CSTOMUL_65536 (0x6u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CSTOR) CSTOCYC x 65536 */
01344 #define   HSMCI_CSTOR_CSTOMUL_1048576 (0x7u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CSTOR) CSTOCYC x 1048576 */
01345 /* -------- HSMCI_RSPR[4] : (HSMCI Offset: 0x20) Response Register -------- */
01346 #define HSMCI_RSPR_RSP_Pos 0
01347 #define HSMCI_RSPR_RSP_Msk (0xffffffffu << HSMCI_RSPR_RSP_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_RSPR[4]) Response */
01348 /* -------- HSMCI_RDR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x30) Receive Data Register -------- */
01349 #define HSMCI_RDR_DATA_Pos 0
01350 #define HSMCI_RDR_DATA_Msk (0xffffffffu << HSMCI_RDR_DATA_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_RDR) Data to Read */
01351 /* -------- HSMCI_TDR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x34) Transmit Data Register -------- */
01352 #define HSMCI_TDR_DATA_Pos 0
01353 #define HSMCI_TDR_DATA_Msk (0xffffffffu << HSMCI_TDR_DATA_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_TDR) Data to Write */
01354 #define HSMCI_TDR_DATA(value) ((HSMCI_TDR_DATA_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_TDR_DATA_Pos)))
01355 /* -------- HSMCI_SR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x40) Status Register -------- */
01356 #define HSMCI_SR_CMDRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) Command Ready */
01357 #define HSMCI_SR_RXRDY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) Receiver Ready */
01358 #define HSMCI_SR_TXRDY (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) Transmit Ready */
01359 #define HSMCI_SR_BLKE (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) Data Block Ended */
01360 #define HSMCI_SR_DTIP (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) Data Transfer in Progress */
01361 #define HSMCI_SR_NOTBUSY (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) HSMCI Not Busy */
01362 #define HSMCI_SR_ENDRX (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) End of RX Buffer */
01363 #define HSMCI_SR_ENDTX (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) End of TX Buffer */
01364 #define HSMCI_SR_SDIOIRQA (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) SDIO Interrupt for Slot A */
01365 #define HSMCI_SR_SDIOWAIT (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) SDIO Read Wait Operation Status */
01366 #define HSMCI_SR_CSRCV (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) CE-ATA Completion Signal Received */
01367 #define HSMCI_SR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) RX Buffer Full */
01368 #define HSMCI_SR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) TX Buffer Empty */
01369 #define HSMCI_SR_RINDE (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) Response Index Error */
01370 #define HSMCI_SR_RDIRE (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) Response Direction Error */
01371 #define HSMCI_SR_RCRCE (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) Response CRC Error */
01372 #define HSMCI_SR_RENDE (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) Response End Bit Error */
01373 #define HSMCI_SR_RTOE (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) Response Time-out Error */
01374 #define HSMCI_SR_DCRCE (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) Data CRC Error */
01375 #define HSMCI_SR_DTOE (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) Data Time-out Error */
01376 #define HSMCI_SR_CSTOE (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) Completion Signal Time-out Error */
01377 #define HSMCI_SR_FIFOEMPTY (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) FIFO empty flag */
01378 #define HSMCI_SR_XFRDONE (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) Transfer Done flag */
01379 #define HSMCI_SR_ACKRCV (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) Boot Operation Acknowledge Received */
01380 #define HSMCI_SR_ACKRCVE (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) Boot Operation Acknowledge Error */
01381 #define HSMCI_SR_OVRE (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) Overrun */
01382 #define HSMCI_SR_UNRE (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (HSMCI_SR) Underrun */
01383 /* -------- HSMCI_IER : (HSMCI Offset: 0x44) Interrupt Enable Register -------- */
01384 #define HSMCI_IER_CMDRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Command Ready Interrupt Enable */
01385 #define HSMCI_IER_RXRDY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Receiver Ready Interrupt Enable */
01386 #define HSMCI_IER_TXRDY (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Transmit Ready Interrupt Enable */
01387 #define HSMCI_IER_BLKE (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Data Block Ended Interrupt Enable */
01388 #define HSMCI_IER_DTIP (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Data Transfer in Progress Interrupt Enable */
01389 #define HSMCI_IER_NOTBUSY (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Data Not Busy Interrupt Enable */
01390 #define HSMCI_IER_ENDRX (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) End of Receive Buffer Interrupt Enable */
01391 #define HSMCI_IER_ENDTX (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) End of Transmit Buffer Interrupt Enable */
01392 #define HSMCI_IER_SDIOIRQA (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) SDIO Interrupt for Slot A Interrupt Enable */
01393 #define HSMCI_IER_SDIOWAIT (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) SDIO Read Wait Operation Status Interrupt Enable */
01394 #define HSMCI_IER_CSRCV (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Completion Signal Received Interrupt Enable */
01395 #define HSMCI_IER_RXBUFF (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Receive Buffer Full Interrupt Enable */
01396 #define HSMCI_IER_TXBUFE (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Transmit Buffer Empty Interrupt Enable */
01397 #define HSMCI_IER_RINDE (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Response Index Error Interrupt Enable */
01398 #define HSMCI_IER_RDIRE (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Response Direction Error Interrupt Enable */
01399 #define HSMCI_IER_RCRCE (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Response CRC Error Interrupt Enable */
01400 #define HSMCI_IER_RENDE (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Response End Bit Error Interrupt Enable */
01401 #define HSMCI_IER_RTOE (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Response Time-out Error Interrupt Enable */
01402 #define HSMCI_IER_DCRCE (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Data CRC Error Interrupt Enable */
01403 #define HSMCI_IER_DTOE (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Data Time-out Error Interrupt Enable */
01404 #define HSMCI_IER_CSTOE (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Completion Signal Timeout Error Interrupt Enable */
01405 #define HSMCI_IER_FIFOEMPTY (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) FIFO empty Interrupt enable */
01406 #define HSMCI_IER_XFRDONE (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Transfer Done Interrupt enable */
01407 #define HSMCI_IER_ACKRCV (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Boot Acknowledge Interrupt Enable */
01408 #define HSMCI_IER_ACKRCVE (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Boot Acknowledge Error Interrupt Enable */
01409 #define HSMCI_IER_OVRE (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Overrun Interrupt Enable */
01410 #define HSMCI_IER_UNRE (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IER) Underrun Interrupt Enable */
01411 /* -------- HSMCI_IDR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x48) Interrupt Disable Register -------- */
01412 #define HSMCI_IDR_CMDRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Command Ready Interrupt Disable */
01413 #define HSMCI_IDR_RXRDY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Receiver Ready Interrupt Disable */
01414 #define HSMCI_IDR_TXRDY (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Transmit Ready Interrupt Disable */
01415 #define HSMCI_IDR_BLKE (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Data Block Ended Interrupt Disable */
01416 #define HSMCI_IDR_DTIP (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Data Transfer in Progress Interrupt Disable */
01417 #define HSMCI_IDR_NOTBUSY (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Data Not Busy Interrupt Disable */
01418 #define HSMCI_IDR_ENDRX (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) End of Receive Buffer Interrupt Disable */
01419 #define HSMCI_IDR_ENDTX (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) End of Transmit Buffer Interrupt Disable */
01420 #define HSMCI_IDR_SDIOIRQA (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) SDIO Interrupt for Slot A Interrupt Disable */
01421 #define HSMCI_IDR_SDIOWAIT (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) SDIO Read Wait Operation Status Interrupt Disable */
01422 #define HSMCI_IDR_CSRCV (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Completion Signal received interrupt Disable */
01423 #define HSMCI_IDR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Receive Buffer Full Interrupt Disable */
01424 #define HSMCI_IDR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Transmit Buffer Empty Interrupt Disable */
01425 #define HSMCI_IDR_RINDE (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Response Index Error Interrupt Disable */
01426 #define HSMCI_IDR_RDIRE (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Response Direction Error Interrupt Disable */
01427 #define HSMCI_IDR_RCRCE (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Response CRC Error Interrupt Disable */
01428 #define HSMCI_IDR_RENDE (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Response End Bit Error Interrupt Disable */
01429 #define HSMCI_IDR_RTOE (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Response Time-out Error Interrupt Disable */
01430 #define HSMCI_IDR_DCRCE (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Data CRC Error Interrupt Disable */
01431 #define HSMCI_IDR_DTOE (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Data Time-out Error Interrupt Disable */
01432 #define HSMCI_IDR_CSTOE (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Completion Signal Time out Error Interrupt Disable */
01433 #define HSMCI_IDR_FIFOEMPTY (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) FIFO empty Interrupt Disable */
01434 #define HSMCI_IDR_XFRDONE (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Transfer Done Interrupt Disable */
01435 #define HSMCI_IDR_ACKRCV (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Boot Acknowledge Interrupt Disable */
01436 #define HSMCI_IDR_ACKRCVE (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Boot Acknowledge Error Interrupt Disable */
01437 #define HSMCI_IDR_OVRE (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Overrun Interrupt Disable */
01438 #define HSMCI_IDR_UNRE (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IDR) Underrun Interrupt Disable */
01439 /* -------- HSMCI_IMR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x4C) Interrupt Mask Register -------- */
01440 #define HSMCI_IMR_CMDRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Command Ready Interrupt Mask */
01441 #define HSMCI_IMR_RXRDY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Receiver Ready Interrupt Mask */
01442 #define HSMCI_IMR_TXRDY (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Transmit Ready Interrupt Mask */
01443 #define HSMCI_IMR_BLKE (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Data Block Ended Interrupt Mask */
01444 #define HSMCI_IMR_DTIP (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Data Transfer in Progress Interrupt Mask */
01445 #define HSMCI_IMR_NOTBUSY (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Data Not Busy Interrupt Mask */
01446 #define HSMCI_IMR_ENDRX (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) End of Receive Buffer Interrupt Mask */
01447 #define HSMCI_IMR_ENDTX (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) End of Transmit Buffer Interrupt Mask */
01448 #define HSMCI_IMR_SDIOIRQA (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) SDIO Interrupt for Slot A Interrupt Mask */
01449 #define HSMCI_IMR_SDIOWAIT (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) SDIO Read Wait Operation Status Interrupt Mask */
01450 #define HSMCI_IMR_CSRCV (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Completion Signal Received Interrupt Mask */
01451 #define HSMCI_IMR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Receive Buffer Full Interrupt Mask */
01452 #define HSMCI_IMR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Transmit Buffer Empty Interrupt Mask */
01453 #define HSMCI_IMR_RINDE (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Response Index Error Interrupt Mask */
01454 #define HSMCI_IMR_RDIRE (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Response Direction Error Interrupt Mask */
01455 #define HSMCI_IMR_RCRCE (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Response CRC Error Interrupt Mask */
01456 #define HSMCI_IMR_RENDE (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Response End Bit Error Interrupt Mask */
01457 #define HSMCI_IMR_RTOE (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Response Time-out Error Interrupt Mask */
01458 #define HSMCI_IMR_DCRCE (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Data CRC Error Interrupt Mask */
01459 #define HSMCI_IMR_DTOE (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Data Time-out Error Interrupt Mask */
01460 #define HSMCI_IMR_CSTOE (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Completion Signal Time-out Error Interrupt Mask */
01461 #define HSMCI_IMR_FIFOEMPTY (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) FIFO Empty Interrupt Mask */
01462 #define HSMCI_IMR_XFRDONE (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Transfer Done Interrupt Mask */
01463 #define HSMCI_IMR_ACKRCV (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Boot Operation Acknowledge Received Interrupt Mask */
01464 #define HSMCI_IMR_ACKRCVE (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Boot Operation Acknowledge Error Interrupt Mask */
01465 #define HSMCI_IMR_OVRE (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Overrun Interrupt Mask */
01466 #define HSMCI_IMR_UNRE (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (HSMCI_IMR) Underrun Interrupt Mask */
01467 /* -------- HSMCI_CFG : (HSMCI Offset: 0x54) Configuration Register -------- */
01468 #define HSMCI_CFG_FIFOMODE (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CFG) HSMCI Internal FIFO control mode */
01469 #define HSMCI_CFG_FERRCTRL (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CFG) Flow Error flag reset control mode */
01470 #define HSMCI_CFG_HSMODE (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CFG) High Speed Mode */
01471 #define HSMCI_CFG_LSYNC (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (HSMCI_CFG) Synchronize on the last block */
01472 /* -------- HSMCI_WPMR : (HSMCI Offset: 0xE4) Write Protection Mode Register -------- */
01473 #define HSMCI_WPMR_WP_EN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_WPMR) Write Protection Enable */
01474 #define HSMCI_WPMR_WP_KEY_Pos 8
01475 #define HSMCI_WPMR_WP_KEY_Msk (0xffffffu << HSMCI_WPMR_WP_KEY_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_WPMR) Write Protection Key password */
01476 #define HSMCI_WPMR_WP_KEY(value) ((HSMCI_WPMR_WP_KEY_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_WPMR_WP_KEY_Pos)))
01477 /* -------- HSMCI_WPSR : (HSMCI Offset: 0xE8) Write Protection Status Register -------- */
01478 #define HSMCI_WPSR_WP_VS_Pos 0
01479 #define HSMCI_WPSR_WP_VS_Msk (0xfu << HSMCI_WPSR_WP_VS_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_WPSR) Write Protection Violation Status */
01480 #define   HSMCI_WPSR_WP_VS_NONE (0x0u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_WPSR) No Write Protection Violation occurred since the last read of this register (WP_SR) */
01481 #define   HSMCI_WPSR_WP_VS_WRITE (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_WPSR) Write Protection detected unauthorized attempt to write a control register had occurred (since the last read.) */
01482 #define   HSMCI_WPSR_WP_VS_RESET (0x2u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_WPSR) Software reset had been performed while Write Protection was enabled (since the last read). */
01483 #define   HSMCI_WPSR_WP_VS_BOTH (0x3u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_WPSR) Both Write Protection violation and software reset with Write Protection enabled have occurred since the last read. */
01484 #define HSMCI_WPSR_WP_VSRC_Pos 8
01485 #define HSMCI_WPSR_WP_VSRC_Msk (0xffffu << HSMCI_WPSR_WP_VSRC_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_WPSR) Write Protection Violation SouRCe */
01486 /* -------- HSMCI_RPR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register -------- */
01487 #define HSMCI_RPR_RXPTR_Pos 0
01488 #define HSMCI_RPR_RXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << HSMCI_RPR_RXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_RPR) Receive Pointer Register */
01489 #define HSMCI_RPR_RXPTR(value) ((HSMCI_RPR_RXPTR_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_RPR_RXPTR_Pos)))
01490 /* -------- HSMCI_RCR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register -------- */
01491 #define HSMCI_RCR_RXCTR_Pos 0
01492 #define HSMCI_RCR_RXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << HSMCI_RCR_RXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_RCR) Receive Counter Register */
01493 #define HSMCI_RCR_RXCTR(value) ((HSMCI_RCR_RXCTR_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_RCR_RXCTR_Pos)))
01494 /* -------- HSMCI_TPR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register -------- */
01495 #define HSMCI_TPR_TXPTR_Pos 0
01496 #define HSMCI_TPR_TXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << HSMCI_TPR_TXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_TPR) Transmit Counter Register */
01497 #define HSMCI_TPR_TXPTR(value) ((HSMCI_TPR_TXPTR_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_TPR_TXPTR_Pos)))
01498 /* -------- HSMCI_TCR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register -------- */
01499 #define HSMCI_TCR_TXCTR_Pos 0
01500 #define HSMCI_TCR_TXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << HSMCI_TCR_TXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_TCR) Transmit Counter Register */
01501 #define HSMCI_TCR_TXCTR(value) ((HSMCI_TCR_TXCTR_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_TCR_TXCTR_Pos)))
01502 /* -------- HSMCI_RNPR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register -------- */
01503 #define HSMCI_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos 0
01504 #define HSMCI_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << HSMCI_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_RNPR) Receive Next Pointer */
01505 #define HSMCI_RNPR_RXNPTR(value) ((HSMCI_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos)))
01506 /* -------- HSMCI_RNCR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register -------- */
01507 #define HSMCI_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos 0
01508 #define HSMCI_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << HSMCI_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_RNCR) Receive Next Counter */
01509 #define HSMCI_RNCR_RXNCTR(value) ((HSMCI_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos)))
01510 /* -------- HSMCI_TNPR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register -------- */
01511 #define HSMCI_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos 0
01512 #define HSMCI_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << HSMCI_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_TNPR) Transmit Next Pointer */
01513 #define HSMCI_TNPR_TXNPTR(value) ((HSMCI_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos)))
01514 /* -------- HSMCI_TNCR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register -------- */
01515 #define HSMCI_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos 0
01516 #define HSMCI_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << HSMCI_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_TNCR) Transmit Counter Next */
01517 #define HSMCI_TNCR_TXNCTR(value) ((HSMCI_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos)))
01518 /* -------- HSMCI_PTCR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register -------- */
01519 #define HSMCI_PTCR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
01520 #define HSMCI_PTCR_RXTDIS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (HSMCI_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Disable */
01521 #define HSMCI_PTCR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (HSMCI_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
01522 #define HSMCI_PTCR_TXTDIS (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (HSMCI_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Disable */
01523 /* -------- HSMCI_PTSR : (HSMCI Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register -------- */
01524 #define HSMCI_PTSR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (HSMCI_PTSR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
01525 #define HSMCI_PTSR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (HSMCI_PTSR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
01526 /* -------- HSMCI_FIFO[256] : (HSMCI Offset: 0x200) FIFO Memory Aperture0 -------- */
01527 #define HSMCI_FIFO_DATA_Pos 0
01528 #define HSMCI_FIFO_DATA_Msk (0xffffffffu << HSMCI_FIFO_DATA_Pos) /**< \brief (HSMCI_FIFO[256]) Data to Read or Data to Write */
01529 #define HSMCI_FIFO_DATA(value) ((HSMCI_FIFO_DATA_Msk & ((value) << HSMCI_FIFO_DATA_Pos)))
01530 
01531 /*@}*/
01532 
01533 /* ============================================================================= */
01534 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR AHB Bus Matrix */
01535 /* ============================================================================= */
01536 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_MATRIX AHB Bus Matrix */
01537 /*@{*/
01538 
01539 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
01540 /** \brief Matrix hardware registers */
01541 typedef struct {
01542   RwReg MATRIX_MCFG[4]; /**< \brief (Matrix Offset: 0x0000) Master Configuration Register */
01543   RwReg Reserved1[12];
01544   RwReg MATRIX_SCFG[5]; /**< \brief (Matrix Offset: 0x0040) Slave Configuration Register */
01545   RwReg Reserved2[11];
01546   RwReg MATRIX_PRAS0;   /**< \brief (Matrix Offset: 0x0080) Priority Register A for Slave 0 */
01547   RwReg Reserved3[1];
01548   RwReg MATRIX_PRAS1;   /**< \brief (Matrix Offset: 0x0088) Priority Register A for Slave 1 */
01549   RwReg Reserved4[1];
01550   RwReg MATRIX_PRAS2;   /**< \brief (Matrix Offset: 0x0090) Priority Register A for Slave 2 */
01551   RwReg Reserved5[1];
01552   RwReg MATRIX_PRAS3;   /**< \brief (Matrix Offset: 0x0098) Priority Register A for Slave 3 */
01553   RwReg Reserved6[1];
01554   RwReg MATRIX_PRAS4;   /**< \brief (Matrix Offset: 0x00A0) Priority Register A for Slave 4 */
01555   RwReg Reserved7[1];
01556   RwReg Reserved8[27];
01557   RwReg CCFG_SYSIO;     /**< \brief (Matrix Offset: 0x0114) System I/O Configuration register */
01558   RwReg Reserved9[1];
01559   RwReg CCFG_SMCNFCS;   /**< \brief (Matrix Offset: 0x011C) SMC Chip Select NAND Flash Assignment Register */
01560   RwReg Reserved10[49];
01561   RwReg MATRIX_WPMR;    /**< \brief (Matrix Offset: 0x1E4) Write Protect Mode Register */
01562   RoReg MATRIX_WPSR;    /**< \brief (Matrix Offset: 0x1E8) Write Protect Status Register */
01563 } Matrix;
01564 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
01565 /* -------- MATRIX_MCFG[4] : (MATRIX Offset: 0x0000) Master Configuration Register -------- */
01566 #define MATRIX_MCFG_ULBT_Pos 0
01567 #define MATRIX_MCFG_ULBT_Msk (0x7u << MATRIX_MCFG_ULBT_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_MCFG[4]) Undefined Length Burst Type */
01568 #define MATRIX_MCFG_ULBT(value) ((MATRIX_MCFG_ULBT_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_MCFG_ULBT_Pos)))
01569 /* -------- MATRIX_SCFG[5] : (MATRIX Offset: 0x0040) Slave Configuration Register -------- */
01570 #define MATRIX_SCFG_SLOT_CYCLE_Pos 0
01571 #define MATRIX_SCFG_SLOT_CYCLE_Msk (0xffu << MATRIX_SCFG_SLOT_CYCLE_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_SCFG[5]) Maximum Number of Allowed Cycles for a Burst */
01572 #define MATRIX_SCFG_SLOT_CYCLE(value) ((MATRIX_SCFG_SLOT_CYCLE_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_SCFG_SLOT_CYCLE_Pos)))
01573 #define MATRIX_SCFG_DEFMSTR_TYPE_Pos 16
01574 #define MATRIX_SCFG_DEFMSTR_TYPE_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_SCFG_DEFMSTR_TYPE_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_SCFG[5]) Default Master Type */
01575 #define MATRIX_SCFG_DEFMSTR_TYPE(value) ((MATRIX_SCFG_DEFMSTR_TYPE_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_SCFG_DEFMSTR_TYPE_Pos)))
01576 #define MATRIX_SCFG_FIXED_DEFMSTR_Pos 18
01577 #define MATRIX_SCFG_FIXED_DEFMSTR_Msk (0x7u << MATRIX_SCFG_FIXED_DEFMSTR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_SCFG[5]) Fixed Default Master */
01578 #define MATRIX_SCFG_FIXED_DEFMSTR(value) ((MATRIX_SCFG_FIXED_DEFMSTR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_SCFG_FIXED_DEFMSTR_Pos)))
01579 #define MATRIX_SCFG_ARBT_Pos 24
01580 #define MATRIX_SCFG_ARBT_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_SCFG_ARBT_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_SCFG[5]) Arbitration Type */
01581 #define MATRIX_SCFG_ARBT(value) ((MATRIX_SCFG_ARBT_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_SCFG_ARBT_Pos)))
01582 /* -------- MATRIX_PRAS0 : (MATRIX Offset: 0x0080) Priority Register A for Slave 0 -------- */
01583 #define MATRIX_PRAS0_M0PR_Pos 0
01584 #define MATRIX_PRAS0_M0PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS0_M0PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS0) Master 0 Priority */
01585 #define MATRIX_PRAS0_M0PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS0_M0PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS0_M0PR_Pos)))
01586 #define MATRIX_PRAS0_M1PR_Pos 4
01587 #define MATRIX_PRAS0_M1PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS0_M1PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS0) Master 1 Priority */
01588 #define MATRIX_PRAS0_M1PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS0_M1PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS0_M1PR_Pos)))
01589 #define MATRIX_PRAS0_M2PR_Pos 8
01590 #define MATRIX_PRAS0_M2PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS0_M2PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS0) Master 2 Priority */
01591 #define MATRIX_PRAS0_M2PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS0_M2PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS0_M2PR_Pos)))
01592 #define MATRIX_PRAS0_M3PR_Pos 12
01593 #define MATRIX_PRAS0_M3PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS0_M3PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS0) Master 3 Priority */
01594 #define MATRIX_PRAS0_M3PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS0_M3PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS0_M3PR_Pos)))
01595 #define MATRIX_PRAS0_M4PR_Pos 16
01596 #define MATRIX_PRAS0_M4PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS0_M4PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS0) Master 4 Priority */
01597 #define MATRIX_PRAS0_M4PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS0_M4PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS0_M4PR_Pos)))
01598 /* -------- MATRIX_PRAS1 : (MATRIX Offset: 0x0088) Priority Register A for Slave 1 -------- */
01599 #define MATRIX_PRAS1_M0PR_Pos 0
01600 #define MATRIX_PRAS1_M0PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS1_M0PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS1) Master 0 Priority */
01601 #define MATRIX_PRAS1_M0PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS1_M0PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS1_M0PR_Pos)))
01602 #define MATRIX_PRAS1_M1PR_Pos 4
01603 #define MATRIX_PRAS1_M1PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS1_M1PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS1) Master 1 Priority */
01604 #define MATRIX_PRAS1_M1PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS1_M1PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS1_M1PR_Pos)))
01605 #define MATRIX_PRAS1_M2PR_Pos 8
01606 #define MATRIX_PRAS1_M2PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS1_M2PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS1) Master 2 Priority */
01607 #define MATRIX_PRAS1_M2PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS1_M2PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS1_M2PR_Pos)))
01608 #define MATRIX_PRAS1_M3PR_Pos 12
01609 #define MATRIX_PRAS1_M3PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS1_M3PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS1) Master 3 Priority */
01610 #define MATRIX_PRAS1_M3PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS1_M3PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS1_M3PR_Pos)))
01611 #define MATRIX_PRAS1_M4PR_Pos 16
01612 #define MATRIX_PRAS1_M4PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS1_M4PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS1) Master 4 Priority */
01613 #define MATRIX_PRAS1_M4PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS1_M4PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS1_M4PR_Pos)))
01614 /* -------- MATRIX_PRAS2 : (MATRIX Offset: 0x0090) Priority Register A for Slave 2 -------- */
01615 #define MATRIX_PRAS2_M0PR_Pos 0
01616 #define MATRIX_PRAS2_M0PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS2_M0PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS2) Master 0 Priority */
01617 #define MATRIX_PRAS2_M0PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS2_M0PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS2_M0PR_Pos)))
01618 #define MATRIX_PRAS2_M1PR_Pos 4
01619 #define MATRIX_PRAS2_M1PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS2_M1PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS2) Master 1 Priority */
01620 #define MATRIX_PRAS2_M1PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS2_M1PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS2_M1PR_Pos)))
01621 #define MATRIX_PRAS2_M2PR_Pos 8
01622 #define MATRIX_PRAS2_M2PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS2_M2PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS2) Master 2 Priority */
01623 #define MATRIX_PRAS2_M2PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS2_M2PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS2_M2PR_Pos)))
01624 #define MATRIX_PRAS2_M3PR_Pos 12
01625 #define MATRIX_PRAS2_M3PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS2_M3PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS2) Master 3 Priority */
01626 #define MATRIX_PRAS2_M3PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS2_M3PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS2_M3PR_Pos)))
01627 #define MATRIX_PRAS2_M4PR_Pos 16
01628 #define MATRIX_PRAS2_M4PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS2_M4PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS2) Master 4 Priority */
01629 #define MATRIX_PRAS2_M4PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS2_M4PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS2_M4PR_Pos)))
01630 /* -------- MATRIX_PRAS3 : (MATRIX Offset: 0x0098) Priority Register A for Slave 3 -------- */
01631 #define MATRIX_PRAS3_M0PR_Pos 0
01632 #define MATRIX_PRAS3_M0PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS3_M0PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS3) Master 0 Priority */
01633 #define MATRIX_PRAS3_M0PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS3_M0PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS3_M0PR_Pos)))
01634 #define MATRIX_PRAS3_M1PR_Pos 4
01635 #define MATRIX_PRAS3_M1PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS3_M1PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS3) Master 1 Priority */
01636 #define MATRIX_PRAS3_M1PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS3_M1PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS3_M1PR_Pos)))
01637 #define MATRIX_PRAS3_M2PR_Pos 8
01638 #define MATRIX_PRAS3_M2PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS3_M2PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS3) Master 2 Priority */
01639 #define MATRIX_PRAS3_M2PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS3_M2PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS3_M2PR_Pos)))
01640 #define MATRIX_PRAS3_M3PR_Pos 12
01641 #define MATRIX_PRAS3_M3PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS3_M3PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS3) Master 3 Priority */
01642 #define MATRIX_PRAS3_M3PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS3_M3PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS3_M3PR_Pos)))
01643 #define MATRIX_PRAS3_M4PR_Pos 16
01644 #define MATRIX_PRAS3_M4PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS3_M4PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS3) Master 4 Priority */
01645 #define MATRIX_PRAS3_M4PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS3_M4PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS3_M4PR_Pos)))
01646 /* -------- MATRIX_PRAS4 : (MATRIX Offset: 0x00A0) Priority Register A for Slave 4 -------- */
01647 #define MATRIX_PRAS4_M0PR_Pos 0
01648 #define MATRIX_PRAS4_M0PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS4_M0PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS4) Master 0 Priority */
01649 #define MATRIX_PRAS4_M0PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS4_M0PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS4_M0PR_Pos)))
01650 #define MATRIX_PRAS4_M1PR_Pos 4
01651 #define MATRIX_PRAS4_M1PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS4_M1PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS4) Master 1 Priority */
01652 #define MATRIX_PRAS4_M1PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS4_M1PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS4_M1PR_Pos)))
01653 #define MATRIX_PRAS4_M2PR_Pos 8
01654 #define MATRIX_PRAS4_M2PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS4_M2PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS4) Master 2 Priority */
01655 #define MATRIX_PRAS4_M2PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS4_M2PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS4_M2PR_Pos)))
01656 #define MATRIX_PRAS4_M3PR_Pos 12
01657 #define MATRIX_PRAS4_M3PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS4_M3PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS4) Master 3 Priority */
01658 #define MATRIX_PRAS4_M3PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS4_M3PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS4_M3PR_Pos)))
01659 #define MATRIX_PRAS4_M4PR_Pos 16
01660 #define MATRIX_PRAS4_M4PR_Msk (0x3u << MATRIX_PRAS4_M4PR_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_PRAS4) Master 4 Priority */
01661 #define MATRIX_PRAS4_M4PR(value) ((MATRIX_PRAS4_M4PR_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_PRAS4_M4PR_Pos)))
01662 /* -------- CCFG_SYSIO : (MATRIX Offset: 0x0114) System I/O Configuration register -------- */
01663 #define CCFG_SYSIO_SYSIO4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (CCFG_SYSIO) PB4 or TDI Assignment */
01664 #define CCFG_SYSIO_SYSIO5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (CCFG_SYSIO) PB5 or TDO/TRACESWO Assignment */
01665 #define CCFG_SYSIO_SYSIO6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (CCFG_SYSIO) PB6 or TMS/SWDIO Assignment */
01666 #define CCFG_SYSIO_SYSIO7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (CCFG_SYSIO) PB7 or TCK/SWCLK Assignment */
01667 #define CCFG_SYSIO_SYSIO10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (CCFG_SYSIO) PB10 or DDM Assignment */
01668 #define CCFG_SYSIO_SYSIO11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (CCFG_SYSIO) PB11 or DDP Assignment */
01669 #define CCFG_SYSIO_SYSIO12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (CCFG_SYSIO) PB12 or ERASE Assignment */
01670 /* -------- CCFG_SMCNFCS : (MATRIX Offset: 0x011C) SMC Chip Select NAND Flash Assignment Register -------- */
01671 #define CCFG_SMCNFCS_SMC_NFCS0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (CCFG_SMCNFCS) SMC NAND Flash Chip Select 0 Assignment */
01672 #define CCFG_SMCNFCS_SMC_NFCS1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (CCFG_SMCNFCS) SMC NAND Flash Chip Select 1 Assignment */
01673 #define CCFG_SMCNFCS_SMC_NFCS2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (CCFG_SMCNFCS) SMC NAND Flash Chip Select 2 Assignment */
01674 #define CCFG_SMCNFCS_SMC_NFCS3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (CCFG_SMCNFCS) SMC NAND Flash Chip Select 3 Assignment */
01675 /* -------- MATRIX_WPMR : (MATRIX Offset: 0x1E4) Write Protect Mode Register -------- */
01676 #define MATRIX_WPMR_WPEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (MATRIX_WPMR) Write Protect ENable */
01677 #define MATRIX_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos 8
01678 #define MATRIX_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk (0xffffffu << MATRIX_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_WPMR) Write Protect KEY (Write-only) */
01679 #define MATRIX_WPMR_WPKEY(value) ((MATRIX_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk & ((value) << MATRIX_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos)))
01680 /* -------- MATRIX_WPSR : (MATRIX Offset: 0x1E8) Write Protect Status Register -------- */
01681 #define MATRIX_WPSR_WPVS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (MATRIX_WPSR) Write Protect Violation Status */
01682 #define MATRIX_WPSR_WPVSRC_Pos 8
01683 #define MATRIX_WPSR_WPVSRC_Msk (0xffffu << MATRIX_WPSR_WPVSRC_Pos) /**< \brief (MATRIX_WPSR) Write Protect Violation Source */
01684 
01685 /*@}*/
01686 
01687 /* ============================================================================= */
01688 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Peripheral DMA Controller */
01689 /* ============================================================================= */
01690 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_PDC Peripheral DMA Controller */
01691 /*@{*/
01692 
01693 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
01694 /** \brief Pdc hardware registers */
01695 typedef struct {
01696   RwReg Reserved1[64];
01697   RwReg PERIPH_RPR;    /**< \brief (Pdc Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register */
01698   RwReg PERIPH_RCR;    /**< \brief (Pdc Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register */
01699   RwReg PERIPH_TPR;    /**< \brief (Pdc Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register */
01700   RwReg PERIPH_TCR;    /**< \brief (Pdc Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register */
01701   RwReg PERIPH_RNPR;   /**< \brief (Pdc Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register */
01702   RwReg PERIPH_RNCR;   /**< \brief (Pdc Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register */
01703   RwReg PERIPH_TNPR;   /**< \brief (Pdc Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register */
01704   RwReg PERIPH_TNCR;   /**< \brief (Pdc Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register */
01705   WoReg PERIPH_PTCR;   /**< \brief (Pdc Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register */
01706   RoReg PERIPH_PTSR;   /**< \brief (Pdc Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register */
01707 } Pdc;
01708 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
01709 /* -------- PERIPH_RPR : (PDC Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register -------- */
01710 #define PERIPH_RPR_RXPTR_Pos 0
01711 #define PERIPH_RPR_RXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << PERIPH_RPR_RXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PERIPH_RPR) Receive Pointer Register */
01712 #define PERIPH_RPR_RXPTR(value) ((PERIPH_RPR_RXPTR_Msk & ((value) << PERIPH_RPR_RXPTR_Pos)))
01713 /* -------- PERIPH_RCR : (PDC Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register -------- */
01714 #define PERIPH_RCR_RXCTR_Pos 0
01715 #define PERIPH_RCR_RXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << PERIPH_RCR_RXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PERIPH_RCR) Receive Counter Register */
01716 #define PERIPH_RCR_RXCTR(value) ((PERIPH_RCR_RXCTR_Msk & ((value) << PERIPH_RCR_RXCTR_Pos)))
01717 /* -------- PERIPH_TPR : (PDC Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register -------- */
01718 #define PERIPH_TPR_TXPTR_Pos 0
01719 #define PERIPH_TPR_TXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << PERIPH_TPR_TXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PERIPH_TPR) Transmit Counter Register */
01720 #define PERIPH_TPR_TXPTR(value) ((PERIPH_TPR_TXPTR_Msk & ((value) << PERIPH_TPR_TXPTR_Pos)))
01721 /* -------- PERIPH_TCR : (PDC Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register -------- */
01722 #define PERIPH_TCR_TXCTR_Pos 0
01723 #define PERIPH_TCR_TXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << PERIPH_TCR_TXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PERIPH_TCR) Transmit Counter Register */
01724 #define PERIPH_TCR_TXCTR(value) ((PERIPH_TCR_TXCTR_Msk & ((value) << PERIPH_TCR_TXCTR_Pos)))
01725 /* -------- PERIPH_RNPR : (PDC Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register -------- */
01726 #define PERIPH_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos 0
01727 #define PERIPH_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << PERIPH_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PERIPH_RNPR) Receive Next Pointer */
01728 #define PERIPH_RNPR_RXNPTR(value) ((PERIPH_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << PERIPH_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos)))
01729 /* -------- PERIPH_RNCR : (PDC Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register -------- */
01730 #define PERIPH_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos 0
01731 #define PERIPH_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << PERIPH_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PERIPH_RNCR) Receive Next Counter */
01732 #define PERIPH_RNCR_RXNCTR(value) ((PERIPH_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << PERIPH_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos)))
01733 /* -------- PERIPH_TNPR : (PDC Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register -------- */
01734 #define PERIPH_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos 0
01735 #define PERIPH_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << PERIPH_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PERIPH_TNPR) Transmit Next Pointer */
01736 #define PERIPH_TNPR_TXNPTR(value) ((PERIPH_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << PERIPH_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos)))
01737 /* -------- PERIPH_TNCR : (PDC Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register -------- */
01738 #define PERIPH_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos 0
01739 #define PERIPH_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << PERIPH_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PERIPH_TNCR) Transmit Counter Next */
01740 #define PERIPH_TNCR_TXNCTR(value) ((PERIPH_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << PERIPH_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos)))
01741 /* -------- PERIPH_PTCR : (PDC Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register -------- */
01742 #define PERIPH_PTCR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PERIPH_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
01743 #define PERIPH_PTCR_RXTDIS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PERIPH_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Disable */
01744 #define PERIPH_PTCR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PERIPH_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
01745 #define PERIPH_PTCR_TXTDIS (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PERIPH_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Disable */
01746 /* -------- PERIPH_PTSR : (PDC Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register -------- */
01747 #define PERIPH_PTSR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PERIPH_PTSR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
01748 #define PERIPH_PTSR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PERIPH_PTSR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
01749 
01750 /*@}*/
01751 
01752 /* ============================================================================= */
01753 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Parallel Input/Output */
01754 /* ============================================================================= */
01755 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_PIO Parallel Input/Output */
01756 /*@{*/
01757 
01758 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
01759 /** \brief Pio hardware registers */
01760 typedef struct {
01761   WoReg PIO_PER;        /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0000) PIO Enable Register */
01762   WoReg PIO_PDR;        /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0004) PIO Disable Register */
01763   RoReg PIO_PSR;        /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0008) PIO Status Register */
01764   RwReg Reserved1[1];
01765   WoReg PIO_OER;        /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0010) Output Enable Register */
01766   WoReg PIO_ODR;        /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0014) Output Disable Register */
01767   RoReg PIO_OSR;        /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0018) Output Status Register */
01768   RwReg Reserved2[1];
01769   WoReg PIO_IFER;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0020) Glitch Input Filter Enable Register */
01770   WoReg PIO_IFDR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0024) Glitch Input Filter Disable Register */
01771   RoReg PIO_IFSR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0028) Glitch Input Filter Status Register */
01772   RwReg Reserved3[1];
01773   WoReg PIO_SODR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0030) Set Output Data Register */
01774   WoReg PIO_CODR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0034) Clear Output Data Register */
01775   RwReg PIO_ODSR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0038) Output Data Status Register */
01776   RoReg PIO_PDSR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x003C) Pin Data Status Register */
01777   WoReg PIO_IER;        /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0040) Interrupt Enable Register */
01778   WoReg PIO_IDR;        /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0044) Interrupt Disable Register */
01779   RoReg PIO_IMR;        /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0048) Interrupt Mask Register */
01780   RoReg PIO_ISR;        /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x004C) Interrupt Status Register */
01781   WoReg PIO_MDER;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0050) Multi-driver Enable Register */
01782   WoReg PIO_MDDR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0054) Multi-driver Disable Register */
01783   RoReg PIO_MDSR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0058) Multi-driver Status Register */
01784   RwReg Reserved4[1];
01785   WoReg PIO_PUDR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0060) Pull-up Disable Register */
01786   WoReg PIO_PUER;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0064) Pull-up Enable Register */
01787   RoReg PIO_PUSR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0068) Pad Pull-up Status Register */
01788   RwReg Reserved5[1];
01789   RwReg PIO_ABCDSR[2];  /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0070) Peripheral Select Register */
01790   RwReg Reserved6[2];
01791   WoReg PIO_IFSCDR;     /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0080) Input Filter Slow Clock Disable Register */
01792   WoReg PIO_IFSCER;     /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0084) Input Filter Slow Clock Enable Register */
01793   RoReg PIO_IFSCSR;     /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0088) Input Filter Slow Clock Status Register */
01794   RwReg PIO_SCDR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x008C) Slow Clock Divider Debouncing Register */
01795   WoReg PIO_PPDDR;      /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0090) Pad Pull-down Disable Register */
01796   WoReg PIO_PPDER;      /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0094) Pad Pull-down Enable Register */
01797   RoReg PIO_PPDSR;      /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0098) Pad Pull-down Status Register */
01798   RwReg Reserved7[1];
01799   WoReg PIO_OWER;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x00A0) Output Write Enable */
01800   WoReg PIO_OWDR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x00A4) Output Write Disable */
01801   RoReg PIO_OWSR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x00A8) Output Write Status Register */
01802   RwReg Reserved8[1];
01803   WoReg PIO_AIMER;      /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x00B0) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable Register */
01804   WoReg PIO_AIMDR;      /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x00B4) Additional Interrupt Modes Disables Register */
01805   RoReg PIO_AIMMR;      /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x00B8) Additional Interrupt Modes Mask Register */
01806   RwReg Reserved9[1];
01807   WoReg PIO_ESR;        /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x00C0) Edge Select Register */
01808   WoReg PIO_LSR;        /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x00C4) Level Select Register */
01809   RoReg PIO_ELSR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x00C8) Edge/Level Status Register */
01810   RwReg Reserved10[1];
01811   WoReg PIO_FELLSR;     /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x00D0) Falling Edge/Low Level Select Register */
01812   WoReg PIO_REHLSR;     /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x00D4) Rising Edge/ High Level Select Register */
01813   RoReg PIO_FRLHSR;     /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x00D8) Fall/Rise - Low/High Status Register */
01814   RwReg Reserved11[1];
01815   RoReg PIO_LOCKSR;     /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x00E0) Lock Status */
01816   RwReg PIO_WPMR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x00E4) Write Protect Mode Register */
01817   RoReg PIO_WPSR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x00E8) Write Protect Status Register */
01818   RwReg Reserved12[5];
01819   RwReg PIO_SCHMITT;    /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x0100) Schmitt Trigger Register */
01820   RwReg Reserved13[19];
01821   RwReg PIO_PCMR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x150) Parallel Capture Mode Register */
01822   WoReg PIO_PCIER;      /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x154) Parallel Capture Interrupt Enable Register */
01823   WoReg PIO_PCIDR;      /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x158) Parallel Capture Interrupt Disable Register */
01824   RoReg PIO_PCIMR;      /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x15C) Parallel Capture Interrupt Mask Register */
01825   RoReg PIO_PCISR;      /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x160) Parallel Capture Interrupt Status Register */
01826   RoReg PIO_PCRHR;      /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x164) Parallel Capture Reception Holding Register */
01827   RwReg PIO_RPR;        /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x168) Receive Pointer Register */
01828   RwReg PIO_RCR;        /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x16C) Receive Counter Register */
01829   RwReg PIO_TPR;        /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x170) Transmit Pointer Register */
01830   RwReg PIO_TCR;        /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x174) Transmit Counter Register */
01831   RwReg PIO_RNPR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x178) Receive Next Pointer Register */
01832   RwReg PIO_RNCR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x17C) Receive Next Counter Register */
01833   RwReg PIO_TNPR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x180) Transmit Next Pointer Register */
01834   RwReg PIO_TNCR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x184) Transmit Next Counter Register */
01835   WoReg PIO_PTCR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x188) Transfer Control Register */
01836   RoReg PIO_PTSR;       /**< \brief (Pio Offset: 0x18C) Transfer Status Register */
01837 } Pio;
01838 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
01839 /* -------- PIO_PER : (PIO Offset: 0x0000) PIO Enable Register -------- */
01840 #define PIO_PER_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01841 #define PIO_PER_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01842 #define PIO_PER_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01843 #define PIO_PER_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01844 #define PIO_PER_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01845 #define PIO_PER_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01846 #define PIO_PER_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01847 #define PIO_PER_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01848 #define PIO_PER_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01849 #define PIO_PER_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01850 #define PIO_PER_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01851 #define PIO_PER_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01852 #define PIO_PER_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01853 #define PIO_PER_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01854 #define PIO_PER_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01855 #define PIO_PER_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01856 #define PIO_PER_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01857 #define PIO_PER_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01858 #define PIO_PER_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01859 #define PIO_PER_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01860 #define PIO_PER_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01861 #define PIO_PER_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01862 #define PIO_PER_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01863 #define PIO_PER_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01864 #define PIO_PER_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01865 #define PIO_PER_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01866 #define PIO_PER_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01867 #define PIO_PER_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01868 #define PIO_PER_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01869 #define PIO_PER_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01870 #define PIO_PER_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01871 #define PIO_PER_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_PER) PIO Enable */
01872 /* -------- PIO_PDR : (PIO Offset: 0x0004) PIO Disable Register -------- */
01873 #define PIO_PDR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01874 #define PIO_PDR_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01875 #define PIO_PDR_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01876 #define PIO_PDR_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01877 #define PIO_PDR_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01878 #define PIO_PDR_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01879 #define PIO_PDR_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01880 #define PIO_PDR_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01881 #define PIO_PDR_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01882 #define PIO_PDR_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01883 #define PIO_PDR_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01884 #define PIO_PDR_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01885 #define PIO_PDR_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01886 #define PIO_PDR_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01887 #define PIO_PDR_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01888 #define PIO_PDR_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01889 #define PIO_PDR_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01890 #define PIO_PDR_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01891 #define PIO_PDR_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01892 #define PIO_PDR_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01893 #define PIO_PDR_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01894 #define PIO_PDR_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01895 #define PIO_PDR_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01896 #define PIO_PDR_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01897 #define PIO_PDR_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01898 #define PIO_PDR_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01899 #define PIO_PDR_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01900 #define PIO_PDR_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01901 #define PIO_PDR_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01902 #define PIO_PDR_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01903 #define PIO_PDR_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01904 #define PIO_PDR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_PDR) PIO Disable */
01905 /* -------- PIO_PSR : (PIO Offset: 0x0008) PIO Status Register -------- */
01906 #define PIO_PSR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01907 #define PIO_PSR_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01908 #define PIO_PSR_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01909 #define PIO_PSR_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01910 #define PIO_PSR_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01911 #define PIO_PSR_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01912 #define PIO_PSR_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01913 #define PIO_PSR_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01914 #define PIO_PSR_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01915 #define PIO_PSR_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01916 #define PIO_PSR_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01917 #define PIO_PSR_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01918 #define PIO_PSR_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01919 #define PIO_PSR_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01920 #define PIO_PSR_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01921 #define PIO_PSR_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01922 #define PIO_PSR_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01923 #define PIO_PSR_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01924 #define PIO_PSR_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01925 #define PIO_PSR_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01926 #define PIO_PSR_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01927 #define PIO_PSR_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01928 #define PIO_PSR_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01929 #define PIO_PSR_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01930 #define PIO_PSR_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01931 #define PIO_PSR_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01932 #define PIO_PSR_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01933 #define PIO_PSR_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01934 #define PIO_PSR_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01935 #define PIO_PSR_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01936 #define PIO_PSR_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01937 #define PIO_PSR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_PSR) PIO Status */
01938 /* -------- PIO_OER : (PIO Offset: 0x0010) Output Enable Register -------- */
01939 #define PIO_OER_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01940 #define PIO_OER_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01941 #define PIO_OER_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01942 #define PIO_OER_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01943 #define PIO_OER_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01944 #define PIO_OER_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01945 #define PIO_OER_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01946 #define PIO_OER_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01947 #define PIO_OER_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01948 #define PIO_OER_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01949 #define PIO_OER_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01950 #define PIO_OER_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01951 #define PIO_OER_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01952 #define PIO_OER_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01953 #define PIO_OER_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01954 #define PIO_OER_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01955 #define PIO_OER_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01956 #define PIO_OER_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01957 #define PIO_OER_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01958 #define PIO_OER_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
