01959 #define PIO_OER_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01960 #define PIO_OER_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01961 #define PIO_OER_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01962 #define PIO_OER_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */

01970 #define PIO_OER_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_OER) Output Enable */
01971 /* -------- PIO_ODR : (PIO Offset: 0x0014) Output Disable Register -------- */

02017 #define PIO_OSR_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_OSR) Output Status */
02018 #define PIO_OSR_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_OSR) Output Status */
02019 #define PIO_OSR_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_OSR) Output Status */
02020 #define PIO_OSR_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_OSR) Output Status */

02037 /* -------- PIO_IFER : (PIO Offset: 0x0020) Glitch Input Filter Enable Register -------- */
02038 #define PIO_IFER_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_IFER) Input Filter Enable */
02039 #define PIO_IFER_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_IFER) Input Filter Enable */

02103 /* -------- PIO_IFSR : (PIO Offset: 0x0028) Glitch Input Filter Status Register -------- */

02136 /* -------- PIO_SODR : (PIO Offset: 0x0030) Set Output Data Register -------- */
02137 #define PIO_SODR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02138 #define PIO_SODR_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02139 #define PIO_SODR_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02140 #define PIO_SODR_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02141 #define PIO_SODR_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02142 #define PIO_SODR_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02143 #define PIO_SODR_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02144 #define PIO_SODR_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02145 #define PIO_SODR_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02146 #define PIO_SODR_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02147 #define PIO_SODR_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02148 #define PIO_SODR_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02149 #define PIO_SODR_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02150 #define PIO_SODR_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02151 #define PIO_SODR_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02152 #define PIO_SODR_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02153 #define PIO_SODR_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02154 #define PIO_SODR_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02155 #define PIO_SODR_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02156 #define PIO_SODR_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02157 #define PIO_SODR_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02158 #define PIO_SODR_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02159 #define PIO_SODR_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02160 #define PIO_SODR_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02161 #define PIO_SODR_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02162 #define PIO_SODR_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02163 #define PIO_SODR_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02164 #define PIO_SODR_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02165 #define PIO_SODR_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02166 #define PIO_SODR_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02167 #define PIO_SODR_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02168 #define PIO_SODR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_SODR) Set Output Data */
02169 /* -------- PIO_CODR : (PIO Offset: 0x0034) Clear Output Data Register -------- */

02367 /* -------- PIO_ISR : (PIO Offset: 0x004C) Interrupt Status Register -------- */
02368 #define PIO_ISR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02369 #define PIO_ISR_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02370 #define PIO_ISR_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02371 #define PIO_ISR_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02372 #define PIO_ISR_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02373 #define PIO_ISR_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02374 #define PIO_ISR_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02375 #define PIO_ISR_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02376 #define PIO_ISR_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02377 #define PIO_ISR_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02378 #define PIO_ISR_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02379 #define PIO_ISR_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02380 #define PIO_ISR_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02381 #define PIO_ISR_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02382 #define PIO_ISR_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02383 #define PIO_ISR_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02384 #define PIO_ISR_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02385 #define PIO_ISR_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02386 #define PIO_ISR_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02387 #define PIO_ISR_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02388 #define PIO_ISR_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02389 #define PIO_ISR_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02390 #define PIO_ISR_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02391 #define PIO_ISR_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02392 #define PIO_ISR_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02393 #define PIO_ISR_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02394 #define PIO_ISR_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02395 #define PIO_ISR_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02396 #define PIO_ISR_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02397 #define PIO_ISR_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02398 #define PIO_ISR_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02399 #define PIO_ISR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_ISR) Input Change Interrupt Status */
02400 /* -------- PIO_MDER : (PIO Offset: 0x0050) Multi-driver Enable Register -------- */
02401 #define PIO_MDER_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_MDER) Multi Drive Enable. */
02402 #define PIO_MDER_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_MDER) Multi Drive Enable. */
02403 #define PIO_MDER_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_MDER) Multi Drive Enable. */
02404 #define PIO_MDER_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_MDER) Multi Drive Enable. */
02405 #define PIO_MDER_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_MDER) Multi Drive Enable. */
02406 #define PIO_MDER_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_MDER) Multi Drive Enable. */

02565 /* -------- PIO_PUSR : (PIO Offset: 0x0068) Pad Pull-up Status Register -------- */

02572 #define PIO_PUSR_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02573 #define PIO_PUSR_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02574 #define PIO_PUSR_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02575 #define PIO_PUSR_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02576 #define PIO_PUSR_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02577 #define PIO_PUSR_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02578 #define PIO_PUSR_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02579 #define PIO_PUSR_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02580 #define PIO_PUSR_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */

02582 #define PIO_PUSR_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02583 #define PIO_PUSR_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02584 #define PIO_PUSR_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */

02586 #define PIO_PUSR_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */

02588 #define PIO_PUSR_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02589 #define PIO_PUSR_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02590 #define PIO_PUSR_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02591 #define PIO_PUSR_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02592 #define PIO_PUSR_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02593 #define PIO_PUSR_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02594 #define PIO_PUSR_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02595 #define PIO_PUSR_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02596 #define PIO_PUSR_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02597 #define PIO_PUSR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_PUSR) Pull Up Status. */
02598 /* -------- PIO_ABCDSR[2] : (PIO Offset: 0x0070) Peripheral Select Register -------- */
02599 #define PIO_ABCDSR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_ABCDSR[2]) Peripheral Select. */
02600 #define PIO_ABCDSR_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_ABCDSR[2]) Peripheral Select. */
02601 #define PIO_ABCDSR_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_ABCDSR[2]) Peripheral Select. */
02602 #define PIO_ABCDSR_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_ABCDSR[2]) Peripheral Select. */
02603 #define PIO_ABCDSR_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_ABCDSR[2]) Peripheral Select. */
02604 #define PIO_ABCDSR_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_ABCDSR[2]) Peripheral Select. */

02613 #define PIO_ABCDSR_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_ABCDSR[2]) Peripheral Select. */
02614 #define PIO_ABCDSR_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_ABCDSR[2]) Peripheral Select. */
02615 #define PIO_ABCDSR_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_ABCDSR[2]) Peripheral Select. */
02616 #define PIO_ABCDSR_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_ABCDSR[2]) Peripheral Select. */
02617 #define PIO_ABCDSR_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_ABCDSR[2]) Peripheral Select. */
02618 #define PIO_ABCDSR_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_ABCDSR[2]) Peripheral Select. */
02619 #define PIO_ABCDSR_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_ABCDSR[2]) Peripheral Select. */

02630 #define PIO_ABCDSR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_ABCDSR[2]) Peripheral Select. */
02631 /* -------- PIO_IFSCDR : (PIO Offset: 0x0080) Input Filter Slow Clock Disable Register -------- */
02632 #define PIO_IFSCDR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_IFSCDR) PIO Clock Glitch Filtering Select. */
02633 #define PIO_IFSCDR_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_IFSCDR) PIO Clock Glitch Filtering Select. */
02634 #define PIO_IFSCDR_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_IFSCDR) PIO Clock Glitch Filtering Select. */
02635 #define PIO_IFSCDR_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_IFSCDR) PIO Clock Glitch Filtering Select. */
02636 #define PIO_IFSCDR_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_IFSCDR) PIO Clock Glitch Filtering Select. */

02663 #define PIO_IFSCDR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_IFSCDR) PIO Clock Glitch Filtering Select. */
02664 /* -------- PIO_IFSCER : (PIO Offset: 0x0084) Input Filter Slow Clock Enable Register -------- */
02665 #define PIO_IFSCER_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_IFSCER) Debouncing Filtering Select. */

02696 #define PIO_IFSCER_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_IFSCER) Debouncing Filtering Select. */
02697 /* -------- PIO_IFSCSR : (PIO Offset: 0x0088) Input Filter Slow Clock Status Register -------- */
02698 #define PIO_IFSCSR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_IFSCSR) Glitch or Debouncing Filter Selection Status */
02699 #define PIO_IFSCSR_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_IFSCSR) Glitch or Debouncing Filter Selection Status */
02700 #define PIO_IFSCSR_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_IFSCSR) Glitch or Debouncing Filter Selection Status */
02701 #define PIO_IFSCSR_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_IFSCSR) Glitch or Debouncing Filter Selection Status */
02702 #define PIO_IFSCSR_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_IFSCSR) Glitch or Debouncing Filter Selection Status */

02715 #define PIO_IFSCSR_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_IFSCSR) Glitch or Debouncing Filter Selection Status */
02716 #define PIO_IFSCSR_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_IFSCSR) Glitch or Debouncing Filter Selection Status */

02729 #define PIO_IFSCSR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_IFSCSR) Glitch or Debouncing Filter Selection Status */
02730 /* -------- PIO_SCDR : (PIO Offset: 0x008C) Slow Clock Divider Debouncing Register -------- */
02731 #define PIO_SCDR_DIV0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_SCDR) Slow Clock Divider Selection for Debouncing */
02732 #define PIO_SCDR_DIV1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_SCDR) Slow Clock Divider Selection for Debouncing */
02733 #define PIO_SCDR_DIV2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_SCDR) Slow Clock Divider Selection for Debouncing */
02734 #define PIO_SCDR_DIV3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_SCDR) Slow Clock Divider Selection for Debouncing */
02735 #define PIO_SCDR_DIV4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_SCDR) Slow Clock Divider Selection for Debouncing */
02736 #define PIO_SCDR_DIV5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_SCDR) Slow Clock Divider Selection for Debouncing */
02737 #define PIO_SCDR_DIV6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_SCDR) Slow Clock Divider Selection for Debouncing */
02738 #define PIO_SCDR_DIV7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_SCDR) Slow Clock Divider Selection for Debouncing */
02739 #define PIO_SCDR_DIV8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_SCDR) Slow Clock Divider Selection for Debouncing */
02740 #define PIO_SCDR_DIV9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_SCDR) Slow Clock Divider Selection for Debouncing */
02741 #define PIO_SCDR_DIV10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_SCDR) Slow Clock Divider Selection for Debouncing */

02744 #define PIO_SCDR_DIV13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_SCDR) Slow Clock Divider Selection for Debouncing */
02745 /* -------- PIO_PPDDR : (PIO Offset: 0x0090) Pad Pull-down Disable Register -------- */
02746 #define PIO_PPDDR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02747 #define PIO_PPDDR_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02748 #define PIO_PPDDR_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02749 #define PIO_PPDDR_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02750 #define PIO_PPDDR_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02751 #define PIO_PPDDR_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02752 #define PIO_PPDDR_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02753 #define PIO_PPDDR_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02754 #define PIO_PPDDR_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02755 #define PIO_PPDDR_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02756 #define PIO_PPDDR_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02757 #define PIO_PPDDR_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02758 #define PIO_PPDDR_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02759 #define PIO_PPDDR_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02760 #define PIO_PPDDR_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02761 #define PIO_PPDDR_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02762 #define PIO_PPDDR_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02763 #define PIO_PPDDR_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02764 #define PIO_PPDDR_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02765 #define PIO_PPDDR_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02766 #define PIO_PPDDR_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02767 #define PIO_PPDDR_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02768 #define PIO_PPDDR_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02769 #define PIO_PPDDR_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02770 #define PIO_PPDDR_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02771 #define PIO_PPDDR_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02772 #define PIO_PPDDR_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02773 #define PIO_PPDDR_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02774 #define PIO_PPDDR_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02775 #define PIO_PPDDR_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02776 #define PIO_PPDDR_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02777 #define PIO_PPDDR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDDR) Pull Down Disable. */
02778 /* -------- PIO_PPDER : (PIO Offset: 0x0094) Pad Pull-down Enable Register -------- */
02779 #define PIO_PPDER_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02780 #define PIO_PPDER_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02781 #define PIO_PPDER_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02782 #define PIO_PPDER_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02783 #define PIO_PPDER_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02784 #define PIO_PPDER_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02785 #define PIO_PPDER_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02786 #define PIO_PPDER_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02787 #define PIO_PPDER_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02788 #define PIO_PPDER_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02789 #define PIO_PPDER_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02790 #define PIO_PPDER_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02791 #define PIO_PPDER_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02792 #define PIO_PPDER_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02793 #define PIO_PPDER_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02794 #define PIO_PPDER_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02795 #define PIO_PPDER_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02796 #define PIO_PPDER_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02797 #define PIO_PPDER_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02798 #define PIO_PPDER_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02799 #define PIO_PPDER_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02800 #define PIO_PPDER_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02801 #define PIO_PPDER_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02802 #define PIO_PPDER_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02803 #define PIO_PPDER_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02804 #define PIO_PPDER_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02805 #define PIO_PPDER_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02806 #define PIO_PPDER_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02807 #define PIO_PPDER_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02808 #define PIO_PPDER_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02809 #define PIO_PPDER_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02810 #define PIO_PPDER_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDER) Pull Down Enable. */
02811 /* -------- PIO_PPDSR : (PIO Offset: 0x0098) Pad Pull-down Status Register -------- */
02812 #define PIO_PPDSR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02813 #define PIO_PPDSR_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02814 #define PIO_PPDSR_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02815 #define PIO_PPDSR_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02816 #define PIO_PPDSR_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02817 #define PIO_PPDSR_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02818 #define PIO_PPDSR_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02819 #define PIO_PPDSR_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02820 #define PIO_PPDSR_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02821 #define PIO_PPDSR_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02822 #define PIO_PPDSR_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02823 #define PIO_PPDSR_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02824 #define PIO_PPDSR_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02825 #define PIO_PPDSR_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02826 #define PIO_PPDSR_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02827 #define PIO_PPDSR_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02828 #define PIO_PPDSR_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02829 #define PIO_PPDSR_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02830 #define PIO_PPDSR_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02831 #define PIO_PPDSR_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02832 #define PIO_PPDSR_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02833 #define PIO_PPDSR_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02834 #define PIO_PPDSR_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02835 #define PIO_PPDSR_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02836 #define PIO_PPDSR_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02837 #define PIO_PPDSR_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02838 #define PIO_PPDSR_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02839 #define PIO_PPDSR_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02840 #define PIO_PPDSR_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02841 #define PIO_PPDSR_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02842 #define PIO_PPDSR_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02843 #define PIO_PPDSR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_PPDSR) Pull Down Status. */
02844 /* -------- PIO_OWER : (PIO Offset: 0x00A0) Output Write Enable -------- */
02845 #define PIO_OWER_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02846 #define PIO_OWER_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02847 #define PIO_OWER_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02848 #define PIO_OWER_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02849 #define PIO_OWER_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02850 #define PIO_OWER_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02851 #define PIO_OWER_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02852 #define PIO_OWER_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02853 #define PIO_OWER_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02854 #define PIO_OWER_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02855 #define PIO_OWER_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02856 #define PIO_OWER_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02857 #define PIO_OWER_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02858 #define PIO_OWER_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02859 #define PIO_OWER_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02860 #define PIO_OWER_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02861 #define PIO_OWER_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02862 #define PIO_OWER_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02863 #define PIO_OWER_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02864 #define PIO_OWER_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02865 #define PIO_OWER_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02866 #define PIO_OWER_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02867 #define PIO_OWER_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02868 #define PIO_OWER_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02869 #define PIO_OWER_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02870 #define PIO_OWER_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02871 #define PIO_OWER_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02872 #define PIO_OWER_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02873 #define PIO_OWER_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02874 #define PIO_OWER_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02875 #define PIO_OWER_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02876 #define PIO_OWER_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_OWER) Output Write Enable. */
02877 /* -------- PIO_OWDR : (PIO Offset: 0x00A4) Output Write Disable -------- */

02910 /* -------- PIO_OWSR : (PIO Offset: 0x00A8) Output Write Status Register -------- */
02911 #define PIO_OWSR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_OWSR) Output Write Status. */

02916 #define PIO_OWSR_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_OWSR) Output Write Status. */
02917 #define PIO_OWSR_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_OWSR) Output Write Status. */

02942 #define PIO_OWSR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_OWSR) Output Write Status. */
02943 /* -------- PIO_AIMER : (PIO Offset: 0x00B0) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable Register -------- */
02944 #define PIO_AIMER_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02945 #define PIO_AIMER_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02946 #define PIO_AIMER_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02947 #define PIO_AIMER_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02948 #define PIO_AIMER_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02949 #define PIO_AIMER_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02950 #define PIO_AIMER_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02951 #define PIO_AIMER_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02952 #define PIO_AIMER_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02953 #define PIO_AIMER_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02954 #define PIO_AIMER_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02955 #define PIO_AIMER_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02956 #define PIO_AIMER_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02957 #define PIO_AIMER_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02958 #define PIO_AIMER_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02959 #define PIO_AIMER_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02960 #define PIO_AIMER_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02961 #define PIO_AIMER_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02962 #define PIO_AIMER_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02963 #define PIO_AIMER_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02964 #define PIO_AIMER_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02965 #define PIO_AIMER_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02966 #define PIO_AIMER_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02967 #define PIO_AIMER_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02968 #define PIO_AIMER_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02969 #define PIO_AIMER_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02970 #define PIO_AIMER_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02971 #define PIO_AIMER_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02972 #define PIO_AIMER_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02973 #define PIO_AIMER_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02974 #define PIO_AIMER_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02975 #define PIO_AIMER_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMER) Additional Interrupt Modes Enable. */
02976 /* -------- PIO_AIMDR : (PIO Offset: 0x00B4) Additional Interrupt Modes Disables Register -------- */
02977 #define PIO_AIMDR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02978 #define PIO_AIMDR_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02979 #define PIO_AIMDR_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02980 #define PIO_AIMDR_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02981 #define PIO_AIMDR_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02982 #define PIO_AIMDR_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02983 #define PIO_AIMDR_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02984 #define PIO_AIMDR_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02985 #define PIO_AIMDR_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02986 #define PIO_AIMDR_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02987 #define PIO_AIMDR_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02988 #define PIO_AIMDR_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02989 #define PIO_AIMDR_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02990 #define PIO_AIMDR_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02991 #define PIO_AIMDR_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02992 #define PIO_AIMDR_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02993 #define PIO_AIMDR_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02994 #define PIO_AIMDR_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02995 #define PIO_AIMDR_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02996 #define PIO_AIMDR_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02997 #define PIO_AIMDR_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02998 #define PIO_AIMDR_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
02999 #define PIO_AIMDR_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
03000 #define PIO_AIMDR_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
03001 #define PIO_AIMDR_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
03002 #define PIO_AIMDR_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
03003 #define PIO_AIMDR_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
03004 #define PIO_AIMDR_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
03005 #define PIO_AIMDR_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
03006 #define PIO_AIMDR_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
03007 #define PIO_AIMDR_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
03008 #define PIO_AIMDR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMDR) Additional Interrupt Modes Disable. */
03009 /* -------- PIO_AIMMR : (PIO Offset: 0x00B8) Additional Interrupt Modes Mask Register -------- */
03010 #define PIO_AIMMR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03011 #define PIO_AIMMR_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03012 #define PIO_AIMMR_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03013 #define PIO_AIMMR_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03014 #define PIO_AIMMR_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03015 #define PIO_AIMMR_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03016 #define PIO_AIMMR_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03017 #define PIO_AIMMR_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03018 #define PIO_AIMMR_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03019 #define PIO_AIMMR_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03020 #define PIO_AIMMR_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03021 #define PIO_AIMMR_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03022 #define PIO_AIMMR_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03023 #define PIO_AIMMR_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03024 #define PIO_AIMMR_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03025 #define PIO_AIMMR_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03026 #define PIO_AIMMR_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03027 #define PIO_AIMMR_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03028 #define PIO_AIMMR_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03029 #define PIO_AIMMR_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03030 #define PIO_AIMMR_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03031 #define PIO_AIMMR_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03032 #define PIO_AIMMR_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03033 #define PIO_AIMMR_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03034 #define PIO_AIMMR_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03035 #define PIO_AIMMR_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03036 #define PIO_AIMMR_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03037 #define PIO_AIMMR_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03038 #define PIO_AIMMR_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03039 #define PIO_AIMMR_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03040 #define PIO_AIMMR_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03041 #define PIO_AIMMR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_AIMMR) Peripheral CD Status. */
03042 /* -------- PIO_ESR : (PIO Offset: 0x00C0) Edge Select Register -------- */
03043 #define PIO_ESR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03044 #define PIO_ESR_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03045 #define PIO_ESR_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03046 #define PIO_ESR_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03047 #define PIO_ESR_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03048 #define PIO_ESR_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03049 #define PIO_ESR_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03050 #define PIO_ESR_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03051 #define PIO_ESR_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03052 #define PIO_ESR_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03053 #define PIO_ESR_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03054 #define PIO_ESR_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03055 #define PIO_ESR_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03056 #define PIO_ESR_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03057 #define PIO_ESR_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03058 #define PIO_ESR_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03059 #define PIO_ESR_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03060 #define PIO_ESR_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03061 #define PIO_ESR_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03062 #define PIO_ESR_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03063 #define PIO_ESR_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03064 #define PIO_ESR_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03065 #define PIO_ESR_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03066 #define PIO_ESR_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03067 #define PIO_ESR_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03068 #define PIO_ESR_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03069 #define PIO_ESR_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03070 #define PIO_ESR_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03071 #define PIO_ESR_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03072 #define PIO_ESR_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03073 #define PIO_ESR_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03074 #define PIO_ESR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_ESR) Edge Interrupt Selection. */
03075 /* -------- PIO_LSR : (PIO Offset: 0x00C4) Level Select Register -------- */
03076 #define PIO_LSR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03077 #define PIO_LSR_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03078 #define PIO_LSR_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03079 #define PIO_LSR_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03080 #define PIO_LSR_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03081 #define PIO_LSR_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03082 #define PIO_LSR_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03083 #define PIO_LSR_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03084 #define PIO_LSR_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03085 #define PIO_LSR_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03086 #define PIO_LSR_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03087 #define PIO_LSR_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03088 #define PIO_LSR_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03089 #define PIO_LSR_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03090 #define PIO_LSR_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03091 #define PIO_LSR_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03092 #define PIO_LSR_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03093 #define PIO_LSR_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03094 #define PIO_LSR_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03095 #define PIO_LSR_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03096 #define PIO_LSR_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03097 #define PIO_LSR_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03098 #define PIO_LSR_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03099 #define PIO_LSR_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03100 #define PIO_LSR_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03101 #define PIO_LSR_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03102 #define PIO_LSR_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03103 #define PIO_LSR_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03104 #define PIO_LSR_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03105 #define PIO_LSR_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03106 #define PIO_LSR_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03107 #define PIO_LSR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_LSR) Level Interrupt Selection. */
03108 /* -------- PIO_ELSR : (PIO Offset: 0x00C8) Edge/Level Status Register -------- */
03109 #define PIO_ELSR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03110 #define PIO_ELSR_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03111 #define PIO_ELSR_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03112 #define PIO_ELSR_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03113 #define PIO_ELSR_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03114 #define PIO_ELSR_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03115 #define PIO_ELSR_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03116 #define PIO_ELSR_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03117 #define PIO_ELSR_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03118 #define PIO_ELSR_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03119 #define PIO_ELSR_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03120 #define PIO_ELSR_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03121 #define PIO_ELSR_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03122 #define PIO_ELSR_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03123 #define PIO_ELSR_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03124 #define PIO_ELSR_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03125 #define PIO_ELSR_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03126 #define PIO_ELSR_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03127 #define PIO_ELSR_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03128 #define PIO_ELSR_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03129 #define PIO_ELSR_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03130 #define PIO_ELSR_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03131 #define PIO_ELSR_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03132 #define PIO_ELSR_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03133 #define PIO_ELSR_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03134 #define PIO_ELSR_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03135 #define PIO_ELSR_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03136 #define PIO_ELSR_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03137 #define PIO_ELSR_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03138 #define PIO_ELSR_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03139 #define PIO_ELSR_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03140 #define PIO_ELSR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_ELSR) Edge/Level Interrupt source selection. */
03141 /* -------- PIO_FELLSR : (PIO Offset: 0x00D0) Falling Edge/Low Level Select Register -------- */
03142 #define PIO_FELLSR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03143 #define PIO_FELLSR_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03144 #define PIO_FELLSR_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03145 #define PIO_FELLSR_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03146 #define PIO_FELLSR_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03147 #define PIO_FELLSR_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03148 #define PIO_FELLSR_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03149 #define PIO_FELLSR_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03150 #define PIO_FELLSR_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03151 #define PIO_FELLSR_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03152 #define PIO_FELLSR_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03153 #define PIO_FELLSR_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03154 #define PIO_FELLSR_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03155 #define PIO_FELLSR_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03156 #define PIO_FELLSR_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03157 #define PIO_FELLSR_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03158 #define PIO_FELLSR_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03159 #define PIO_FELLSR_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03160 #define PIO_FELLSR_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03161 #define PIO_FELLSR_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03162 #define PIO_FELLSR_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03163 #define PIO_FELLSR_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03164 #define PIO_FELLSR_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03165 #define PIO_FELLSR_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03166 #define PIO_FELLSR_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03167 #define PIO_FELLSR_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03168 #define PIO_FELLSR_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03169 #define PIO_FELLSR_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03170 #define PIO_FELLSR_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03171 #define PIO_FELLSR_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03172 #define PIO_FELLSR_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03173 #define PIO_FELLSR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_FELLSR) Falling Edge/Low Level Interrupt Selection. */
03174 /* -------- PIO_REHLSR : (PIO Offset: 0x00D4) Rising Edge/ High Level Select Register -------- */
03175 #define PIO_REHLSR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03176 #define PIO_REHLSR_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03177 #define PIO_REHLSR_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03178 #define PIO_REHLSR_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03179 #define PIO_REHLSR_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03180 #define PIO_REHLSR_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03181 #define PIO_REHLSR_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03182 #define PIO_REHLSR_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03183 #define PIO_REHLSR_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03184 #define PIO_REHLSR_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03185 #define PIO_REHLSR_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03186 #define PIO_REHLSR_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03187 #define PIO_REHLSR_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03188 #define PIO_REHLSR_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03189 #define PIO_REHLSR_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03190 #define PIO_REHLSR_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03191 #define PIO_REHLSR_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03192 #define PIO_REHLSR_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03193 #define PIO_REHLSR_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03194 #define PIO_REHLSR_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03195 #define PIO_REHLSR_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03196 #define PIO_REHLSR_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03197 #define PIO_REHLSR_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03198 #define PIO_REHLSR_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03199 #define PIO_REHLSR_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03200 #define PIO_REHLSR_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03201 #define PIO_REHLSR_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03202 #define PIO_REHLSR_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03203 #define PIO_REHLSR_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03204 #define PIO_REHLSR_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03205 #define PIO_REHLSR_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03206 #define PIO_REHLSR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_REHLSR) Rising Edge /High Level Interrupt Selection. */
03207 /* -------- PIO_FRLHSR : (PIO Offset: 0x00D8) Fall/Rise - Low/High Status Register -------- */
03208 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03209 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03210 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03211 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03212 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03213 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03214 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03215 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03216 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03217 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03218 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03219 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03220 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03221 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03222 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03223 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03224 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03225 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03226 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03227 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03228 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03229 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03230 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03231 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03232 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03233 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03234 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03235 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03236 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03237 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03238 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03239 #define PIO_FRLHSR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_FRLHSR) Edge /Level Interrupt Source Selection. */
03240 /* -------- PIO_LOCKSR : (PIO Offset: 0x00E0) Lock Status -------- */
03241 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03242 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03243 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03244 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03245 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03246 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03247 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03248 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03249 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03250 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03251 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03252 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03253 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03254 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03255 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03256 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03257 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03258 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03259 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03260 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03261 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03262 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03263 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03264 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03265 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03266 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03267 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03268 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03269 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03270 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03271 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03272 #define PIO_LOCKSR_P31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_LOCKSR) Lock Status. */
03273 /* -------- PIO_WPMR : (PIO Offset: 0x00E4) Write Protect Mode Register -------- */
03274 #define PIO_WPMR_WPEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_WPMR) Write Protect Enable */
03275 #define PIO_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos 8
03276 #define PIO_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk (0xffffffu << PIO_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos) /**< \brief (PIO_WPMR) Write Protect KEY */
03277 #define PIO_WPMR_WPKEY(value) ((PIO_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk & ((value) << PIO_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos)))
03278 /* -------- PIO_WPSR : (PIO Offset: 0x00E8) Write Protect Status Register -------- */
03279 #define PIO_WPSR_WPVS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_WPSR) Write Protect Violation Status */
03280 #define PIO_WPSR_WPVSRC_Pos 8
03281 #define PIO_WPSR_WPVSRC_Msk (0xffffu << PIO_WPSR_WPVSRC_Pos) /**< \brief (PIO_WPSR) Write Protect Violation Source */
03282 /* -------- PIO_SCHMITT : (PIO Offset: 0x0100) Schmitt Trigger Register -------- */
03283 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03284 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03285 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03286 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03287 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03288 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03289 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03290 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03291 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03292 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03293 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03294 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03295 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03296 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03297 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03298 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03299 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03300 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03301 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03302 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03303 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03304 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03305 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03306 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03307 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03308 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03309 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03310 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03311 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03312 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03313 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03314 #define PIO_SCHMITT_SCHMITT31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PIO_SCHMITT)  */
03315 /* -------- PIO_PCMR : (PIO Offset: 0x150) Parallel Capture Mode Register -------- */
03316 #define PIO_PCMR_PCEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_PCMR) Parallel Capture Mode Enable */
03317 #define PIO_PCMR_DSIZE_Pos 4
03318 #define PIO_PCMR_DSIZE_Msk (0x3u << PIO_PCMR_DSIZE_Pos) /**< \brief (PIO_PCMR) Parallel Capture Mode Data Size */
03319 #define PIO_PCMR_DSIZE(value) ((PIO_PCMR_DSIZE_Msk & ((value) << PIO_PCMR_DSIZE_Pos)))
03320 #define PIO_PCMR_ALWYS (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_PCMR) Parallel Capture Mode Always Sampling */
03321 #define PIO_PCMR_HALFS (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PIO_PCMR) Parallel Capture Mode Half Sampling */
03322 #define PIO_PCMR_FRSTS (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PIO_PCMR) Parallel Capture Mode First Sample */
03323 /* -------- PIO_PCIER : (PIO Offset: 0x154) Parallel Capture Interrupt Enable Register -------- */
03324 #define PIO_PCIER_DRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_PCIER) Parallel Capture Mode Data Ready Interrupt Enable */
03325 #define PIO_PCIER_OVRE (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_PCIER) Parallel Capture Mode Overrun Error Interrupt Enable */
03326 #define PIO_PCIER_ENDRX (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_PCIER) End of Reception Transfer Interrupt Enable */
03327 #define PIO_PCIER_RXBUFF (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_PCIER) Reception Buffer Full Interrupt Enable */
03328 /* -------- PIO_PCIDR : (PIO Offset: 0x158) Parallel Capture Interrupt Disable Register -------- */
03329 #define PIO_PCIDR_DRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_PCIDR) Parallel Capture Mode Data Ready Interrupt Disable */
03330 #define PIO_PCIDR_OVRE (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_PCIDR) Parallel Capture Mode Overrun Error Interrupt Disable */
03331 #define PIO_PCIDR_ENDRX (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_PCIDR) End of Reception Transfer Interrupt Disable */
03332 #define PIO_PCIDR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_PCIDR) Reception Buffer Full Interrupt Disable */
03333 /* -------- PIO_PCIMR : (PIO Offset: 0x15C) Parallel Capture Interrupt Mask Register -------- */
03334 #define PIO_PCIMR_DRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_PCIMR) Parallel Capture Mode Data Ready Interrupt Mask */
03335 #define PIO_PCIMR_OVRE (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_PCIMR) Parallel Capture Mode Overrun Error Interrupt Mask */
03336 #define PIO_PCIMR_ENDRX (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_PCIMR) End of Reception Transfer Interrupt Mask */
03337 #define PIO_PCIMR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_PCIMR) Reception Buffer Full Interrupt Mask */
03338 /* -------- PIO_PCISR : (PIO Offset: 0x160) Parallel Capture Interrupt Status Register -------- */
03339 #define PIO_PCISR_DRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_PCISR) Parallel Capture Mode Data Ready */
03340 #define PIO_PCISR_OVRE (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_PCISR) Parallel Capture Mode Overrun Error. */
03341 #define PIO_PCISR_ENDRX (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PIO_PCISR) End of Reception Transfer. */
03342 #define PIO_PCISR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PIO_PCISR) Reception Buffer Full */
03343 /* -------- PIO_PCRHR : (PIO Offset: 0x164) Parallel Capture Reception Holding Register -------- */
03344 #define PIO_PCRHR_RDATA_Pos 0
03345 #define PIO_PCRHR_RDATA_Msk (0xffffffffu << PIO_PCRHR_RDATA_Pos) /**< \brief (PIO_PCRHR) Parallel Capture Mode Reception Data. */
03346 /* -------- PIO_RPR : (PIO Offset: 0x168) Receive Pointer Register -------- */
03347 #define PIO_RPR_RXPTR_Pos 0
03348 #define PIO_RPR_RXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << PIO_RPR_RXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PIO_RPR) Receive Pointer Register */
03349 #define PIO_RPR_RXPTR(value) ((PIO_RPR_RXPTR_Msk & ((value) << PIO_RPR_RXPTR_Pos)))
03350 /* -------- PIO_RCR : (PIO Offset: 0x16C) Receive Counter Register -------- */
03351 #define PIO_RCR_RXCTR_Pos 0
03352 #define PIO_RCR_RXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << PIO_RCR_RXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PIO_RCR) Receive Counter Register */
03353 #define PIO_RCR_RXCTR(value) ((PIO_RCR_RXCTR_Msk & ((value) << PIO_RCR_RXCTR_Pos)))
03354 /* -------- PIO_TPR : (PIO Offset: 0x170) Transmit Pointer Register -------- */
03355 #define PIO_TPR_TXPTR_Pos 0
03356 #define PIO_TPR_TXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << PIO_TPR_TXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PIO_TPR) Transmit Counter Register */
03357 #define PIO_TPR_TXPTR(value) ((PIO_TPR_TXPTR_Msk & ((value) << PIO_TPR_TXPTR_Pos)))
03358 /* -------- PIO_TCR : (PIO Offset: 0x174) Transmit Counter Register -------- */
03359 #define PIO_TCR_TXCTR_Pos 0
03360 #define PIO_TCR_TXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << PIO_TCR_TXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PIO_TCR) Transmit Counter Register */
03361 #define PIO_TCR_TXCTR(value) ((PIO_TCR_TXCTR_Msk & ((value) << PIO_TCR_TXCTR_Pos)))
03362 /* -------- PIO_RNPR : (PIO Offset: 0x178) Receive Next Pointer Register -------- */
03363 #define PIO_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos 0
03364 #define PIO_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << PIO_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PIO_RNPR) Receive Next Pointer */
03365 #define PIO_RNPR_RXNPTR(value) ((PIO_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << PIO_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos)))
03366 /* -------- PIO_RNCR : (PIO Offset: 0x17C) Receive Next Counter Register -------- */
03367 #define PIO_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos 0
03368 #define PIO_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << PIO_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PIO_RNCR) Receive Next Counter */
03369 #define PIO_RNCR_RXNCTR(value) ((PIO_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << PIO_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos)))
03370 /* -------- PIO_TNPR : (PIO Offset: 0x180) Transmit Next Pointer Register -------- */
03371 #define PIO_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos 0
03372 #define PIO_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << PIO_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PIO_TNPR) Transmit Next Pointer */
03373 #define PIO_TNPR_TXNPTR(value) ((PIO_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << PIO_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos)))
03374 /* -------- PIO_TNCR : (PIO Offset: 0x184) Transmit Next Counter Register -------- */
03375 #define PIO_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos 0
03376 #define PIO_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << PIO_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PIO_TNCR) Transmit Counter Next */
03377 #define PIO_TNCR_TXNCTR(value) ((PIO_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << PIO_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos)))
03378 /* -------- PIO_PTCR : (PIO Offset: 0x188) Transfer Control Register -------- */
03379 #define PIO_PTCR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
03380 #define PIO_PTCR_RXTDIS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PIO_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Disable */
03381 #define PIO_PTCR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
03382 #define PIO_PTCR_TXTDIS (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PIO_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Disable */
03383 /* -------- PIO_PTSR : (PIO Offset: 0x18C) Transfer Status Register -------- */
03384 #define PIO_PTSR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PIO_PTSR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
03385 #define PIO_PTSR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PIO_PTSR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
03386 
03387 /*@}*/
03388 
03389 /* ============================================================================= */
03390 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Power Management Controller */
03391 /* ============================================================================= */
03392 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_PMC Power Management Controller */
03393 /*@{*/
03394 
03395 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
03396 /** \brief Pmc hardware registers */
03397 typedef struct {
03398   WoReg PMC_SCER;      /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0000) System Clock Enable Register */
03399   WoReg PMC_SCDR;      /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0004) System Clock Disable Register */
03400   RoReg PMC_SCSR;      /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0008) System Clock Status Register */
03401   RwReg Reserved1[1];
03402   WoReg PMC_PCER0;     /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0010) Peripheral Clock Enable Register 0 */
03403   WoReg PMC_PCDR0;     /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0014) Peripheral Clock Disable Register 0 */
03404   RoReg PMC_PCSR0;     /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0018) Peripheral Clock Status Register 0 */
03405   RwReg Reserved2[1];
03406   RwReg CKGR_MOR;      /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0020) Main Oscillator Register */
03407   RoReg CKGR_MCFR;     /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0024) Main Clock Frequency Register */
03408   RwReg CKGR_PLLAR;    /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0028) PLLA Register */
03409   RwReg CKGR_PLLBR;    /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x002C) PLLB Register */
03410   RwReg PMC_MCKR;      /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0030) Master Clock Register */
03411   RwReg Reserved3[1];
03412   RwReg PMC_USB;       /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0038) USB Clock Register */
03413   RwReg Reserved4[1];
03414   RwReg PMC_PCK[3];    /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0040) Programmable Clock 0 Register */
03415   RwReg Reserved5[5];
03416   WoReg PMC_IER;       /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0060) Interrupt Enable Register */
03417   WoReg PMC_IDR;       /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0064) Interrupt Disable Register */
03418   RoReg PMC_SR;        /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0068) Status Register */
03419   RoReg PMC_IMR;       /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x006C) Interrupt Mask Register */
03420   RwReg PMC_FSMR;      /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0070) Fast Startup Mode Register */
03421   RwReg PMC_FSPR;      /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0074) Fast Startup Polarity Register */
03422   WoReg PMC_FOCR;      /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0078) Fault Output Clear Register */
03423   RwReg Reserved6[26];
03424   RwReg PMC_WPMR;      /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x00E4) Write Protect Mode Register */
03425   RoReg PMC_WPSR;      /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x00E8) Write Protect Status Register */
03426   RwReg Reserved7[5];
03427   WoReg PMC_PCER1;     /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0100) Peripheral Clock Enable Register 1 */
03428   WoReg PMC_PCDR1;     /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0104) Peripheral Clock Disable Register 1 */
03429   RoReg PMC_PCSR1;     /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0108) Peripheral Clock Status Register 1 */
03430   RwReg Reserved8[1];
03431   RwReg PMC_OCR;       /**< \brief (Pmc Offset: 0x0110) Oscillator Calibration Register */
03432 } Pmc;
03433 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
03434 /* -------- PMC_SCER : (PMC Offset: 0x0000) System Clock Enable Register -------- */
03435 #define PMC_SCER_UDP (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PMC_SCER) USB Device Port Clock Enable */
03436 #define PMC_SCER_PCK0 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PMC_SCER) Programmable Clock 0 Output Enable */
03437 #define PMC_SCER_PCK1 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PMC_SCER) Programmable Clock 1 Output Enable */
03438 #define PMC_SCER_PCK2 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PMC_SCER) Programmable Clock 2 Output Enable */
03439 /* -------- PMC_SCDR : (PMC Offset: 0x0004) System Clock Disable Register -------- */
03440 #define PMC_SCDR_UDP (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PMC_SCDR) USB Device Port Clock Disable */
03441 #define PMC_SCDR_PCK0 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PMC_SCDR) Programmable Clock 0 Output Disable */
03442 #define PMC_SCDR_PCK1 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PMC_SCDR) Programmable Clock 1 Output Disable */
03443 #define PMC_SCDR_PCK2 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PMC_SCDR) Programmable Clock 2 Output Disable */
03444 /* -------- PMC_SCSR : (PMC Offset: 0x0008) System Clock Status Register -------- */
03445 #define PMC_SCSR_UDP (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PMC_SCSR) USB Device Port Clock Status */
03446 #define PMC_SCSR_PCK0 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PMC_SCSR) Programmable Clock 0 Output Status */
03447 #define PMC_SCSR_PCK1 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PMC_SCSR) Programmable Clock 1 Output Status */
03448 #define PMC_SCSR_PCK2 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PMC_SCSR) Programmable Clock 2 Output Status */
03449 /* -------- PMC_PCER0 : (PMC Offset: 0x0010) Peripheral Clock Enable Register 0 -------- */
03450 #define PMC_PCER0_PID2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 2 Enable */
03451 #define PMC_PCER0_PID3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 3 Enable */
03452 #define PMC_PCER0_PID4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 4 Enable */
03453 #define PMC_PCER0_PID5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 5 Enable */
03454 #define PMC_PCER0_PID6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 6 Enable */
03455 #define PMC_PCER0_PID7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 7 Enable */
03456 #define PMC_PCER0_PID8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 8 Enable */
03457 #define PMC_PCER0_PID9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 9 Enable */
03458 #define PMC_PCER0_PID10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 10 Enable */
03459 #define PMC_PCER0_PID11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 11 Enable */
03460 #define PMC_PCER0_PID12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 12 Enable */
03461 #define PMC_PCER0_PID13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 13 Enable */
03462 #define PMC_PCER0_PID14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 14 Enable */
03463 #define PMC_PCER0_PID15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 15 Enable */
03464 #define PMC_PCER0_PID16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 16 Enable */
03465 #define PMC_PCER0_PID17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 17 Enable */
03466 #define PMC_PCER0_PID18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 18 Enable */
03467 #define PMC_PCER0_PID19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 19 Enable */
03468 #define PMC_PCER0_PID20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 20 Enable */
03469 #define PMC_PCER0_PID21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 21 Enable */
03470 #define PMC_PCER0_PID22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 22 Enable */
03471 #define PMC_PCER0_PID23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 23 Enable */
03472 #define PMC_PCER0_PID24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 24 Enable */
03473 #define PMC_PCER0_PID25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 25 Enable */
03474 #define PMC_PCER0_PID26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 26 Enable */
03475 #define PMC_PCER0_PID27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 27 Enable */
03476 #define PMC_PCER0_PID28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 28 Enable */
03477 #define PMC_PCER0_PID29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 29 Enable */
03478 #define PMC_PCER0_PID30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 30 Enable */
03479 #define PMC_PCER0_PID31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER0) Peripheral Clock 31 Enable */
03480 /* -------- PMC_PCDR0 : (PMC Offset: 0x0014) Peripheral Clock Disable Register 0 -------- */
03481 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 2 Disable */
03482 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 3 Disable */
03483 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 4 Disable */
03484 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 5 Disable */
03485 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 6 Disable */
03486 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 7 Disable */
03487 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 8 Disable */
03488 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 9 Disable */
03489 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 10 Disable */
03490 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 11 Disable */
03491 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 12 Disable */
03492 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 13 Disable */
03493 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 14 Disable */
03494 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 15 Disable */
03495 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 16 Disable */
03496 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 17 Disable */
03497 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 18 Disable */
03498 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 19 Disable */
03499 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 20 Disable */
03500 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 21 Disable */
03501 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 22 Disable */
03502 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 23 Disable */
03503 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 24 Disable */
03504 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 25 Disable */
03505 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 26 Disable */
03506 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 27 Disable */
03507 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 28 Disable */
03508 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 29 Disable */
03509 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 30 Disable */
03510 #define PMC_PCDR0_PID31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR0) Peripheral Clock 31 Disable */
03511 /* -------- PMC_PCSR0 : (PMC Offset: 0x0018) Peripheral Clock Status Register 0 -------- */
03512 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 2 Status */
