03513 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 3 Status */
03514 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 4 Status */
03515 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 5 Status */
03516 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 6 Status */
03517 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 7 Status */
03518 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 8 Status */
03519 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 9 Status */
03520 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 10 Status */
03521 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 11 Status */
03522 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 12 Status */
03523 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 13 Status */
03524 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 14 Status */
03525 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 15 Status */
03526 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID16 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 16 Status */
03527 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID17 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 17 Status */
03528 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID18 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 18 Status */
03529 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID19 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 19 Status */
03530 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID20 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 20 Status */
03531 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID21 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 21 Status */
03532 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID22 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 22 Status */
03533 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID23 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 23 Status */
03534 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID24 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 24 Status */
03535 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID25 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 25 Status */
03536 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID26 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 26 Status */
03537 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID27 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 27 Status */
03538 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID28 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 28 Status */
03539 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID29 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 29 Status */
03540 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID30 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 30 Status */
03541 #define PMC_PCSR0_PID31 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR0) Peripheral Clock 31 Status */
03542 /* -------- CKGR_MOR : (PMC Offset: 0x0020) Main Oscillator Register -------- */
03543 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (CKGR_MOR) Main Crystal Oscillator Enable */
03544 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCXTBY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (CKGR_MOR) Main Crystal Oscillator Bypass */
03545 #define CKGR_MOR_WAITMODE (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (CKGR_MOR) Wait Mode Command */
03546 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCEN (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (CKGR_MOR) Main On-Chip RC Oscillator Enable */
03547 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCF_Pos 4
03548 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCF_Msk (0x7u << CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCF_Pos) /**< \brief (CKGR_MOR) Main On-Chip RC Oscillator Frequency Selection */
03549 #define   CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCF_4MHZ (0x0u << 4) /**< \brief (CKGR_MOR) Fast RC Oscillator Frequency is at 4 MHz */
03550 #define   CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCF_8MHZ (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (CKGR_MOR) Fast RC Oscillator Frequency is at 8 MHz */
03551 #define   CKGR_MOR_MOSCRCF_12MHZ (0x2u << 4) /**< \brief (CKGR_MOR) Fast RC Oscillator Frequency is at 12 MHz */
03552 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCXTST_Pos 8
03553 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCXTST_Msk (0xffu << CKGR_MOR_MOSCXTST_Pos) /**< \brief (CKGR_MOR) Main Crystal Oscillator Start-up Time */
03554 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCXTST(value) ((CKGR_MOR_MOSCXTST_Msk & ((value) << CKGR_MOR_MOSCXTST_Pos)))
03555 #define CKGR_MOR_KEY_Pos 16
03556 #define CKGR_MOR_KEY_Msk (0xffu << CKGR_MOR_KEY_Pos) /**< \brief (CKGR_MOR) Password */
03557 #define CKGR_MOR_KEY(value) ((CKGR_MOR_KEY_Msk & ((value) << CKGR_MOR_KEY_Pos)))
03558 #define CKGR_MOR_MOSCSEL (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (CKGR_MOR) Main Oscillator Selection */
03559 #define CKGR_MOR_CFDEN (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (CKGR_MOR) Clock Failure Detector Enable */
03560 /* -------- CKGR_MCFR : (PMC Offset: 0x0024) Main Clock Frequency Register -------- */
03561 #define CKGR_MCFR_MAINF_Pos 0
03562 #define CKGR_MCFR_MAINF_Msk (0xffffu << CKGR_MCFR_MAINF_Pos) /**< \brief (CKGR_MCFR) Main Clock Frequency */
03563 #define CKGR_MCFR_MAINFRDY (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (CKGR_MCFR) Main Clock Ready */
03564 /* -------- CKGR_PLLAR : (PMC Offset: 0x0028) PLLA Register -------- */
03565 #define CKGR_PLLAR_DIVA_Pos 0
03566 #define CKGR_PLLAR_DIVA_Msk (0xffu << CKGR_PLLAR_DIVA_Pos) /**< \brief (CKGR_PLLAR) Divider */
03567 #define CKGR_PLLAR_DIVA(value) ((CKGR_PLLAR_DIVA_Msk & ((value) << CKGR_PLLAR_DIVA_Pos)))
03568 #define CKGR_PLLAR_PLLACOUNT_Pos 8
03569 #define CKGR_PLLAR_PLLACOUNT_Msk (0x3fu << CKGR_PLLAR_PLLACOUNT_Pos) /**< \brief (CKGR_PLLAR) PLLA Counter */
03570 #define CKGR_PLLAR_PLLACOUNT(value) ((CKGR_PLLAR_PLLACOUNT_Msk & ((value) << CKGR_PLLAR_PLLACOUNT_Pos)))
03571 #define CKGR_PLLAR_MULA_Pos 16
03572 #define CKGR_PLLAR_MULA_Msk (0x7ffu << CKGR_PLLAR_MULA_Pos) /**< \brief (CKGR_PLLAR) PLLA Multiplier */
03573 #define CKGR_PLLAR_MULA(value) ((CKGR_PLLAR_MULA_Msk & ((value) << CKGR_PLLAR_MULA_Pos)))
03574 #define CKGR_PLLAR_STUCKTO1 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (CKGR_PLLAR)  */
03575 /* -------- CKGR_PLLBR : (PMC Offset: 0x002C) PLLB Register -------- */
03576 #define CKGR_PLLBR_DIVB_Pos 0
03577 #define CKGR_PLLBR_DIVB_Msk (0xffu << CKGR_PLLBR_DIVB_Pos) /**< \brief (CKGR_PLLBR) Divider */
03578 #define CKGR_PLLBR_DIVB(value) ((CKGR_PLLBR_DIVB_Msk & ((value) << CKGR_PLLBR_DIVB_Pos)))
03579 #define CKGR_PLLBR_PLLBCOUNT_Pos 8
03580 #define CKGR_PLLBR_PLLBCOUNT_Msk (0x3fu << CKGR_PLLBR_PLLBCOUNT_Pos) /**< \brief (CKGR_PLLBR) PLLB Counter */
03581 #define CKGR_PLLBR_PLLBCOUNT(value) ((CKGR_PLLBR_PLLBCOUNT_Msk & ((value) << CKGR_PLLBR_PLLBCOUNT_Pos)))
03582 #define CKGR_PLLBR_MULB_Pos 16
03583 #define CKGR_PLLBR_MULB_Msk (0x7ffu << CKGR_PLLBR_MULB_Pos) /**< \brief (CKGR_PLLBR) PLLB Multiplier */
03584 #define CKGR_PLLBR_MULB(value) ((CKGR_PLLBR_MULB_Msk & ((value) << CKGR_PLLBR_MULB_Pos)))
03585 /* -------- PMC_MCKR : (PMC Offset: 0x0030) Master Clock Register -------- */
03586 #define PMC_MCKR_CSS_Pos 0
03587 #define PMC_MCKR_CSS_Msk (0x3u << PMC_MCKR_CSS_Pos) /**< \brief (PMC_MCKR) Master Clock Source Selection */
03588 #define   PMC_MCKR_CSS_SLOW_CLK (0x0u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_MCKR) Slow Clock is selected */
03589 #define   PMC_MCKR_CSS_MAIN_CLK (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_MCKR) Main Clock is selected */
03590 #define   PMC_MCKR_CSS_PLLA_CLK (0x2u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_MCKR) PLLA Clock is selected */
03591 #define   PMC_MCKR_CSS_PLLB_CLK (0x3u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_MCKR) PLLB Clock is selected */
03592 #define PMC_MCKR_PRES_Pos 4
03593 #define PMC_MCKR_PRES_Msk (0x7u << PMC_MCKR_PRES_Pos) /**< \brief (PMC_MCKR) Processor Clock Prescaler */
03594 #define   PMC_MCKR_PRES_CLK (0x0u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_MCKR) Selected clock */
03595 #define   PMC_MCKR_PRES_CLK_2 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_MCKR) Selected clock divided by 2 */
03596 #define   PMC_MCKR_PRES_CLK_4 (0x2u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_MCKR) Selected clock divided by 4 */
03597 #define   PMC_MCKR_PRES_CLK_8 (0x3u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_MCKR) Selected clock divided by 8 */
03598 #define   PMC_MCKR_PRES_CLK_16 (0x4u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_MCKR) Selected clock divided by 16 */
03599 #define   PMC_MCKR_PRES_CLK_32 (0x5u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_MCKR) Selected clock divided by 32 */
03600 #define   PMC_MCKR_PRES_CLK_64 (0x6u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_MCKR) Selected clock divided by 64 */
03601 #define   PMC_MCKR_PRES_CLK_3 (0x7u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_MCKR) Selected clock divided by 3 */
03602 #define PMC_MCKR_PLLADIV2 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PMC_MCKR) PLLA Divisor by 2 */
03603 #define PMC_MCKR_PLLBDIV2 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PMC_MCKR) PLLB Divisor by 2 */
03604 /* -------- PMC_USB : (PMC Offset: 0x0038) USB Clock Register -------- */
03605 #define PMC_USB_USBS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_USB) USB Input Clock Selection */
03606 #define PMC_USB_USBDIV_Pos 8
03607 #define PMC_USB_USBDIV_Msk (0xfu << PMC_USB_USBDIV_Pos) /**< \brief (PMC_USB) Divider for USB Clock. */
03608 #define PMC_USB_USBDIV(value) ((PMC_USB_USBDIV_Msk & ((value) << PMC_USB_USBDIV_Pos)))
03609 /* -------- PMC_PCK[3] : (PMC Offset: 0x0040) Programmable Clock 0 Register -------- */
03610 #define PMC_PCK_CSS_Pos 0
03611 #define PMC_PCK_CSS_Msk (0x7u << PMC_PCK_CSS_Pos) /**< \brief (PMC_PCK[3]) Master Clock Source Selection */
03612 #define   PMC_PCK_CSS_SLOW_CLK (0x0u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_PCK[3]) Slow Clock is selected */
03613 #define   PMC_PCK_CSS_MAIN_CLK (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_PCK[3]) Main Clock is selected */
03614 #define   PMC_PCK_CSS_PLLA_CLK (0x2u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_PCK[3]) PLLA Clock is selected */
03615 #define   PMC_PCK_CSS_PLLB_CLK (0x3u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_PCK[3]) PLLB Clock is selected */
03616 #define   PMC_PCK_CSS_MCK (0x4u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_PCK[3]) Master Clock is selected */
03617 #define PMC_PCK_PRES_Pos 4
03618 #define PMC_PCK_PRES_Msk (0x7u << PMC_PCK_PRES_Pos) /**< \brief (PMC_PCK[3]) Programmable Clock Prescaler */
03619 #define   PMC_PCK_PRES_CLK (0x0u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_PCK[3]) Selected clock */
03620 #define   PMC_PCK_PRES_CLK_2 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_PCK[3]) Selected clock divided by 2 */
03621 #define   PMC_PCK_PRES_CLK_4 (0x2u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_PCK[3]) Selected clock divided by 4 */
03622 #define   PMC_PCK_PRES_CLK_8 (0x3u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_PCK[3]) Selected clock divided by 8 */
03623 #define   PMC_PCK_PRES_CLK_16 (0x4u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_PCK[3]) Selected clock divided by 16 */
03624 #define   PMC_PCK_PRES_CLK_32 (0x5u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_PCK[3]) Selected clock divided by 32 */
03625 #define   PMC_PCK_PRES_CLK_64 (0x6u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_PCK[3]) Selected clock divided by 64 */
03626 /* -------- PMC_IER : (PMC Offset: 0x0060) Interrupt Enable Register -------- */
03627 #define PMC_IER_MOSCXTS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_IER) Main Crystal Oscillator Status Interrupt Enable */
03628 #define PMC_IER_LOCKA (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PMC_IER) PLLA Lock Interrupt Enable */
03629 #define PMC_IER_LOCKB (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PMC_IER) PLLB Lock Interrupt Enable */
03630 #define PMC_IER_MCKRDY (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PMC_IER) Master Clock Ready Interrupt Enable */
03631 #define PMC_IER_PCKRDY0 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PMC_IER) Programmable Clock Ready 0 Interrupt Enable */
03632 #define PMC_IER_PCKRDY1 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PMC_IER) Programmable Clock Ready 1 Interrupt Enable */
03633 #define PMC_IER_PCKRDY2 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PMC_IER) Programmable Clock Ready 2 Interrupt Enable */
03634 #define PMC_IER_MOSCSELS (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PMC_IER) Main Oscillator Selection Status Interrupt Enable */
03635 #define PMC_IER_MOSCRCS (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PMC_IER) Main On-Chip RC Status Interrupt Enable */
03636 #define PMC_IER_CFDEV (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PMC_IER) Clock Failure Detector Event Interrupt Enable */
03637 /* -------- PMC_IDR : (PMC Offset: 0x0064) Interrupt Disable Register -------- */
03638 #define PMC_IDR_MOSCXTS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_IDR) Main Crystal Oscillator Status Interrupt Disable */
03639 #define PMC_IDR_LOCKA (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PMC_IDR) PLLA Lock Interrupt Disable */
03640 #define PMC_IDR_LOCKB (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PMC_IDR) PLLB Lock Interrupt Disable */
03641 #define PMC_IDR_MCKRDY (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PMC_IDR) Master Clock Ready Interrupt Disable */
03642 #define PMC_IDR_PCKRDY0 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PMC_IDR) Programmable Clock Ready 0 Interrupt Disable */
03643 #define PMC_IDR_PCKRDY1 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PMC_IDR) Programmable Clock Ready 1 Interrupt Disable */
03644 #define PMC_IDR_PCKRDY2 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PMC_IDR) Programmable Clock Ready 2 Interrupt Disable */
03645 #define PMC_IDR_MOSCSELS (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PMC_IDR) Main Oscillator Selection Status Interrupt Disable */
03646 #define PMC_IDR_MOSCRCS (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PMC_IDR) Main On-Chip RC Status Interrupt Disable */
03647 #define PMC_IDR_CFDEV (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PMC_IDR) Clock Failure Detector Event Interrupt Disable */
03648 /* -------- PMC_SR : (PMC Offset: 0x0068) Status Register -------- */
03649 #define PMC_SR_MOSCXTS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_SR) Main XTAL Oscillator Status */
03650 #define PMC_SR_LOCKA (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PMC_SR) PLLA Lock Status */
03651 #define PMC_SR_LOCKB (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PMC_SR) PLLB Lock Status */
03652 #define PMC_SR_MCKRDY (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PMC_SR) Master Clock Status */
03653 #define PMC_SR_OSCSELS (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PMC_SR) Slow Clock Oscillator Selection */
03654 #define PMC_SR_PCKRDY0 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PMC_SR) Programmable Clock Ready Status */
03655 #define PMC_SR_PCKRDY1 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PMC_SR) Programmable Clock Ready Status */
03656 #define PMC_SR_PCKRDY2 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PMC_SR) Programmable Clock Ready Status */
03657 #define PMC_SR_MOSCSELS (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PMC_SR) Main Oscillator Selection Status */
03658 #define PMC_SR_MOSCRCS (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PMC_SR) Main On-Chip RC Oscillator Status */
03659 #define PMC_SR_CFDEV (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PMC_SR) Clock Failure Detector Event */
03660 #define PMC_SR_CFDS (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PMC_SR) Clock Failure Detector Status */
03661 #define PMC_SR_FOS (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PMC_SR) Clock Failure Detector Fault Output Status */
03662 /* -------- PMC_IMR : (PMC Offset: 0x006C) Interrupt Mask Register -------- */
03663 #define PMC_IMR_MOSCXTS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_IMR) Main Crystal Oscillator Status Interrupt Mask */
03664 #define PMC_IMR_LOCKA (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PMC_IMR) PLLA Lock Interrupt Mask */
03665 #define PMC_IMR_LOCKB (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PMC_IMR) PLLB Lock Interrupt Mask */
03666 #define PMC_IMR_MCKRDY (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PMC_IMR) Master Clock Ready Interrupt Mask */
03667 #define PMC_IMR_PCKRDY0 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PMC_IMR) Programmable Clock Ready 0 Interrupt Mask */
03668 #define PMC_IMR_PCKRDY1 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PMC_IMR) Programmable Clock Ready 1 Interrupt Mask */
03669 #define PMC_IMR_PCKRDY2 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PMC_IMR) Programmable Clock Ready 2 Interrupt Mask */
03670 #define PMC_IMR_MOSCSELS (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PMC_IMR) Main Oscillator Selection Status Interrupt Mask */
03671 #define PMC_IMR_MOSCRCS (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PMC_IMR) Main On-Chip RC Status Interrupt Mask */
03672 #define PMC_IMR_CFDEV (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PMC_IMR) Clock Failure Detector Event Interrupt Mask */
03673 /* -------- PMC_FSMR : (PMC Offset: 0x0070) Fast Startup Mode Register -------- */
03674 #define PMC_FSMR_FSTT0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) Fast Startup Input Enable 0 */
03675 #define PMC_FSMR_FSTT1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) Fast Startup Input Enable 1 */
03676 #define PMC_FSMR_FSTT2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) Fast Startup Input Enable 2 */
03677 #define PMC_FSMR_FSTT3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) Fast Startup Input Enable 3 */
03678 #define PMC_FSMR_FSTT4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) Fast Startup Input Enable 4 */
03679 #define PMC_FSMR_FSTT5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) Fast Startup Input Enable 5 */
03680 #define PMC_FSMR_FSTT6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) Fast Startup Input Enable 6 */
03681 #define PMC_FSMR_FSTT7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) Fast Startup Input Enable 7 */
03682 #define PMC_FSMR_FSTT8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) Fast Startup Input Enable 8 */
03683 #define PMC_FSMR_FSTT9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) Fast Startup Input Enable 9 */
03684 #define PMC_FSMR_FSTT10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) Fast Startup Input Enable 10 */
03685 #define PMC_FSMR_FSTT11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) Fast Startup Input Enable 11 */
03686 #define PMC_FSMR_FSTT12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) Fast Startup Input Enable 12 */
03687 #define PMC_FSMR_FSTT13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) Fast Startup Input Enable 13 */
03688 #define PMC_FSMR_FSTT14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) Fast Startup Input Enable 14 */
03689 #define PMC_FSMR_FSTT15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) Fast Startup Input Enable 15 */
03690 #define PMC_FSMR_RTTAL (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) RTT Alarm Enable */
03691 #define PMC_FSMR_RTCAL (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) RTC Alarm Enable */
03692 #define PMC_FSMR_USBAL (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) USB Alarm Enable */
03693 #define PMC_FSMR_LPM (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PMC_FSMR) Low Power Mode */
03694 /* -------- PMC_FSPR : (PMC Offset: 0x0074) Fast Startup Polarity Register -------- */
03695 #define PMC_FSPR_FSTP0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_FSPR) Fast Startup Input Polarityx */
03696 #define PMC_FSPR_FSTP1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PMC_FSPR) Fast Startup Input Polarityx */
03697 #define PMC_FSPR_FSTP2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PMC_FSPR) Fast Startup Input Polarityx */
03698 #define PMC_FSPR_FSTP3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PMC_FSPR) Fast Startup Input Polarityx */
03699 #define PMC_FSPR_FSTP4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_FSPR) Fast Startup Input Polarityx */
03700 #define PMC_FSPR_FSTP5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PMC_FSPR) Fast Startup Input Polarityx */
03701 #define PMC_FSPR_FSTP6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PMC_FSPR) Fast Startup Input Polarityx */
03702 #define PMC_FSPR_FSTP7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PMC_FSPR) Fast Startup Input Polarityx */
03703 #define PMC_FSPR_FSTP8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PMC_FSPR) Fast Startup Input Polarityx */
03704 #define PMC_FSPR_FSTP9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PMC_FSPR) Fast Startup Input Polarityx */
03705 #define PMC_FSPR_FSTP10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PMC_FSPR) Fast Startup Input Polarityx */
03706 #define PMC_FSPR_FSTP11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PMC_FSPR) Fast Startup Input Polarityx */
03707 #define PMC_FSPR_FSTP12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PMC_FSPR) Fast Startup Input Polarityx */
03708 #define PMC_FSPR_FSTP13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PMC_FSPR) Fast Startup Input Polarityx */
03709 #define PMC_FSPR_FSTP14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PMC_FSPR) Fast Startup Input Polarityx */
03710 #define PMC_FSPR_FSTP15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PMC_FSPR) Fast Startup Input Polarityx */
03711 /* -------- PMC_FOCR : (PMC Offset: 0x0078) Fault Output Clear Register -------- */
03712 #define PMC_FOCR_FOCLR (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_FOCR) Fault Output Clear */
03713 /* -------- PMC_WPMR : (PMC Offset: 0x00E4) Write Protect Mode Register -------- */
03714 #define PMC_WPMR_WPEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_WPMR) Write Protect Enable */
03715 #define PMC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos 8
03716 #define PMC_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk (0xffffffu << PMC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos) /**< \brief (PMC_WPMR) Write Protect KEY */
03717 #define PMC_WPMR_WPKEY(value) ((PMC_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk & ((value) << PMC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos)))
03718 /* -------- PMC_WPSR : (PMC Offset: 0x00E8) Write Protect Status Register -------- */
03719 #define PMC_WPSR_WPVS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_WPSR) Write Protect Violation Status */
03720 #define PMC_WPSR_WPVSRC_Pos 8
03721 #define PMC_WPSR_WPVSRC_Msk (0xffffu << PMC_WPSR_WPVSRC_Pos) /**< \brief (PMC_WPSR) Write Protect Violation Source */
03722 /* -------- PMC_PCER1 : (PMC Offset: 0x0100) Peripheral Clock Enable Register 1 -------- */
03723 #define PMC_PCER1_PID32 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 32 Enable */
03724 #define PMC_PCER1_PID33 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 33 Enable */
03725 #define PMC_PCER1_PID34 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 34 Enable */
03726 #define PMC_PCER1_PID35 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 35 Enable */
03727 #define PMC_PCER1_PID36 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 36 Enable */
03728 #define PMC_PCER1_PID37 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 37 Enable */
03729 #define PMC_PCER1_PID38 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 38 Enable */
03730 #define PMC_PCER1_PID39 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 39 Enable */
03731 #define PMC_PCER1_PID40 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 40 Enable */
03732 #define PMC_PCER1_PID41 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 41 Enable */
03733 #define PMC_PCER1_PID42 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 42 Enable */
03734 #define PMC_PCER1_PID43 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 43 Enable */
03735 #define PMC_PCER1_PID44 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 44 Enable */
03736 #define PMC_PCER1_PID45 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 45 Enable */
03737 #define PMC_PCER1_PID46 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 46 Enable */
03738 #define PMC_PCER1_PID47 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 47 Enable */
03739 #define PMC_PCER1_PID48 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 48 Enable */
03740 #define PMC_PCER1_PID49 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 49 Enable */
03741 #define PMC_PCER1_PID50 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 50 Enable */
03742 #define PMC_PCER1_PID51 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 51 Enable */
03743 #define PMC_PCER1_PID52 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 52 Enable */
03744 #define PMC_PCER1_PID53 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 53 Enable */
03745 #define PMC_PCER1_PID54 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 54 Enable */
03746 #define PMC_PCER1_PID55 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 55 Enable */
03747 #define PMC_PCER1_PID56 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 56 Enable */
03748 #define PMC_PCER1_PID57 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 57 Enable */
03749 #define PMC_PCER1_PID58 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 58 Enable */
03750 #define PMC_PCER1_PID59 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 59 Enable */
03751 #define PMC_PCER1_PID60 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 60 Enable */
03752 #define PMC_PCER1_PID61 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 61 Enable */
03753 #define PMC_PCER1_PID62 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 62 Enable */
03754 #define PMC_PCER1_PID63 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PMC_PCER1) Peripheral Clock 63 Enable */
03755 /* -------- PMC_PCDR1 : (PMC Offset: 0x0104) Peripheral Clock Disable Register 1 -------- */
03756 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID32 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 32 Disable */
03757 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID33 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 33 Disable */
03758 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID34 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 34 Disable */
03759 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID35 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 35 Disable */
03760 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID36 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 36 Disable */
03761 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID37 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 37 Disable */
03762 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID38 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 38 Disable */
03763 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID39 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 39 Disable */
03764 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID40 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 40 Disable */
03765 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID41 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 41 Disable */
03766 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID42 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 42 Disable */
03767 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID43 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 43 Disable */
03768 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID44 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 44 Disable */
03769 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID45 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 45 Disable */
03770 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID46 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 46 Disable */
03771 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID47 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 47 Disable */
03772 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID48 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 48 Disable */
03773 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID49 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 49 Disable */
03774 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID50 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 50 Disable */
03775 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID51 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 51 Disable */
03776 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID52 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 52 Disable */
03777 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID53 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 53 Disable */
03778 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID54 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 54 Disable */
03779 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID55 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 55 Disable */
03780 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID56 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 56 Disable */
03781 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID57 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 57 Disable */
03782 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID58 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 58 Disable */
03783 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID59 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 59 Disable */
03784 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID60 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 60 Disable */
03785 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID61 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 61 Disable */
03786 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID62 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 62 Disable */
03787 #define PMC_PCDR1_PID63 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PMC_PCDR1) Peripheral Clock 63 Disable */
03788 /* -------- PMC_PCSR1 : (PMC Offset: 0x0108) Peripheral Clock Status Register 1 -------- */
03789 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID32 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 32 Status */
03790 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID33 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 33 Status */
03791 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID34 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 34 Status */
03792 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID35 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 35 Status */
03793 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID36 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 36 Status */
03794 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID37 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 37 Status */
03795 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID38 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 38 Status */
03796 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID39 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 39 Status */
03797 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID40 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 40 Status */
03798 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID41 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 41 Status */
03799 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID42 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 42 Status */
03800 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID43 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 43 Status */
03801 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID44 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 44 Status */
03802 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID45 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 45 Status */
03803 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID46 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 46 Status */
03804 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID47 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 47 Status */
03805 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID48 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 48 Status */
03806 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID49 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 49 Status */
03807 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID50 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 50 Status */
03808 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID51 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 51 Status */
03809 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID52 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 52 Status */
03810 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID53 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 53 Status */
03811 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID54 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 54 Status */
03812 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID55 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 55 Status */
03813 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID56 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 56 Status */
03814 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID57 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 57 Status */
03815 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID58 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 58 Status */
03816 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID59 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 59 Status */
03817 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID60 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 60 Status */
03818 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID61 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 61 Status */
03819 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID62 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 62 Status */
03820 #define PMC_PCSR1_PID63 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (PMC_PCSR1) Peripheral Clock 63 Status */
03821 /* -------- PMC_OCR : (PMC Offset: 0x0110) Oscillator Calibration Register -------- */
03822 #define PMC_OCR_CAL4_Pos 0
03823 #define PMC_OCR_CAL4_Msk (0x7fu << PMC_OCR_CAL4_Pos) /**< \brief (PMC_OCR) RC Oscillator Calibration bits for 4 Mhz */
03824 #define PMC_OCR_CAL4(value) ((PMC_OCR_CAL4_Msk & ((value) << PMC_OCR_CAL4_Pos)))
03825 #define PMC_OCR_SEL4 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PMC_OCR) Selection of RC Oscillator Calibration bits for 4 Mhz */
03826 #define PMC_OCR_CAL8_Pos 8
03827 #define PMC_OCR_CAL8_Msk (0x7fu << PMC_OCR_CAL8_Pos) /**< \brief (PMC_OCR) RC Oscillator Calibration bits for 8 Mhz */
03828 #define PMC_OCR_CAL8(value) ((PMC_OCR_CAL8_Msk & ((value) << PMC_OCR_CAL8_Pos)))
03829 #define PMC_OCR_SEL8 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PMC_OCR) Selection of RC Oscillator Calibration bits for 8 Mhz */
03830 #define PMC_OCR_CAL12_Pos 16
03831 #define PMC_OCR_CAL12_Msk (0x7fu << PMC_OCR_CAL12_Pos) /**< \brief (PMC_OCR) RC Oscillator Calibration bits for 12 Mhz */
03832 #define PMC_OCR_CAL12(value) ((PMC_OCR_CAL12_Msk & ((value) << PMC_OCR_CAL12_Pos)))
03833 #define PMC_OCR_SEL12 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PMC_OCR) Selection of RC Oscillator Calibration bits for 12 Mhz */
03834 
03835 /*@}*/
03836 
03837 /* ============================================================================= */
03838 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Pulse Width Modulation Controller */
03839 /* ============================================================================= */
03840 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_PWM Pulse Width Modulation Controller */
03841 /*@{*/
03842 
03843 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
03844 /** \brief PwmCh_num hardware registers */
03845 typedef struct {
03846   RwReg      PWM_CMR;       /**< \brief (PwmCh_num Offset: 0x0) PWM Channel Mode Register */
03847   RwReg      PWM_CDTY;      /**< \brief (PwmCh_num Offset: 0x4) PWM Channel Duty Cycle Register */
03848   RwReg      PWM_CDTYUPD;   /**< \brief (PwmCh_num Offset: 0x8) PWM Channel Duty Cycle Update Register */
03849   RwReg      PWM_CPRD;      /**< \brief (PwmCh_num Offset: 0xC) PWM Channel Period Register */
03850   RwReg      PWM_CPRDUPD;   /**< \brief (PwmCh_num Offset: 0x10) PWM Channel Period Update Register */
03851   RwReg      PWM_CCNT;      /**< \brief (PwmCh_num Offset: 0x14) PWM Channel Counter Register */
03852   RwReg      PWM_DT;        /**< \brief (PwmCh_num Offset: 0x18) PWM Channel Dead Time Register */
03853   RwReg      PWM_DTUPD;     /**< \brief (PwmCh_num Offset: 0x1C) PWM Channel Dead Time Update Register */
03854 } PwmCh_num;
03855 /** \brief PwmCmp hardware registers */
03856 typedef struct {
03857   RwReg      PWM_CMPxV;     /**< \brief (PwmCmp Offset: 0x0) PWM Comparison 0 Value Register */
03858   RwReg      PWM_CMPxVUPD;  /**< \brief (PwmCmp Offset: 0x4) PWM Comparison 0 Value Update Register */
03859   RwReg      PWM_CMPxM;     /**< \brief (PwmCmp Offset: 0x8) PWM Comparison 0 Mode Register */
03860   RwReg      PWM_CMPxMUPD;  /**< \brief (PwmCmp Offset: 0xC) PWM Comparison 0 Mode Update Register */
03861 } PwmCmp;
03862 /** \brief Pwm hardware registers */
03863 typedef struct {
03864   RwReg      PWM_CLK;       /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x00) PWM Clock Register */
03865   WoReg      PWM_ENA;       /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x04) PWM Enable Register */
03866   WoReg      PWM_DIS;       /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x08) PWM Disable Register */
03867   RoReg      PWM_SR;        /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x0C) PWM Status Register */
03868   WoReg      PWM_IER1;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x10) PWM Interrupt Enable Register 1 */
03869   WoReg      PWM_IDR1;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x14) PWM Interrupt Disable Register 1 */
03870   RoReg      PWM_IMR1;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x18) PWM Interrupt Mask Register 1 */
03871   RoReg      PWM_ISR1;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x1C) PWM Interrupt Status Register 1 */
03872   RwReg      PWM_SCM;       /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x20) PWM Sync Channels Mode Register */
03873   RwReg      Reserved1[1];
03874   RwReg      PWM_SCUC;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x28) PWM Sync Channels Update Control Register */
03875   RwReg      PWM_SCUP;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x2C) PWM Sync Channels Update Period Register */
03876   WoReg      PWM_SCUPUPD;   /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x30) PWM Sync Channels Update Period Update Register */
03877   WoReg      PWM_IER2;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x34) PWM Interrupt Enable Register 2 */
03878   WoReg      PWM_IDR2;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x38) PWM Interrupt Disable Register 2 */
03879   RoReg      PWM_IMR2;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x3C) PWM Interrupt Mask Register 2 */
03880   RoReg      PWM_ISR2;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x40) PWM Interrupt Status Register 2 */
03881   RwReg      PWM_OOV;       /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x44) PWM Output Override Value Register */
03882   RwReg      PWM_OS;        /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x48) PWM Output Selection Register */
03883   WoReg      PWM_OSS;       /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x4C) PWM Output Selection Set Register */
03884   WoReg      PWM_OSC;       /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x50) PWM Output Selection Clear Register */
03885   WoReg      PWM_OSSUPD;    /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x54) PWM Output Selection Set Update Register */
03886   WoReg      PWM_OSCUPD;    /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x58) PWM Output Selection Clear Update Register */
03887   RwReg      PWM_FMR;       /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x5C) PWM Fault Mode Register */
03888   RoReg      PWM_FSR;       /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x60) PWM Fault Status Register */
03889   WoReg      PWM_FCR;       /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x64) PWM Fault Clear Register */
03890   RwReg      PWM_FPV;       /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x68) PWM Fault Protection Value Register */
03891   RwReg      PWM_FPE;       /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x6C) PWM Fault Protection Enable Register */
03892   RwReg      Reserved2[3];
03893   RwReg      PWM_ELxMR[2];  /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x7C) PWM Event Line 0 Mode Register */
03894   RwReg      Reserved3[11];
03895   RwReg      PWM_SMMR;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0xB0) PWM Stepper Motor Mode Register */
03896   RwReg      Reserved4[12];
03897   WoReg      PWM_WPCR;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0xE4) PWM Write Protect Control Register */
03898   RoReg      PWM_WPSR;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0xE8) PWM Write Protect Status Register */
03899   RwReg      Reserved5[5];
03900   RwReg      PWM_RPR;       /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register */
03901   RwReg      PWM_RCR;       /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register */
03902   RwReg      PWM_TPR;       /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register */
03903   RwReg      PWM_TCR;       /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register */
03904   RwReg      PWM_RNPR;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register */
03905   RwReg      PWM_RNCR;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register */
03906   RwReg      PWM_TNPR;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register */
03907   RwReg      PWM_TNCR;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register */
03908   WoReg      PWM_PTCR;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register */
03909   RoReg      PWM_PTSR;      /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register */
03910   RwReg      Reserved6[2];
03911   PwmCmp     PWM_CMP[8];    /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x130) cmp = 0 .. 7 */
03912   RwReg      Reserved7[20];
03913   PwmCh_num  PWM_CH_NUM[4]; /**< \brief (Pwm Offset: 0x200) ch_num = 0 .. 3 */
03914 } Pwm;
03915 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
03916 /* -------- PWM_CLK : (PWM Offset: 0x00) PWM Clock Register -------- */
03917 #define PWM_CLK_DIVA_Pos 0
03918 #define PWM_CLK_DIVA_Msk (0xffu << PWM_CLK_DIVA_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CLK) CLKA, CLKB Divide Factor */
03919 #define PWM_CLK_DIVA(value) ((PWM_CLK_DIVA_Msk & ((value) << PWM_CLK_DIVA_Pos)))
03920 #define PWM_CLK_PREA_Pos 8
03921 #define PWM_CLK_PREA_Msk (0xfu << PWM_CLK_PREA_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CLK) CLKA, CLKB Source Clock Selection */
03922 #define PWM_CLK_PREA(value) ((PWM_CLK_PREA_Msk & ((value) << PWM_CLK_PREA_Pos)))
03923 #define PWM_CLK_DIVB_Pos 16
03924 #define PWM_CLK_DIVB_Msk (0xffu << PWM_CLK_DIVB_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CLK) CLKA, CLKB Divide Factor */
03925 #define PWM_CLK_DIVB(value) ((PWM_CLK_DIVB_Msk & ((value) << PWM_CLK_DIVB_Pos)))
03926 #define PWM_CLK_PREB_Pos 24
03927 #define PWM_CLK_PREB_Msk (0xfu << PWM_CLK_PREB_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CLK) CLKA, CLKB Source Clock Selection */
03928 #define PWM_CLK_PREB(value) ((PWM_CLK_PREB_Msk & ((value) << PWM_CLK_PREB_Pos)))
03929 /* -------- PWM_ENA : (PWM Offset: 0x04) PWM Enable Register -------- */
03930 #define PWM_ENA_CHID0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_ENA) Channel ID */
03931 #define PWM_ENA_CHID1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_ENA) Channel ID */
03932 #define PWM_ENA_CHID2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_ENA) Channel ID */
03933 #define PWM_ENA_CHID3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_ENA) Channel ID */
03934 /* -------- PWM_DIS : (PWM Offset: 0x08) PWM Disable Register -------- */
03935 #define PWM_DIS_CHID0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_DIS) Channel ID */
03936 #define PWM_DIS_CHID1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_DIS) Channel ID */
03937 #define PWM_DIS_CHID2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_DIS) Channel ID */
03938 #define PWM_DIS_CHID3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_DIS) Channel ID */
03939 /* -------- PWM_SR : (PWM Offset: 0x0C) PWM Status Register -------- */
03940 #define PWM_SR_CHID0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_SR) Channel ID */
03941 #define PWM_SR_CHID1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_SR) Channel ID */
03942 #define PWM_SR_CHID2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_SR) Channel ID */
03943 #define PWM_SR_CHID3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_SR) Channel ID */
03944 /* -------- PWM_IER1 : (PWM Offset: 0x10) PWM Interrupt Enable Register 1 -------- */
03945 #define PWM_IER1_CHID0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_IER1) Counter Event on Channel 0 Interrupt Enable */
03946 #define PWM_IER1_CHID1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_IER1) Counter Event on Channel 1 Interrupt Enable */
03947 #define PWM_IER1_CHID2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_IER1) Counter Event on Channel 2 Interrupt Enable */
03948 #define PWM_IER1_CHID3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_IER1) Counter Event on Channel 3 Interrupt Enable */
03949 #define PWM_IER1_FCHID0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_IER1) Fault Protection Trigger on Channel 0 Interrupt Enable */
03950 #define PWM_IER1_FCHID1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PWM_IER1) Fault Protection Trigger on Channel 1 Interrupt Enable */
03951 #define PWM_IER1_FCHID2 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PWM_IER1) Fault Protection Trigger on Channel 2 Interrupt Enable */
03952 #define PWM_IER1_FCHID3 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PWM_IER1) Fault Protection Trigger on Channel 3 Interrupt Enable */
03953 /* -------- PWM_IDR1 : (PWM Offset: 0x14) PWM Interrupt Disable Register 1 -------- */
03954 #define PWM_IDR1_CHID0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR1) Counter Event on Channel 0 Interrupt Disable */
03955 #define PWM_IDR1_CHID1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR1) Counter Event on Channel 1 Interrupt Disable */
03956 #define PWM_IDR1_CHID2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR1) Counter Event on Channel 2 Interrupt Disable */
03957 #define PWM_IDR1_CHID3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR1) Counter Event on Channel 3 Interrupt Disable */
03958 #define PWM_IDR1_FCHID0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR1) Fault Protection Trigger on Channel 0 Interrupt Disable */
03959 #define PWM_IDR1_FCHID1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR1) Fault Protection Trigger on Channel 1 Interrupt Disable */
03960 #define PWM_IDR1_FCHID2 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR1) Fault Protection Trigger on Channel 2 Interrupt Disable */
03961 #define PWM_IDR1_FCHID3 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR1) Fault Protection Trigger on Channel 3 Interrupt Disable */
03962 /* -------- PWM_IMR1 : (PWM Offset: 0x18) PWM Interrupt Mask Register 1 -------- */
03963 #define PWM_IMR1_CHID0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR1) Counter Event on Channel 0 Interrupt Mask */
03964 #define PWM_IMR1_CHID1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR1) Counter Event on Channel 1 Interrupt Mask */
03965 #define PWM_IMR1_CHID2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR1) Counter Event on Channel 2 Interrupt Mask */
03966 #define PWM_IMR1_CHID3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR1) Counter Event on Channel 3 Interrupt Mask */
03967 #define PWM_IMR1_FCHID0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR1) Fault Protection Trigger on Channel 0 Interrupt Mask */
03968 #define PWM_IMR1_FCHID1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR1) Fault Protection Trigger on Channel 1 Interrupt Mask */
03969 #define PWM_IMR1_FCHID2 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR1) Fault Protection Trigger on Channel 2 Interrupt Mask */
03970 #define PWM_IMR1_FCHID3 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR1) Fault Protection Trigger on Channel 3 Interrupt Mask */
03971 /* -------- PWM_ISR1 : (PWM Offset: 0x1C) PWM Interrupt Status Register 1 -------- */
03972 #define PWM_ISR1_CHID0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR1) Counter Event on Channel 0 */
03973 #define PWM_ISR1_CHID1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR1) Counter Event on Channel 1 */
03974 #define PWM_ISR1_CHID2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR1) Counter Event on Channel 2 */
03975 #define PWM_ISR1_CHID3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR1) Counter Event on Channel 3 */
03976 #define PWM_ISR1_FCHID0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR1) Fault Protection Trigger on Channel 0 */
03977 #define PWM_ISR1_FCHID1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR1) Fault Protection Trigger on Channel 1 */
03978 #define PWM_ISR1_FCHID2 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR1) Fault Protection Trigger on Channel 2 */
03979 #define PWM_ISR1_FCHID3 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR1) Fault Protection Trigger on Channel 3 */
03980 /* -------- PWM_SCM : (PWM Offset: 0x20) PWM Sync Channels Mode Register -------- */
03981 #define PWM_SCM_SYNC0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_SCM) Synchronous Channel 0 */
03982 #define PWM_SCM_SYNC1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_SCM) Synchronous Channel 1 */
03983 #define PWM_SCM_SYNC2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_SCM) Synchronous Channel 2 */
03984 #define PWM_SCM_SYNC3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_SCM) Synchronous Channel 3 */
03985 #define PWM_SCM_UPDM_Pos 16
03986 #define PWM_SCM_UPDM_Msk (0x3u << PWM_SCM_UPDM_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_SCM) Synchronous Channels Update Mode */
03987 #define   PWM_SCM_UPDM_MODE0 (0x0u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_SCM) Manual write of double buffer registers and manual update of synchronous channels. The update occurs at the begin- ning of the next PWM period, when the bit UPDULOCK in "PWM Sync Channels Update Control Register" on page 55 is set. */
03988 #define   PWM_SCM_UPDM_MODE1 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_SCM) Manual write of double buffer registers and automatic update of synchronous channels. The update occurs when the Update Period is elapsed. */
03989 #define   PWM_SCM_UPDM_MODE2 (0x2u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_SCM) Automatic write of duty-cycle update registers by the PDC and automatic update of synchronous channels. The update occurs when the Update Period is elapsed. */
03990 #define PWM_SCM_PTRM (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PWM_SCM) PDC Transfer Request Mode */
03991 #define PWM_SCM_PTRCS_Pos 21
03992 #define PWM_SCM_PTRCS_Msk (0x7u << PWM_SCM_PTRCS_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_SCM) PDC Transfer Request Comparison Selection */
03993 #define PWM_SCM_PTRCS(value) ((PWM_SCM_PTRCS_Msk & ((value) << PWM_SCM_PTRCS_Pos)))
03994 /* -------- PWM_SCUC : (PWM Offset: 0x28) PWM Sync Channels Update Control Register -------- */
03995 #define PWM_SCUC_UPDULOCK (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_SCUC) Synchronous Channels Update Unlock */
03996 /* -------- PWM_SCUP : (PWM Offset: 0x2C) PWM Sync Channels Update Period Register -------- */
03997 #define PWM_SCUP_UPR_Pos 0
03998 #define PWM_SCUP_UPR_Msk (0xfu << PWM_SCUP_UPR_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_SCUP) Update Period */
03999 #define PWM_SCUP_UPR(value) ((PWM_SCUP_UPR_Msk & ((value) << PWM_SCUP_UPR_Pos)))
04000 #define PWM_SCUP_UPRCNT_Pos 4
04001 #define PWM_SCUP_UPRCNT_Msk (0xfu << PWM_SCUP_UPRCNT_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_SCUP) Update Period Counter */
04002 #define PWM_SCUP_UPRCNT(value) ((PWM_SCUP_UPRCNT_Msk & ((value) << PWM_SCUP_UPRCNT_Pos)))
04003 /* -------- PWM_SCUPUPD : (PWM Offset: 0x30) PWM Sync Channels Update Period Update Register -------- */
04004 #define PWM_SCUPUPD_UPRUPD_Pos 0
04005 #define PWM_SCUPUPD_UPRUPD_Msk (0xfu << PWM_SCUPUPD_UPRUPD_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_SCUPUPD) Update Period Update */
04006 #define PWM_SCUPUPD_UPRUPD(value) ((PWM_SCUPUPD_UPRUPD_Msk & ((value) << PWM_SCUPUPD_UPRUPD_Pos)))
04007 /* -------- PWM_IER2 : (PWM Offset: 0x34) PWM Interrupt Enable Register 2 -------- */
04008 #define PWM_IER2_WRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) Write Ready for Synchronous Channels Update Interrupt Enable */
04009 #define PWM_IER2_ENDTX (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) PDC End of TX Buffer Interrupt Enable */
04010 #define PWM_IER2_TXBUFE (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) PDC TX Buffer Empty Interrupt Enable */
04011 #define PWM_IER2_UNRE (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) Synchronous Channels Update Underrun Error Interrupt Enable */
04012 #define PWM_IER2_CMPM0 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) Comparison 0 Match Interrupt Enable */
04013 #define PWM_IER2_CMPM1 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) Comparison 1 Match Interrupt Enable */
04014 #define PWM_IER2_CMPM2 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) Comparison 2 Match Interrupt Enable */
04015 #define PWM_IER2_CMPM3 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) Comparison 3 Match Interrupt Enable */
04016 #define PWM_IER2_CMPM4 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) Comparison 4 Match Interrupt Enable */
04017 #define PWM_IER2_CMPM5 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) Comparison 5 Match Interrupt Enable */
04018 #define PWM_IER2_CMPM6 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) Comparison 6 Match Interrupt Enable */
04019 #define PWM_IER2_CMPM7 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) Comparison 7 Match Interrupt Enable */
04020 #define PWM_IER2_CMPU0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) Comparison 0 Update Interrupt Enable */
04021 #define PWM_IER2_CMPU1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) Comparison 1 Update Interrupt Enable */
04022 #define PWM_IER2_CMPU2 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) Comparison 2 Update Interrupt Enable */
04023 #define PWM_IER2_CMPU3 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) Comparison 3 Update Interrupt Enable */
04024 #define PWM_IER2_CMPU4 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) Comparison 4 Update Interrupt Enable */
04025 #define PWM_IER2_CMPU5 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) Comparison 5 Update Interrupt Enable */
04026 #define PWM_IER2_CMPU6 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) Comparison 6 Update Interrupt Enable */
04027 #define PWM_IER2_CMPU7 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PWM_IER2) Comparison 7 Update Interrupt Enable */
04028 /* -------- PWM_IDR2 : (PWM Offset: 0x38) PWM Interrupt Disable Register 2 -------- */
04029 #define PWM_IDR2_WRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) Write Ready for Synchronous Channels Update Interrupt Disable */
04030 #define PWM_IDR2_ENDTX (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) PDC End of TX Buffer Interrupt Disable */
04031 #define PWM_IDR2_TXBUFE (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) PDC TX Buffer Empty Interrupt Disable */
04032 #define PWM_IDR2_UNRE (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) Synchronous Channels Update Underrun Error Interrupt Disable */
04033 #define PWM_IDR2_CMPM0 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) Comparison 0 Match Interrupt Disable */
04034 #define PWM_IDR2_CMPM1 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) Comparison 1 Match Interrupt Disable */
04035 #define PWM_IDR2_CMPM2 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) Comparison 2 Match Interrupt Disable */
04036 #define PWM_IDR2_CMPM3 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) Comparison 3 Match Interrupt Disable */
04037 #define PWM_IDR2_CMPM4 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) Comparison 4 Match Interrupt Disable */
04038 #define PWM_IDR2_CMPM5 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) Comparison 5 Match Interrupt Disable */
04039 #define PWM_IDR2_CMPM6 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) Comparison 6 Match Interrupt Disable */
04040 #define PWM_IDR2_CMPM7 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) Comparison 7 Match Interrupt Disable */
04041 #define PWM_IDR2_CMPU0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) Comparison 0 Update Interrupt Disable */
04042 #define PWM_IDR2_CMPU1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) Comparison 1 Update Interrupt Disable */
04043 #define PWM_IDR2_CMPU2 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) Comparison 2 Update Interrupt Disable */
04044 #define PWM_IDR2_CMPU3 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) Comparison 3 Update Interrupt Disable */
04045 #define PWM_IDR2_CMPU4 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) Comparison 4 Update Interrupt Disable */
04046 #define PWM_IDR2_CMPU5 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) Comparison 5 Update Interrupt Disable */
04047 #define PWM_IDR2_CMPU6 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) Comparison 6 Update Interrupt Disable */
04048 #define PWM_IDR2_CMPU7 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PWM_IDR2) Comparison 7 Update Interrupt Disable */
04049 /* -------- PWM_IMR2 : (PWM Offset: 0x3C) PWM Interrupt Mask Register 2 -------- */
04050 #define PWM_IMR2_WRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) Write Ready for Synchronous Channels Update Interrupt Mask */
04051 #define PWM_IMR2_ENDTX (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) PDC End of TX Buffer Interrupt Mask */
04052 #define PWM_IMR2_TXBUFE (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) PDC TX Buffer Empty Interrupt Mask */
04053 #define PWM_IMR2_UNRE (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) Synchronous Channels Update Underrun Error Interrupt Mask */
04054 #define PWM_IMR2_CMPM0 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) Comparison 0 Match Interrupt Mask */
04055 #define PWM_IMR2_CMPM1 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) Comparison 1 Match Interrupt Mask */
04056 #define PWM_IMR2_CMPM2 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) Comparison 2 Match Interrupt Mask */
04057 #define PWM_IMR2_CMPM3 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) Comparison 3 Match Interrupt Mask */
04058 #define PWM_IMR2_CMPM4 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) Comparison 4 Match Interrupt Mask */
04059 #define PWM_IMR2_CMPM5 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) Comparison 5 Match Interrupt Mask */
04060 #define PWM_IMR2_CMPM6 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) Comparison 6 Match Interrupt Mask */
04061 #define PWM_IMR2_CMPM7 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) Comparison 7 Match Interrupt Mask */
04062 #define PWM_IMR2_CMPU0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) Comparison 0 Update Interrupt Mask */
04063 #define PWM_IMR2_CMPU1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) Comparison 1 Update Interrupt Mask */
04064 #define PWM_IMR2_CMPU2 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) Comparison 2 Update Interrupt Mask */
04065 #define PWM_IMR2_CMPU3 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) Comparison 3 Update Interrupt Mask */
04066 #define PWM_IMR2_CMPU4 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) Comparison 4 Update Interrupt Mask */
04067 #define PWM_IMR2_CMPU5 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) Comparison 5 Update Interrupt Mask */
04068 #define PWM_IMR2_CMPU6 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) Comparison 6 Update Interrupt Mask */
04069 #define PWM_IMR2_CMPU7 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PWM_IMR2) Comparison 7 Update Interrupt Mask */
04070 /* -------- PWM_ISR2 : (PWM Offset: 0x40) PWM Interrupt Status Register 2 -------- */
04071 #define PWM_ISR2_WRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) Write Ready for Synchronous Channels Update */
04072 #define PWM_ISR2_ENDTX (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) PDC End of TX Buffer */
04073 #define PWM_ISR2_TXBUFE (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) PDC TX Buffer Empty */
04074 #define PWM_ISR2_UNRE (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) Synchronous Channels Update Underrun Error */
04075 #define PWM_ISR2_CMPM0 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) Comparison 0 Match */
04076 #define PWM_ISR2_CMPM1 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) Comparison 1 Match */
04077 #define PWM_ISR2_CMPM2 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) Comparison 2 Match */
04078 #define PWM_ISR2_CMPM3 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) Comparison 3 Match */
04079 #define PWM_ISR2_CMPM4 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) Comparison 4 Match */
04080 #define PWM_ISR2_CMPM5 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) Comparison 5 Match */
04081 #define PWM_ISR2_CMPM6 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) Comparison 6 Match */
04082 #define PWM_ISR2_CMPM7 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) Comparison 7 Match */
04083 #define PWM_ISR2_CMPU0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) Comparison 0 Update */
04084 #define PWM_ISR2_CMPU1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) Comparison 1 Update */
04085 #define PWM_ISR2_CMPU2 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) Comparison 2 Update */
04086 #define PWM_ISR2_CMPU3 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) Comparison 3 Update */
04087 #define PWM_ISR2_CMPU4 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) Comparison 4 Update */
04088 #define PWM_ISR2_CMPU5 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) Comparison 5 Update */
04089 #define PWM_ISR2_CMPU6 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) Comparison 6 Update */
04090 #define PWM_ISR2_CMPU7 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (PWM_ISR2) Comparison 7 Update */
04091 /* -------- PWM_OOV : (PWM Offset: 0x44) PWM Output Override Value Register -------- */
04092 #define PWM_OOV_OOVH0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_OOV) Output Override Value for PWMH output of the channel 0 */
04093 #define PWM_OOV_OOVH1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_OOV) Output Override Value for PWMH output of the channel 1 */
04094 #define PWM_OOV_OOVH2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_OOV) Output Override Value for PWMH output of the channel 2 */
04095 #define PWM_OOV_OOVH3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_OOV) Output Override Value for PWMH output of the channel 3 */
04096 #define PWM_OOV_OOVL0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_OOV) Output Override Value for PWML output of the channel 0 */
04097 #define PWM_OOV_OOVL1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PWM_OOV) Output Override Value for PWML output of the channel 1 */
04098 #define PWM_OOV_OOVL2 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PWM_OOV) Output Override Value for PWML output of the channel 2 */
04099 #define PWM_OOV_OOVL3 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PWM_OOV) Output Override Value for PWML output of the channel 3 */
04100 /* -------- PWM_OS : (PWM Offset: 0x48) PWM Output Selection Register -------- */
04101 #define PWM_OS_OSH0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_OS) Output Selection for PWMH output of the channel 0 */
04102 #define PWM_OS_OSH1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_OS) Output Selection for PWMH output of the channel 1 */
04103 #define PWM_OS_OSH2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_OS) Output Selection for PWMH output of the channel 2 */
04104 #define PWM_OS_OSH3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_OS) Output Selection for PWMH output of the channel 3 */
04105 #define PWM_OS_OSL0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_OS) Output Selection for PWML output of the channel 0 */
04106 #define PWM_OS_OSL1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PWM_OS) Output Selection for PWML output of the channel 1 */
04107 #define PWM_OS_OSL2 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PWM_OS) Output Selection for PWML output of the channel 2 */
04108 #define PWM_OS_OSL3 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PWM_OS) Output Selection for PWML output of the channel 3 */
04109 /* -------- PWM_OSS : (PWM Offset: 0x4C) PWM Output Selection Set Register -------- */
04110 #define PWM_OSS_OSSH0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_OSS) Output Selection Set for PWMH output of the channel 0 */
04111 #define PWM_OSS_OSSH1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_OSS) Output Selection Set for PWMH output of the channel 1 */
04112 #define PWM_OSS_OSSH2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_OSS) Output Selection Set for PWMH output of the channel 2 */
04113 #define PWM_OSS_OSSH3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_OSS) Output Selection Set for PWMH output of the channel 3 */
04114 #define PWM_OSS_OSSL0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_OSS) Output Selection Set for PWML output of the channel 0 */
04115 #define PWM_OSS_OSSL1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PWM_OSS) Output Selection Set for PWML output of the channel 1 */
04116 #define PWM_OSS_OSSL2 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PWM_OSS) Output Selection Set for PWML output of the channel 2 */
04117 #define PWM_OSS_OSSL3 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PWM_OSS) Output Selection Set for PWML output of the channel 3 */
04118 /* -------- PWM_OSC : (PWM Offset: 0x50) PWM Output Selection Clear Register -------- */
04119 #define PWM_OSC_OSCH0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_OSC) Output Selection Clear for PWMH output of the channel 0 */
04120 #define PWM_OSC_OSCH1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_OSC) Output Selection Clear for PWMH output of the channel 1 */
04121 #define PWM_OSC_OSCH2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_OSC) Output Selection Clear for PWMH output of the channel 2 */
04122 #define PWM_OSC_OSCH3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_OSC) Output Selection Clear for PWMH output of the channel 3 */
04123 #define PWM_OSC_OSCL0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_OSC) Output Selection Clear for PWML output of the channel 0 */
04124 #define PWM_OSC_OSCL1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PWM_OSC) Output Selection Clear for PWML output of the channel 1 */
04125 #define PWM_OSC_OSCL2 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PWM_OSC) Output Selection Clear for PWML output of the channel 2 */
04126 #define PWM_OSC_OSCL3 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PWM_OSC) Output Selection Clear for PWML output of the channel 3 */
04127 /* -------- PWM_OSSUPD : (PWM Offset: 0x54) PWM Output Selection Set Update Register -------- */
04128 #define PWM_OSSUPD_OSSUPH0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_OSSUPD) Output Selection Set for PWMH output of the channel 0 */
04129 #define PWM_OSSUPD_OSSUPH1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_OSSUPD) Output Selection Set for PWMH output of the channel 1 */
04130 #define PWM_OSSUPD_OSSUPH2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_OSSUPD) Output Selection Set for PWMH output of the channel 2 */
04131 #define PWM_OSSUPD_OSSUPH3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_OSSUPD) Output Selection Set for PWMH output of the channel 3 */
04132 #define PWM_OSSUPD_OSSUPL0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_OSSUPD) Output Selection Set for PWML output of the channel 0 */
04133 #define PWM_OSSUPD_OSSUPL1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PWM_OSSUPD) Output Selection Set for PWML output of the channel 1 */
04134 #define PWM_OSSUPD_OSSUPL2 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PWM_OSSUPD) Output Selection Set for PWML output of the channel 2 */
04135 #define PWM_OSSUPD_OSSUPL3 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PWM_OSSUPD) Output Selection Set for PWML output of the channel 3 */
04136 /* -------- PWM_OSCUPD : (PWM Offset: 0x58) PWM Output Selection Clear Update Register -------- */
04137 #define PWM_OSCUPD_OSCUPH0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_OSCUPD) Output Selection Clear for PWMH output of the channel 0 */
04138 #define PWM_OSCUPD_OSCUPH1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_OSCUPD) Output Selection Clear for PWMH output of the channel 1 */
04139 #define PWM_OSCUPD_OSCUPH2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_OSCUPD) Output Selection Clear for PWMH output of the channel 2 */
04140 #define PWM_OSCUPD_OSCUPH3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_OSCUPD) Output Selection Clear for PWMH output of the channel 3 */
04141 #define PWM_OSCUPD_OSCUPL0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_OSCUPD) Output Selection Clear for PWML output of the channel 0 */
04142 #define PWM_OSCUPD_OSCUPL1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PWM_OSCUPD) Output Selection Clear for PWML output of the channel 1 */
04143 #define PWM_OSCUPD_OSCUPL2 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PWM_OSCUPD) Output Selection Clear for PWML output of the channel 2 */
04144 #define PWM_OSCUPD_OSCUPL3 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PWM_OSCUPD) Output Selection Clear for PWML output of the channel 3 */
04145 /* -------- PWM_FMR : (PWM Offset: 0x5C) PWM Fault Mode Register -------- */
04146 #define PWM_FMR_FPOL_Pos 0
04147 #define PWM_FMR_FPOL_Msk (0xffu << PWM_FMR_FPOL_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_FMR) Fault Polarity (fault input bit varies from 0 to 5) */
04148 #define PWM_FMR_FPOL(value) ((PWM_FMR_FPOL_Msk & ((value) << PWM_FMR_FPOL_Pos)))
04149 #define PWM_FMR_FMOD_Pos 8
04150 #define PWM_FMR_FMOD_Msk (0xffu << PWM_FMR_FMOD_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_FMR) Fault Activation Mode (fault input bit varies from 0 to 5) */
04151 #define PWM_FMR_FMOD(value) ((PWM_FMR_FMOD_Msk & ((value) << PWM_FMR_FMOD_Pos)))
04152 #define PWM_FMR_FFIL_Pos 16
04153 #define PWM_FMR_FFIL_Msk (0xffu << PWM_FMR_FFIL_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_FMR) Fault Filtering (fault input bit varies from 0 to 5) */
04154 #define PWM_FMR_FFIL(value) ((PWM_FMR_FFIL_Msk & ((value) << PWM_FMR_FFIL_Pos)))
04155 /* -------- PWM_FSR : (PWM Offset: 0x60) PWM Fault Status Register -------- */
04156 #define PWM_FSR_FIV_Pos 0
04157 #define PWM_FSR_FIV_Msk (0xffu << PWM_FSR_FIV_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_FSR) Fault Input Value (fault input bit varies from 0 to 5) */
04158 #define PWM_FSR_FS_Pos 8
04159 #define PWM_FSR_FS_Msk (0xffu << PWM_FSR_FS_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_FSR) Fault Status (fault input bit varies from 0 to 5) */
04160 /* -------- PWM_FCR : (PWM Offset: 0x64) PWM Fault Clear Register -------- */
04161 #define PWM_FCR_FCLR_Pos 0
04162 #define PWM_FCR_FCLR_Msk (0xffu << PWM_FCR_FCLR_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_FCR) Fault Clear (fault input bit varies from 0 to 5) */
04163 #define PWM_FCR_FCLR(value) ((PWM_FCR_FCLR_Msk & ((value) << PWM_FCR_FCLR_Pos)))
04164 /* -------- PWM_FPV : (PWM Offset: 0x68) PWM Fault Protection Value Register -------- */
04165 #define PWM_FPV_FPVH0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_FPV) Fault Protection Value for PWMH output on channel 0 */
04166 #define PWM_FPV_FPVH1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_FPV) Fault Protection Value for PWMH output on channel 1 */
04167 #define PWM_FPV_FPVH2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_FPV) Fault Protection Value for PWMH output on channel 2 */
04168 #define PWM_FPV_FPVH3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_FPV) Fault Protection Value for PWMH output on channel 3 */
04169 #define PWM_FPV_FPVL0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_FPV) Fault Protection Value for PWML output on channel 0 */
04170 #define PWM_FPV_FPVL1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PWM_FPV) Fault Protection Value for PWML output on channel 1 */
04171 #define PWM_FPV_FPVL2 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PWM_FPV) Fault Protection Value for PWML output on channel 2 */
04172 #define PWM_FPV_FPVL3 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (PWM_FPV) Fault Protection Value for PWML output on channel 3 */
04173 /* -------- PWM_FPE : (PWM Offset: 0x6C) PWM Fault Protection Enable Register -------- */
04174 #define PWM_FPE_FPE0_Pos 0
04175 #define PWM_FPE_FPE0_Msk (0xffu << PWM_FPE_FPE0_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_FPE) Fault Protection Enable for channel 0 (fault input bit varies from 0 to 5) */
04176 #define PWM_FPE_FPE0(value) ((PWM_FPE_FPE0_Msk & ((value) << PWM_FPE_FPE0_Pos)))
04177 #define PWM_FPE_FPE1_Pos 8
04178 #define PWM_FPE_FPE1_Msk (0xffu << PWM_FPE_FPE1_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_FPE) Fault Protection Enable for channel 1 (fault input bit varies from 0 to 5) */
04179 #define PWM_FPE_FPE1(value) ((PWM_FPE_FPE1_Msk & ((value) << PWM_FPE_FPE1_Pos)))
04180 #define PWM_FPE_FPE2_Pos 16
04181 #define PWM_FPE_FPE2_Msk (0xffu << PWM_FPE_FPE2_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_FPE) Fault Protection Enable for channel 2 (fault input bit varies from 0 to 5) */
04182 #define PWM_FPE_FPE2(value) ((PWM_FPE_FPE2_Msk & ((value) << PWM_FPE_FPE2_Pos)))
04183 #define PWM_FPE_FPE3_Pos 24
04184 #define PWM_FPE_FPE3_Msk (0xffu << PWM_FPE_FPE3_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_FPE) Fault Protection Enable for channel 3 (fault input bit varies from 0 to 5) */
04185 #define PWM_FPE_FPE3(value) ((PWM_FPE_FPE3_Msk & ((value) << PWM_FPE_FPE3_Pos)))
04186 /* -------- PWM_EL0MR : (PWM Offset: 0x7C) PWM Event Line 0 Mode Register -------- */
04187 #define PWM_EL0MR_CSEL0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_EL0MR) Comparison 0 Selection */
04188 #define PWM_EL0MR_CSEL1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_EL0MR) Comparison 1 Selection */
04189 #define PWM_EL0MR_CSEL2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_EL0MR) Comparison 2 Selection */
04190 #define PWM_EL0MR_CSEL3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_EL0MR) Comparison 3 Selection */
04191 #define PWM_EL0MR_CSEL4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PWM_EL0MR) Comparison 4 Selection */
04192 #define PWM_EL0MR_CSEL5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PWM_EL0MR) Comparison 5 Selection */
04193 #define PWM_EL0MR_CSEL6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PWM_EL0MR) Comparison 6 Selection */
04194 #define PWM_EL0MR_CSEL7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PWM_EL0MR) Comparison 7 Selection */
04195 /* -------- PWM_EL1MR : (PWM Offset: 0x80) PWM Event Line 1 Mode Register -------- */
04196 #define PWM_EL1MR_CSEL0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_EL1MR) Comparison 0 Selection */
04197 #define PWM_EL1MR_CSEL1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_EL1MR) Comparison 1 Selection */
04198 #define PWM_EL1MR_CSEL2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_EL1MR) Comparison 2 Selection */
04199 #define PWM_EL1MR_CSEL3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_EL1MR) Comparison 3 Selection */
04200 #define PWM_EL1MR_CSEL4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PWM_EL1MR) Comparison 4 Selection */
04201 #define PWM_EL1MR_CSEL5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PWM_EL1MR) Comparison 5 Selection */
04202 #define PWM_EL1MR_CSEL6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PWM_EL1MR) Comparison 6 Selection */
04203 #define PWM_EL1MR_CSEL7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PWM_EL1MR) Comparison 7 Selection */
04204 /* -------- PWM_SMMR : (PWM Offset: 0xB0) PWM Stepper Motor Mode Register -------- */
04205 #define PWM_SMMR_GCEN0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_SMMR) Gray Count ENable */
04206 #define PWM_SMMR_GCEN1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_SMMR) Gray Count ENable */
04207 #define PWM_SMMR_DOWN0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_SMMR) DOWN Count */
04208 #define PWM_SMMR_DOWN1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PWM_SMMR) DOWN Count */
04209 /* -------- PWM_WPCR : (PWM Offset: 0xE4) PWM Write Protect Control Register -------- */
04210 #define PWM_WPCR_WPCMD_Pos 0
04211 #define PWM_WPCR_WPCMD_Msk (0x3u << PWM_WPCR_WPCMD_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_WPCR) Write Protect Command */
04212 #define PWM_WPCR_WPCMD(value) ((PWM_WPCR_WPCMD_Msk & ((value) << PWM_WPCR_WPCMD_Pos)))
04213 #define PWM_WPCR_WPRG0 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_WPCR) Write Protect Register Group 0 */
04214 #define PWM_WPCR_WPRG1 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_WPCR) Write Protect Register Group 1 */
04215 #define PWM_WPCR_WPRG2 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PWM_WPCR) Write Protect Register Group 2 */
04216 #define PWM_WPCR_WPRG3 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PWM_WPCR) Write Protect Register Group 3 */
04217 #define PWM_WPCR_WPRG4 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (PWM_WPCR) Write Protect Register Group 4 */
04218 #define PWM_WPCR_WPRG5 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PWM_WPCR) Write Protect Register Group 5 */
04219 #define PWM_WPCR_WPKEY_Pos 8
04220 #define PWM_WPCR_WPKEY_Msk (0xffffffu << PWM_WPCR_WPKEY_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_WPCR) Write Protect Key */
04221 #define PWM_WPCR_WPKEY(value) ((PWM_WPCR_WPKEY_Msk & ((value) << PWM_WPCR_WPKEY_Pos)))
04222 /* -------- PWM_WPSR : (PWM Offset: 0xE8) PWM Write Protect Status Register -------- */
04223 #define PWM_WPSR_WPSWS0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_WPSR) Write Protect SW Status */
04224 #define PWM_WPSR_WPSWS1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_WPSR) Write Protect SW Status */
04225 #define PWM_WPSR_WPSWS2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (PWM_WPSR) Write Protect SW Status */
04226 #define PWM_WPSR_WPSWS3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (PWM_WPSR) Write Protect SW Status */
04227 #define PWM_WPSR_WPSWS4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (PWM_WPSR) Write Protect SW Status */
04228 #define PWM_WPSR_WPSWS5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (PWM_WPSR) Write Protect SW Status */
04229 #define PWM_WPSR_WPVS (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (PWM_WPSR) Write Protect Violation Status */
04230 #define PWM_WPSR_WPHWS0 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PWM_WPSR) Write Protect HW Status */
04231 #define PWM_WPSR_WPHWS1 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PWM_WPSR) Write Protect HW Status */
04232 #define PWM_WPSR_WPHWS2 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PWM_WPSR) Write Protect HW Status */
04233 #define PWM_WPSR_WPHWS3 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (PWM_WPSR) Write Protect HW Status */
04234 #define PWM_WPSR_WPHWS4 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (PWM_WPSR) Write Protect HW Status */
04235 #define PWM_WPSR_WPHWS5 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (PWM_WPSR) Write Protect HW Status */
04236 #define PWM_WPSR_WPVSRC_Pos 16
04237 #define PWM_WPSR_WPVSRC_Msk (0xffffu << PWM_WPSR_WPVSRC_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_WPSR) Write Protect Violation Source */
04238 /* -------- PWM_RPR : (PWM Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register -------- */
04239 #define PWM_RPR_RXPTR_Pos 0
04240 #define PWM_RPR_RXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << PWM_RPR_RXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_RPR) Receive Pointer Register */
04241 #define PWM_RPR_RXPTR(value) ((PWM_RPR_RXPTR_Msk & ((value) << PWM_RPR_RXPTR_Pos)))
04242 /* -------- PWM_RCR : (PWM Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register -------- */
04243 #define PWM_RCR_RXCTR_Pos 0
04244 #define PWM_RCR_RXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << PWM_RCR_RXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_RCR) Receive Counter Register */
04245 #define PWM_RCR_RXCTR(value) ((PWM_RCR_RXCTR_Msk & ((value) << PWM_RCR_RXCTR_Pos)))
04246 /* -------- PWM_TPR : (PWM Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register -------- */
04247 #define PWM_TPR_TXPTR_Pos 0
04248 #define PWM_TPR_TXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << PWM_TPR_TXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_TPR) Transmit Counter Register */
04249 #define PWM_TPR_TXPTR(value) ((PWM_TPR_TXPTR_Msk & ((value) << PWM_TPR_TXPTR_Pos)))
04250 /* -------- PWM_TCR : (PWM Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register -------- */
04251 #define PWM_TCR_TXCTR_Pos 0
04252 #define PWM_TCR_TXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << PWM_TCR_TXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_TCR) Transmit Counter Register */
04253 #define PWM_TCR_TXCTR(value) ((PWM_TCR_TXCTR_Msk & ((value) << PWM_TCR_TXCTR_Pos)))
04254 /* -------- PWM_RNPR : (PWM Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register -------- */
04255 #define PWM_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos 0
04256 #define PWM_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << PWM_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_RNPR) Receive Next Pointer */
04257 #define PWM_RNPR_RXNPTR(value) ((PWM_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << PWM_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos)))
04258 /* -------- PWM_RNCR : (PWM Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register -------- */
04259 #define PWM_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos 0
04260 #define PWM_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << PWM_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_RNCR) Receive Next Counter */
04261 #define PWM_RNCR_RXNCTR(value) ((PWM_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << PWM_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos)))
04262 /* -------- PWM_TNPR : (PWM Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register -------- */
04263 #define PWM_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos 0
04264 #define PWM_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << PWM_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_TNPR) Transmit Next Pointer */
04265 #define PWM_TNPR_TXNPTR(value) ((PWM_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << PWM_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos)))
04266 /* -------- PWM_TNCR : (PWM Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register -------- */
04267 #define PWM_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos 0
04268 #define PWM_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << PWM_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_TNCR) Transmit Counter Next */
04269 #define PWM_TNCR_TXNCTR(value) ((PWM_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << PWM_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos)))
04270 /* -------- PWM_PTCR : (PWM Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register -------- */
04271 #define PWM_PTCR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
04272 #define PWM_PTCR_RXTDIS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (PWM_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Disable */
04273 #define PWM_PTCR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PWM_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
04274 #define PWM_PTCR_TXTDIS (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PWM_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Disable */
04275 /* -------- PWM_PTSR : (PWM Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register -------- */
04276 #define PWM_PTSR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_PTSR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
04277 #define PWM_PTSR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PWM_PTSR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
04278 /* -------- PWM_CMPxV : (PWM Offset: N/A) PWM Comparison 0 Value Register -------- */
04279 #define PWM_CMPxV_CV_Pos 0
04280 #define PWM_CMPxV_CV_Msk (0xffffffu << PWM_CMPxV_CV_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CMPxV) Comparison x Value */
04281 #define PWM_CMPxV_CV(value) ((PWM_CMPxV_CV_Msk & ((value) << PWM_CMPxV_CV_Pos)))
04282 #define PWM_CMPxV_CVM (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PWM_CMPxV) Comparison x Value Mode */
04283 /* -------- PWM_CMPxVUPD : (PWM Offset: N/A) PWM Comparison 0 Value Update Register -------- */
04284 #define PWM_CMPxVUPD_CVUPD_Pos 0
04285 #define PWM_CMPxVUPD_CVUPD_Msk (0xffffffu << PWM_CMPxVUPD_CVUPD_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CMPxVUPD) Comparison x Value Update */
04286 #define PWM_CMPxVUPD_CVUPD(value) ((PWM_CMPxVUPD_CVUPD_Msk & ((value) << PWM_CMPxVUPD_CVUPD_Pos)))
04287 #define PWM_CMPxVUPD_CVMUPD (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (PWM_CMPxVUPD) Comparison x Value Mode Update */
04288 /* -------- PWM_CMPxM : (PWM Offset: N/A) PWM Comparison 0 Mode Register -------- */
04289 #define PWM_CMPxM_CEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_CMPxM) Comparison x Enable */
04290 #define PWM_CMPxM_CTR_Pos 4
04291 #define PWM_CMPxM_CTR_Msk (0xfu << PWM_CMPxM_CTR_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CMPxM) Comparison x Trigger */
04292 #define PWM_CMPxM_CTR(value) ((PWM_CMPxM_CTR_Msk & ((value) << PWM_CMPxM_CTR_Pos)))
04293 #define PWM_CMPxM_CPR_Pos 8
04294 #define PWM_CMPxM_CPR_Msk (0xfu << PWM_CMPxM_CPR_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CMPxM) Comparison x Period */
04295 #define PWM_CMPxM_CPR(value) ((PWM_CMPxM_CPR_Msk & ((value) << PWM_CMPxM_CPR_Pos)))
04296 #define PWM_CMPxM_CPRCNT_Pos 12
04297 #define PWM_CMPxM_CPRCNT_Msk (0xfu << PWM_CMPxM_CPRCNT_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CMPxM) Comparison x Period Counter */
04298 #define PWM_CMPxM_CPRCNT(value) ((PWM_CMPxM_CPRCNT_Msk & ((value) << PWM_CMPxM_CPRCNT_Pos)))
04299 #define PWM_CMPxM_CUPR_Pos 16
04300 #define PWM_CMPxM_CUPR_Msk (0xfu << PWM_CMPxM_CUPR_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CMPxM) Comparison x Update Period */
04301 #define PWM_CMPxM_CUPR(value) ((PWM_CMPxM_CUPR_Msk & ((value) << PWM_CMPxM_CUPR_Pos)))
04302 #define PWM_CMPxM_CUPRCNT_Pos 20
04303 #define PWM_CMPxM_CUPRCNT_Msk (0xfu << PWM_CMPxM_CUPRCNT_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CMPxM) Comparison x Update Period Counter */
04304 #define PWM_CMPxM_CUPRCNT(value) ((PWM_CMPxM_CUPRCNT_Msk & ((value) << PWM_CMPxM_CUPRCNT_Pos)))
04305 /* -------- PWM_CMPxMUPD : (PWM Offset: N/A) PWM Comparison 0 Mode Update Register -------- */
04306 #define PWM_CMPxMUPD_CENUPD (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_CMPxMUPD) Comparison x Enable Update */
04307 #define PWM_CMPxMUPD_CTRUPD_Pos 4
04308 #define PWM_CMPxMUPD_CTRUPD_Msk (0xfu << PWM_CMPxMUPD_CTRUPD_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CMPxMUPD) Comparison x Trigger Update */
04309 #define PWM_CMPxMUPD_CTRUPD(value) ((PWM_CMPxMUPD_CTRUPD_Msk & ((value) << PWM_CMPxMUPD_CTRUPD_Pos)))
04310 #define PWM_CMPxMUPD_CPRUPD_Pos 8
04311 #define PWM_CMPxMUPD_CPRUPD_Msk (0xfu << PWM_CMPxMUPD_CPRUPD_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CMPxMUPD) Comparison x Period Update */
04312 #define PWM_CMPxMUPD_CPRUPD(value) ((PWM_CMPxMUPD_CPRUPD_Msk & ((value) << PWM_CMPxMUPD_CPRUPD_Pos)))
04313 #define PWM_CMPxMUPD_CUPRUPD_Pos 16
04314 #define PWM_CMPxMUPD_CUPRUPD_Msk (0xfu << PWM_CMPxMUPD_CUPRUPD_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CMPxMUPD) Comparison x Update Period Update */
04315 #define PWM_CMPxMUPD_CUPRUPD(value) ((PWM_CMPxMUPD_CUPRUPD_Msk & ((value) << PWM_CMPxMUPD_CUPRUPD_Pos)))
04316 /* -------- PWM_CMR : (PWM Offset: N/A) PWM Channel Mode Register -------- */
04317 #define PWM_CMR_CPRE_Pos 0
04318 #define PWM_CMR_CPRE_Msk (0xfu << PWM_CMR_CPRE_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) Channel Pre-scaler */
04319 #define   PWM_CMR_CPRE_MCK (0x0u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) MCK */
04320 #define   PWM_CMR_CPRE_MCK_DIV_2 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) MCK/2 */
04321 #define   PWM_CMR_CPRE_MCK_DIV_4 (0x2u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) MCK/4 */
04322 #define   PWM_CMR_CPRE_MCK_DIV_8 (0x3u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) MCK/8 */
04323 #define   PWM_CMR_CPRE_MCK_DIV_16 (0x4u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) MCK/16 */
04324 #define   PWM_CMR_CPRE_MCK_DIV_32 (0x5u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) MCK/32 */
04325 #define   PWM_CMR_CPRE_MCK_DIV_64 (0x6u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) MCK/64 */
04326 #define   PWM_CMR_CPRE_MCK_DIV_128 (0x7u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) MCK/128 */
04327 #define   PWM_CMR_CPRE_MCK_DIV_256 (0x8u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) MCK/256 */
04328 #define   PWM_CMR_CPRE_MCK_DIV_512 (0x9u << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) MCK/512 */
04329 #define   PWM_CMR_CPRE_MCK_DIV_1024 (0xAu << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) MCK/1024 */
04330 #define   PWM_CMR_CPRE_CKA (0xBu << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) CLKA */
04331 #define   PWM_CMR_CPRE_CKB (0xCu << 0) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) CLKB */
04332 #define PWM_CMR_CALG (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) Channel Alignment */
04333 #define PWM_CMR_CPOL (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) Channel Polarity */
04334 #define PWM_CMR_CES (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) Counter Event Selection */
04335 #define PWM_CMR_DTE (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) Dead-Time Generator Enable */
04336 #define PWM_CMR_DTHI (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) Dead-Time PWMHx Output Inverted */
04337 #define PWM_CMR_DTLI (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (PWM_CMR) Dead-Time PWMLx Output Inverted */
04338 /* -------- PWM_CDTY : (PWM Offset: N/A) PWM Channel Duty Cycle Register -------- */
04339 #define PWM_CDTY_CDTY_Pos 0
04340 #define PWM_CDTY_CDTY_Msk (0xffffffu << PWM_CDTY_CDTY_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CDTY) Channel Duty-Cycle */
04341 #define PWM_CDTY_CDTY(value) ((PWM_CDTY_CDTY_Msk & ((value) << PWM_CDTY_CDTY_Pos)))
04342 /* -------- PWM_CDTYUPD : (PWM Offset: N/A) PWM Channel Duty Cycle Update Register -------- */
04343 #define PWM_CDTYUPD_CDTYUPD_Pos 0
04344 #define PWM_CDTYUPD_CDTYUPD_Msk (0xffffffu << PWM_CDTYUPD_CDTYUPD_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CDTYUPD) Channel Duty-Cycle Update */
04345 #define PWM_CDTYUPD_CDTYUPD(value) ((PWM_CDTYUPD_CDTYUPD_Msk & ((value) << PWM_CDTYUPD_CDTYUPD_Pos)))
04346 /* -------- PWM_CPRD : (PWM Offset: N/A) PWM Channel Period Register -------- */
04347 #define PWM_CPRD_CPRD_Pos 0
04348 #define PWM_CPRD_CPRD_Msk (0xffffffu << PWM_CPRD_CPRD_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CPRD) Channel Period */
04349 #define PWM_CPRD_CPRD(value) ((PWM_CPRD_CPRD_Msk & ((value) << PWM_CPRD_CPRD_Pos)))
04350 /* -------- PWM_CPRDUPD : (PWM Offset: N/A) PWM Channel Period Update Register -------- */
04351 #define PWM_CPRDUPD_CPRDUPD_Pos 0
04352 #define PWM_CPRDUPD_CPRDUPD_Msk (0xffffffu << PWM_CPRDUPD_CPRDUPD_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CPRDUPD) Channel Period Update */
04353 #define PWM_CPRDUPD_CPRDUPD(value) ((PWM_CPRDUPD_CPRDUPD_Msk & ((value) << PWM_CPRDUPD_CPRDUPD_Pos)))
04354 /* -------- PWM_CCNT : (PWM Offset: N/A) PWM Channel Counter Register -------- */
04355 #define PWM_CCNT_CNT_Pos 0
04356 #define PWM_CCNT_CNT_Msk (0xffffffu << PWM_CCNT_CNT_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_CCNT) Channel Counter Register */
04357 /* -------- PWM_DT : (PWM Offset: N/A) PWM Channel Dead Time Register -------- */
04358 #define PWM_DT_DTH_Pos 0
04359 #define PWM_DT_DTH_Msk (0xffffu << PWM_DT_DTH_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_DT) Dead-Time Value for PWMHx Output */
04360 #define PWM_DT_DTH(value) ((PWM_DT_DTH_Msk & ((value) << PWM_DT_DTH_Pos)))
04361 #define PWM_DT_DTL_Pos 16
04362 #define PWM_DT_DTL_Msk (0xffffu << PWM_DT_DTL_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_DT) Dead-Time Value for PWMLx Output */
