04363 #define PWM_DT_DTL(value) ((PWM_DT_DTL_Msk & ((value) << PWM_DT_DTL_Pos)))
04364 /* -------- PWM_DTUPD : (PWM Offset: N/A) PWM Channel Dead Time Update Register -------- */
04365 #define PWM_DTUPD_DTHUPD_Pos 0
04366 #define PWM_DTUPD_DTHUPD_Msk (0xffffu << PWM_DTUPD_DTHUPD_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_DTUPD) Dead-Time Value Update for PWMHx Output */
04367 #define PWM_DTUPD_DTHUPD(value) ((PWM_DTUPD_DTHUPD_Msk & ((value) << PWM_DTUPD_DTHUPD_Pos)))
04368 #define PWM_DTUPD_DTLUPD_Pos 16
04369 #define PWM_DTUPD_DTLUPD_Msk (0xffffu << PWM_DTUPD_DTLUPD_Pos) /**< \brief (PWM_DTUPD) Dead-Time Value Update for PWMLx Output */
04370 #define PWM_DTUPD_DTLUPD(value) ((PWM_DTUPD_DTLUPD_Msk & ((value) << PWM_DTUPD_DTLUPD_Pos)))
04371 
04372 /*@}*/
04373 
04374 /* ============================================================================= */
04375 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Reset Controller */
04376 /* ============================================================================= */
04377 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_RSTC Reset Controller */
04378 /*@{*/
04379 
04380 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
04381 /** \brief Rstc hardware registers */
04382 typedef struct {
04383   WoReg RSTC_CR; /**< \brief (Rstc Offset: 0x00) Control Register */
04384   RoReg RSTC_SR; /**< \brief (Rstc Offset: 0x04) Status Register */
04385   RwReg RSTC_MR; /**< \brief (Rstc Offset: 0x08) Mode Register */
04386 } Rstc;
04387 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
04388 /* -------- RSTC_CR : (RSTC Offset: 0x00) Control Register -------- */
04389 #define RSTC_CR_PROCRST (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (RSTC_CR) Processor Reset */
04390 #define RSTC_CR_PERRST (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (RSTC_CR) Peripheral Reset */
04391 #define RSTC_CR_EXTRST (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (RSTC_CR) External Reset */
04392 #define RSTC_CR_KEY_Pos 24
04393 #define RSTC_CR_KEY_Msk (0xffu << RSTC_CR_KEY_Pos) /**< \brief (RSTC_CR) Password */
04394 #define RSTC_CR_KEY(value) ((RSTC_CR_KEY_Msk & ((value) << RSTC_CR_KEY_Pos)))
04395 /* -------- RSTC_SR : (RSTC Offset: 0x04) Status Register -------- */
04396 #define RSTC_SR_URSTS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (RSTC_SR) User Reset Status */
04397 #define RSTC_SR_RSTTYP_Pos 8
04398 #define RSTC_SR_RSTTYP_Msk (0x7u << RSTC_SR_RSTTYP_Pos) /**< \brief (RSTC_SR) Reset Type */
04399 #define RSTC_SR_NRSTL (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (RSTC_SR) NRST Pin Level */
04400 #define RSTC_SR_SRCMP (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (RSTC_SR) Software Reset Command in Progress */
04401 /* -------- RSTC_MR : (RSTC Offset: 0x08) Mode Register -------- */
04402 #define RSTC_MR_URSTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (RSTC_MR) User Reset Enable */
04403 #define RSTC_MR_URSTIEN (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (RSTC_MR) User Reset Interrupt Enable */
04404 #define RSTC_MR_ERSTL_Pos 8
04405 #define RSTC_MR_ERSTL_Msk (0xfu << RSTC_MR_ERSTL_Pos) /**< \brief (RSTC_MR) External Reset Length */
04406 #define RSTC_MR_ERSTL(value) ((RSTC_MR_ERSTL_Msk & ((value) << RSTC_MR_ERSTL_Pos)))
04407 #define RSTC_MR_KEY_Pos 24
04408 #define RSTC_MR_KEY_Msk (0xffu << RSTC_MR_KEY_Pos) /**< \brief (RSTC_MR) Password */
04409 #define RSTC_MR_KEY(value) ((RSTC_MR_KEY_Msk & ((value) << RSTC_MR_KEY_Pos)))
04410 
04411 /*@}*/
04412 
04413 /* ============================================================================= */
04414 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Real-time Clock */
04415 /* ============================================================================= */
04416 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_RTC Real-time Clock */
04417 /*@{*/
04418 
04419 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
04420 /** \brief Rtc hardware registers */
04421 typedef struct {
04422   RwReg RTC_CR;     /**< \brief (Rtc Offset: 0x00) Control Register */
04423   RwReg RTC_MR;     /**< \brief (Rtc Offset: 0x04) Mode Register */
04424   RwReg RTC_TIMR;   /**< \brief (Rtc Offset: 0x08) Time Register */
04425   RwReg RTC_CALR;   /**< \brief (Rtc Offset: 0x0C) Calendar Register */
04426   RwReg RTC_TIMALR; /**< \brief (Rtc Offset: 0x10) Time Alarm Register */
04427   RwReg RTC_CALALR; /**< \brief (Rtc Offset: 0x14) Calendar Alarm Register */
04428   RoReg RTC_SR;     /**< \brief (Rtc Offset: 0x18) Status Register */
04429   WoReg RTC_SCCR;   /**< \brief (Rtc Offset: 0x1C) Status Clear Command Register */
04430   WoReg RTC_IER;    /**< \brief (Rtc Offset: 0x20) Interrupt Enable Register */
04431   WoReg RTC_IDR;    /**< \brief (Rtc Offset: 0x24) Interrupt Disable Register */
04432   RoReg RTC_IMR;    /**< \brief (Rtc Offset: 0x28) Interrupt Mask Register */
04433   RoReg RTC_VER;    /**< \brief (Rtc Offset: 0x2C) Valid Entry Register */
04434 } Rtc;
04435 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
04436 /* -------- RTC_CR : (RTC Offset: 0x00) Control Register -------- */
04437 #define RTC_CR_UPDTIM (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (RTC_CR) Update Request Time Register */
04438 #define RTC_CR_UPDCAL (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (RTC_CR) Update Request Calendar Register */
04439 #define RTC_CR_TIMEVSEL_Pos 8
04440 #define RTC_CR_TIMEVSEL_Msk (0x3u << RTC_CR_TIMEVSEL_Pos) /**< \brief (RTC_CR) Time Event Selection */
04441 #define   RTC_CR_TIMEVSEL_MINUTE (0x0u << 8) /**< \brief (RTC_CR) Minute change */
04442 #define   RTC_CR_TIMEVSEL_HOUR (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (RTC_CR) Hour change */
04443 #define   RTC_CR_TIMEVSEL_MIDNIGHT (0x2u << 8) /**< \brief (RTC_CR) Every day at midnight */
04444 #define   RTC_CR_TIMEVSEL_NOON (0x3u << 8) /**< \brief (RTC_CR) Every day at noon */
04445 #define RTC_CR_CALEVSEL_Pos 16
04446 #define RTC_CR_CALEVSEL_Msk (0x3u << RTC_CR_CALEVSEL_Pos) /**< \brief (RTC_CR) Calendar Event Selection */
04447 #define   RTC_CR_CALEVSEL_WEEK (0x0u << 16) /**< \brief (RTC_CR) Week change (every Monday at time 00:00:00) */
04448 #define   RTC_CR_CALEVSEL_MONTH (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (RTC_CR) Month change (every 01 of each month at time 00:00:00) */
04449 #define   RTC_CR_CALEVSEL_YEAR (0x2u << 16) /**< \brief (RTC_CR) Year change (every January 1 at time 00:00:00) */
04450 /* -------- RTC_MR : (RTC Offset: 0x04) Mode Register -------- */
04451 #define RTC_MR_HRMOD (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (RTC_MR) 12-/24-hour Mode */
04452 /* -------- RTC_TIMR : (RTC Offset: 0x08) Time Register -------- */
04453 #define RTC_TIMR_SEC_Pos 0
04454 #define RTC_TIMR_SEC_Msk (0x7fu << RTC_TIMR_SEC_Pos) /**< \brief (RTC_TIMR) Current Second */
04455 #define RTC_TIMR_SEC(value) ((RTC_TIMR_SEC_Msk & ((value) << RTC_TIMR_SEC_Pos)))
04456 #define RTC_TIMR_MIN_Pos 8
04457 #define RTC_TIMR_MIN_Msk (0x7fu << RTC_TIMR_MIN_Pos) /**< \brief (RTC_TIMR) Current Minute */
04458 #define RTC_TIMR_MIN(value) ((RTC_TIMR_MIN_Msk & ((value) << RTC_TIMR_MIN_Pos)))
04459 #define RTC_TIMR_HOUR_Pos 16
04460 #define RTC_TIMR_HOUR_Msk (0x3fu << RTC_TIMR_HOUR_Pos) /**< \brief (RTC_TIMR) Current Hour */
04461 #define RTC_TIMR_HOUR(value) ((RTC_TIMR_HOUR_Msk & ((value) << RTC_TIMR_HOUR_Pos)))
04462 #define RTC_TIMR_AMPM (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (RTC_TIMR) Ante Meridiem Post Meridiem Indicator */
04463 /* -------- RTC_CALR : (RTC Offset: 0x0C) Calendar Register -------- */
04464 #define RTC_CALR_CENT_Pos 0
04465 #define RTC_CALR_CENT_Msk (0x7fu << RTC_CALR_CENT_Pos) /**< \brief (RTC_CALR) Current Century */
04466 #define RTC_CALR_CENT(value) ((RTC_CALR_CENT_Msk & ((value) << RTC_CALR_CENT_Pos)))
04467 #define RTC_CALR_YEAR_Pos 8
04468 #define RTC_CALR_YEAR_Msk (0xffu << RTC_CALR_YEAR_Pos) /**< \brief (RTC_CALR) Current Year */
04469 #define RTC_CALR_YEAR(value) ((RTC_CALR_YEAR_Msk & ((value) << RTC_CALR_YEAR_Pos)))
04470 #define RTC_CALR_MONTH_Pos 16
04471 #define RTC_CALR_MONTH_Msk (0x1fu << RTC_CALR_MONTH_Pos) /**< \brief (RTC_CALR) Current Month */
04472 #define RTC_CALR_MONTH(value) ((RTC_CALR_MONTH_Msk & ((value) << RTC_CALR_MONTH_Pos)))
04473 #define RTC_CALR_DAY_Pos 21
04474 #define RTC_CALR_DAY_Msk (0x7u << RTC_CALR_DAY_Pos) /**< \brief (RTC_CALR) Current Day in Current Week */
04475 #define RTC_CALR_DAY(value) ((RTC_CALR_DAY_Msk & ((value) << RTC_CALR_DAY_Pos)))
04476 #define RTC_CALR_DATE_Pos 24
04477 #define RTC_CALR_DATE_Msk (0x3fu << RTC_CALR_DATE_Pos) /**< \brief (RTC_CALR) Current Day in Current Month */
04478 #define RTC_CALR_DATE(value) ((RTC_CALR_DATE_Msk & ((value) << RTC_CALR_DATE_Pos)))
04479 /* -------- RTC_TIMALR : (RTC Offset: 0x10) Time Alarm Register -------- */
04480 #define RTC_TIMALR_SEC_Pos 0
04481 #define RTC_TIMALR_SEC_Msk (0x7fu << RTC_TIMALR_SEC_Pos) /**< \brief (RTC_TIMALR) Second Alarm */
04482 #define RTC_TIMALR_SEC(value) ((RTC_TIMALR_SEC_Msk & ((value) << RTC_TIMALR_SEC_Pos)))
04483 #define RTC_TIMALR_SECEN (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (RTC_TIMALR) Second Alarm Enable */
04484 #define RTC_TIMALR_MIN_Pos 8
04485 #define RTC_TIMALR_MIN_Msk (0x7fu << RTC_TIMALR_MIN_Pos) /**< \brief (RTC_TIMALR) Minute Alarm */
04486 #define RTC_TIMALR_MIN(value) ((RTC_TIMALR_MIN_Msk & ((value) << RTC_TIMALR_MIN_Pos)))
04487 #define RTC_TIMALR_MINEN (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (RTC_TIMALR) Minute Alarm Enable */
04488 #define RTC_TIMALR_HOUR_Pos 16
04489 #define RTC_TIMALR_HOUR_Msk (0x3fu << RTC_TIMALR_HOUR_Pos) /**< \brief (RTC_TIMALR) Hour Alarm */
04490 #define RTC_TIMALR_HOUR(value) ((RTC_TIMALR_HOUR_Msk & ((value) << RTC_TIMALR_HOUR_Pos)))
04491 #define RTC_TIMALR_AMPM (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (RTC_TIMALR) AM/PM Indicator */
04492 #define RTC_TIMALR_HOUREN (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (RTC_TIMALR) Hour Alarm Enable */
04493 /* -------- RTC_CALALR : (RTC Offset: 0x14) Calendar Alarm Register -------- */
04494 #define RTC_CALALR_MONTH_Pos 16
04495 #define RTC_CALALR_MONTH_Msk (0x1fu << RTC_CALALR_MONTH_Pos) /**< \brief (RTC_CALALR) Month Alarm */
04496 #define RTC_CALALR_MONTH(value) ((RTC_CALALR_MONTH_Msk & ((value) << RTC_CALALR_MONTH_Pos)))
04497 #define RTC_CALALR_MTHEN (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (RTC_CALALR) Month Alarm Enable */
04498 #define RTC_CALALR_DATE_Pos 24
04499 #define RTC_CALALR_DATE_Msk (0x3fu << RTC_CALALR_DATE_Pos) /**< \brief (RTC_CALALR) Date Alarm */
04500 #define RTC_CALALR_DATE(value) ((RTC_CALALR_DATE_Msk & ((value) << RTC_CALALR_DATE_Pos)))
04501 #define RTC_CALALR_DATEEN (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (RTC_CALALR) Date Alarm Enable */
04502 /* -------- RTC_SR : (RTC Offset: 0x18) Status Register -------- */
04503 #define RTC_SR_ACKUPD (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (RTC_SR) Acknowledge for Update */
04504 #define RTC_SR_ALARM (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (RTC_SR) Alarm Flag */
04505 #define RTC_SR_SEC (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (RTC_SR) Second Event */
04506 #define RTC_SR_TIMEV (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (RTC_SR) Time Event */
04507 #define RTC_SR_CALEV (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (RTC_SR) Calendar Event */
04508 /* -------- RTC_SCCR : (RTC Offset: 0x1C) Status Clear Command Register -------- */
04509 #define RTC_SCCR_ACKCLR (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (RTC_SCCR) Acknowledge Clear */
04510 #define RTC_SCCR_ALRCLR (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (RTC_SCCR) Alarm Clear */
04511 #define RTC_SCCR_SECCLR (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (RTC_SCCR) Second Clear */
04512 #define RTC_SCCR_TIMCLR (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (RTC_SCCR) Time Clear */
04513 #define RTC_SCCR_CALCLR (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (RTC_SCCR) Calendar Clear */
04514 /* -------- RTC_IER : (RTC Offset: 0x20) Interrupt Enable Register -------- */
04515 #define RTC_IER_ACKEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (RTC_IER) Acknowledge Update Interrupt Enable */
04516 #define RTC_IER_ALREN (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (RTC_IER) Alarm Interrupt Enable */
04517 #define RTC_IER_SECEN (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (RTC_IER) Second Event Interrupt Enable */
04518 #define RTC_IER_TIMEN (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (RTC_IER) Time Event Interrupt Enable */
04519 #define RTC_IER_CALEN (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (RTC_IER) Calendar Event Interrupt Enable */
04520 /* -------- RTC_IDR : (RTC Offset: 0x24) Interrupt Disable Register -------- */
04521 #define RTC_IDR_ACKDIS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (RTC_IDR) Acknowledge Update Interrupt Disable */
04522 #define RTC_IDR_ALRDIS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (RTC_IDR) Alarm Interrupt Disable */
04523 #define RTC_IDR_SECDIS (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (RTC_IDR) Second Event Interrupt Disable */
04524 #define RTC_IDR_TIMDIS (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (RTC_IDR) Time Event Interrupt Disable */
04525 #define RTC_IDR_CALDIS (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (RTC_IDR) Calendar Event Interrupt Disable */
04526 /* -------- RTC_IMR : (RTC Offset: 0x28) Interrupt Mask Register -------- */
04527 #define RTC_IMR_ACK (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (RTC_IMR) Acknowledge Update Interrupt Mask */
04528 #define RTC_IMR_ALR (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (RTC_IMR) Alarm Interrupt Mask */
04529 #define RTC_IMR_SEC (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (RTC_IMR) Second Event Interrupt Mask */
04530 #define RTC_IMR_TIM (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (RTC_IMR) Time Event Interrupt Mask */
04531 #define RTC_IMR_CAL (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (RTC_IMR) Calendar Event Interrupt Mask */
04532 /* -------- RTC_VER : (RTC Offset: 0x2C) Valid Entry Register -------- */
04533 #define RTC_VER_NVTIM (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (RTC_VER) Non-valid Time */
04534 #define RTC_VER_NVCAL (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (RTC_VER) Non-valid Calendar */
04535 #define RTC_VER_NVTIMALR (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (RTC_VER) Non-valid Time Alarm */
04536 #define RTC_VER_NVCALALR (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (RTC_VER) Non-valid Calendar Alarm */
04537 
04538 /*@}*/
04539 
04540 /* ============================================================================= */
04541 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Real-time Timer */
04542 /* ============================================================================= */
04543 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_RTT Real-time Timer */
04544 /*@{*/
04545 
04546 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
04547 /** \brief Rtt hardware registers */
04548 typedef struct {
04549   RwReg RTT_MR; /**< \brief (Rtt Offset: 0x00) Mode Register */
04550   RwReg RTT_AR; /**< \brief (Rtt Offset: 0x04) Alarm Register */
04551   RoReg RTT_VR; /**< \brief (Rtt Offset: 0x08) Value Register */
04552   RoReg RTT_SR; /**< \brief (Rtt Offset: 0x0C) Status Register */
04553 } Rtt;
04554 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
04555 /* -------- RTT_MR : (RTT Offset: 0x00) Mode Register -------- */
04556 #define RTT_MR_RTPRES_Pos 0
04557 #define RTT_MR_RTPRES_Msk (0xffffu << RTT_MR_RTPRES_Pos) /**< \brief (RTT_MR) Real-time Timer Prescaler Value */
04558 #define RTT_MR_RTPRES(value) ((RTT_MR_RTPRES_Msk & ((value) << RTT_MR_RTPRES_Pos)))
04559 #define RTT_MR_ALMIEN (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (RTT_MR) Alarm Interrupt Enable */
04560 #define RTT_MR_RTTINCIEN (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (RTT_MR) Real-time Timer Increment Interrupt Enable */
04561 #define RTT_MR_RTTRST (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (RTT_MR) Real-time Timer Restart */
04562 /* -------- RTT_AR : (RTT Offset: 0x04) Alarm Register -------- */
04563 #define RTT_AR_ALMV_Pos 0
04564 #define RTT_AR_ALMV_Msk (0xffffffffu << RTT_AR_ALMV_Pos) /**< \brief (RTT_AR) Alarm Value */
04565 #define RTT_AR_ALMV(value) ((RTT_AR_ALMV_Msk & ((value) << RTT_AR_ALMV_Pos)))
04566 /* -------- RTT_VR : (RTT Offset: 0x08) Value Register -------- */
04567 #define RTT_VR_CRTV_Pos 0
04568 #define RTT_VR_CRTV_Msk (0xffffffffu << RTT_VR_CRTV_Pos) /**< \brief (RTT_VR) Current Real-time Value */
04569 /* -------- RTT_SR : (RTT Offset: 0x0C) Status Register -------- */
04570 #define RTT_SR_ALMS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (RTT_SR) Real-time Alarm Status */
04571 #define RTT_SR_RTTINC (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (RTT_SR) Real-time Timer Increment */
04572 
04573 /*@}*/
04574 
04575 /* ============================================================================= */
04576 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Static Memory Controller */
04577 /* ============================================================================= */
04578 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_SMC Static Memory Controller */
04579 /*@{*/
04580 
04581 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
04582 /** \brief SmcCs_number hardware registers */
04583 typedef struct {
04584   RwReg         SMC_SETUP;        /**< \brief (SmcCs_number Offset: 0x0) SMC Setup Register */
04585   RwReg         SMC_PULSE;        /**< \brief (SmcCs_number Offset: 0x4) SMC Pulse Register */
04586   RwReg         SMC_CYCLE;        /**< \brief (SmcCs_number Offset: 0x8) SMC Cycle Register */
04587   RwReg         SMC_MODE;         /**< \brief (SmcCs_number Offset: 0xC) SMC Mode Register */
04588 } SmcCs_number;
04589 /** \brief Smc hardware registers */
04590 typedef struct {
04591   SmcCs_number  SMC_CS_NUMBER[5]; /**< \brief (Smc Offset: 0x0) CS_number = 0 .. 4 */
04592   RwReg         Reserved1[12];
04593   RwReg         SMC_OCMS;         /**< \brief (Smc Offset: 0x80) SMC OCMS MODE Register */
04594   WoReg         SMC_KEY1;         /**< \brief (Smc Offset: 0x84) SMC OCMS KEY1 Register */
04595   WoReg         SMC_KEY2;         /**< \brief (Smc Offset: 0x88) SMC OCMS KEY2 Register */
04596   RwReg         Reserved2[22];
04597   RwReg         SMC_WPMR;         /**< \brief (Smc Offset: 0xE4) SMC Write Protect Mode Register */
04598   RoReg         SMC_WPSR;         /**< \brief (Smc Offset: 0xE8) SMC Write Protect Status Register */
04599 } Smc;
04600 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
04601 /* -------- SMC_SETUP : (SMC Offset: N/A) SMC Setup Register -------- */
04602 #define SMC_SETUP_NWE_SETUP_Pos 0
04603 #define SMC_SETUP_NWE_SETUP_Msk (0x3fu << SMC_SETUP_NWE_SETUP_Pos) /**< \brief (SMC_SETUP) NWE Setup Length */
04604 #define SMC_SETUP_NWE_SETUP(value) ((SMC_SETUP_NWE_SETUP_Msk & ((value) << SMC_SETUP_NWE_SETUP_Pos)))
04605 #define SMC_SETUP_NCS_WR_SETUP_Pos 8
04606 #define SMC_SETUP_NCS_WR_SETUP_Msk (0x3fu << SMC_SETUP_NCS_WR_SETUP_Pos) /**< \brief (SMC_SETUP) NCS Setup Length in WRITE Access */
04607 #define SMC_SETUP_NCS_WR_SETUP(value) ((SMC_SETUP_NCS_WR_SETUP_Msk & ((value) << SMC_SETUP_NCS_WR_SETUP_Pos)))
04608 #define SMC_SETUP_NRD_SETUP_Pos 16
04609 #define SMC_SETUP_NRD_SETUP_Msk (0x3fu << SMC_SETUP_NRD_SETUP_Pos) /**< \brief (SMC_SETUP) NRD Setup Length */
04610 #define SMC_SETUP_NRD_SETUP(value) ((SMC_SETUP_NRD_SETUP_Msk & ((value) << SMC_SETUP_NRD_SETUP_Pos)))
04611 #define SMC_SETUP_NCS_RD_SETUP_Pos 24
04612 #define SMC_SETUP_NCS_RD_SETUP_Msk (0x3fu << SMC_SETUP_NCS_RD_SETUP_Pos) /**< \brief (SMC_SETUP) NCS Setup Length in READ Access */
04613 #define SMC_SETUP_NCS_RD_SETUP(value) ((SMC_SETUP_NCS_RD_SETUP_Msk & ((value) << SMC_SETUP_NCS_RD_SETUP_Pos)))
04614 /* -------- SMC_PULSE : (SMC Offset: N/A) SMC Pulse Register -------- */
04615 #define SMC_PULSE_NWE_PULSE_Pos 0
04616 #define SMC_PULSE_NWE_PULSE_Msk (0x7fu << SMC_PULSE_NWE_PULSE_Pos) /**< \brief (SMC_PULSE) NWE Pulse Length */
04617 #define SMC_PULSE_NWE_PULSE(value) ((SMC_PULSE_NWE_PULSE_Msk & ((value) << SMC_PULSE_NWE_PULSE_Pos)))
04618 #define SMC_PULSE_NCS_WR_PULSE_Pos 8
04619 #define SMC_PULSE_NCS_WR_PULSE_Msk (0x7fu << SMC_PULSE_NCS_WR_PULSE_Pos) /**< \brief (SMC_PULSE) NCS Pulse Length in WRITE Access */
04620 #define SMC_PULSE_NCS_WR_PULSE(value) ((SMC_PULSE_NCS_WR_PULSE_Msk & ((value) << SMC_PULSE_NCS_WR_PULSE_Pos)))
04621 #define SMC_PULSE_NRD_PULSE_Pos 16
04622 #define SMC_PULSE_NRD_PULSE_Msk (0x7fu << SMC_PULSE_NRD_PULSE_Pos) /**< \brief (SMC_PULSE) NRD Pulse Length */
04623 #define SMC_PULSE_NRD_PULSE(value) ((SMC_PULSE_NRD_PULSE_Msk & ((value) << SMC_PULSE_NRD_PULSE_Pos)))
04624 #define SMC_PULSE_NCS_RD_PULSE_Pos 24
04625 #define SMC_PULSE_NCS_RD_PULSE_Msk (0x7fu << SMC_PULSE_NCS_RD_PULSE_Pos) /**< \brief (SMC_PULSE) NCS Pulse Length in READ Access */
04626 #define SMC_PULSE_NCS_RD_PULSE(value) ((SMC_PULSE_NCS_RD_PULSE_Msk & ((value) << SMC_PULSE_NCS_RD_PULSE_Pos)))
04627 /* -------- SMC_CYCLE : (SMC Offset: N/A) SMC Cycle Register -------- */
04628 #define SMC_CYCLE_NWE_CYCLE_Pos 0
04629 #define SMC_CYCLE_NWE_CYCLE_Msk (0x1ffu << SMC_CYCLE_NWE_CYCLE_Pos) /**< \brief (SMC_CYCLE) Total Write Cycle Length */
04630 #define SMC_CYCLE_NWE_CYCLE(value) ((SMC_CYCLE_NWE_CYCLE_Msk & ((value) << SMC_CYCLE_NWE_CYCLE_Pos)))
04631 #define SMC_CYCLE_NRD_CYCLE_Pos 16
04632 #define SMC_CYCLE_NRD_CYCLE_Msk (0x1ffu << SMC_CYCLE_NRD_CYCLE_Pos) /**< \brief (SMC_CYCLE) Total Read Cycle Length */
04633 #define SMC_CYCLE_NRD_CYCLE(value) ((SMC_CYCLE_NRD_CYCLE_Msk & ((value) << SMC_CYCLE_NRD_CYCLE_Pos)))
04634 /* -------- SMC_MODE : (SMC Offset: N/A) SMC Mode Register -------- */
04635 #define SMC_MODE_READ_MODE (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SMC_MODE)  */
04636 #define SMC_MODE_WRITE_MODE (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SMC_MODE)  */
04637 #define SMC_MODE_EXNW_MODE_Pos 4
04638 #define SMC_MODE_EXNW_MODE_Msk (0x3u << SMC_MODE_EXNW_MODE_Pos) /**< \brief (SMC_MODE) NWAIT Mode */
04639 #define   SMC_MODE_EXNW_MODE_DISABLED (0x0u << 4) /**< \brief (SMC_MODE) Disabled */
04640 #define   SMC_MODE_EXNW_MODE_FROZEN (0x2u << 4) /**< \brief (SMC_MODE) Frozen Mode */
04641 #define   SMC_MODE_EXNW_MODE_READY (0x3u << 4) /**< \brief (SMC_MODE) Ready Mode */
04642 #define SMC_MODE_DBW_Pos 12
04643 #define SMC_MODE_DBW_Msk (0x3u << SMC_MODE_DBW_Pos) /**< \brief (SMC_MODE) Data Bus Width */
04644 #define   SMC_MODE_DBW_8_BIT (0x0u << 12) /**< \brief (SMC_MODE) 8-bit bus */
04645 #define   SMC_MODE_DBW_16_BIT (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (SMC_MODE) 16-bit bus */
04646 #define   SMC_MODE_DBW_32_BIT (0x2u << 12) /**< \brief (SMC_MODE) 32-bit bus */
04647 #define SMC_MODE_TDF_CYCLES_Pos 16
04648 #define SMC_MODE_TDF_CYCLES_Msk (0xfu << SMC_MODE_TDF_CYCLES_Pos) /**< \brief (SMC_MODE) Data Float Time */
04649 #define SMC_MODE_TDF_CYCLES(value) ((SMC_MODE_TDF_CYCLES_Msk & ((value) << SMC_MODE_TDF_CYCLES_Pos)))
04650 #define SMC_MODE_TDF_MODE (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (SMC_MODE) TDF Optimization */
04651 #define SMC_MODE_PMEN (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (SMC_MODE) Page Mode Enabled */
04652 #define SMC_MODE_PS_Pos 28
04653 #define SMC_MODE_PS_Msk (0x3u << SMC_MODE_PS_Pos) /**< \brief (SMC_MODE) Page Size */
04654 #define   SMC_MODE_PS_4_BYTE (0x0u << 28) /**< \brief (SMC_MODE) 4-byte page */
04655 #define   SMC_MODE_PS_8_BYTE (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (SMC_MODE) 8-byte page */
04656 #define   SMC_MODE_PS_16_BYTE (0x2u << 28) /**< \brief (SMC_MODE) 16-byte page */
04657 #define   SMC_MODE_PS_32_BYTE (0x3u << 28) /**< \brief (SMC_MODE) 32-byte page */
04658 /* -------- SMC_OCMS : (SMC Offset: 0x80) SMC OCMS MODE Register -------- */
04659 #define SMC_OCMS_SMSE (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SMC_OCMS) Static Memory Controller Scrambling Enable */
04660 #define SMC_OCMS_CS0SE (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (SMC_OCMS) Chip Select (x = 0 to 3) Scrambling Enable */
04661 #define SMC_OCMS_CS1SE (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (SMC_OCMS) Chip Select (x = 0 to 3) Scrambling Enable */
04662 #define SMC_OCMS_CS2SE (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (SMC_OCMS) Chip Select (x = 0 to 3) Scrambling Enable */
04663 #define SMC_OCMS_CS3SE (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (SMC_OCMS) Chip Select (x = 0 to 3) Scrambling Enable */
04664 /* -------- SMC_KEY1 : (SMC Offset: 0x84) SMC OCMS KEY1 Register -------- */
04665 #define SMC_KEY1_KEY1_Pos 0
04666 #define SMC_KEY1_KEY1_Msk (0xffffffffu << SMC_KEY1_KEY1_Pos) /**< \brief (SMC_KEY1) Off Chip Memory Scrambling (OCMS) Key Part 1 */
04667 #define SMC_KEY1_KEY1(value) ((SMC_KEY1_KEY1_Msk & ((value) << SMC_KEY1_KEY1_Pos)))
04668 /* -------- SMC_KEY2 : (SMC Offset: 0x88) SMC OCMS KEY2 Register -------- */
04669 #define SMC_KEY2_KEY2_Pos 0
04670 #define SMC_KEY2_KEY2_Msk (0xffffffffu << SMC_KEY2_KEY2_Pos) /**< \brief (SMC_KEY2) Off Chip Memory Scrambling (OCMS) Key Part 2 */
04671 #define SMC_KEY2_KEY2(value) ((SMC_KEY2_KEY2_Msk & ((value) << SMC_KEY2_KEY2_Pos)))
04672 /* -------- SMC_WPMR : (SMC Offset: 0xE4) SMC Write Protect Mode Register -------- */
04673 #define SMC_WPMR_WPEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SMC_WPMR) Write Protect Enable */
04674 #define SMC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos 8
04675 #define SMC_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk (0xffffffu << SMC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos) /**< \brief (SMC_WPMR) Write Protect KEY */
04676 #define SMC_WPMR_WPKEY(value) ((SMC_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk & ((value) << SMC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos)))
04677 /* -------- SMC_WPSR : (SMC Offset: 0xE8) SMC Write Protect Status Register -------- */
04678 #define SMC_WPSR_WPVS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SMC_WPSR) Write Protect Enable */
04679 #define SMC_WPSR_WPVSRC_Pos 8
04680 #define SMC_WPSR_WPVSRC_Msk (0xffffu << SMC_WPSR_WPVSRC_Pos) /**< \brief (SMC_WPSR) Write Protect Violation Source */
04681 
04682 /*@}*/
04683 
04684 /* ============================================================================= */
04685 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Serial Peripheral Interface */
04686 /* ============================================================================= */
04687 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_SPI Serial Peripheral Interface */
04688 /*@{*/
04689 
04690 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
04691 /** \brief Spi hardware registers */
04692 typedef struct {
04693   WoReg SPI_CR;        /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x00) Control Register */
04694   RwReg SPI_MR;        /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x04) Mode Register */
04695   RoReg SPI_RDR;       /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x08) Receive Data Register */
04696   WoReg SPI_TDR;       /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x0C) Transmit Data Register */
04697   RoReg SPI_SR;        /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x10) Status Register */
04698   WoReg SPI_IER;       /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x14) Interrupt Enable Register */
04699   WoReg SPI_IDR;       /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x18) Interrupt Disable Register */
04700   RoReg SPI_IMR;       /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x1C) Interrupt Mask Register */
04701   RwReg Reserved1[4];
04702   RwReg SPI_CSR[4];    /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x30) Chip Select Register */
04703   RwReg Reserved2[41];
04704   RwReg SPI_WPMR;      /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0xE4) Write Protection Control Register */
04705   RoReg SPI_WPSR;      /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0xE8) Write Protection Status Register */
04706   RwReg Reserved3[5];
04707   RwReg SPI_RPR;       /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register */
04708   RwReg SPI_RCR;       /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register */
04709   RwReg SPI_TPR;       /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register */
04710   RwReg SPI_TCR;       /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register */
04711   RwReg SPI_RNPR;      /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register */
04712   RwReg SPI_RNCR;      /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register */
04713   RwReg SPI_TNPR;      /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register */
04714   RwReg SPI_TNCR;      /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register */
04715   WoReg SPI_PTCR;      /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register */
04716   RoReg SPI_PTSR;      /**< \brief (Spi Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register */
04717 } Spi;
04718 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
04719 /* -------- SPI_CR : (SPI Offset: 0x00) Control Register -------- */
04720 #define SPI_CR_SPIEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SPI_CR) SPI Enable */
04721 #define SPI_CR_SPIDIS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SPI_CR) SPI Disable */
04722 #define SPI_CR_SWRST (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (SPI_CR) SPI Software Reset */
04723 #define SPI_CR_LASTXFER (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (SPI_CR) Last Transfer */
04724 /* -------- SPI_MR : (SPI Offset: 0x04) Mode Register -------- */
04725 #define SPI_MR_MSTR (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SPI_MR) Master/Slave Mode */
04726 #define SPI_MR_PS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SPI_MR) Peripheral Select */
04727 #define SPI_MR_PCSDEC (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SPI_MR) Chip Select Decode */
04728 #define SPI_MR_MODFDIS (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (SPI_MR) Mode Fault Detection */
04729 #define SPI_MR_WDRBT (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (SPI_MR) Wait Data Read Before Transfer */
04730 #define SPI_MR_LLB (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (SPI_MR) Local Loopback Enable */
04731 #define SPI_MR_PCS_Pos 16
04732 #define SPI_MR_PCS_Msk (0xfu << SPI_MR_PCS_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_MR) Peripheral Chip Select */
04733 #define SPI_MR_PCS(value) ((SPI_MR_PCS_Msk & ((value) << SPI_MR_PCS_Pos)))
04734 #define SPI_MR_DLYBCS_Pos 24
04735 #define SPI_MR_DLYBCS_Msk (0xffu << SPI_MR_DLYBCS_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_MR) Delay Between Chip Selects */
04736 #define SPI_MR_DLYBCS(value) ((SPI_MR_DLYBCS_Msk & ((value) << SPI_MR_DLYBCS_Pos)))
04737 /* -------- SPI_RDR : (SPI Offset: 0x08) Receive Data Register -------- */
04738 #define SPI_RDR_RD_Pos 0
04739 #define SPI_RDR_RD_Msk (0xffffu << SPI_RDR_RD_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_RDR) Receive Data */
04740 #define SPI_RDR_PCS_Pos 16
04741 #define SPI_RDR_PCS_Msk (0xfu << SPI_RDR_PCS_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_RDR) Peripheral Chip Select */
04742 /* -------- SPI_TDR : (SPI Offset: 0x0C) Transmit Data Register -------- */
04743 #define SPI_TDR_TD_Pos 0
04744 #define SPI_TDR_TD_Msk (0xffffu << SPI_TDR_TD_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_TDR) Transmit Data */
04745 #define SPI_TDR_TD(value) ((SPI_TDR_TD_Msk & ((value) << SPI_TDR_TD_Pos)))
04746 #define SPI_TDR_PCS_Pos 16
04747 #define SPI_TDR_PCS_Msk (0xfu << SPI_TDR_PCS_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_TDR) Peripheral Chip Select */
04748 #define SPI_TDR_PCS(value) ((SPI_TDR_PCS_Msk & ((value) << SPI_TDR_PCS_Pos)))
04749 #define SPI_TDR_LASTXFER (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (SPI_TDR) Last Transfer */
04750 /* -------- SPI_SR : (SPI Offset: 0x10) Status Register -------- */
04751 #define SPI_SR_RDRF (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SPI_SR) Receive Data Register Full */
04752 #define SPI_SR_TDRE (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SPI_SR) Transmit Data Register Empty */
04753 #define SPI_SR_MODF (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SPI_SR) Mode Fault Error */
04754 #define SPI_SR_OVRES (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (SPI_SR) Overrun Error Status */
04755 #define SPI_SR_ENDRX (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (SPI_SR) End of RX buffer */
04756 #define SPI_SR_ENDTX (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (SPI_SR) End of TX buffer */
04757 #define SPI_SR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (SPI_SR) RX Buffer Full */
04758 #define SPI_SR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (SPI_SR) TX Buffer Empty */
04759 #define SPI_SR_NSSR (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (SPI_SR) NSS Rising */
04760 #define SPI_SR_TXEMPTY (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (SPI_SR) Transmission Registers Empty */
04761 #define SPI_SR_UNDES (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (SPI_SR) Underrun Error Status (Slave Mode Only) */
04762 #define SPI_SR_SPIENS (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (SPI_SR) SPI Enable Status */
04763 /* -------- SPI_IER : (SPI Offset: 0x14) Interrupt Enable Register -------- */
04764 #define SPI_IER_RDRF (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SPI_IER) Receive Data Register Full Interrupt Enable */
04765 #define SPI_IER_TDRE (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SPI_IER) SPI Transmit Data Register Empty Interrupt Enable */
04766 #define SPI_IER_MODF (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SPI_IER) Mode Fault Error Interrupt Enable */
04767 #define SPI_IER_OVRES (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (SPI_IER) Overrun Error Interrupt Enable */
04768 #define SPI_IER_ENDRX (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (SPI_IER) End of Receive Buffer Interrupt Enable */
04769 #define SPI_IER_ENDTX (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (SPI_IER) End of Transmit Buffer Interrupt Enable */
04770 #define SPI_IER_RXBUFF (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (SPI_IER) Receive Buffer Full Interrupt Enable */
04771 #define SPI_IER_TXBUFE (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (SPI_IER) Transmit Buffer Empty Interrupt Enable */
04772 #define SPI_IER_NSSR (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (SPI_IER) NSS Rising Interrupt Enable */
04773 #define SPI_IER_TXEMPTY (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (SPI_IER) Transmission Registers Empty Enable */
04774 #define SPI_IER_UNDES (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (SPI_IER) Underrun Error Interrupt Enable */
04775 /* -------- SPI_IDR : (SPI Offset: 0x18) Interrupt Disable Register -------- */
04776 #define SPI_IDR_RDRF (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SPI_IDR) Receive Data Register Full Interrupt Disable */
04777 #define SPI_IDR_TDRE (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SPI_IDR) SPI Transmit Data Register Empty Interrupt Disable */
04778 #define SPI_IDR_MODF (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SPI_IDR) Mode Fault Error Interrupt Disable */
04779 #define SPI_IDR_OVRES (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (SPI_IDR) Overrun Error Interrupt Disable */
04780 #define SPI_IDR_ENDRX (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (SPI_IDR) End of Receive Buffer Interrupt Disable */
04781 #define SPI_IDR_ENDTX (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (SPI_IDR) End of Transmit Buffer Interrupt Disable */
04782 #define SPI_IDR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (SPI_IDR) Receive Buffer Full Interrupt Disable */
04783 #define SPI_IDR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (SPI_IDR) Transmit Buffer Empty Interrupt Disable */
04784 #define SPI_IDR_NSSR (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (SPI_IDR) NSS Rising Interrupt Disable */
04785 #define SPI_IDR_TXEMPTY (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (SPI_IDR) Transmission Registers Empty Disable */
04786 #define SPI_IDR_UNDES (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (SPI_IDR) Underrun Error Interrupt Disable */
04787 /* -------- SPI_IMR : (SPI Offset: 0x1C) Interrupt Mask Register -------- */
04788 #define SPI_IMR_RDRF (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SPI_IMR) Receive Data Register Full Interrupt Mask */
04789 #define SPI_IMR_TDRE (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SPI_IMR) SPI Transmit Data Register Empty Interrupt Mask */
04790 #define SPI_IMR_MODF (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SPI_IMR) Mode Fault Error Interrupt Mask */
04791 #define SPI_IMR_OVRES (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (SPI_IMR) Overrun Error Interrupt Mask */
04792 #define SPI_IMR_ENDRX (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (SPI_IMR) End of Receive Buffer Interrupt Mask */
04793 #define SPI_IMR_ENDTX (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (SPI_IMR) End of Transmit Buffer Interrupt Mask */
04794 #define SPI_IMR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (SPI_IMR) Receive Buffer Full Interrupt Mask */
04795 #define SPI_IMR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (SPI_IMR) Transmit Buffer Empty Interrupt Mask */
04796 #define SPI_IMR_NSSR (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (SPI_IMR) NSS Rising Interrupt Mask */
04797 #define SPI_IMR_TXEMPTY (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (SPI_IMR) Transmission Registers Empty Mask */
04798 #define SPI_IMR_UNDES (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (SPI_IMR) Underrun Error Interrupt Mask */
04799 /* -------- SPI_CSR[4] : (SPI Offset: 0x30) Chip Select Register -------- */
04800 #define SPI_CSR_CPOL (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SPI_CSR[4]) Clock Polarity */
04801 #define SPI_CSR_NCPHA (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SPI_CSR[4]) Clock Phase */
04802 #define SPI_CSR_CSNAAT (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SPI_CSR[4]) Chip Select Not Active After Transfer (Ignored if CSAAT = 1) */
04803 #define SPI_CSR_CSAAT (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (SPI_CSR[4]) Chip Select Not Active After Transfer (Ignored if CSAAT = 1) */
04804 #define SPI_CSR_BITS_Pos 4
04805 #define SPI_CSR_BITS_Msk (0xfu << SPI_CSR_BITS_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_CSR[4]) Bits Per Transfer */
04806 #define   SPI_CSR_BITS_8_BIT (0x0u << 4) /**< \brief (SPI_CSR[4]) 8_bits for transfer */
04807 #define   SPI_CSR_BITS_9_BIT (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (SPI_CSR[4]) 9_bits for transfer */
04808 #define   SPI_CSR_BITS_10_BIT (0x2u << 4) /**< \brief (SPI_CSR[4]) 8_bits for transfer */
04809 #define   SPI_CSR_BITS_11_BIT (0x3u << 4) /**< \brief (SPI_CSR[4]) 8_bits for transfer */
04810 #define   SPI_CSR_BITS_12_BIT (0x4u << 4) /**< \brief (SPI_CSR[4]) 8_bits for transfer */
04811 #define   SPI_CSR_BITS_13_BIT (0x5u << 4) /**< \brief (SPI_CSR[4]) 8_bits for transfer */
04812 #define   SPI_CSR_BITS_14_BIT (0x6u << 4) /**< \brief (SPI_CSR[4]) 8_bits for transfer */
04813 #define   SPI_CSR_BITS_15_BIT (0x7u << 4) /**< \brief (SPI_CSR[4]) 8_bits for transfer */
04814 #define   SPI_CSR_BITS_16_BIT (0x8u << 4) /**< \brief (SPI_CSR[4]) 8_bits for transfer */
04815 #define SPI_CSR_SCBR_Pos 8
04816 #define SPI_CSR_SCBR_Msk (0xffu << SPI_CSR_SCBR_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_CSR[4]) Serial Clock Baud Rate */
04817 #define SPI_CSR_SCBR(value) ((SPI_CSR_SCBR_Msk & ((value) << SPI_CSR_SCBR_Pos)))
04818 #define SPI_CSR_DLYBS_Pos 16
04819 #define SPI_CSR_DLYBS_Msk (0xffu << SPI_CSR_DLYBS_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_CSR[4]) Delay Before SPCK */
04820 #define SPI_CSR_DLYBS(value) ((SPI_CSR_DLYBS_Msk & ((value) << SPI_CSR_DLYBS_Pos)))
04821 #define SPI_CSR_DLYBCT_Pos 24
04822 #define SPI_CSR_DLYBCT_Msk (0xffu << SPI_CSR_DLYBCT_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_CSR[4]) Delay Between Consecutive Transfers */
04823 #define SPI_CSR_DLYBCT(value) ((SPI_CSR_DLYBCT_Msk & ((value) << SPI_CSR_DLYBCT_Pos)))
04824 /* -------- SPI_WPMR : (SPI Offset: 0xE4) Write Protection Control Register -------- */
04825 #define SPI_WPMR_SPIWPEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SPI_WPMR) SPI Write Protection Enable */
04826 #define SPI_WPMR_SPIWPKEY_Pos 8
04827 #define SPI_WPMR_SPIWPKEY_Msk (0xffffffu << SPI_WPMR_SPIWPKEY_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_WPMR) SPI Write Protection Key Password */
04828 #define SPI_WPMR_SPIWPKEY(value) ((SPI_WPMR_SPIWPKEY_Msk & ((value) << SPI_WPMR_SPIWPKEY_Pos)))
04829 /* -------- SPI_WPSR : (SPI Offset: 0xE8) Write Protection Status Register -------- */
04830 #define SPI_WPSR_SPIWPVS_Pos 0
04831 #define SPI_WPSR_SPIWPVS_Msk (0x7u << SPI_WPSR_SPIWPVS_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_WPSR) SPI Write Protection Violation Status */
04832 #define SPI_WPSR_SPIWPVSRC_Pos 8
04833 #define SPI_WPSR_SPIWPVSRC_Msk (0xffu << SPI_WPSR_SPIWPVSRC_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_WPSR) SPI Write Protection Violation Source */
04834 /* -------- SPI_RPR : (SPI Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register -------- */
04835 #define SPI_RPR_RXPTR_Pos 0
04836 #define SPI_RPR_RXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << SPI_RPR_RXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_RPR) Receive Pointer Register */
04837 #define SPI_RPR_RXPTR(value) ((SPI_RPR_RXPTR_Msk & ((value) << SPI_RPR_RXPTR_Pos)))
04838 /* -------- SPI_RCR : (SPI Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register -------- */
04839 #define SPI_RCR_RXCTR_Pos 0
04840 #define SPI_RCR_RXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << SPI_RCR_RXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_RCR) Receive Counter Register */
04841 #define SPI_RCR_RXCTR(value) ((SPI_RCR_RXCTR_Msk & ((value) << SPI_RCR_RXCTR_Pos)))
04842 /* -------- SPI_TPR : (SPI Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register -------- */
04843 #define SPI_TPR_TXPTR_Pos 0
04844 #define SPI_TPR_TXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << SPI_TPR_TXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_TPR) Transmit Counter Register */
04845 #define SPI_TPR_TXPTR(value) ((SPI_TPR_TXPTR_Msk & ((value) << SPI_TPR_TXPTR_Pos)))
04846 /* -------- SPI_TCR : (SPI Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register -------- */
04847 #define SPI_TCR_TXCTR_Pos 0
04848 #define SPI_TCR_TXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << SPI_TCR_TXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_TCR) Transmit Counter Register */
04849 #define SPI_TCR_TXCTR(value) ((SPI_TCR_TXCTR_Msk & ((value) << SPI_TCR_TXCTR_Pos)))
04850 /* -------- SPI_RNPR : (SPI Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register -------- */
04851 #define SPI_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos 0
04852 #define SPI_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << SPI_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_RNPR) Receive Next Pointer */
04853 #define SPI_RNPR_RXNPTR(value) ((SPI_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << SPI_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos)))
04854 /* -------- SPI_RNCR : (SPI Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register -------- */
04855 #define SPI_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos 0
04856 #define SPI_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << SPI_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_RNCR) Receive Next Counter */
04857 #define SPI_RNCR_RXNCTR(value) ((SPI_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << SPI_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos)))
04858 /* -------- SPI_TNPR : (SPI Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register -------- */
04859 #define SPI_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos 0
04860 #define SPI_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << SPI_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_TNPR) Transmit Next Pointer */
04861 #define SPI_TNPR_TXNPTR(value) ((SPI_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << SPI_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos)))
04862 /* -------- SPI_TNCR : (SPI Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register -------- */
04863 #define SPI_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos 0
04864 #define SPI_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << SPI_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (SPI_TNCR) Transmit Counter Next */
04865 #define SPI_TNCR_TXNCTR(value) ((SPI_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << SPI_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos)))
04866 /* -------- SPI_PTCR : (SPI Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register -------- */
04867 #define SPI_PTCR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SPI_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
04868 #define SPI_PTCR_RXTDIS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SPI_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Disable */
04869 #define SPI_PTCR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (SPI_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
04870 #define SPI_PTCR_TXTDIS (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (SPI_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Disable */
04871 /* -------- SPI_PTSR : (SPI Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register -------- */
04872 #define SPI_PTSR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SPI_PTSR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
04873 #define SPI_PTSR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (SPI_PTSR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
04874 
04875 /*@}*/
04876 
04877 /* ============================================================================= */
04878 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Synchronous Serial Controller */
04879 /* ============================================================================= */
04880 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_SSC Synchronous Serial Controller */
04881 /*@{*/
04882 
04883 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
04884 /** \brief Ssc hardware registers */
04885 typedef struct {
04886   WoReg SSC_CR;        /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x0) Control Register */
04887   RwReg SSC_CMR;       /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x4) Clock Mode Register */
04888   RwReg Reserved1[2];
04889   RwReg SSC_RCMR;      /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x10) Receive Clock Mode Register */
04890   RwReg SSC_RFMR;      /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x14) Receive Frame Mode Register */
04891   RwReg SSC_TCMR;      /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x18) Transmit Clock Mode Register */
04892   RwReg SSC_TFMR;      /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x1C) Transmit Frame Mode Register */
04893   RoReg SSC_RHR;       /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x20) Receive Holding Register */
04894   WoReg SSC_THR;       /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x24) Transmit Holding Register */
04895   RwReg Reserved2[2];
04896   RoReg SSC_RSHR;      /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x30) Receive Sync. Holding Register */
04897   RwReg SSC_TSHR;      /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x34) Transmit Sync. Holding Register */
04898   RwReg SSC_RC0R;      /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x38) Receive Compare 0 Register */
04899   RwReg SSC_RC1R;      /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x3C) Receive Compare 1 Register */
04900   RoReg SSC_SR;        /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x40) Status Register */
04901   WoReg SSC_IER;       /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x44) Interrupt Enable Register */
04902   WoReg SSC_IDR;       /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x48) Interrupt Disable Register */
04903   RoReg SSC_IMR;       /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x4C) Interrupt Mask Register */
04904   RwReg Reserved3[37];
04905   RwReg SSC_WPMR;      /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0xE4) Write Protect Mode Register */
04906   RoReg SSC_WPSR;      /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0xE8) Write Protect Status Register */
04907   RwReg Reserved4[5];
04908   RwReg SSC_RPR;       /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register */
04909   RwReg SSC_RCR;       /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register */
04910   RwReg SSC_TPR;       /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register */
04911   RwReg SSC_TCR;       /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register */
04912   RwReg SSC_RNPR;      /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register */
04913   RwReg SSC_RNCR;      /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register */
04914   RwReg SSC_TNPR;      /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register */
04915   RwReg SSC_TNCR;      /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register */
04916   WoReg SSC_PTCR;      /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register */
04917   RoReg SSC_PTSR;      /**< \brief (Ssc Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register */
04918 } Ssc;
04919 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
04920 /* -------- SSC_CR : (SSC Offset: 0x0) Control Register -------- */
04921 #define SSC_CR_RXEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SSC_CR) Receive Enable */
04922 #define SSC_CR_RXDIS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SSC_CR) Receive Disable */
04923 #define SSC_CR_TXEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_CR) Transmit Enable */
04924 #define SSC_CR_TXDIS (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (SSC_CR) Transmit Disable */
04925 #define SSC_CR_SWRST (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (SSC_CR) Software Reset */
04926 /* -------- SSC_CMR : (SSC Offset: 0x4) Clock Mode Register -------- */
04927 #define SSC_CMR_DIV_Pos 0
04928 #define SSC_CMR_DIV_Msk (0xfffu << SSC_CMR_DIV_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_CMR) Clock Divider */
04929 #define SSC_CMR_DIV(value) ((SSC_CMR_DIV_Msk & ((value) << SSC_CMR_DIV_Pos)))
04930 /* -------- SSC_RCMR : (SSC Offset: 0x10) Receive Clock Mode Register -------- */
04931 #define SSC_RCMR_CKS_Pos 0
04932 #define SSC_RCMR_CKS_Msk (0x3u << SSC_RCMR_CKS_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Receive Clock Selection */
04933 #define   SSC_RCMR_CKS_MCK (0x0u << 0) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Divided Clock */
04934 #define   SSC_RCMR_CKS_TK (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) TK Clock signal */
04935 #define   SSC_RCMR_CKS_RK (0x2u << 0) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) RK pin */
04936 #define SSC_RCMR_CKO_Pos 2
04937 #define SSC_RCMR_CKO_Msk (0x7u << SSC_RCMR_CKO_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Receive Clock Output Mode Selection */
04938 #define   SSC_RCMR_CKO_NONE (0x0u << 2) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) None */
04939 #define   SSC_RCMR_CKO_CONTINUOUS (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Continuous Receive Clock */
04940 #define   SSC_RCMR_CKO_TRANSFER (0x2u << 2) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Receive Clock only during data transfers */
04941 #define SSC_RCMR_CKI (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Receive Clock Inversion */
04942 #define SSC_RCMR_CKG_Pos 6
04943 #define SSC_RCMR_CKG_Msk (0x3u << SSC_RCMR_CKG_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Receive Clock Gating Selection */
04944 #define   SSC_RCMR_CKG_NONE (0x0u << 6) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) None */
04945 #define   SSC_RCMR_CKG_CONTINUOUS (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Continuous Receive Clock */
04946 #define   SSC_RCMR_CKG_TRANSFER (0x2u << 6) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Receive Clock only during data transfers */
04947 #define SSC_RCMR_START_Pos 8
04948 #define SSC_RCMR_START_Msk (0xfu << SSC_RCMR_START_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Receive Start Selection */
04949 #define   SSC_RCMR_START_CONTINUOUS (0x0u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Continuous, as soon as the receiver is enabled, and immediately after the end of transfer of the previous data. */
04950 #define   SSC_RCMR_START_TRANSMIT (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Transmit start */
04951 #define   SSC_RCMR_START_RF_LOW (0x2u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Detection of a low level on RF signal */
04952 #define   SSC_RCMR_START_RF_HIGH (0x3u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Detection of a high level on RF signal */
04953 #define   SSC_RCMR_START_RF_FALLING (0x4u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Detection of a falling edge on RF signal */
04954 #define   SSC_RCMR_START_RF_RISING (0x5u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Detection of a rising edge on RF signal */
04955 #define   SSC_RCMR_START_RF_LEVEL (0x6u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Detection of any level change on RF signal */
04956 #define   SSC_RCMR_START_RF_EDGE (0x7u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Detection of any edge on RF signal */
04957 #define   SSC_RCMR_START_CMP_0 (0x8u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Compare 0 */
04958 #define SSC_RCMR_STOP (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Receive Stop Selection */
04959 #define SSC_RCMR_STTDLY_Pos 16
04960 #define SSC_RCMR_STTDLY_Msk (0xffu << SSC_RCMR_STTDLY_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Receive Start Delay */
04961 #define SSC_RCMR_STTDLY(value) ((SSC_RCMR_STTDLY_Msk & ((value) << SSC_RCMR_STTDLY_Pos)))
04962 #define SSC_RCMR_PERIOD_Pos 24
04963 #define SSC_RCMR_PERIOD_Msk (0xffu << SSC_RCMR_PERIOD_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RCMR) Receive Period Divider Selection */
04964 #define SSC_RCMR_PERIOD(value) ((SSC_RCMR_PERIOD_Msk & ((value) << SSC_RCMR_PERIOD_Pos)))
04965 /* -------- SSC_RFMR : (SSC Offset: 0x14) Receive Frame Mode Register -------- */
04966 #define SSC_RFMR_DATLEN_Pos 0
04967 #define SSC_RFMR_DATLEN_Msk (0x1fu << SSC_RFMR_DATLEN_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RFMR) Data Length */
04968 #define SSC_RFMR_DATLEN(value) ((SSC_RFMR_DATLEN_Msk & ((value) << SSC_RFMR_DATLEN_Pos)))
04969 #define SSC_RFMR_LOOP (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (SSC_RFMR) Loop Mode */
04970 #define SSC_RFMR_MSBF (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (SSC_RFMR) Most Significant Bit First */
04971 #define SSC_RFMR_DATNB_Pos 8
04972 #define SSC_RFMR_DATNB_Msk (0xfu << SSC_RFMR_DATNB_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RFMR) Data Number per Frame */
04973 #define SSC_RFMR_DATNB(value) ((SSC_RFMR_DATNB_Msk & ((value) << SSC_RFMR_DATNB_Pos)))
04974 #define SSC_RFMR_FSLEN_Pos 16
04975 #define SSC_RFMR_FSLEN_Msk (0xfu << SSC_RFMR_FSLEN_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RFMR) Receive Frame Sync Length */
04976 #define SSC_RFMR_FSLEN(value) ((SSC_RFMR_FSLEN_Msk & ((value) << SSC_RFMR_FSLEN_Pos)))
04977 #define SSC_RFMR_FSOS_Pos 20
04978 #define SSC_RFMR_FSOS_Msk (0x7u << SSC_RFMR_FSOS_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RFMR) Receive Frame Sync Output Selection */
04979 #define   SSC_RFMR_FSOS_NONE (0x0u << 20) /**< \brief (SSC_RFMR) None */
04980 #define   SSC_RFMR_FSOS_NEGATIVE (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (SSC_RFMR) Negative Pulse */
04981 #define   SSC_RFMR_FSOS_POSITIVE (0x2u << 20) /**< \brief (SSC_RFMR) Positive Pulse */
04982 #define   SSC_RFMR_FSOS_LOW (0x3u << 20) /**< \brief (SSC_RFMR) Driven Low during data transfer */
04983 #define   SSC_RFMR_FSOS_HIGH (0x4u << 20) /**< \brief (SSC_RFMR) Driven High during data transfer */
04984 #define   SSC_RFMR_FSOS_TOGGLING (0x5u << 20) /**< \brief (SSC_RFMR) Toggling at each start of data transfer */
04985 #define SSC_RFMR_FSEDGE (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (SSC_RFMR) Frame Sync Edge Detection */
04986 #define   SSC_RFMR_FSEDGE_POSITIVE (0x0u << 24) /**< \brief (SSC_RFMR) Positive Edge Detection */
04987 #define   SSC_RFMR_FSEDGE_NEGATIVE (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (SSC_RFMR) Negative Edge Detection */
04988 #define SSC_RFMR_FSLEN_EXT_Pos 28
04989 #define SSC_RFMR_FSLEN_EXT_Msk (0xfu << SSC_RFMR_FSLEN_EXT_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RFMR) FSLEN Field Extension */
04990 #define SSC_RFMR_FSLEN_EXT(value) ((SSC_RFMR_FSLEN_EXT_Msk & ((value) << SSC_RFMR_FSLEN_EXT_Pos)))
04991 /* -------- SSC_TCMR : (SSC Offset: 0x18) Transmit Clock Mode Register -------- */
04992 #define SSC_TCMR_CKS_Pos 0
04993 #define SSC_TCMR_CKS_Msk (0x3u << SSC_TCMR_CKS_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Transmit Clock Selection */
04994 #define   SSC_TCMR_CKS_MCK (0x0u << 0) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Divided Clock */
04995 #define   SSC_TCMR_CKS_TK (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) TK Clock signal */
04996 #define   SSC_TCMR_CKS_RK (0x2u << 0) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) RK pin */
04997 #define SSC_TCMR_CKO_Pos 2
04998 #define SSC_TCMR_CKO_Msk (0x7u << SSC_TCMR_CKO_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Transmit Clock Output Mode Selection */
04999 #define   SSC_TCMR_CKO_NONE (0x0u << 2) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) None */
05000 #define   SSC_TCMR_CKO_CONTINUOUS (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Continuous Receive Clock */
05001 #define   SSC_TCMR_CKO_TRANSFER (0x2u << 2) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Transmit Clock only during data transfers */
05002 #define SSC_TCMR_CKI (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Transmit Clock Inversion */
05003 #define SSC_TCMR_CKG_Pos 6
05004 #define SSC_TCMR_CKG_Msk (0x3u << SSC_TCMR_CKG_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Transmit Clock Gating Selection */
05005 #define   SSC_TCMR_CKG_NONE (0x0u << 6) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) None */
05006 #define   SSC_TCMR_CKG_CONTINUOUS (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Transmit Clock enabled only if TF Low */
05007 #define   SSC_TCMR_CKG_TRANSFER (0x2u << 6) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Transmit Clock enabled only if TF High */
05008 #define SSC_TCMR_START_Pos 8
05009 #define SSC_TCMR_START_Msk (0xfu << SSC_TCMR_START_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Transmit Start Selection */
05010 #define   SSC_TCMR_START_CONTINUOUS (0x0u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Continuous, as soon as a word is written in the SSC_THR Register (if Transmit is enabled), and immediately after the end of transfer of the previous data. */
05011 #define   SSC_TCMR_START_RECEIVE (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Receive start */
05012 #define   SSC_TCMR_START_RF_LOW (0x2u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Detection of a low level on TF signal */
05013 #define   SSC_TCMR_START_RF_HIGH (0x3u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Detection of a high level on TF signal */
05014 #define   SSC_TCMR_START_RF_FALLING (0x4u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Detection of a falling edge on TF signal */
05015 #define   SSC_TCMR_START_RF_RISING (0x5u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Detection of a rising edge on TF signal */
05016 #define   SSC_TCMR_START_RF_LEVEL (0x6u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Detection of any level change on TF signal */
05017 #define   SSC_TCMR_START_RF_EDGE (0x7u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Detection of any edge on TF signal */
05018 #define   SSC_TCMR_START_CMP_0 (0x8u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Compare 0 */
05019 #define SSC_TCMR_STTDLY_Pos 16
05020 #define SSC_TCMR_STTDLY_Msk (0xffu << SSC_TCMR_STTDLY_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Transmit Start Delay */
05021 #define SSC_TCMR_STTDLY(value) ((SSC_TCMR_STTDLY_Msk & ((value) << SSC_TCMR_STTDLY_Pos)))
05022 #define SSC_TCMR_PERIOD_Pos 24
05023 #define SSC_TCMR_PERIOD_Msk (0xffu << SSC_TCMR_PERIOD_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_TCMR) Transmit Period Divider Selection */
05024 #define SSC_TCMR_PERIOD(value) ((SSC_TCMR_PERIOD_Msk & ((value) << SSC_TCMR_PERIOD_Pos)))
05025 /* -------- SSC_TFMR : (SSC Offset: 0x1C) Transmit Frame Mode Register -------- */
05026 #define SSC_TFMR_DATLEN_Pos 0
05027 #define SSC_TFMR_DATLEN_Msk (0x1fu << SSC_TFMR_DATLEN_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_TFMR) Data Length */
05028 #define SSC_TFMR_DATLEN(value) ((SSC_TFMR_DATLEN_Msk & ((value) << SSC_TFMR_DATLEN_Pos)))
05029 #define SSC_TFMR_DATDEF (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (SSC_TFMR) Data Default Value */
05030 #define SSC_TFMR_MSBF (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (SSC_TFMR) Most Significant Bit First */
05031 #define SSC_TFMR_DATNB_Pos 8
05032 #define SSC_TFMR_DATNB_Msk (0xfu << SSC_TFMR_DATNB_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_TFMR) Data Number per frame */
05033 #define SSC_TFMR_DATNB(value) ((SSC_TFMR_DATNB_Msk & ((value) << SSC_TFMR_DATNB_Pos)))
05034 #define SSC_TFMR_FSLEN_Pos 16
05035 #define SSC_TFMR_FSLEN_Msk (0xfu << SSC_TFMR_FSLEN_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_TFMR) Transmit Frame Sync Length */
05036 #define SSC_TFMR_FSLEN(value) ((SSC_TFMR_FSLEN_Msk & ((value) << SSC_TFMR_FSLEN_Pos)))
05037 #define SSC_TFMR_FSOS_Pos 20
05038 #define SSC_TFMR_FSOS_Msk (0x7u << SSC_TFMR_FSOS_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_TFMR) Transmit Frame Sync Output Selection */
05039 #define   SSC_TFMR_FSOS_NONE (0x0u << 20) /**< \brief (SSC_TFMR) None */
05040 #define   SSC_TFMR_FSOS_NEGATIVE (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (SSC_TFMR) Negative Pulse */
05041 #define   SSC_TFMR_FSOS_POSITIVE (0x2u << 20) /**< \brief (SSC_TFMR) Positive Pulse */
05042 #define   SSC_TFMR_FSOS_LOW (0x3u << 20) /**< \brief (SSC_TFMR) Driven Low during data transfer */
05043 #define   SSC_TFMR_FSOS_HIGH (0x4u << 20) /**< \brief (SSC_TFMR) Driven High during data transfer */
05044 #define   SSC_TFMR_FSOS_TOGGLING (0x5u << 20) /**< \brief (SSC_TFMR) Toggling at each start of data transfer */
05045 #define SSC_TFMR_FSDEN (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (SSC_TFMR) Frame Sync Data Enable */
05046 #define SSC_TFMR_FSEDGE (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (SSC_TFMR) Frame Sync Edge Detection */
05047 #define   SSC_TFMR_FSEDGE_POSITIVE (0x0u << 24) /**< \brief (SSC_TFMR) Positive Edge Detection */
05048 #define   SSC_TFMR_FSEDGE_NEGATIVE (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (SSC_TFMR) Negative Edge Detection */
05049 #define SSC_TFMR_FSLEN_EXT_Pos 28
05050 #define SSC_TFMR_FSLEN_EXT_Msk (0xfu << SSC_TFMR_FSLEN_EXT_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_TFMR) FSLEN Field Extension */
05051 #define SSC_TFMR_FSLEN_EXT(value) ((SSC_TFMR_FSLEN_EXT_Msk & ((value) << SSC_TFMR_FSLEN_EXT_Pos)))
05052 /* -------- SSC_RHR : (SSC Offset: 0x20) Receive Holding Register -------- */
05053 #define SSC_RHR_RDAT_Pos 0
05054 #define SSC_RHR_RDAT_Msk (0xffffffffu << SSC_RHR_RDAT_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RHR) Receive Data */
05055 /* -------- SSC_THR : (SSC Offset: 0x24) Transmit Holding Register -------- */
05056 #define SSC_THR_TDAT_Pos 0
05057 #define SSC_THR_TDAT_Msk (0xffffffffu << SSC_THR_TDAT_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_THR) Transmit Data */
05058 #define SSC_THR_TDAT(value) ((SSC_THR_TDAT_Msk & ((value) << SSC_THR_TDAT_Pos)))
05059 /* -------- SSC_RSHR : (SSC Offset: 0x30) Receive Sync. Holding Register -------- */
05060 #define SSC_RSHR_RSDAT_Pos 0
05061 #define SSC_RSHR_RSDAT_Msk (0xffffu << SSC_RSHR_RSDAT_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RSHR) Receive Synchronization Data */
05062 /* -------- SSC_TSHR : (SSC Offset: 0x34) Transmit Sync. Holding Register -------- */
05063 #define SSC_TSHR_TSDAT_Pos 0
05064 #define SSC_TSHR_TSDAT_Msk (0xffffu << SSC_TSHR_TSDAT_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_TSHR) Transmit Synchronization Data */
05065 #define SSC_TSHR_TSDAT(value) ((SSC_TSHR_TSDAT_Msk & ((value) << SSC_TSHR_TSDAT_Pos)))
05066 /* -------- SSC_RC0R : (SSC Offset: 0x38) Receive Compare 0 Register -------- */
05067 #define SSC_RC0R_CP0_Pos 0
05068 #define SSC_RC0R_CP0_Msk (0xffffu << SSC_RC0R_CP0_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RC0R) Receive Compare Data 0 */
05069 #define SSC_RC0R_CP0(value) ((SSC_RC0R_CP0_Msk & ((value) << SSC_RC0R_CP0_Pos)))
05070 /* -------- SSC_RC1R : (SSC Offset: 0x3C) Receive Compare 1 Register -------- */
05071 #define SSC_RC1R_CP1_Pos 0
05072 #define SSC_RC1R_CP1_Msk (0xffffu << SSC_RC1R_CP1_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RC1R) Receive Compare Data 1 */
05073 #define SSC_RC1R_CP1(value) ((SSC_RC1R_CP1_Msk & ((value) << SSC_RC1R_CP1_Pos)))
05074 /* -------- SSC_SR : (SSC Offset: 0x40) Status Register -------- */
05075 #define SSC_SR_TXRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SSC_SR) Transmit Ready */
05076 #define SSC_SR_TXEMPTY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SSC_SR) Transmit Empty */
05077 #define SSC_SR_ENDTX (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SSC_SR) End of Transmission */
05078 #define SSC_SR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (SSC_SR) Transmit Buffer Empty */
05079 #define SSC_SR_RXRDY (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (SSC_SR) Receive Ready */
05080 #define SSC_SR_OVRUN (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (SSC_SR) Receive Overrun */
05081 #define SSC_SR_ENDRX (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (SSC_SR) End of Reception */
05082 #define SSC_SR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (SSC_SR) Receive Buffer Full */
05083 #define SSC_SR_CP0 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_SR) Compare 0 */
05084 #define SSC_SR_CP1 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (SSC_SR) Compare 1 */
05085 #define SSC_SR_TXSYN (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (SSC_SR) Transmit Sync */
05086 #define SSC_SR_RXSYN (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (SSC_SR) Receive Sync */
05087 #define SSC_SR_TXEN (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (SSC_SR) Transmit Enable */
05088 #define SSC_SR_RXEN (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (SSC_SR) Receive Enable */
05089 /* -------- SSC_IER : (SSC Offset: 0x44) Interrupt Enable Register -------- */
05090 #define SSC_IER_TXRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SSC_IER) Transmit Ready Interrupt Enable */
05091 #define SSC_IER_TXEMPTY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SSC_IER) Transmit Empty Interrupt Enable */
05092 #define SSC_IER_ENDTX (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SSC_IER) End of Transmission Interrupt Enable */
05093 #define SSC_IER_TXBUFE (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (SSC_IER) Transmit Buffer Empty Interrupt Enable */
05094 #define SSC_IER_RXRDY (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (SSC_IER) Receive Ready Interrupt Enable */
05095 #define SSC_IER_OVRUN (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (SSC_IER) Receive Overrun Interrupt Enable */
05096 #define SSC_IER_ENDRX (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (SSC_IER) End of Reception Interrupt Enable */
05097 #define SSC_IER_RXBUFF (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (SSC_IER) Receive Buffer Full Interrupt Enable */
05098 #define SSC_IER_CP0 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_IER) Compare 0 Interrupt Enable */
05099 #define SSC_IER_CP1 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (SSC_IER) Compare 1 Interrupt Enable */
05100 #define SSC_IER_TXSYN (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (SSC_IER) Tx Sync Interrupt Enable */
05101 #define SSC_IER_RXSYN (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (SSC_IER) Rx Sync Interrupt Enable */
05102 /* -------- SSC_IDR : (SSC Offset: 0x48) Interrupt Disable Register -------- */
05103 #define SSC_IDR_TXRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SSC_IDR) Transmit Ready Interrupt Disable */
05104 #define SSC_IDR_TXEMPTY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SSC_IDR) Transmit Empty Interrupt Disable */
05105 #define SSC_IDR_ENDTX (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SSC_IDR) End of Transmission Interrupt Disable */
05106 #define SSC_IDR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (SSC_IDR) Transmit Buffer Empty Interrupt Disable */
05107 #define SSC_IDR_RXRDY (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (SSC_IDR) Receive Ready Interrupt Disable */
05108 #define SSC_IDR_OVRUN (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (SSC_IDR) Receive Overrun Interrupt Disable */
05109 #define SSC_IDR_ENDRX (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (SSC_IDR) End of Reception Interrupt Disable */
05110 #define SSC_IDR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (SSC_IDR) Receive Buffer Full Interrupt Disable */
05111 #define SSC_IDR_CP0 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_IDR) Compare 0 Interrupt Disable */
05112 #define SSC_IDR_CP1 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (SSC_IDR) Compare 1 Interrupt Disable */
05113 #define SSC_IDR_TXSYN (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (SSC_IDR) Tx Sync Interrupt Enable */
05114 #define SSC_IDR_RXSYN (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (SSC_IDR) Rx Sync Interrupt Enable */
05115 /* -------- SSC_IMR : (SSC Offset: 0x4C) Interrupt Mask Register -------- */
05116 #define SSC_IMR_TXRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SSC_IMR) Transmit Ready Interrupt Mask */
05117 #define SSC_IMR_TXEMPTY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SSC_IMR) Transmit Empty Interrupt Mask */
05118 #define SSC_IMR_ENDTX (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SSC_IMR) End of Transmission Interrupt Mask */
05119 #define SSC_IMR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (SSC_IMR) Transmit Buffer Empty Interrupt Mask */
05120 #define SSC_IMR_RXRDY (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (SSC_IMR) Receive Ready Interrupt Mask */
05121 #define SSC_IMR_OVRUN (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (SSC_IMR) Receive Overrun Interrupt Mask */
05122 #define SSC_IMR_ENDRX (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (SSC_IMR) End of Reception Interrupt Mask */
05123 #define SSC_IMR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (SSC_IMR) Receive Buffer Full Interrupt Mask */
05124 #define SSC_IMR_CP0 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_IMR) Compare 0 Interrupt Mask */
05125 #define SSC_IMR_CP1 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (SSC_IMR) Compare 1 Interrupt Mask */
05126 #define SSC_IMR_TXSYN (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (SSC_IMR) Tx Sync Interrupt Mask */
05127 #define SSC_IMR_RXSYN (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (SSC_IMR) Rx Sync Interrupt Mask */
05128 /* -------- SSC_WPMR : (SSC Offset: 0xE4) Write Protect Mode Register -------- */
05129 #define SSC_WPMR_WPEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SSC_WPMR) Write Protect Enable */
05130 #define SSC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos 8
05131 #define SSC_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk (0xffffffu << SSC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_WPMR) Write Protect KEY */
05132 #define SSC_WPMR_WPKEY(value) ((SSC_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk & ((value) << SSC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos)))
05133 /* -------- SSC_WPSR : (SSC Offset: 0xE8) Write Protect Status Register -------- */
05134 #define SSC_WPSR_WPVS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SSC_WPSR) Write Protect Violation Status */
05135 #define SSC_WPSR_WPVSRC_Pos 8
05136 #define SSC_WPSR_WPVSRC_Msk (0xffffu << SSC_WPSR_WPVSRC_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_WPSR) Write Protect Violation Source */
05137 /* -------- SSC_RPR : (SSC Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register -------- */
05138 #define SSC_RPR_RXPTR_Pos 0
05139 #define SSC_RPR_RXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << SSC_RPR_RXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RPR) Receive Pointer Register */
05140 #define SSC_RPR_RXPTR(value) ((SSC_RPR_RXPTR_Msk & ((value) << SSC_RPR_RXPTR_Pos)))
05141 /* -------- SSC_RCR : (SSC Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register -------- */
05142 #define SSC_RCR_RXCTR_Pos 0
05143 #define SSC_RCR_RXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << SSC_RCR_RXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RCR) Receive Counter Register */
05144 #define SSC_RCR_RXCTR(value) ((SSC_RCR_RXCTR_Msk & ((value) << SSC_RCR_RXCTR_Pos)))
05145 /* -------- SSC_TPR : (SSC Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register -------- */
05146 #define SSC_TPR_TXPTR_Pos 0
05147 #define SSC_TPR_TXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << SSC_TPR_TXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_TPR) Transmit Counter Register */
05148 #define SSC_TPR_TXPTR(value) ((SSC_TPR_TXPTR_Msk & ((value) << SSC_TPR_TXPTR_Pos)))
05149 /* -------- SSC_TCR : (SSC Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register -------- */
05150 #define SSC_TCR_TXCTR_Pos 0
05151 #define SSC_TCR_TXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << SSC_TCR_TXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_TCR) Transmit Counter Register */
05152 #define SSC_TCR_TXCTR(value) ((SSC_TCR_TXCTR_Msk & ((value) << SSC_TCR_TXCTR_Pos)))
05153 /* -------- SSC_RNPR : (SSC Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register -------- */
05154 #define SSC_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos 0
05155 #define SSC_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << SSC_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RNPR) Receive Next Pointer */
05156 #define SSC_RNPR_RXNPTR(value) ((SSC_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << SSC_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos)))
05157 /* -------- SSC_RNCR : (SSC Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register -------- */
05158 #define SSC_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos 0
05159 #define SSC_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << SSC_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_RNCR) Receive Next Counter */
05160 #define SSC_RNCR_RXNCTR(value) ((SSC_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << SSC_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos)))
05161 /* -------- SSC_TNPR : (SSC Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register -------- */
05162 #define SSC_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos 0
05163 #define SSC_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << SSC_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_TNPR) Transmit Next Pointer */
05164 #define SSC_TNPR_TXNPTR(value) ((SSC_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << SSC_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos)))
05165 /* -------- SSC_TNCR : (SSC Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register -------- */
05166 #define SSC_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos 0
05167 #define SSC_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << SSC_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (SSC_TNCR) Transmit Counter Next */
05168 #define SSC_TNCR_TXNCTR(value) ((SSC_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << SSC_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos)))
05169 /* -------- SSC_PTCR : (SSC Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register -------- */
05170 #define SSC_PTCR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SSC_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
05171 #define SSC_PTCR_RXTDIS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SSC_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Disable */
05172 #define SSC_PTCR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
05173 #define SSC_PTCR_TXTDIS (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (SSC_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Disable */
05174 /* -------- SSC_PTSR : (SSC Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register -------- */
05175 #define SSC_PTSR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SSC_PTSR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
05176 #define SSC_PTSR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (SSC_PTSR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
05177 
05178 /*@}*/
05179 
05180 /* ============================================================================= */
05181 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Supply Controller */
05182 /* ============================================================================= */
05183 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_SUPC Supply Controller */
05184 /*@{*/
05185 
05186 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
05187 /** \brief Supc hardware registers */
05188 typedef struct {
05189   WoReg SUPC_CR;   /**< \brief (Supc Offset: 0x00) Supply Controller Control Register */
05190   RwReg SUPC_SMMR; /**< \brief (Supc Offset: 0x04) Supply Controller Supply Monitor Mode Register */
05191   RwReg SUPC_MR;   /**< \brief (Supc Offset: 0x08) Supply Controller Mode Register */
05192   RwReg SUPC_WUMR; /**< \brief (Supc Offset: 0x0C) Supply Controller Wake Up Mode Register */
05193   RwReg SUPC_WUIR; /**< \brief (Supc Offset: 0x10) Supply Controller Wake Up Inputs Register */
05194   RoReg SUPC_SR;   /**< \brief (Supc Offset: 0x14) Supply Controller Status Register */
05195 } Supc;
05196 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
05197 /* -------- SUPC_CR : (SUPC Offset: 0x00) Supply Controller Control Register -------- */
05198 #define SUPC_CR_VROFF (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SUPC_CR) Voltage Regulator Off */
05199 #define   SUPC_CR_VROFF_NO_EFFECT (0x0u << 2) /**< \brief (SUPC_CR) no effect. */
05200 #define   SUPC_CR_VROFF_STOP_VREG (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SUPC_CR) if KEY is correct, asserts vddcore_nreset and stops the voltage regulator. */
05201 #define SUPC_CR_XTALSEL (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (SUPC_CR) Crystal Oscillator Select */
05202 #define   SUPC_CR_XTALSEL_NO_EFFECT (0x0u << 3) /**< \brief (SUPC_CR) no effect. */
05203 #define   SUPC_CR_XTALSEL_CRYSTAL_SEL (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (SUPC_CR) if KEY is correct, switches the slow clock on the crystal oscillator output. */
05204 #define SUPC_CR_KEY_Pos 24
05205 #define SUPC_CR_KEY_Msk (0xffu << SUPC_CR_KEY_Pos) /**< \brief (SUPC_CR) Password */
05206 #define SUPC_CR_KEY(value) ((uint32_t)(SUPC_CR_KEY_Msk & ((value) << SUPC_CR_KEY_Pos)))
05207 /* -------- SUPC_SMMR : (SUPC Offset: 0x04) Supply Controller Supply Monitor Mode Register -------- */
05208 #define SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_Pos 0
05209 #define SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_Msk (0xfu << SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_Pos) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) Supply Monitor Threshold */
05210 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_1_9V (0x0u << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) 1.9 V */
05211 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_2_0V (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) 2.0 V */
05212 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_2_1V (0x2u << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) 2.1 V */
05213 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_2_2V (0x3u << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) 2.2 V */
05214 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_2_3V (0x4u << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) 2.3 V */
05215 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_2_4V (0x5u << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) 2.4 V */
05216 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_2_5V (0x6u << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) 2.5 V */
05217 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_2_6V (0x7u << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) 2.6 V */
05218 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_2_7V (0x8u << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) 2.7 V */
05219 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_2_8V (0x9u << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) 2.8 V */
05220 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_2_9V (0xAu << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) 2.9 V */
05221 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_3_0V (0xBu << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) 3.0 V */
05222 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_3_1V (0xCu << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) 3.1 V */
05223 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_3_2V (0xDu << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) 3.2 V */
05224 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_3_3V (0xEu << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) 3.3 V */
05225 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMTH_3_4V (0xFu << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) 3.4 V */
05226 #define SUPC_SMMR_SMSMPL_Pos 8
05227 #define SUPC_SMMR_SMSMPL_Msk (0x7u << SUPC_SMMR_SMSMPL_Pos) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) Supply Monitor Sampling Period */
05228 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMSMPL_SMD (0x0u << 8) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) Supply Monitor disabled */
05229 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMSMPL_CSM (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) Continuous Supply Monitor */
05230 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMSMPL_32SLCK (0x2u << 8) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) Supply Monitor enabled one SLCK period every 32 SLCK periods */
05231 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMSMPL_256SLCK (0x3u << 8) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) Supply Monitor enabled one SLCK period every 256 SLCK periods */
05232 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMSMPL_2048SLCK (0x4u << 8) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) Supply Monitor enabled one SLCK period every 2,048 SLCK periods */
05233 #define SUPC_SMMR_SMRSTEN (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) Supply Monitor Reset Enable */
05234 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMRSTEN_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 12) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) the core reset signal "vddcore_nreset" is not affected when a supply monitor detection occurs. */
05235 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMRSTEN_ENABLE (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) the core reset signal, vddcore_nreset is asserted when a supply monitor detection occurs. */
05236 #define SUPC_SMMR_SMIEN (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) Supply Monitor Interrupt Enable */
05237 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMIEN_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 13) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) the SUPC interrupt signal is not affected when a supply monitor detection occurs. */
05238 #define   SUPC_SMMR_SMIEN_ENABLE (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (SUPC_SMMR) the SUPC interrupt signal is asserted when a supply monitor detection occurs. */
05239 /* -------- SUPC_MR : (SUPC Offset: 0x08) Supply Controller Mode Register -------- */
05240 #define SUPC_MR_BODRSTEN (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (SUPC_MR) Brownout Detector Reset Enable */
05241 #define   SUPC_MR_BODRSTEN_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 12) /**< \brief (SUPC_MR) the core reset signal "vddcore_nreset" is not affected when a brownout detection occurs. */
05242 #define   SUPC_MR_BODRSTEN_ENABLE (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (SUPC_MR) the core reset signal, vddcore_nreset is asserted when a brownout detection occurs. */
05243 #define SUPC_MR_BODDIS (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (SUPC_MR) Brownout Detector Disable */
05244 #define   SUPC_MR_BODDIS_ENABLE (0x0u << 13) /**< \brief (SUPC_MR) the core brownout detector is enabled. */
05245 #define   SUPC_MR_BODDIS_DISABLE (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (SUPC_MR) the core brownout detector is disabled. */
05246 #define SUPC_MR_ONREG (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (SUPC_MR) Voltage Regulator enable */
05247 #define   SUPC_MR_ONREG_ONREG_UNUSED (0x0u << 14) /**< \brief (SUPC_MR) Voltage Regulator is not used */
05248 #define   SUPC_MR_ONREG_ONREG_USED (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (SUPC_MR) Voltage Regulator is used */
05249 #define SUPC_MR_OSCBYPASS (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (SUPC_MR) Oscillator Bypass */
05250 #define   SUPC_MR_OSCBYPASS_NO_EFFECT (0x0u << 20) /**< \brief (SUPC_MR) no effect. Clock selection depends on XTALSEL value. */
05251 #define   SUPC_MR_OSCBYPASS_BYPASS (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (SUPC_MR) the 32-KHz XTAL oscillator is selected and is put in bypass mode. */
05252 #define SUPC_MR_KEY_Pos 24
05253 #define SUPC_MR_KEY_Msk (0xffu << SUPC_MR_KEY_Pos) /**< \brief (SUPC_MR) Password Key */
05254 #define SUPC_MR_KEY(value) ((SUPC_MR_KEY_Msk & ((value) << SUPC_MR_KEY_Pos)))
05255 /* -------- SUPC_WUMR : (SUPC Offset: 0x0C) Supply Controller Wake Up Mode Register -------- */
05256 #define SUPC_WUMR_SMEN (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUMR) Supply Monitor Wake Up Enable */
05257 #define   SUPC_WUMR_SMEN_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 1) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUMR) the supply monitor detection has no wake up effect. */
05258 #define   SUPC_WUMR_SMEN_ENABLE (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUMR) the supply monitor detection forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05259 #define SUPC_WUMR_RTTEN (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUMR) Real Time Timer Wake Up Enable */
05260 #define   SUPC_WUMR_RTTEN_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 2) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUMR) the RTT alarm signal has no wake up effect. */
05261 #define   SUPC_WUMR_RTTEN_ENABLE (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUMR) the RTT alarm signal forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05262 #define SUPC_WUMR_RTCEN (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUMR) Real Time Clock Wake Up Enable */
05263 #define   SUPC_WUMR_RTCEN_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 3) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUMR) the RTC alarm signal has no wake up effect. */
05264 #define   SUPC_WUMR_RTCEN_ENABLE (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUMR) the RTC alarm signal forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05265 #define SUPC_WUMR_WKUPDBC_Pos 12
05266 #define SUPC_WUMR_WKUPDBC_Msk (0x7u << SUPC_WUMR_WKUPDBC_Pos) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUMR) Wake Up Inputs Debouncer Period */
05267 #define   SUPC_WUMR_WKUPDBC_IMMEDIATE (0x0u << 12) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUMR) Immediate, no debouncing, detected active at least on one Slow Clock edge. */
05268 #define   SUPC_WUMR_WKUPDBC_3_SCLK (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUMR) WKUPx shall be in its active state for at least 3 SLCK periods */
05269 #define   SUPC_WUMR_WKUPDBC_32_SCLK (0x2u << 12) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUMR) WKUPx shall be in its active state for at least 32 SLCK periods */
05270 #define   SUPC_WUMR_WKUPDBC_512_SCLK (0x3u << 12) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUMR) WKUPx shall be in its active state for at least 512 SLCK periods */
05271 #define   SUPC_WUMR_WKUPDBC_4096_SCLK (0x4u << 12) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUMR) WKUPx shall be in its active state for at least 4,096 SLCK periods */
05272 #define   SUPC_WUMR_WKUPDBC_32768_SCLK (0x5u << 12) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUMR) WKUPx shall be in its active state for at least 32,768 SLCK periods */
05273 /* -------- SUPC_WUIR : (SUPC Offset: 0x10) Supply Controller Wake Up Inputs Register -------- */
05274 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Enable 0 */
05275 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN0_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input has no wake up effect. */
05276 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN0_ENABLE (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05277 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Enable 1 */
05278 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN1_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 1) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input has no wake up effect. */
05279 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN1_ENABLE (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05280 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Enable 2 */
05281 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN2_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 2) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input has no wake up effect. */
05282 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN2_ENABLE (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05283 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Enable 3 */
05284 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN3_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 3) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input has no wake up effect. */
05285 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN3_ENABLE (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05286 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Enable 4 */
05287 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN4_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 4) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input has no wake up effect. */
05288 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN4_ENABLE (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05289 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Enable 5 */
05290 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN5_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 5) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input has no wake up effect. */
05291 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN5_ENABLE (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05292 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Enable 6 */
05293 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN6_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 6) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input has no wake up effect. */
05294 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN6_ENABLE (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05295 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Enable 7 */
05296 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN7_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 7) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input has no wake up effect. */
05297 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN7_ENABLE (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05298 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN8 (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Enable 8 */
05299 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN8_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 8) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input has no wake up effect. */
05300 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN8_ENABLE (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05301 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN9 (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Enable 9 */
05302 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN9_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 9) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input has no wake up effect. */
05303 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN9_ENABLE (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05304 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN10 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Enable 10 */
05305 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN10_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 10) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input has no wake up effect. */
05306 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN10_ENABLE (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05307 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN11 (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Enable 11 */
05308 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN11_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 11) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input has no wake up effect. */
05309 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN11_ENABLE (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
