05310 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Enable 12 */
05311 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN12_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 12) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input has no wake up effect. */
05312 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN12_ENABLE (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05313 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN13 (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Enable 13 */
05314 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN13_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 13) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input has no wake up effect. */
05315 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN13_ENABLE (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05316 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN14 (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Enable 14 */
05317 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN14_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 14) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input has no wake up effect. */
05318 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN14_ENABLE (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05319 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN15 (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Enable 15 */
05320 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN15_NOT_ENABLE (0x0u << 15) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input has no wake up effect. */
05321 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPEN15_ENABLE (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05322 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Transition 0 */
05323 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT0_HIGH_TO_LOW (0x0u << 16) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a high to low level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05324 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT0_LOW_TO_HIGH (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a low to high level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05325 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Transition 1 */
05326 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT1_HIGH_TO_LOW (0x0u << 17) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a high to low level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05327 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT1_LOW_TO_HIGH (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a low to high level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05328 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT2 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Transition 2 */
05329 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT2_HIGH_TO_LOW (0x0u << 18) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a high to low level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05330 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT2_LOW_TO_HIGH (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a low to high level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05331 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT3 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Transition 3 */
05332 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT3_HIGH_TO_LOW (0x0u << 19) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a high to low level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05333 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT3_LOW_TO_HIGH (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a low to high level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05334 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT4 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Transition 4 */
05335 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT4_HIGH_TO_LOW (0x0u << 20) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a high to low level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05336 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT4_LOW_TO_HIGH (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a low to high level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05337 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT5 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Transition 5 */
05338 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT5_HIGH_TO_LOW (0x0u << 21) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a high to low level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05339 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT5_LOW_TO_HIGH (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a low to high level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05340 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT6 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Transition 6 */
05341 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT6_HIGH_TO_LOW (0x0u << 22) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a high to low level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05342 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT6_LOW_TO_HIGH (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a low to high level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05343 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT7 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Transition 7 */
05344 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT7_HIGH_TO_LOW (0x0u << 23) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a high to low level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05345 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT7_LOW_TO_HIGH (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a low to high level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05346 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT8 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Transition 8 */
05347 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT8_HIGH_TO_LOW (0x0u << 24) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a high to low level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05348 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT8_LOW_TO_HIGH (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a low to high level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05349 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT9 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Transition 9 */
05350 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT9_HIGH_TO_LOW (0x0u << 25) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a high to low level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05351 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT9_LOW_TO_HIGH (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a low to high level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05352 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT10 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Transition 10 */
05353 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT10_HIGH_TO_LOW (0x0u << 26) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a high to low level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05354 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT10_LOW_TO_HIGH (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a low to high level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05355 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT11 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Transition 11 */
05356 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT11_HIGH_TO_LOW (0x0u << 27) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a high to low level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05357 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT11_LOW_TO_HIGH (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a low to high level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05358 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT12 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Transition 12 */
05359 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT12_HIGH_TO_LOW (0x0u << 28) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a high to low level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05360 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT12_LOW_TO_HIGH (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a low to high level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05361 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT13 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Transition 13 */
05362 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT13_HIGH_TO_LOW (0x0u << 29) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a high to low level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05363 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT13_LOW_TO_HIGH (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a low to high level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05364 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT14 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Transition 14 */
05365 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT14_HIGH_TO_LOW (0x0u << 30) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a high to low level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05366 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT14_LOW_TO_HIGH (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a low to high level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05367 #define SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT15 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) Wake Up Input Transition 15 */
05368 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT15_HIGH_TO_LOW (0x0u << 31) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a high to low level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05369 #define   SUPC_WUIR_WKUPT15_LOW_TO_HIGH (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (SUPC_WUIR) a low to high level transition on the corresponding wake-up input forces the wake up of the core power supply. */
05370 /* -------- SUPC_SR : (SUPC Offset: 0x14) Supply Controller Status Register -------- */
05371 #define SUPC_SR_WKUPS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) WKUP Wake Up Status */
05372 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPS_NO (0x0u << 1) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) no wake up due to the assertion of the WKUP pins has occurred since the last read of SUPC_SR. */
05373 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPS_PRESENT (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) at least one wake up due to the assertion of the WKUP pins has occurred since the last read of SUPC_SR. */
05374 #define SUPC_SR_SMWS (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) Supply Monitor Detection Wake Up Status */
05375 #define   SUPC_SR_SMWS_NO (0x0u << 2) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) no wake up due to a supply monitor detection has occurred since the last read of SUPC_SR. */
05376 #define   SUPC_SR_SMWS_PRESENT (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) at least one wake up due to a supply monitor detection has occurred since the last read of SUPC_SR. */
05377 #define SUPC_SR_BODRSTS (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) Brownout Detector Reset Status */
05378 #define   SUPC_SR_BODRSTS_NO (0x0u << 3) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) no core brownout rising edge event has been detected since the last read of the SUPC_SR. */
05379 #define   SUPC_SR_BODRSTS_PRESENT (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) at least one brownout output rising edge event has been detected since the last read of the SUPC_SR. */
05380 #define SUPC_SR_SMRSTS (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) Supply Monitor Reset Status */
05381 #define   SUPC_SR_SMRSTS_NO (0x0u << 4) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) no supply monitor detection has generated a core reset since the last read of the SUPC_SR. */
05382 #define   SUPC_SR_SMRSTS_PRESENT (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) at least one supply monitor detection has generated a core reset since the last read of the SUPC_SR. */
05383 #define SUPC_SR_SMS (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) Supply Monitor Status */
05384 #define   SUPC_SR_SMS_NO (0x0u << 5) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) no supply monitor detection since the last read of SUPC_SR. */
05385 #define   SUPC_SR_SMS_PRESENT (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) at least one supply monitor detection since the last read of SUPC_SR. */
05386 #define SUPC_SR_SMOS (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) Supply Monitor Output Status */
05387 #define   SUPC_SR_SMOS_HIGH (0x0u << 6) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the supply monitor detected VDDIO higher than its threshold at its last measurement. */
05388 #define   SUPC_SR_SMOS_LOW (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the supply monitor detected VDDIO lower than its threshold at its last measurement. */
05389 #define SUPC_SR_OSCSEL (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) 32-kHz Oscillator Selection Status */
05390 #define   SUPC_SR_OSCSEL_RC (0x0u << 7) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the slow clock, SLCK is generated by the embedded 32-kHz RC oscillator. */
05391 #define   SUPC_SR_OSCSEL_CRYST (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the slow clock, SLCK is generated by the 32-kHz crystal oscillator. */
05392 #define SUPC_SR_WKUPIS0 (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) WKUP Input Status 0 */
05393 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS0_DIS (0x0u << 16) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input is disabled, or was inactive at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05394 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS0_EN (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input was active at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05395 #define SUPC_SR_WKUPIS1 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) WKUP Input Status 1 */
05396 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS1_DIS (0x0u << 17) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input is disabled, or was inactive at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05397 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS1_EN (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input was active at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05398 #define SUPC_SR_WKUPIS2 (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) WKUP Input Status 2 */
05399 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS2_DIS (0x0u << 18) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input is disabled, or was inactive at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05400 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS2_EN (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input was active at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05401 #define SUPC_SR_WKUPIS3 (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) WKUP Input Status 3 */
05402 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS3_DIS (0x0u << 19) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input is disabled, or was inactive at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05403 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS3_EN (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input was active at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05404 #define SUPC_SR_WKUPIS4 (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) WKUP Input Status 4 */
05405 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS4_DIS (0x0u << 20) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input is disabled, or was inactive at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05406 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS4_EN (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input was active at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05407 #define SUPC_SR_WKUPIS5 (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) WKUP Input Status 5 */
05408 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS5_DIS (0x0u << 21) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input is disabled, or was inactive at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05409 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS5_EN (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input was active at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05410 #define SUPC_SR_WKUPIS6 (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) WKUP Input Status 6 */
05411 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS6_DIS (0x0u << 22) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input is disabled, or was inactive at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05412 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS6_EN (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input was active at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05413 #define SUPC_SR_WKUPIS7 (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) WKUP Input Status 7 */
05414 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS7_DIS (0x0u << 23) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input is disabled, or was inactive at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05415 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS7_EN (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input was active at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05416 #define SUPC_SR_WKUPIS8 (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) WKUP Input Status 8 */
05417 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS8_DIS (0x0u << 24) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input is disabled, or was inactive at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05418 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS8_EN (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input was active at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05419 #define SUPC_SR_WKUPIS9 (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) WKUP Input Status 9 */
05420 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS9_DIS (0x0u << 25) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input is disabled, or was inactive at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05421 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS9_EN (0x1u << 25) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input was active at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05422 #define SUPC_SR_WKUPIS10 (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) WKUP Input Status 10 */
05423 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS10_DIS (0x0u << 26) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input is disabled, or was inactive at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05424 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS10_EN (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input was active at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05425 #define SUPC_SR_WKUPIS11 (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) WKUP Input Status 11 */
05426 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS11_DIS (0x0u << 27) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input is disabled, or was inactive at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05427 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS11_EN (0x1u << 27) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input was active at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05428 #define SUPC_SR_WKUPIS12 (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) WKUP Input Status 12 */
05429 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS12_DIS (0x0u << 28) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input is disabled, or was inactive at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05430 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS12_EN (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input was active at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05431 #define SUPC_SR_WKUPIS13 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) WKUP Input Status 13 */
05432 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS13_DIS (0x0u << 29) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input is disabled, or was inactive at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05433 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS13_EN (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input was active at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05434 #define SUPC_SR_WKUPIS14 (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) WKUP Input Status 14 */
05435 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS14_DIS (0x0u << 30) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input is disabled, or was inactive at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05436 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS14_EN (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input was active at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05437 #define SUPC_SR_WKUPIS15 (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) WKUP Input Status 15 */
05438 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS15_DIS (0x0u << 31) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input is disabled, or was inactive at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05439 #define   SUPC_SR_WKUPIS15_EN (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (SUPC_SR) the corresponding wake-up input was active at the time the debouncer triggered a wake up event. */
05440 
05441 /*@}*/
05442 
05443 /* ============================================================================= */
05444 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Timer Counter */
05445 /* ============================================================================= */
05446 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_TC Timer Counter */
05447 /*@{*/
05448 
05449 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
05450 /** \brief TcChannel hardware registers */
05451 typedef struct {
05452   RwReg      TC_CCR;        /**< \brief (TcChannel Offset: 0x0) Channel Control Register */
05453   RwReg      TC_CMR;        /**< \brief (TcChannel Offset: 0x4) Channel Mode Register */
05454   RwReg      TC_SMMR;       /**< \brief (TcChannel Offset: 0x8) Stepper Motor Mode Register */
05455   RwReg      Reserved1[1];
05456   RwReg      TC_CV;         /**< \brief (TcChannel Offset: 0x10) Counter Value */
05457   RwReg      TC_RA;         /**< \brief (TcChannel Offset: 0x14) Register A */
05458   RwReg      TC_RB;         /**< \brief (TcChannel Offset: 0x18) Register B */
05459   RwReg      TC_RC;         /**< \brief (TcChannel Offset: 0x1C) Register C */
05460   RwReg      TC_SR;         /**< \brief (TcChannel Offset: 0x20) Status Register */
05461   RwReg      TC_IER;        /**< \brief (TcChannel Offset: 0x24) Interrupt Enable Register */
05462   RwReg      TC_IDR;        /**< \brief (TcChannel Offset: 0x28) Interrupt Disable Register */
05463   RwReg      TC_IMR;        /**< \brief (TcChannel Offset: 0x2C) Interrupt Mask Register */
05464   RwReg      Reserved2[4];
05465 } TcChannel;
05466 /** \brief Tc hardware registers */
05467 typedef struct {
05468   TcChannel  TC_CHANNEL[3]; /**< \brief (Tc Offset: 0x0) channel = 0 .. 2 */
05469   WoReg      TC_BCR;        /**< \brief (Tc Offset: 0xC0) Block Control Register */
05470   RwReg      TC_BMR;        /**< \brief (Tc Offset: 0xC4) Block Mode Register */
05471   WoReg      TC_QIER;       /**< \brief (Tc Offset: 0xC8) QDEC Interrupt Enable Register */
05472   WoReg      TC_QIDR;       /**< \brief (Tc Offset: 0xCC) QDEC Interrupt Disable Register */
05473   RoReg      TC_QIMR;       /**< \brief (Tc Offset: 0xD0) QDEC Interrupt Mask Register */
05474   RoReg      TC_QISR;       /**< \brief (Tc Offset: 0xD4) QDEC Interrupt Status Register */
05475   RwReg      TC_FMR;        /**< \brief (Tc Offset: 0xD8) Fault Mode Register */
05476   RwReg      Reserved1[2];
05477   RwReg      TC_WPMR;       /**< \brief (Tc Offset: 0xE4) Write Protect Mode Register */
05478 } Tc;
05479 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
05480 /* -------- TC_CCR : (TC Offset: N/A) Channel Control Register -------- */
05481 #define TC_CCR_CLKEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_CCR) Counter Clock Enable Command */
05482 #define TC_CCR_CLKDIS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (TC_CCR) Counter Clock Disable Command */
05483 #define TC_CCR_SWTRG (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (TC_CCR) Software Trigger Command */
05484 /* -------- TC_CMR : (TC Offset: N/A) Channel Mode Register -------- */
05485 #define TC_CMR_TCCLKS_Pos 0
05486 #define TC_CMR_TCCLKS_Msk (0x7u << TC_CMR_TCCLKS_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Clock Selection */
05487 #define   TC_CMR_TCCLKS_TIMER_CLOCK1 (0x0u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Clock selected: TCLK1 */
05488 #define   TC_CMR_TCCLKS_TIMER_CLOCK2 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Clock selected: TCLK2 */
05489 #define   TC_CMR_TCCLKS_TIMER_CLOCK3 (0x2u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Clock selected: TCLK3 */
05490 #define   TC_CMR_TCCLKS_TIMER_CLOCK4 (0x3u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Clock selected: TCLK4 */
05491 #define   TC_CMR_TCCLKS_TIMER_CLOCK5 (0x4u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Clock selected: TCLK5 */
05492 #define   TC_CMR_TCCLKS_XC0 (0x5u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Clock selected: XC0 */
05493 #define   TC_CMR_TCCLKS_XC1 (0x6u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Clock selected: XC1 */
05494 #define   TC_CMR_TCCLKS_XC2 (0x7u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Clock selected: XC2 */
05495 #define TC_CMR_CLKI (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Clock Invert */
05496 #define TC_CMR_BURST_Pos 4
05497 #define TC_CMR_BURST_Msk (0x3u << TC_CMR_BURST_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Burst Signal Selection */
05498 #define   TC_CMR_BURST_NONE (0x0u << 4) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) The clock is not gated by an external signal. */
05499 #define   TC_CMR_BURST_XC0 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) XC0 is ANDed with the selected clock. */
05500 #define   TC_CMR_BURST_XC1 (0x2u << 4) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) XC1 is ANDed with the selected clock. */
05501 #define   TC_CMR_BURST_XC2 (0x3u << 4) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) XC2 is ANDed with the selected clock. */
05502 #define TC_CMR_LDBSTOP (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Counter Clock Stopped with RB Loading */
05503 #define TC_CMR_LDBDIS (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Counter Clock Disable with RB Loading */
05504 #define TC_CMR_ETRGEDG_Pos 8
05505 #define TC_CMR_ETRGEDG_Msk (0x3u << TC_CMR_ETRGEDG_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) External Trigger Edge Selection */
05506 #define   TC_CMR_ETRGEDG_NONE (0x0u << 8) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) The clock is not gated by an external signal. */
05507 #define   TC_CMR_ETRGEDG_RISING (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Rising edge */
05508 #define   TC_CMR_ETRGEDG_FALLING (0x2u << 8) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Falling edge */
05509 #define   TC_CMR_ETRGEDG_EDGE (0x3u << 8) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Each edge */
05510 #define TC_CMR_ABETRG (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) TIOA or TIOB External Trigger Selection */
05511 #define TC_CMR_CPCTRG (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) RC Compare Trigger Enable */
05512 #define TC_CMR_WAVE (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (TC_CMR)  */
05513 #define TC_CMR_LDRA_Pos 16
05514 #define TC_CMR_LDRA_Msk (0x3u << TC_CMR_LDRA_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) RA Loading Selection */
05515 #define   TC_CMR_LDRA_NONE (0x0u << 16) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) None */
05516 #define   TC_CMR_LDRA_RISING (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Rising edge of TIOA */
05517 #define   TC_CMR_LDRA_FALLING (0x2u << 16) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Falling edge of TIOA */
05518 #define   TC_CMR_LDRA_EDGE (0x3u << 16) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Each edge of TIOA */
05519 #define TC_CMR_LDRB_Pos 18
05520 #define TC_CMR_LDRB_Msk (0x3u << TC_CMR_LDRB_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) RB Loading Selection */
05521 #define   TC_CMR_LDRB_NONE (0x0u << 18) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) None */
05522 #define   TC_CMR_LDRB_RISING (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Rising edge of TIOA */
05523 #define   TC_CMR_LDRB_FALLING (0x2u << 18) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Falling edge of TIOA */
05524 #define   TC_CMR_LDRB_EDGE (0x3u << 18) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Each edge of TIOA */
05525 #define TC_CMR_CPCSTOP (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Counter Clock Stopped with RC Compare */
05526 #define TC_CMR_CPCDIS (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Counter Clock Disable with RC Compare */
05527 #define TC_CMR_EEVTEDG_Pos 8
05528 #define TC_CMR_EEVTEDG_Msk (0x3u << TC_CMR_EEVTEDG_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) External Event Edge Selection */
05529 #define   TC_CMR_EEVTEDG_NONE (0x0u << 8) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) None */
05530 #define   TC_CMR_EEVTEDG_RISING (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Rising edge */
05531 #define   TC_CMR_EEVTEDG_FALLING (0x2u << 8) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Falling edge */
05532 #define   TC_CMR_EEVTEDG_EDGE (0x3u << 8) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Each edge */
05533 #define TC_CMR_EEVT_Pos 10
05534 #define TC_CMR_EEVT_Msk (0x3u << TC_CMR_EEVT_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) External Event Selection */
05535 #define   TC_CMR_EEVT_TIOB (0x0u << 10) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) TIOB */
05536 #define   TC_CMR_EEVT_XC0 (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) XC0 */
05537 #define   TC_CMR_EEVT_XC1 (0x2u << 10) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) XC1 */
05538 #define   TC_CMR_EEVT_XC2 (0x3u << 10) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) XC2 */
05539 #define TC_CMR_ENETRG (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) External Event Trigger Enable */
05540 #define TC_CMR_WAVSEL_Pos 13
05541 #define TC_CMR_WAVSEL_Msk (0x3u << TC_CMR_WAVSEL_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Waveform Selection */
05542 #define   TC_CMR_WAVSEL_UP (0x0u << 13) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) UP mode without automatic trigger on RC Compare */
05543 #define   TC_CMR_WAVSEL_UPDOWN (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) UPDOWN mode without automatic trigger on RC Compare */
05544 #define   TC_CMR_WAVSEL_UP_RC (0x2u << 13) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) UP mode with automatic trigger on RC Compare */
05545 #define   TC_CMR_WAVSEL_UPDOWN_RC (0x3u << 13) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) UPDOWN mode with automatic trigger on RC Compare */
05546 #define TC_CMR_ACPA_Pos 16
05547 #define TC_CMR_ACPA_Msk (0x3u << TC_CMR_ACPA_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) RA Compare Effect on TIOA */
05548 #define   TC_CMR_ACPA_NONE (0x0u << 16) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) None */
05549 #define   TC_CMR_ACPA_SET (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Set */
05550 #define   TC_CMR_ACPA_CLEAR (0x2u << 16) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Clear */
05551 #define   TC_CMR_ACPA_TOGGLE (0x3u << 16) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Toggle */
05552 #define TC_CMR_ACPC_Pos 18
05553 #define TC_CMR_ACPC_Msk (0x3u << TC_CMR_ACPC_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) RC Compare Effect on TIOA */
05554 #define   TC_CMR_ACPC_NONE (0x0u << 18) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) None */
05555 #define   TC_CMR_ACPC_SET (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Set */
05556 #define   TC_CMR_ACPC_CLEAR (0x2u << 18) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Clear */
05557 #define   TC_CMR_ACPC_TOGGLE (0x3u << 18) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Toggle */
05558 #define TC_CMR_AEEVT_Pos 20
05559 #define TC_CMR_AEEVT_Msk (0x3u << TC_CMR_AEEVT_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) External Event Effect on TIOA */
05560 #define   TC_CMR_AEEVT_NONE (0x0u << 20) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) None */
05561 #define   TC_CMR_AEEVT_SET (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Set */
05562 #define   TC_CMR_AEEVT_CLEAR (0x2u << 20) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Clear */
05563 #define   TC_CMR_AEEVT_TOGGLE (0x3u << 20) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Toggle */
05564 #define TC_CMR_ASWTRG_Pos 22
05565 #define TC_CMR_ASWTRG_Msk (0x3u << TC_CMR_ASWTRG_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Software Trigger Effect on TIOA */
05566 #define   TC_CMR_ASWTRG_NONE (0x0u << 22) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) None */
05567 #define   TC_CMR_ASWTRG_SET (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Set */
05568 #define   TC_CMR_ASWTRG_CLEAR (0x2u << 22) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Clear */
05569 #define   TC_CMR_ASWTRG_TOGGLE (0x3u << 22) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Toggle */
05570 #define TC_CMR_BCPB_Pos 24
05571 #define TC_CMR_BCPB_Msk (0x3u << TC_CMR_BCPB_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) RB Compare Effect on TIOB */
05572 #define   TC_CMR_BCPB_NONE (0x0u << 24) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) None */
05573 #define   TC_CMR_BCPB_SET (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Set */
05574 #define   TC_CMR_BCPB_CLEAR (0x2u << 24) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Clear */
05575 #define   TC_CMR_BCPB_TOGGLE (0x3u << 24) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Toggle */
05576 #define TC_CMR_BCPC_Pos 26
05577 #define TC_CMR_BCPC_Msk (0x3u << TC_CMR_BCPC_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) RC Compare Effect on TIOB */
05578 #define   TC_CMR_BCPC_NONE (0x0u << 26) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) None */
05579 #define   TC_CMR_BCPC_SET (0x1u << 26) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Set */
05580 #define   TC_CMR_BCPC_CLEAR (0x2u << 26) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Clear */
05581 #define   TC_CMR_BCPC_TOGGLE (0x3u << 26) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Toggle */
05582 #define TC_CMR_BEEVT_Pos 28
05583 #define TC_CMR_BEEVT_Msk (0x3u << TC_CMR_BEEVT_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) External Event Effect on TIOB */
05584 #define   TC_CMR_BEEVT_NONE (0x0u << 28) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) None */
05585 #define   TC_CMR_BEEVT_SET (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Set */
05586 #define   TC_CMR_BEEVT_CLEAR (0x2u << 28) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Clear */
05587 #define   TC_CMR_BEEVT_TOGGLE (0x3u << 28) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Toggle */
05588 #define TC_CMR_BSWTRG_Pos 30
05589 #define TC_CMR_BSWTRG_Msk (0x3u << TC_CMR_BSWTRG_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Software Trigger Effect on TIOB */
05590 #define   TC_CMR_BSWTRG_NONE (0x0u << 30) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) None */
05591 #define   TC_CMR_BSWTRG_SET (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Set */
05592 #define   TC_CMR_BSWTRG_CLEAR (0x2u << 30) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Clear */
05593 #define   TC_CMR_BSWTRG_TOGGLE (0x3u << 30) /**< \brief (TC_CMR) Toggle */
05594 /* -------- TC_SMMR : (TC Offset: N/A) Stepper Motor Mode Register -------- */
05595 #define TC_SMMR_GCEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_SMMR) Gray Count Enable */
05596 #define TC_SMMR_DOWN (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (TC_SMMR) DOWN Count */
05597 /* -------- TC_CV : (TC Offset: N/A) Counter Value -------- */
05598 #define TC_CV_CV_Pos 0
05599 #define TC_CV_CV_Msk (0xffffu << TC_CV_CV_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_CV) Counter Value */
05600 /* -------- TC_RA : (TC Offset: N/A) Register A -------- */
05601 #define TC_RA_RA_Pos 0
05602 #define TC_RA_RA_Msk (0xffffu << TC_RA_RA_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_RA) Register A */
05603 #define TC_RA_RA(value) ((TC_RA_RA_Msk & ((value) << TC_RA_RA_Pos)))
05604 /* -------- TC_RB : (TC Offset: N/A) Register B -------- */
05605 #define TC_RB_RB_Pos 0
05606 #define TC_RB_RB_Msk (0xffffu << TC_RB_RB_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_RB) Register B */
05607 #define TC_RB_RB(value) ((TC_RB_RB_Msk & ((value) << TC_RB_RB_Pos)))
05608 /* -------- TC_RC : (TC Offset: N/A) Register C -------- */
05609 #define TC_RC_RC_Pos 0
05610 #define TC_RC_RC_Msk (0xffffu << TC_RC_RC_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_RC) Register C */
05611 #define TC_RC_RC(value) ((TC_RC_RC_Msk & ((value) << TC_RC_RC_Pos)))
05612 /* -------- TC_SR : (TC Offset: N/A) Status Register -------- */
05613 #define TC_SR_COVFS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_SR) Counter Overflow Status */
05614 #define TC_SR_LOVRS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (TC_SR) Load Overrun Status */
05615 #define TC_SR_CPAS (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (TC_SR) RA Compare Status */
05616 #define TC_SR_CPBS (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (TC_SR) RB Compare Status */
05617 #define TC_SR_CPCS (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (TC_SR) RC Compare Status */
05618 #define TC_SR_LDRAS (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (TC_SR) RA Loading Status */
05619 #define TC_SR_LDRBS (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (TC_SR) RB Loading Status */
05620 #define TC_SR_ETRGS (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (TC_SR) External Trigger Status */
05621 #define TC_SR_CLKSTA (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (TC_SR) Clock Enabling Status */
05622 #define TC_SR_MTIOA (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (TC_SR) TIOA Mirror */
05623 #define TC_SR_MTIOB (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (TC_SR) TIOB Mirror */
05624 /* -------- TC_IER : (TC Offset: N/A) Interrupt Enable Register -------- */
05625 #define TC_IER_COVFS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_IER) Counter Overflow */
05626 #define TC_IER_LOVRS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (TC_IER) Load Overrun */
05627 #define TC_IER_CPAS (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (TC_IER) RA Compare */
05628 #define TC_IER_CPBS (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (TC_IER) RB Compare */
05629 #define TC_IER_CPCS (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (TC_IER) RC Compare */
05630 #define TC_IER_LDRAS (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (TC_IER) RA Loading */
05631 #define TC_IER_LDRBS (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (TC_IER) RB Loading */
05632 #define TC_IER_ETRGS (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (TC_IER) External Trigger */
05633 /* -------- TC_IDR : (TC Offset: N/A) Interrupt Disable Register -------- */
05634 #define TC_IDR_COVFS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_IDR) Counter Overflow */
05635 #define TC_IDR_LOVRS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (TC_IDR) Load Overrun */
05636 #define TC_IDR_CPAS (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (TC_IDR) RA Compare */
05637 #define TC_IDR_CPBS (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (TC_IDR) RB Compare */
05638 #define TC_IDR_CPCS (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (TC_IDR) RC Compare */
05639 #define TC_IDR_LDRAS (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (TC_IDR) RA Loading */
05640 #define TC_IDR_LDRBS (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (TC_IDR) RB Loading */
05641 #define TC_IDR_ETRGS (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (TC_IDR) External Trigger */
05642 /* -------- TC_IMR : (TC Offset: N/A) Interrupt Mask Register -------- */
05643 #define TC_IMR_COVFS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_IMR) Counter Overflow */
05644 #define TC_IMR_LOVRS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (TC_IMR) Load Overrun */
05645 #define TC_IMR_CPAS (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (TC_IMR) RA Compare */
05646 #define TC_IMR_CPBS (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (TC_IMR) RB Compare */
05647 #define TC_IMR_CPCS (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (TC_IMR) RC Compare */
05648 #define TC_IMR_LDRAS (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (TC_IMR) RA Loading */
05649 #define TC_IMR_LDRBS (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (TC_IMR) RB Loading */
05650 #define TC_IMR_ETRGS (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (TC_IMR) External Trigger */
05651 /* -------- TC_BCR : (TC Offset: 0xC0) Block Control Register -------- */
05652 #define TC_BCR_SYNC (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_BCR) Synchro Command */
05653 /* -------- TC_BMR : (TC Offset: 0xC4) Block Mode Register -------- */
05654 #define TC_BMR_TC0XC0S_Pos 0
05655 #define TC_BMR_TC0XC0S_Msk (0x3u << TC_BMR_TC0XC0S_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) External Clock Signal 0 Selection */
05656 #define   TC_BMR_TC0XC0S_TCLK0 (0x0u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) Signal connected to XC0: TCLK0 */
05657 #define   TC_BMR_TC0XC0S_TIOA1 (0x2u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) Signal connected to XC0: TIOA1 */
05658 #define   TC_BMR_TC0XC0S_TIOA2 (0x3u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) Signal connected to XC0: TIOA2 */
05659 #define TC_BMR_TC1XC1S_Pos 2
05660 #define TC_BMR_TC1XC1S_Msk (0x3u << TC_BMR_TC1XC1S_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) External Clock Signal 1 Selection */
05661 #define   TC_BMR_TC1XC1S_TCLK1 (0x0u << 2) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) Signal connected to XC1: TCLK1 */
05662 #define   TC_BMR_TC1XC1S_TIOA0 (0x2u << 2) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) Signal connected to XC1: TIOA0 */
05663 #define   TC_BMR_TC1XC1S_TIOA2 (0x3u << 2) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) Signal connected to XC1: TIOA2 */
05664 #define TC_BMR_TC2XC2S_Pos 4
05665 #define TC_BMR_TC2XC2S_Msk (0x3u << TC_BMR_TC2XC2S_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) External Clock Signal 2 Selection */
05666 #define   TC_BMR_TC2XC2S_TCLK2 (0x0u << 4) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) Signal connected to XC2: TCLK2 */
05667 #define   TC_BMR_TC2XC2S_TIOA1 (0x2u << 4) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) Signal connected to XC2: TIOA1 */
05668 #define   TC_BMR_TC2XC2S_TIOA2 (0x3u << 4) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) Signal connected to XC2: TIOA2 */
05669 #define TC_BMR_QDEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) Quadrature Decoder ENabled */
05670 #define TC_BMR_POSEN (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) POSition ENabled */
05671 #define TC_BMR_SPEEDEN (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) SPEED ENabled */
05672 #define TC_BMR_QDTRANS (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) Quadrature Decoding TRANSparent */
05673 #define TC_BMR_EDGPHA (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) EDGe on PHA count mode */
05674 #define TC_BMR_INVA (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) INVerted phA */
05675 #define TC_BMR_INVB (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) INVerted phB */
05676 #define TC_BMR_INVIDX (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) INVerted InDeX */
05677 #define TC_BMR_SWAP (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) SWAP PHA and PHB */
05678 #define TC_BMR_IDXPHB (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) InDeX pin is PHB pin */
05679 #define TC_BMR_FILTER (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (TC_BMR)  */
05680 #define TC_BMR_MAXFILT_Pos 20
05681 #define TC_BMR_MAXFILT_Msk (0x3fu << TC_BMR_MAXFILT_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_BMR) MAXimum FILTer */
05682 #define TC_BMR_MAXFILT(value) ((TC_BMR_MAXFILT_Msk & ((value) << TC_BMR_MAXFILT_Pos)))
05683 /* -------- TC_QIER : (TC Offset: 0xC8) QDEC Interrupt Enable Register -------- */
05684 #define TC_QIER_IDX (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_QIER) InDeX */
05685 #define TC_QIER_DIRCHG (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (TC_QIER) DIRection CHanGe */
05686 #define TC_QIER_QERR (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (TC_QIER) Quadrature ERRor */
05687 /* -------- TC_QIDR : (TC Offset: 0xCC) QDEC Interrupt Disable Register -------- */
05688 #define TC_QIDR_IDX (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_QIDR) InDeX */
05689 #define TC_QIDR_DIRCHG (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (TC_QIDR) DIRection CHanGe */
05690 #define TC_QIDR_QERR (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (TC_QIDR) Quadrature ERRor */
05691 /* -------- TC_QIMR : (TC Offset: 0xD0) QDEC Interrupt Mask Register -------- */
05692 #define TC_QIMR_IDX (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_QIMR) InDeX */
05693 #define TC_QIMR_DIRCHG (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (TC_QIMR) DIRection CHanGe */
05694 #define TC_QIMR_QERR (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (TC_QIMR) Quadrature ERRor */
05695 /* -------- TC_QISR : (TC Offset: 0xD4) QDEC Interrupt Status Register -------- */
05696 #define TC_QISR_IDX (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_QISR) InDeX */
05697 #define TC_QISR_DIRCHG (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (TC_QISR) DIRection CHanGe */
05698 #define TC_QISR_QERR (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (TC_QISR) Quadrature ERRor */
05699 #define TC_QISR_DIR (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (TC_QISR) Direction */
05700 /* -------- TC_FMR : (TC Offset: 0xD8) Fault Mode Register -------- */
05701 #define TC_FMR_ENCF0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_FMR) ENable Compare Fault Channel 0 */
05702 #define TC_FMR_ENCF1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (TC_FMR) ENable Compare Fault Channel 1 */
05703 /* -------- TC_WPMR : (TC Offset: 0xE4) Write Protect Mode Register -------- */
05704 #define TC_WPMR_WPEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TC_WPMR) Write Protect Enable */
05705 #define TC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos 8
05706 #define TC_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk (0xffffffu << TC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos) /**< \brief (TC_WPMR) Write Protect KEY */
05707 #define TC_WPMR_WPKEY(value) ((TC_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk & ((value) << TC_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos)))
05708 
05709 /*@}*/
05710 
05711 /* ============================================================================= */
05712 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Two-wire Interface */
05713 /* ============================================================================= */
05714 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_TWI Two-wire Interface */
05715 /*@{*/
05716 
05717 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
05718 /** \brief Twi hardware registers */
05719 typedef struct {
05720   WoReg TWI_CR;        /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x00) Control Register */
05721   RwReg TWI_MMR;       /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x04) Master Mode Register */
05722   RwReg TWI_SMR;       /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x08) Slave Mode Register */
05723   RwReg TWI_IADR;      /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x0C) Internal Address Register */
05724   RwReg TWI_CWGR;      /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x10) Clock Waveform Generator Register */
05725   RwReg Reserved1[3];
05726   RoReg TWI_SR;        /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x20) Status Register */
05727   WoReg TWI_IER;       /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x24) Interrupt Enable Register */
05728   WoReg TWI_IDR;       /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x28) Interrupt Disable Register */
05729   RoReg TWI_IMR;       /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x2C) Interrupt Mask Register */
05730   RoReg TWI_RHR;       /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x30) Receive Holding Register */
05731   WoReg TWI_THR;       /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x34) Transmit Holding Register */
05732   RwReg Reserved2[50];
05733   RwReg TWI_RPR;       /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register */
05734   RwReg TWI_RCR;       /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register */
05735   RwReg TWI_TPR;       /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register */
05736   RwReg TWI_TCR;       /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register */
05737   RwReg TWI_RNPR;      /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register */
05738   RwReg TWI_RNCR;      /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register */
05739   RwReg TWI_TNPR;      /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register */
05740   RwReg TWI_TNCR;      /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register */
05741   WoReg TWI_PTCR;      /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register */
05742   RoReg TWI_PTSR;      /**< \brief (Twi Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register */
05743 } Twi;
05744 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
05745 /* -------- TWI_CR : (TWI Offset: 0x00) Control Register -------- */
05746 #define TWI_CR_START (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TWI_CR) Send a START Condition */
05747 #define TWI_CR_STOP (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (TWI_CR) Send a STOP Condition */
05748 #define TWI_CR_MSEN (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (TWI_CR) TWI Master Mode Enabled */
05749 #define TWI_CR_MSDIS (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (TWI_CR) TWI Master Mode Disabled */
05750 #define TWI_CR_SVEN (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (TWI_CR) TWI Slave Mode Enabled */
05751 #define TWI_CR_SVDIS (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (TWI_CR) TWI Slave Mode Disabled */
05752 #define TWI_CR_QUICK (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (TWI_CR) SMBUS Quick Command */
05753 #define TWI_CR_SWRST (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (TWI_CR) Software Reset */
05754 /* -------- TWI_MMR : (TWI Offset: 0x04) Master Mode Register -------- */
05755 #define TWI_MMR_IADRSZ_Pos 8
05756 #define TWI_MMR_IADRSZ_Msk (0x3u << TWI_MMR_IADRSZ_Pos) /**< \brief (TWI_MMR) Internal Device Address Size */
05757 #define   TWI_MMR_IADRSZ_NONE (0x0u << 8) /**< \brief (TWI_MMR) No internal device address */
05758 #define   TWI_MMR_IADRSZ_1_BYTE (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (TWI_MMR) One-byte internal device address */
05759 #define   TWI_MMR_IADRSZ_2_BYTE (0x2u << 8) /**< \brief (TWI_MMR) Two-byte internal device address */
05760 #define   TWI_MMR_IADRSZ_3_BYTE (0x3u << 8) /**< \brief (TWI_MMR) Three-byte internal device address */
05761 #define TWI_MMR_MREAD (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (TWI_MMR) Master Read Direction */
05762 #define TWI_MMR_DADR_Pos 16
05763 #define TWI_MMR_DADR_Msk (0x7fu << TWI_MMR_DADR_Pos) /**< \brief (TWI_MMR) Device Address */
05764 #define TWI_MMR_DADR(value) ((TWI_MMR_DADR_Msk & ((value) << TWI_MMR_DADR_Pos)))
05765 /* -------- TWI_SMR : (TWI Offset: 0x08) Slave Mode Register -------- */
05766 #define TWI_SMR_SADR_Pos 16
05767 #define TWI_SMR_SADR_Msk (0x7fu << TWI_SMR_SADR_Pos) /**< \brief (TWI_SMR) Slave Address */
05768 #define TWI_SMR_SADR(value) ((TWI_SMR_SADR_Msk & ((value) << TWI_SMR_SADR_Pos)))
05769 /* -------- TWI_IADR : (TWI Offset: 0x0C) Internal Address Register -------- */
05770 #define TWI_IADR_IADR_Pos 0
05771 #define TWI_IADR_IADR_Msk (0xffffffu << TWI_IADR_IADR_Pos) /**< \brief (TWI_IADR) Internal Address */
05772 #define TWI_IADR_IADR(value) ((TWI_IADR_IADR_Msk & ((value) << TWI_IADR_IADR_Pos)))
05773 /* -------- TWI_CWGR : (TWI Offset: 0x10) Clock Waveform Generator Register -------- */
05774 #define TWI_CWGR_CLDIV_Pos 0
05775 #define TWI_CWGR_CLDIV_Msk (0xffu << TWI_CWGR_CLDIV_Pos) /**< \brief (TWI_CWGR) Clock Low Divider */
05776 #define TWI_CWGR_CLDIV(value) ((TWI_CWGR_CLDIV_Msk & ((value) << TWI_CWGR_CLDIV_Pos)))
05777 #define TWI_CWGR_CHDIV_Pos 8
05778 #define TWI_CWGR_CHDIV_Msk (0xffu << TWI_CWGR_CHDIV_Pos) /**< \brief (TWI_CWGR) Clock High Divider */
05779 #define TWI_CWGR_CHDIV(value) ((TWI_CWGR_CHDIV_Msk & ((value) << TWI_CWGR_CHDIV_Pos)))
05780 #define TWI_CWGR_CKDIV_Pos 16
05781 #define TWI_CWGR_CKDIV_Msk (0x7u << TWI_CWGR_CKDIV_Pos) /**< \brief (TWI_CWGR) Clock Divider */
05782 #define TWI_CWGR_CKDIV(value) ((TWI_CWGR_CKDIV_Msk & ((value) << TWI_CWGR_CKDIV_Pos)))
05783 /* -------- TWI_SR : (TWI Offset: 0x20) Status Register -------- */
05784 #define TWI_SR_TXCOMP (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TWI_SR) Transmission Completed (automatically set / reset) */
05785 #define TWI_SR_RXRDY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (TWI_SR) Receive Holding Register Ready (automatically set / reset) */
05786 #define TWI_SR_TXRDY (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (TWI_SR) Transmit Holding Register Ready (automatically set / reset) */
05787 #define TWI_SR_SVREAD (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (TWI_SR) Slave Read (automatically set / reset) */
05788 #define TWI_SR_SVACC (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (TWI_SR) Slave Access (automatically set / reset) */
05789 #define TWI_SR_GACC (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (TWI_SR) General Call Access (clear on read) */
05790 #define TWI_SR_OVRE (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (TWI_SR) Overrun Error (clear on read) */
05791 #define TWI_SR_NACK (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (TWI_SR) Not Acknowledged (clear on read) */
05792 #define TWI_SR_ARBLST (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (TWI_SR) Arbitration Lost (clear on read) */
05793 #define TWI_SR_SCLWS (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (TWI_SR) Clock Wait State (automatically set / reset) */
05794 #define TWI_SR_EOSACC (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (TWI_SR) End Of Slave Access (clear on read) */
05795 #define TWI_SR_ENDRX (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (TWI_SR) End of RX buffer */
05796 #define TWI_SR_ENDTX (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (TWI_SR) End of TX buffer */
05797 #define TWI_SR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (TWI_SR) RX Buffer Full */
05798 #define TWI_SR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (TWI_SR) TX Buffer Empty */
05799 /* -------- TWI_IER : (TWI Offset: 0x24) Interrupt Enable Register -------- */
05800 #define TWI_IER_TXCOMP (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TWI_IER) Transmission Completed Interrupt Enable */
05801 #define TWI_IER_RXRDY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (TWI_IER) Receive Holding Register Ready Interrupt Enable */
05802 #define TWI_IER_TXRDY (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (TWI_IER) Transmit Holding Register Ready Interrupt Enable */
05803 #define TWI_IER_SVACC (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (TWI_IER) Slave Access Interrupt Enable */
05804 #define TWI_IER_GACC (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (TWI_IER) General Call Access Interrupt Enable */
05805 #define TWI_IER_OVRE (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (TWI_IER) Overrun Error Interrupt Enable */
05806 #define TWI_IER_NACK (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (TWI_IER) Not Acknowledge Interrupt Enable */
05807 #define TWI_IER_ARBLST (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (TWI_IER) Arbitration Lost Interrupt Enable */
05808 #define TWI_IER_SCL_WS (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (TWI_IER) Clock Wait State Interrupt Enable */
05809 #define TWI_IER_EOSACC (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (TWI_IER) End Of Slave Access Interrupt Enable */
05810 #define TWI_IER_ENDRX (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (TWI_IER) End of Receive Buffer Interrupt Enable */
05811 #define TWI_IER_ENDTX (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (TWI_IER) End of Transmit Buffer Interrupt Enable */
05812 #define TWI_IER_RXBUFF (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (TWI_IER) Receive Buffer Full Interrupt Enable */
05813 #define TWI_IER_TXBUFE (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (TWI_IER) Transmit Buffer Empty Interrupt Enable */
05814 /* -------- TWI_IDR : (TWI Offset: 0x28) Interrupt Disable Register -------- */
05815 #define TWI_IDR_TXCOMP (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TWI_IDR) Transmission Completed Interrupt Disable */
05816 #define TWI_IDR_RXRDY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (TWI_IDR) Receive Holding Register Ready Interrupt Disable */
05817 #define TWI_IDR_TXRDY (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (TWI_IDR) Transmit Holding Register Ready Interrupt Disable */
05818 #define TWI_IDR_SVACC (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (TWI_IDR) Slave Access Interrupt Disable */
05819 #define TWI_IDR_GACC (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (TWI_IDR) General Call Access Interrupt Disable */
05820 #define TWI_IDR_OVRE (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (TWI_IDR) Overrun Error Interrupt Disable */
05821 #define TWI_IDR_NACK (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (TWI_IDR) Not Acknowledge Interrupt Disable */
05822 #define TWI_IDR_ARBLST (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (TWI_IDR) Arbitration Lost Interrupt Disable */
05823 #define TWI_IDR_SCL_WS (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (TWI_IDR) Clock Wait State Interrupt Disable */
05824 #define TWI_IDR_EOSACC (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (TWI_IDR) End Of Slave Access Interrupt Disable */
05825 #define TWI_IDR_ENDRX (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (TWI_IDR) End of Receive Buffer Interrupt Disable */
05826 #define TWI_IDR_ENDTX (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (TWI_IDR) End of Transmit Buffer Interrupt Disable */
05827 #define TWI_IDR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (TWI_IDR) Receive Buffer Full Interrupt Disable */
05828 #define TWI_IDR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (TWI_IDR) Transmit Buffer Empty Interrupt Disable */
05829 /* -------- TWI_IMR : (TWI Offset: 0x2C) Interrupt Mask Register -------- */
05830 #define TWI_IMR_TXCOMP (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TWI_IMR) Transmission Completed Interrupt Mask */
05831 #define TWI_IMR_RXRDY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (TWI_IMR) Receive Holding Register Ready Interrupt Mask */
05832 #define TWI_IMR_TXRDY (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (TWI_IMR) Transmit Holding Register Ready Interrupt Mask */
05833 #define TWI_IMR_SVACC (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (TWI_IMR) Slave Access Interrupt Mask */
05834 #define TWI_IMR_GACC (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (TWI_IMR) General Call Access Interrupt Mask */
05835 #define TWI_IMR_OVRE (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (TWI_IMR) Overrun Error Interrupt Mask */
05836 #define TWI_IMR_NACK (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (TWI_IMR) Not Acknowledge Interrupt Mask */
05837 #define TWI_IMR_ARBLST (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (TWI_IMR) Arbitration Lost Interrupt Mask */
05838 #define TWI_IMR_SCL_WS (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (TWI_IMR) Clock Wait State Interrupt Mask */
05839 #define TWI_IMR_EOSACC (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (TWI_IMR) End Of Slave Access Interrupt Mask */
05840 #define TWI_IMR_ENDRX (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (TWI_IMR) End of Receive Buffer Interrupt Mask */
05841 #define TWI_IMR_ENDTX (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (TWI_IMR) End of Transmit Buffer Interrupt Mask */
05842 #define TWI_IMR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (TWI_IMR) Receive Buffer Full Interrupt Mask */
05843 #define TWI_IMR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (TWI_IMR) Transmit Buffer Empty Interrupt Mask */
05844 /* -------- TWI_RHR : (TWI Offset: 0x30) Receive Holding Register -------- */
05845 #define TWI_RHR_RXDATA_Pos 0
05846 #define TWI_RHR_RXDATA_Msk (0xffu << TWI_RHR_RXDATA_Pos) /**< \brief (TWI_RHR) Master or Slave Receive Holding Data */
05847 /* -------- TWI_THR : (TWI Offset: 0x34) Transmit Holding Register -------- */
05848 #define TWI_THR_TXDATA_Pos 0
05849 #define TWI_THR_TXDATA_Msk (0xffu << TWI_THR_TXDATA_Pos) /**< \brief (TWI_THR) Master or Slave Transmit Holding Data */
05850 #define TWI_THR_TXDATA(value) ((TWI_THR_TXDATA_Msk & ((value) << TWI_THR_TXDATA_Pos)))
05851 /* -------- TWI_RPR : (TWI Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register -------- */
05852 #define TWI_RPR_RXPTR_Pos 0
05853 #define TWI_RPR_RXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << TWI_RPR_RXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (TWI_RPR) Receive Pointer Register */
05854 #define TWI_RPR_RXPTR(value) ((TWI_RPR_RXPTR_Msk & ((value) << TWI_RPR_RXPTR_Pos)))
05855 /* -------- TWI_RCR : (TWI Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register -------- */
05856 #define TWI_RCR_RXCTR_Pos 0
05857 #define TWI_RCR_RXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << TWI_RCR_RXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (TWI_RCR) Receive Counter Register */
05858 #define TWI_RCR_RXCTR(value) ((TWI_RCR_RXCTR_Msk & ((value) << TWI_RCR_RXCTR_Pos)))
05859 /* -------- TWI_TPR : (TWI Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register -------- */
05860 #define TWI_TPR_TXPTR_Pos 0
05861 #define TWI_TPR_TXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << TWI_TPR_TXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (TWI_TPR) Transmit Counter Register */
05862 #define TWI_TPR_TXPTR(value) ((TWI_TPR_TXPTR_Msk & ((value) << TWI_TPR_TXPTR_Pos)))
05863 /* -------- TWI_TCR : (TWI Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register -------- */
05864 #define TWI_TCR_TXCTR_Pos 0
05865 #define TWI_TCR_TXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << TWI_TCR_TXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (TWI_TCR) Transmit Counter Register */
05866 #define TWI_TCR_TXCTR(value) ((TWI_TCR_TXCTR_Msk & ((value) << TWI_TCR_TXCTR_Pos)))
05867 /* -------- TWI_RNPR : (TWI Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register -------- */
05868 #define TWI_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos 0
05869 #define TWI_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << TWI_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (TWI_RNPR) Receive Next Pointer */
05870 #define TWI_RNPR_RXNPTR(value) ((TWI_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << TWI_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos)))
05871 /* -------- TWI_RNCR : (TWI Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register -------- */
05872 #define TWI_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos 0
05873 #define TWI_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << TWI_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (TWI_RNCR) Receive Next Counter */
05874 #define TWI_RNCR_RXNCTR(value) ((TWI_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << TWI_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos)))
05875 /* -------- TWI_TNPR : (TWI Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register -------- */
05876 #define TWI_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos 0
05877 #define TWI_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << TWI_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (TWI_TNPR) Transmit Next Pointer */
05878 #define TWI_TNPR_TXNPTR(value) ((TWI_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << TWI_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos)))
05879 /* -------- TWI_TNCR : (TWI Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register -------- */
05880 #define TWI_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos 0
05881 #define TWI_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << TWI_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (TWI_TNCR) Transmit Counter Next */
05882 #define TWI_TNCR_TXNCTR(value) ((TWI_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << TWI_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos)))
05883 /* -------- TWI_PTCR : (TWI Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register -------- */
05884 #define TWI_PTCR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TWI_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
05885 #define TWI_PTCR_RXTDIS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (TWI_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Disable */
05886 #define TWI_PTCR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (TWI_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
05887 #define TWI_PTCR_TXTDIS (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (TWI_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Disable */
05888 /* -------- TWI_PTSR : (TWI Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register -------- */
05889 #define TWI_PTSR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (TWI_PTSR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
05890 #define TWI_PTSR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (TWI_PTSR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
05891 
05892 /*@}*/
05893 
05894 /* ============================================================================= */
05895 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Universal Asynchronous Receiver Transmitter */
05896 /* ============================================================================= */
05897 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_UART Universal Asynchronous Receiver Transmitter */
05898 /*@{*/
05899 
05900 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
05901 /** \brief Uart hardware registers */
05902 typedef struct {
05903   WoReg UART_CR;       /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x0000) Control Register */
05904   RwReg UART_MR;       /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x0004) Mode Register */
05905   WoReg UART_IER;      /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x0008) Interrupt Enable Register */
05906   WoReg UART_IDR;      /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x000C) Interrupt Disable Register */
05907   RoReg UART_IMR;      /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x0010) Interrupt Mask Register */
05908   RoReg UART_SR;       /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x0014) Status Register */
05909   RoReg UART_RHR;      /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x0018) Receive Holding Register */
05910   WoReg UART_THR;      /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x001C) Transmit Holding Register */
05911   RwReg UART_BRGR;     /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x0020) Baud Rate Generator Register */
05912   RwReg Reserved1[55];
05913   RwReg UART_RPR;      /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register */
05914   RwReg UART_RCR;      /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register */
05915   RwReg UART_TPR;      /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register */
05916   RwReg UART_TCR;      /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register */
05917   RwReg UART_RNPR;     /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register */
05918   RwReg UART_RNCR;     /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register */
05919   RwReg UART_TNPR;     /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register */
05920   RwReg UART_TNCR;     /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register */
05921   WoReg UART_PTCR;     /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register */
05922   RoReg UART_PTSR;     /**< \brief (Uart Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register */
05923 } Uart;
05924 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
05925 /* -------- UART_CR : (UART Offset: 0x0000) Control Register -------- */
05926 #define UART_CR_RSTRX (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (UART_CR) Reset Receiver */
05927 #define UART_CR_RSTTX (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (UART_CR) Reset Transmitter */
05928 #define UART_CR_RXEN (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (UART_CR) Receiver Enable */
05929 #define UART_CR_RXDIS (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (UART_CR) Receiver Disable */
05930 #define UART_CR_TXEN (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (UART_CR) Transmitter Enable */
05931 #define UART_CR_TXDIS (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (UART_CR) Transmitter Disable */
05932 #define UART_CR_RSTSTA (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (UART_CR) Reset Status Bits */
05933 /* -------- UART_MR : (UART Offset: 0x0004) Mode Register -------- */
05934 #define UART_MR_PAR_Pos 9
05935 #define UART_MR_PAR_Msk (0x7u << UART_MR_PAR_Pos) /**< \brief (UART_MR) Parity Type */
05936 #define   UART_MR_PAR_EVEN (0x0u << 9) /**< \brief (UART_MR) Even parity */
05937 #define   UART_MR_PAR_ODD (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (UART_MR) Odd parity */
05938 #define   UART_MR_PAR_SPACE (0x2u << 9) /**< \brief (UART_MR) Space: parity forced to 0 */
05939 #define   UART_MR_PAR_MARK (0x3u << 9) /**< \brief (UART_MR) Mark: parity forced to 1 */
05940 #define   UART_MR_PAR_NO (0x4u << 9) /**< \brief (UART_MR) No parity */
05941 #define UART_MR_CHMODE_Pos 14
05942 #define UART_MR_CHMODE_Msk (0x3u << UART_MR_CHMODE_Pos) /**< \brief (UART_MR) Channel Mode */
05943 #define   UART_MR_CHMODE_NORMAL (0x0u << 14) /**< \brief (UART_MR) Normal Mode */
05944 #define   UART_MR_CHMODE_AUTOMATIC (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (UART_MR) Automatic Echo */
05945 #define   UART_MR_CHMODE_LOCAL_LOOPBACK (0x2u << 14) /**< \brief (UART_MR) Local Loopback */
05946 #define   UART_MR_CHMODE_REMOTE_LOOPBACK (0x3u << 14) /**< \brief (UART_MR) Remote Loopback */
05947 /* -------- UART_IER : (UART Offset: 0x0008) Interrupt Enable Register -------- */
05948 #define UART_IER_RXRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (UART_IER) Enable RXRDY Interrupt */
05949 #define UART_IER_TXRDY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (UART_IER) Enable TXRDY Interrupt */
05950 #define UART_IER_ENDRX (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (UART_IER) Enable End of Receive Transfer Interrupt */
05951 #define UART_IER_ENDTX (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (UART_IER) Enable End of Transmit Interrupt */
05952 #define UART_IER_OVRE (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (UART_IER) Enable Overrun Error Interrupt */
05953 #define UART_IER_FRAME (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (UART_IER) Enable Framing Error Interrupt */
05954 #define UART_IER_PARE (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (UART_IER) Enable Parity Error Interrupt */
05955 #define UART_IER_TXEMPTY (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (UART_IER) Enable TXEMPTY Interrupt */
05956 #define UART_IER_TXBUFE (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (UART_IER) Enable Buffer Empty Interrupt */
05957 #define UART_IER_RXBUFF (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (UART_IER) Enable Buffer Full Interrupt */
05958 /* -------- UART_IDR : (UART Offset: 0x000C) Interrupt Disable Register -------- */
05959 #define UART_IDR_RXRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (UART_IDR) Disable RXRDY Interrupt */
05960 #define UART_IDR_TXRDY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (UART_IDR) Disable TXRDY Interrupt */
05961 #define UART_IDR_ENDRX (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (UART_IDR) Disable End of Receive Transfer Interrupt */
05962 #define UART_IDR_ENDTX (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (UART_IDR) Disable End of Transmit Interrupt */
05963 #define UART_IDR_OVRE (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (UART_IDR) Disable Overrun Error Interrupt */
05964 #define UART_IDR_FRAME (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (UART_IDR) Disable Framing Error Interrupt */
05965 #define UART_IDR_PARE (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (UART_IDR) Disable Parity Error Interrupt */
05966 #define UART_IDR_TXEMPTY (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (UART_IDR) Disable TXEMPTY Interrupt */
05967 #define UART_IDR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (UART_IDR) Disable Buffer Empty Interrupt */
05968 #define UART_IDR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (UART_IDR) Disable Buffer Full Interrupt */
05969 /* -------- UART_IMR : (UART Offset: 0x0010) Interrupt Mask Register -------- */
05970 #define UART_IMR_RXRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (UART_IMR) Mask RXRDY Interrupt */
05971 #define UART_IMR_TXRDY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (UART_IMR) Disable TXRDY Interrupt */
05972 #define UART_IMR_ENDRX (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (UART_IMR) Mask End of Receive Transfer Interrupt */
05973 #define UART_IMR_ENDTX (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (UART_IMR) Mask End of Transmit Interrupt */
05974 #define UART_IMR_OVRE (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (UART_IMR) Mask Overrun Error Interrupt */
05975 #define UART_IMR_FRAME (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (UART_IMR) Mask Framing Error Interrupt */
05976 #define UART_IMR_PARE (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (UART_IMR) Mask Parity Error Interrupt */
05977 #define UART_IMR_TXEMPTY (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (UART_IMR) Mask TXEMPTY Interrupt */
05978 #define UART_IMR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (UART_IMR) Mask TXBUFE Interrupt */
05979 #define UART_IMR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (UART_IMR) Mask RXBUFF Interrupt */
05980 /* -------- UART_SR : (UART Offset: 0x0014) Status Register -------- */
05981 #define UART_SR_RXRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (UART_SR) Receiver Ready */
05982 #define UART_SR_TXRDY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (UART_SR) Transmitter Ready */
05983 #define UART_SR_ENDRX (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (UART_SR) End of Receiver Transfer */
05984 #define UART_SR_ENDTX (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (UART_SR) End of Transmitter Transfer */
05985 #define UART_SR_OVRE (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (UART_SR) Overrun Error */
05986 #define UART_SR_FRAME (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (UART_SR) Framing Error */
05987 #define UART_SR_PARE (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (UART_SR) Parity Error */
05988 #define UART_SR_TXEMPTY (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (UART_SR) Transmitter Empty */
05989 #define UART_SR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (UART_SR) Transmission Buffer Empty */
05990 #define UART_SR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (UART_SR) Receive Buffer Full */
05991 /* -------- UART_RHR : (UART Offset: 0x0018) Receive Holding Register -------- */
05992 #define UART_RHR_RXCHR_Pos 0
05993 #define UART_RHR_RXCHR_Msk (0xffu << UART_RHR_RXCHR_Pos) /**< \brief (UART_RHR) Received Character */
05994 /* -------- UART_THR : (UART Offset: 0x001C) Transmit Holding Register -------- */
05995 #define UART_THR_TXCHR_Pos 0
05996 #define UART_THR_TXCHR_Msk (0xffu << UART_THR_TXCHR_Pos) /**< \brief (UART_THR) Character to be Transmitted */
05997 #define UART_THR_TXCHR(value) ((UART_THR_TXCHR_Msk & ((value) << UART_THR_TXCHR_Pos)))
05998 /* -------- UART_BRGR : (UART Offset: 0x0020) Baud Rate Generator Register -------- */
05999 #define UART_BRGR_CD_Pos 0
06000 #define UART_BRGR_CD_Msk (0xffffu << UART_BRGR_CD_Pos) /**< \brief (UART_BRGR) Clock Divisor */
06001 #define UART_BRGR_CD(value) ((UART_BRGR_CD_Msk & ((value) << UART_BRGR_CD_Pos)))
06002 /* -------- UART_RPR : (UART Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register -------- */
06003 #define UART_RPR_RXPTR_Pos 0
06004 #define UART_RPR_RXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << UART_RPR_RXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (UART_RPR) Receive Pointer Register */
06005 #define UART_RPR_RXPTR(value) ((UART_RPR_RXPTR_Msk & ((value) << UART_RPR_RXPTR_Pos)))
06006 /* -------- UART_RCR : (UART Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register -------- */
06007 #define UART_RCR_RXCTR_Pos 0
06008 #define UART_RCR_RXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << UART_RCR_RXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (UART_RCR) Receive Counter Register */
06009 #define UART_RCR_RXCTR(value) ((UART_RCR_RXCTR_Msk & ((value) << UART_RCR_RXCTR_Pos)))
06010 /* -------- UART_TPR : (UART Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register -------- */
06011 #define UART_TPR_TXPTR_Pos 0
06012 #define UART_TPR_TXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << UART_TPR_TXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (UART_TPR) Transmit Counter Register */
06013 #define UART_TPR_TXPTR(value) ((UART_TPR_TXPTR_Msk & ((value) << UART_TPR_TXPTR_Pos)))
06014 /* -------- UART_TCR : (UART Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register -------- */
06015 #define UART_TCR_TXCTR_Pos 0
06016 #define UART_TCR_TXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << UART_TCR_TXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (UART_TCR) Transmit Counter Register */
06017 #define UART_TCR_TXCTR(value) ((UART_TCR_TXCTR_Msk & ((value) << UART_TCR_TXCTR_Pos)))
06018 /* -------- UART_RNPR : (UART Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register -------- */
06019 #define UART_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos 0
06020 #define UART_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << UART_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (UART_RNPR) Receive Next Pointer */
06021 #define UART_RNPR_RXNPTR(value) ((UART_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << UART_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos)))
06022 /* -------- UART_RNCR : (UART Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register -------- */
06023 #define UART_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos 0
06024 #define UART_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << UART_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (UART_RNCR) Receive Next Counter */
06025 #define UART_RNCR_RXNCTR(value) ((UART_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << UART_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos)))
06026 /* -------- UART_TNPR : (UART Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register -------- */
06027 #define UART_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos 0
06028 #define UART_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << UART_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (UART_TNPR) Transmit Next Pointer */
06029 #define UART_TNPR_TXNPTR(value) ((UART_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << UART_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos)))
06030 /* -------- UART_TNCR : (UART Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register -------- */
06031 #define UART_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos 0
06032 #define UART_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << UART_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (UART_TNCR) Transmit Counter Next */
06033 #define UART_TNCR_TXNCTR(value) ((UART_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << UART_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos)))
06034 /* -------- UART_PTCR : (UART Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register -------- */
06035 #define UART_PTCR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (UART_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
06036 #define UART_PTCR_RXTDIS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (UART_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Disable */
06037 #define UART_PTCR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (UART_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
06038 #define UART_PTCR_TXTDIS (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (UART_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Disable */
06039 /* -------- UART_PTSR : (UART Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register -------- */
06040 #define UART_PTSR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (UART_PTSR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
06041 #define UART_PTSR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (UART_PTSR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
06042 
06043 /*@}*/
06044 
06045 /* ============================================================================= */
06046 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR USB Device Port */
06047 /* ============================================================================= */
06048 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_UDP USB Device Port */
06049 /*@{*/
06050 
06051 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
06052 /** \brief Udp hardware registers */
06053 typedef struct {
06054   RoReg UDP_FRM_NUM;  /**< \brief (Udp Offset: 0x000) Frame Number Register */
06055   RwReg UDP_GLB_STAT; /**< \brief (Udp Offset: 0x004) Global State Register */
06056   RwReg UDP_FADDR;    /**< \brief (Udp Offset: 0x008) Function Address Register */
06057   RwReg Reserved1[1];
06058   WoReg UDP_IER;      /**< \brief (Udp Offset: 0x010) Interrupt Enable Register */
06059   WoReg UDP_IDR;      /**< \brief (Udp Offset: 0x014) Interrupt Disable Register */
06060   RoReg UDP_IMR;      /**< \brief (Udp Offset: 0x018) Interrupt Mask Register */
06061   RoReg UDP_ISR;      /**< \brief (Udp Offset: 0x01C) Interrupt Status Register */
06062   WoReg UDP_ICR;      /**< \brief (Udp Offset: 0x020) Interrupt Clear Register */
06063   RwReg Reserved2[1];
06064   RwReg UDP_RST_EP;   /**< \brief (Udp Offset: 0x028) Reset Endpoint Register */
06065   RwReg Reserved3[1];
06066   RwReg UDP_CSR[8];   /**< \brief (Udp Offset: 0x030) Endpoint Control and Status Register */
06067   RwReg UDP_FDR[8];   /**< \brief (Udp Offset: 0x050) Endpoint FIFO Data Register */
06068   RwReg Reserved4[1];
06069   RwReg UDP_TXVC;     /**< \brief (Udp Offset: 0x074) Transceiver Control Register */
06070 } Udp;
06071 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
06072 /* -------- UDP_FRM_NUM : (UDP Offset: 0x000) Frame Number Register -------- */
06073 #define UDP_FRM_NUM_FRM_NUM_Pos 0
06074 #define UDP_FRM_NUM_FRM_NUM_Msk (0x7ffu << UDP_FRM_NUM_FRM_NUM_Pos) /**< \brief (UDP_FRM_NUM) Frame Number as Defined in the Packet Field Formats */
06075 #define UDP_FRM_NUM_FRM_ERR (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (UDP_FRM_NUM) Frame Error */
06076 #define UDP_FRM_NUM_FRM_OK (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (UDP_FRM_NUM) Frame OK */
06077 /* -------- UDP_GLB_STAT : (UDP Offset: 0x004) Global State Register -------- */
06078 #define UDP_GLB_STAT_FADDEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (UDP_GLB_STAT) Function Address Enable */
06079 #define UDP_GLB_STAT_CONFG (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (UDP_GLB_STAT) Configured */
06080 #define UDP_GLB_STAT_ESR (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (UDP_GLB_STAT) Enable Send Resume */
06081 #define UDP_GLB_STAT_RSMINPR (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (UDP_GLB_STAT)  */
06082 #define UDP_GLB_STAT_RMWUPE (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (UDP_GLB_STAT) Remote Wake Up Enable */
06083 /* -------- UDP_FADDR : (UDP Offset: 0x008) Function Address Register -------- */
06084 #define UDP_FADDR_FADD_Pos 0
06085 #define UDP_FADDR_FADD_Msk (0x7fu << UDP_FADDR_FADD_Pos) /**< \brief (UDP_FADDR) Function Address Value */
06086 #define UDP_FADDR_FADD(value) ((UDP_FADDR_FADD_Msk & ((value) << UDP_FADDR_FADD_Pos)))
06087 #define UDP_FADDR_FEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (UDP_FADDR) Function Enable */
06088 /* -------- UDP_IER : (UDP Offset: 0x010) Interrupt Enable Register -------- */
06089 #define UDP_IER_EP0INT (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (UDP_IER) Enable Endpoint 0 Interrupt */
06090 #define UDP_IER_EP1INT (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (UDP_IER) Enable Endpoint 1 Interrupt */
06091 #define UDP_IER_EP2INT (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (UDP_IER) Enable Endpoint 2Interrupt */
06092 #define UDP_IER_EP3INT (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (UDP_IER) Enable Endpoint 3 Interrupt */
06093 #define UDP_IER_EP4INT (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (UDP_IER) Enable Endpoint 4 Interrupt */
06094 #define UDP_IER_EP5INT (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (UDP_IER) Enable Endpoint 5 Interrupt */
06095 #define UDP_IER_EP6INT (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (UDP_IER) Enable Endpoint 6 Interrupt */
06096 #define UDP_IER_EP7INT (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (UDP_IER) Enable Endpoint 7 Interrupt */
06097 #define UDP_IER_RXSUSP (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (UDP_IER) Enable UDP Suspend Interrupt */
06098 #define UDP_IER_RXRSM (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (UDP_IER) Enable UDP Resume Interrupt */
06099 #define UDP_IER_EXTRSM (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (UDP_IER)  */
06100 #define UDP_IER_SOFINT (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (UDP_IER) Enable Start Of Frame Interrupt */
06101 #define UDP_IER_WAKEUP (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (UDP_IER) Enable UDP bus Wakeup Interrupt */
06102 /* -------- UDP_IDR : (UDP Offset: 0x014) Interrupt Disable Register -------- */
06103 #define UDP_IDR_EP0INT (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (UDP_IDR) Disable Endpoint 0 Interrupt */
06104 #define UDP_IDR_EP1INT (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (UDP_IDR) Disable Endpoint 1 Interrupt */
06105 #define UDP_IDR_EP2INT (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (UDP_IDR) Disable Endpoint 2 Interrupt */
06106 #define UDP_IDR_EP3INT (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (UDP_IDR) Disable Endpoint 3 Interrupt */
06107 #define UDP_IDR_EP4INT (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (UDP_IDR) Disable Endpoint 4 Interrupt */
06108 #define UDP_IDR_EP5INT (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (UDP_IDR) Disable Endpoint 5 Interrupt */
06109 #define UDP_IDR_EP6INT (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (UDP_IDR) Disable Endpoint 6 Interrupt */
06110 #define UDP_IDR_EP7INT (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (UDP_IDR) Disable Endpoint 7 Interrupt */
06111 #define UDP_IDR_RXSUSP (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (UDP_IDR) Disable UDP Suspend Interrupt */
06112 #define UDP_IDR_RXRSM (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (UDP_IDR) Disable UDP Resume Interrupt */
06113 #define UDP_IDR_EXTRSM (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (UDP_IDR)  */
06114 #define UDP_IDR_SOFINT (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (UDP_IDR) Disable Start Of Frame Interrupt */
06115 #define UDP_IDR_WAKEUP (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (UDP_IDR) Disable USB Bus Interrupt */
06116 /* -------- UDP_IMR : (UDP Offset: 0x018) Interrupt Mask Register -------- */
06117 #define UDP_IMR_EP0INT (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (UDP_IMR) Mask Endpoint 0 Interrupt */
06118 #define UDP_IMR_EP1INT (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (UDP_IMR) Mask Endpoint 1 Interrupt */
06119 #define UDP_IMR_EP2INT (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (UDP_IMR) Mask Endpoint 2 Interrupt */
06120 #define UDP_IMR_EP3INT (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (UDP_IMR) Mask Endpoint 3 Interrupt */
06121 #define UDP_IMR_EP4INT (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (UDP_IMR) Mask Endpoint 4 Interrupt */
06122 #define UDP_IMR_EP5INT (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (UDP_IMR) Mask Endpoint 5 Interrupt */
06123 #define UDP_IMR_EP6INT (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (UDP_IMR) Mask Endpoint 6 Interrupt */
06124 #define UDP_IMR_EP7INT (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (UDP_IMR) Mask Endpoint 7 Interrupt */
06125 #define UDP_IMR_RXSUSP (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (UDP_IMR) Mask UDP Suspend Interrupt */
06126 #define UDP_IMR_RXRSM (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (UDP_IMR) Mask UDP Resume Interrupt. */
06127 #define UDP_IMR_EXTRSM (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (UDP_IMR)  */
06128 #define UDP_IMR_SOFINT (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (UDP_IMR) Mask Start Of Frame Interrupt */
06129 #define UDP_IMR_BIT12 (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (UDP_IMR) UDP_IMR Bit 12 */
06130 #define UDP_IMR_WAKEUP (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (UDP_IMR) USB Bus WAKEUP Interrupt */
06131 /* -------- UDP_ISR : (UDP Offset: 0x01C) Interrupt Status Register -------- */
06132 #define UDP_ISR_EP0INT (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (UDP_ISR) Endpoint 0 Interrupt Status */
06133 #define UDP_ISR_EP1INT (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (UDP_ISR) Endpoint 1 Interrupt Status */
06134 #define UDP_ISR_EP2INT (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (UDP_ISR) Endpoint 2 Interrupt Status */
06135 #define UDP_ISR_EP3INT (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (UDP_ISR) Endpoint 3 Interrupt Status */
06136 #define UDP_ISR_EP4INT (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (UDP_ISR) Endpoint 4 Interrupt Status */
06137 #define UDP_ISR_EP5INT (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (UDP_ISR) Endpoint 5 Interrupt Status */
06138 #define UDP_ISR_EP6INT (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (UDP_ISR) Endpoint 6 Interrupt Status */
06139 #define UDP_ISR_EP7INT (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (UDP_ISR) Endpoint 7Interrupt Status */
06140 #define UDP_ISR_RXSUSP (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (UDP_ISR) UDP Suspend Interrupt Status */
06141 #define UDP_ISR_RXRSM (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (UDP_ISR) UDP Resume Interrupt Status */
06142 #define UDP_ISR_EXTRSM (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (UDP_ISR)  */
06143 #define UDP_ISR_SOFINT (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (UDP_ISR) Start of Frame Interrupt Status */
06144 #define UDP_ISR_ENDBUSRES (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (UDP_ISR) End of BUS Reset Interrupt Status */
06145 #define UDP_ISR_WAKEUP (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (UDP_ISR) UDP Resume Interrupt Status */
06146 /* -------- UDP_ICR : (UDP Offset: 0x020) Interrupt Clear Register -------- */
06147 #define UDP_ICR_RXSUSP (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (UDP_ICR) Clear UDP Suspend Interrupt */
06148 #define UDP_ICR_RXRSM (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (UDP_ICR) Clear UDP Resume Interrupt */
06149 #define UDP_ICR_EXTRSM (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (UDP_ICR)  */
06150 #define UDP_ICR_SOFINT (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (UDP_ICR) Clear Start Of Frame Interrupt */
06151 #define UDP_ICR_ENDBUSRES (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (UDP_ICR) Clear End of Bus Reset Interrupt */
06152 #define UDP_ICR_WAKEUP (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (UDP_ICR) Clear Wakeup Interrupt */
06153 /* -------- UDP_RST_EP : (UDP Offset: 0x028) Reset Endpoint Register -------- */
06154 #define UDP_RST_EP_EP0 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (UDP_RST_EP) Reset Endpoint 0 */
06155 #define UDP_RST_EP_EP1 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (UDP_RST_EP) Reset Endpoint 1 */
06156 #define UDP_RST_EP_EP2 (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (UDP_RST_EP) Reset Endpoint 2 */
06157 #define UDP_RST_EP_EP3 (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (UDP_RST_EP) Reset Endpoint 3 */
06158 #define UDP_RST_EP_EP4 (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (UDP_RST_EP) Reset Endpoint 4 */
06159 #define UDP_RST_EP_EP5 (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (UDP_RST_EP) Reset Endpoint 5 */
06160 #define UDP_RST_EP_EP6 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (UDP_RST_EP) Reset Endpoint 6 */
06161 #define UDP_RST_EP_EP7 (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (UDP_RST_EP) Reset Endpoint 7 */
06162 /* -------- UDP_CSR[8] : (UDP Offset: 0x030) Endpoint Control and Status Register -------- */
06163 #define UDP_CSR_TXCOMP (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8]) Generates an IN Packet with Data Previously Written in the DPR */
06164 #define UDP_CSR_RX_DATA_BK0 (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8]) Receive Data Bank 0 */
06165 #define UDP_CSR_RXSETUP (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8]) Received Setup */
06166 #define UDP_CSR_STALLSENTISOERROR (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8])  */
06167 #define UDP_CSR_TXPKTRDY (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8]) Transmit Packet Ready */
06168 #define UDP_CSR_FORCESTALL (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8]) Force Stall (used by Control, Bulk and Isochronous Endpoints) */
06169 #define UDP_CSR_RX_DATA_BK1 (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8]) Receive Data Bank 1 (only used by endpoints with ping-pong attributes) */
06170 #define UDP_CSR_DIR (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8]) Transfer Direction (only available for control endpoints) */
06171 #define UDP_CSR_EPTYPE_Pos 8
06172 #define UDP_CSR_EPTYPE_Msk (0x7u << UDP_CSR_EPTYPE_Pos) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8]) Endpoint Type */
06173 #define   UDP_CSR_EPTYPE_CTRL (0x0u << 8) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8]) Control */
06174 #define   UDP_CSR_EPTYPE_ISO_OUT (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8]) Isochronous OUT */
06175 #define   UDP_CSR_EPTYPE_BULK_OUT (0x2u << 8) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8]) Bulk OUT */
06176 #define   UDP_CSR_EPTYPE_INT_OUT (0x3u << 8) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8]) Interrupt OUT */
