06177 #define   UDP_CSR_EPTYPE_ISO_IN (0x5u << 8) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8]) Isochronous IN */
06178 #define   UDP_CSR_EPTYPE_BULK_IN (0x6u << 8) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8]) Bulk IN */
06179 #define   UDP_CSR_EPTYPE_INT_IN (0x7u << 8) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8]) Interrupt IN */
06180 #define UDP_CSR_DTGLE (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8]) Data Toggle */
06181 #define UDP_CSR_EPEDS (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8]) Endpoint Enable Disable */
06182 #define UDP_CSR_RXBYTECNT_Pos 16
06183 #define UDP_CSR_RXBYTECNT_Msk (0x7ffu << UDP_CSR_RXBYTECNT_Pos) /**< \brief (UDP_CSR[8]) Number of Bytes Available in the FIFO */
06184 #define UDP_CSR_RXBYTECNT(value) ((UDP_CSR_RXBYTECNT_Msk & ((value) << UDP_CSR_RXBYTECNT_Pos)))
06185 /* -------- UDP_FDR[8] : (UDP Offset: 0x050) Endpoint FIFO Data Register -------- */
06186 #define UDP_FDR_FIFO_DATA_Pos 0
06187 #define UDP_FDR_FIFO_DATA_Msk (0xffu << UDP_FDR_FIFO_DATA_Pos) /**< \brief (UDP_FDR[8]) FIFO Data Value */
06188 #define UDP_FDR_FIFO_DATA(value) ((UDP_FDR_FIFO_DATA_Msk & ((value) << UDP_FDR_FIFO_DATA_Pos)))
06189 /* -------- UDP_TXVC : (UDP Offset: 0x074) Transceiver Control Register -------- */
06190 #define UDP_TXVC_TXVDIS (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (UDP_TXVC) Transceiver Disable */
06191 #define UDP_TXVC_PUON (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (UDP_TXVC) Pullup On */
06192 
06193 /*@}*/
06194 
06195 /* ============================================================================= */
06196 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Universal Synchronous Asynchronous Receiver Transmitter */
06197 /* ============================================================================= */
06198 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_USART Universal Synchronous Asynchronous Receiver Transmitter */
06199 /*@{*/
06200 
06201 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
06202 /** \brief Usart hardware registers */
06203 typedef struct {
06204   WoReg US_CR;         /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x0000) Control Register */
06205   RwReg US_MR;         /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x0004) Mode Register */
06206   WoReg US_IER;        /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x0008) Interrupt Enable Register */
06207   WoReg US_IDR;        /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x000C) Interrupt Disable Register */
06208   RoReg US_IMR;        /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x0010) Interrupt Mask Register */
06209   RoReg US_CSR;        /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x0014) Channel Status Register */
06210   RoReg US_RHR;        /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x0018) Receiver Holding Register */
06211   WoReg US_THR;        /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x001C) Transmitter Holding Register */
06212   RwReg US_BRGR;       /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x0020) Baud Rate Generator Register */
06213   RwReg US_RTOR;       /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x0024) Receiver Time-out Register */
06214   RwReg US_TTGR;       /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x0028) Transmitter Timeguard Register */
06215   RwReg Reserved1[5];
06216   RwReg US_FIDI;       /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x0040) FI DI Ratio Register */
06217   RoReg US_NER;        /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x0044) Number of Errors Register */
06218   RwReg Reserved2[1];
06219   RwReg US_IF;         /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x004C) IrDA Filter Register */
06220   RwReg US_MAN;        /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x0050) Manchester Encoder Decoder Register */
06221   RwReg Reserved3[36];
06222   RwReg US_WPMR;       /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0xE4) Write Protect Mode Register */
06223   RoReg US_WPSR;       /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0xE8) Write Protect Status Register */
06224   RwReg Reserved4[5];
06225   RwReg US_RPR;        /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register */
06226   RwReg US_RCR;        /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register */
06227   RwReg US_TPR;        /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register */
06228   RwReg US_TCR;        /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register */
06229   RwReg US_RNPR;       /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register */
06230   RwReg US_RNCR;       /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register */
06231   RwReg US_TNPR;       /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register */
06232   RwReg US_TNCR;       /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register */
06233   WoReg US_PTCR;       /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register */
06234   RoReg US_PTSR;       /**< \brief (Usart Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register */
06235 } Usart;
06236 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
06237 /* -------- US_CR : (USART Offset: 0x0000) Control Register -------- */
06238 #define US_CR_RSTRX (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (US_CR) Reset Receiver */
06239 #define US_CR_RSTTX (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (US_CR) Reset Transmitter */
06240 #define US_CR_RXEN (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (US_CR) Receiver Enable */
06241 #define US_CR_RXDIS (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (US_CR) Receiver Disable */
06242 #define US_CR_TXEN (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (US_CR) Transmitter Enable */
06243 #define US_CR_TXDIS (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (US_CR) Transmitter Disable */
06244 #define US_CR_RSTSTA (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (US_CR) Reset Status Bits */
06245 #define US_CR_STTBRK (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (US_CR) Start Break */
06246 #define US_CR_STPBRK (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (US_CR) Stop Break */
06247 #define US_CR_STTTO (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (US_CR) Start Time-out */
06248 #define US_CR_SENDA (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (US_CR) Send Address */
06249 #define US_CR_RSTIT (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (US_CR) Reset Iterations */
06250 #define US_CR_RSTNACK (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (US_CR) Reset Non Acknowledge */
06251 #define US_CR_RETTO (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (US_CR) Rearm Time-out */
06252 #define US_CR_DTREN (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (US_CR) Data Terminal Ready Enable */
06253 #define US_CR_DTRDIS (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (US_CR) Data Terminal Ready Disable */
06254 #define US_CR_RTSEN (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (US_CR) Request to Send Enable */
06255 #define US_CR_FCS (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (US_CR) Force SPI Chip Select */
06256 #define US_CR_RTSDIS (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (US_CR) Request to Send Disable */
06257 #define US_CR_RCS (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (US_CR) Release SPI Chip Select */
06258 /* -------- US_MR : (USART Offset: 0x0004) Mode Register -------- */
06259 #define US_MR_USART_MODE_Pos 0
06260 #define US_MR_USART_MODE_Msk (0xfu << US_MR_USART_MODE_Pos) /**< \brief (US_MR)  */
06261 #define   US_MR_USART_MODE_NORMAL (0x0u << 0) /**< \brief (US_MR) Normal mode */
06262 #define   US_MR_USART_MODE_RS485 (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (US_MR) RS485 */
06263 #define   US_MR_USART_MODE_HW_HANDSHAKING (0x2u << 0) /**< \brief (US_MR) Hardware Handshaking */
06264 #define   US_MR_USART_MODE_MODEM (0x3u << 0) /**< \brief (US_MR) Modem */
06265 #define   US_MR_USART_MODE_IS07816_T_0 (0x4u << 0) /**< \brief (US_MR) IS07816 Protocol: T = 0 */
06266 #define   US_MR_USART_MODE_IS07816_T_1 (0x6u << 0) /**< \brief (US_MR) IS07816 Protocol: T = 1 */
06267 #define   US_MR_USART_MODE_IRDA (0x8u << 0) /**< \brief (US_MR) IrDA */
06268 #define   US_MR_USART_MODE_SPI_MASTER (0xEu << 0) /**< \brief (US_MR) SPI Master */
06269 #define   US_MR_USART_MODE_SPI_SLAVE (0xFu << 0) /**< \brief (US_MR) SPI Slave */
06270 #define US_MR_USCLKS_Pos 4
06271 #define US_MR_USCLKS_Msk (0x3u << US_MR_USCLKS_Pos) /**< \brief (US_MR) Clock Selection */
06272 #define   US_MR_USCLKS_MCK (0x0u << 4) /**< \brief (US_MR) Master Clock MCK is selected */
06273 #define   US_MR_USCLKS_DIV (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (US_MR) Internal Clock Divided MCK/DIV (DIV=8) is selected */
06274 #define   US_MR_USCLKS_SCK (0x3u << 4) /**< \brief (US_MR) Serial Clock SLK is selected */
06275 #define US_MR_CHRL_Pos 6
06276 #define US_MR_CHRL_Msk (0x3u << US_MR_CHRL_Pos) /**< \brief (US_MR) Character Length. */
06277 #define   US_MR_CHRL_5_BIT (0x0u << 6) /**< \brief (US_MR) Character length is 5 bits */
06278 #define   US_MR_CHRL_6_BIT (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (US_MR) Character length is 6 bits */
06279 #define   US_MR_CHRL_7_BIT (0x2u << 6) /**< \brief (US_MR) Character length is 7 bits */
06280 #define   US_MR_CHRL_8_BIT (0x3u << 6) /**< \brief (US_MR) Character length is 8 bits */
06281 #define US_MR_SYNC (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (US_MR) Synchronous Mode Select */
06282 #define US_MR_CPHA (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (US_MR) SPI Clock Phase */
06283 #define US_MR_PAR_Pos 9
06284 #define US_MR_PAR_Msk (0x7u << US_MR_PAR_Pos) /**< \brief (US_MR) Parity Type */
06285 #define   US_MR_PAR_EVEN (0x0u << 9) /**< \brief (US_MR) Even parity */
06286 #define   US_MR_PAR_ODD (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (US_MR) Odd parity */
06287 #define   US_MR_PAR_SPACE (0x2u << 9) /**< \brief (US_MR) Parity forced to 0 (Space) */
06288 #define   US_MR_PAR_MARK (0x3u << 9) /**< \brief (US_MR) Parity forced to 1 (Mark) */
06289 #define   US_MR_PAR_NO (0x4u << 9) /**< \brief (US_MR) No parity */
06290 #define   US_MR_PAR_MULTIDROP (0x6u << 9) /**< \brief (US_MR) Multidrop mode */
06291 #define US_MR_NBSTOP_Pos 12
06292 #define US_MR_NBSTOP_Msk (0x3u << US_MR_NBSTOP_Pos) /**< \brief (US_MR) Number of Stop Bits */
06293 #define   US_MR_NBSTOP_1_BIT (0x0u << 12) /**< \brief (US_MR) 1 stop bit */
06294 #define   US_MR_NBSTOP_1_5_BIT (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (US_MR) 1.5 stop bit (SYNC = 0) or reserved (SYNC = 1) */
06295 #define   US_MR_NBSTOP_2_BIT (0x2u << 12) /**< \brief (US_MR) 2 stop bits */
06296 #define US_MR_CHMODE_Pos 14
06297 #define US_MR_CHMODE_Msk (0x3u << US_MR_CHMODE_Pos) /**< \brief (US_MR) Channel Mode */
06298 #define   US_MR_CHMODE_NORMAL (0x0u << 14) /**< \brief (US_MR) Normal Mode */
06299 #define   US_MR_CHMODE_AUTOMATIC (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (US_MR) Automatic Echo. Receiver input is connected to the TXD pin. */
06300 #define   US_MR_CHMODE_LOCAL_LOOPBACK (0x2u << 14) /**< \brief (US_MR) Local Loopback. Transmitter output is connected to the Receiver Input. */
06301 #define   US_MR_CHMODE_REMOTE_LOOPBACK (0x3u << 14) /**< \brief (US_MR) Remote Loopback. RXD pin is internally connected to the TXD pin. */
06302 #define US_MR_MSBF (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (US_MR) Bit Order */
06303 #define US_MR_CPOL (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (US_MR) SPI Clock Polarity */
06304 #define US_MR_MODE9 (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (US_MR) 9-bit Character Length */
06305 #define US_MR_CLKO (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (US_MR) Clock Output Select */
06306 #define US_MR_OVER (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (US_MR) Oversampling Mode */
06307 #define US_MR_INACK (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (US_MR) Inhibit Non Acknowledge */
06308 #define US_MR_DSNACK (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (US_MR) Disable Successive NACK */
06309 #define US_MR_VAR_SYNC (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (US_MR) Variable Synchronization of Command/Data Sync Start Frame Delimiter */
06310 #define US_MR_INVDATA (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (US_MR) INverted Data */
06311 #define US_MR_MAX_ITERATION_Pos 24
06312 #define US_MR_MAX_ITERATION_Msk (0x7u << US_MR_MAX_ITERATION_Pos) /**< \brief (US_MR)  */
06313 #define US_MR_MAX_ITERATION(value) ((US_MR_MAX_ITERATION_Msk & ((value) << US_MR_MAX_ITERATION_Pos)))
06314 #define US_MR_FILTER (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (US_MR) Infrared Receive Line Filter */
06315 #define US_MR_MAN (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (US_MR) Manchester Encoder/Decoder Enable */
06316 #define US_MR_MODSYNC (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (US_MR) Manchester Synchronization Mode */
06317 #define US_MR_ONEBIT (0x1u << 31) /**< \brief (US_MR) Start Frame Delimiter Selector */
06318 /* -------- US_IER : (USART Offset: 0x0008) Interrupt Enable Register -------- */
06319 #define US_IER_RXRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (US_IER) RXRDY Interrupt Enable */
06320 #define US_IER_TXRDY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (US_IER) TXRDY Interrupt Enable */
06321 #define US_IER_RXBRK (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (US_IER) Receiver Break Interrupt Enable */
06322 #define US_IER_ENDRX (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (US_IER) End of Receive Transfer Interrupt Enable */
06323 #define US_IER_ENDTX (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (US_IER) End of Transmit Interrupt Enable */
06324 #define US_IER_OVRE (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (US_IER) Overrun Error Interrupt Enable */
06325 #define US_IER_FRAME (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (US_IER) Framing Error Interrupt Enable */
06326 #define US_IER_PARE (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (US_IER) Parity Error Interrupt Enable */
06327 #define US_IER_TIMEOUT (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (US_IER) Time-out Interrupt Enable */
06328 #define US_IER_TXEMPTY (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (US_IER) TXEMPTY Interrupt Enable */
06329 #define US_IER_ITER (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (US_IER) Max number of Repetitions Reached */
06330 #define US_IER_UNRE (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (US_IER) SPI Underrun Error */
06331 #define US_IER_TXBUFE (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (US_IER) Buffer Empty Interrupt Enable */
06332 #define US_IER_RXBUFF (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (US_IER) Buffer Full Interrupt Enable */
06333 #define US_IER_NACK (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (US_IER) Non AcknowledgeInterrupt Enable */
06334 #define US_IER_RIIC (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (US_IER) Ring Indicator Input Change Enable */
06335 #define US_IER_DSRIC (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (US_IER) Data Set Ready Input Change Enable */
06336 #define US_IER_DCDIC (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (US_IER) Data Carrier Detect Input Change Interrupt Enable */
06337 #define US_IER_CTSIC (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (US_IER) Clear to Send Input Change Interrupt Enable */
06338 #define US_IER_MANE (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (US_IER) Manchester Error Interrupt Enable */
06339 /* -------- US_IDR : (USART Offset: 0x000C) Interrupt Disable Register -------- */
06340 #define US_IDR_RXRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (US_IDR) RXRDY Interrupt Disable */
06341 #define US_IDR_TXRDY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (US_IDR) TXRDY Interrupt Disable */
06342 #define US_IDR_RXBRK (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (US_IDR) Receiver Break Interrupt Disable */
06343 #define US_IDR_ENDRX (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (US_IDR) End of Receive Transfer Interrupt Disable */
06344 #define US_IDR_ENDTX (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (US_IDR) End of Transmit Interrupt Disable */
06345 #define US_IDR_OVRE (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (US_IDR) Overrun Error Interrupt Disable */
06346 #define US_IDR_FRAME (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (US_IDR) Framing Error Interrupt Disable */
06347 #define US_IDR_PARE (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (US_IDR) Parity Error Interrupt Disable */
06348 #define US_IDR_TIMEOUT (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (US_IDR) Time-out Interrupt Disable */
06349 #define US_IDR_TXEMPTY (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (US_IDR) TXEMPTY Interrupt Disable */
06350 #define US_IDR_ITER (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (US_IDR) Max number of Repetitions Reached Disable */
06351 #define US_IDR_UNRE (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (US_IDR) SPI Underrun Error Disable */
06352 #define US_IDR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (US_IDR) Buffer Empty Interrupt Disable */
06353 #define US_IDR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (US_IDR) Buffer Full Interrupt Disable */
06354 #define US_IDR_NACK (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (US_IDR) Non AcknowledgeInterrupt Disable */
06355 #define US_IDR_RIIC (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (US_IDR) Ring Indicator Input Change Disable */
06356 #define US_IDR_DSRIC (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (US_IDR) Data Set Ready Input Change Disable */
06357 #define US_IDR_DCDIC (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (US_IDR) Data Carrier Detect Input Change Interrupt Disable */
06358 #define US_IDR_CTSIC (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (US_IDR) Clear to Send Input Change Interrupt Disable */
06359 #define US_IDR_MANE (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (US_IDR) Manchester Error Interrupt Disable */
06360 /* -------- US_IMR : (USART Offset: 0x0010) Interrupt Mask Register -------- */
06361 #define US_IMR_RXRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (US_IMR) RXRDY Interrupt Mask */
06362 #define US_IMR_TXRDY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (US_IMR) TXRDY Interrupt Mask */
06363 #define US_IMR_RXBRK (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (US_IMR) Receiver Break Interrupt Mask */
06364 #define US_IMR_ENDRX (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (US_IMR) End of Receive Transfer Interrupt Mask */
06365 #define US_IMR_ENDTX (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (US_IMR) End of Transmit Interrupt Mask */
06366 #define US_IMR_OVRE (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (US_IMR) Overrun Error Interrupt Mask */
06367 #define US_IMR_FRAME (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (US_IMR) Framing Error Interrupt Mask */
06368 #define US_IMR_PARE (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (US_IMR) Parity Error Interrupt Mask */
06369 #define US_IMR_TIMEOUT (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (US_IMR) Time-out Interrupt Mask */
06370 #define US_IMR_TXEMPTY (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (US_IMR) TXEMPTY Interrupt Mask */
06371 #define US_IMR_ITER (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (US_IMR) Max number of Repetitions Reached Mask */
06372 #define US_IMR_UNRE (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (US_IMR) SPI Underrun Error Mask */
06373 #define US_IMR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (US_IMR) Buffer Empty Interrupt Mask */
06374 #define US_IMR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (US_IMR) Buffer Full Interrupt Mask */
06375 #define US_IMR_NACK (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (US_IMR) Non AcknowledgeInterrupt Mask */
06376 #define US_IMR_RIIC (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (US_IMR) Ring Indicator Input Change Mask */
06377 #define US_IMR_DSRIC (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (US_IMR) Data Set Ready Input Change Mask */
06378 #define US_IMR_DCDIC (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (US_IMR) Data Carrier Detect Input Change Interrupt Mask */
06379 #define US_IMR_CTSIC (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (US_IMR) Clear to Send Input Change Interrupt Mask */
06380 #define US_IMR_MANE (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (US_IMR) Manchester Error Interrupt Mask */
06381 /* -------- US_CSR : (USART Offset: 0x0014) Channel Status Register -------- */
06382 #define US_CSR_RXRDY (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Receiver Ready */
06383 #define US_CSR_TXRDY (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Transmitter Ready */
06384 #define US_CSR_RXBRK (0x1u << 2) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Break Received/End of Break */
06385 #define US_CSR_ENDRX (0x1u << 3) /**< \brief (US_CSR) End of Receiver Transfer */
06386 #define US_CSR_ENDTX (0x1u << 4) /**< \brief (US_CSR) End of Transmitter Transfer */
06387 #define US_CSR_OVRE (0x1u << 5) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Overrun Error */
06388 #define US_CSR_FRAME (0x1u << 6) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Framing Error */
06389 #define US_CSR_PARE (0x1u << 7) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Parity Error */
06390 #define US_CSR_TIMEOUT (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Receiver Time-out */
06391 #define US_CSR_TXEMPTY (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Transmitter Empty */
06392 #define US_CSR_ITER (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Max number of Repetitions Reached */
06393 #define US_CSR_UNRE (0x1u << 10) /**< \brief (US_CSR) SPI Underrun Error */
06394 #define US_CSR_TXBUFE (0x1u << 11) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Transmission Buffer Empty */
06395 #define US_CSR_RXBUFF (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Reception Buffer Full */
06396 #define US_CSR_NACK (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Non AcknowledgeInterrupt */
06397 #define US_CSR_RIIC (0x1u << 16) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Ring Indicator Input Change Flag */
06398 #define US_CSR_DSRIC (0x1u << 17) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Data Set Ready Input Change Flag */
06399 #define US_CSR_DCDIC (0x1u << 18) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Data Carrier Detect Input Change Flag */
06400 #define US_CSR_CTSIC (0x1u << 19) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Clear to Send Input Change Flag */
06401 #define US_CSR_RI (0x1u << 20) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Image of RI Input */
06402 #define US_CSR_DSR (0x1u << 21) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Image of DSR Input */
06403 #define US_CSR_DCD (0x1u << 22) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Image of DCD Input */
06404 #define US_CSR_CTS (0x1u << 23) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Image of CTS Input */
06405 #define US_CSR_MANERR (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (US_CSR) Manchester Error */
06406 /* -------- US_RHR : (USART Offset: 0x0018) Receiver Holding Register -------- */
06407 #define US_RHR_RXCHR_Pos 0
06408 #define US_RHR_RXCHR_Msk (0x1ffu << US_RHR_RXCHR_Pos) /**< \brief (US_RHR) Received Character */
06409 #define US_RHR_RXSYNH (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (US_RHR) Received Sync */
06410 /* -------- US_THR : (USART Offset: 0x001C) Transmitter Holding Register -------- */
06411 #define US_THR_TXCHR_Pos 0
06412 #define US_THR_TXCHR_Msk (0x1ffu << US_THR_TXCHR_Pos) /**< \brief (US_THR) Character to be Transmitted */
06413 #define US_THR_TXCHR(value) ((US_THR_TXCHR_Msk & ((value) << US_THR_TXCHR_Pos)))
06414 #define US_THR_TXSYNH (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (US_THR) Sync Field to be transmitted */
06415 /* -------- US_BRGR : (USART Offset: 0x0020) Baud Rate Generator Register -------- */
06416 #define US_BRGR_CD_Pos 0
06417 #define US_BRGR_CD_Msk (0xffffu << US_BRGR_CD_Pos) /**< \brief (US_BRGR) Clock Divider */
06418 #define US_BRGR_CD(value) ((US_BRGR_CD_Msk & ((value) << US_BRGR_CD_Pos)))
06419 #define US_BRGR_FP_Pos 16
06420 #define US_BRGR_FP_Msk (0x7u << US_BRGR_FP_Pos) /**< \brief (US_BRGR) Fractional Part */
06421 #define US_BRGR_FP(value) ((US_BRGR_FP_Msk & ((value) << US_BRGR_FP_Pos)))
06422 /* -------- US_RTOR : (USART Offset: 0x0024) Receiver Time-out Register -------- */
06423 #define US_RTOR_TO_Pos 0
06424 #define US_RTOR_TO_Msk (0xffffu << US_RTOR_TO_Pos) /**< \brief (US_RTOR) Time-out Value */
06425 #define US_RTOR_TO(value) ((US_RTOR_TO_Msk & ((value) << US_RTOR_TO_Pos)))
06426 /* -------- US_TTGR : (USART Offset: 0x0028) Transmitter Timeguard Register -------- */
06427 #define US_TTGR_TG_Pos 0
06428 #define US_TTGR_TG_Msk (0xffu << US_TTGR_TG_Pos) /**< \brief (US_TTGR) Timeguard Value */
06429 #define US_TTGR_TG(value) ((US_TTGR_TG_Msk & ((value) << US_TTGR_TG_Pos)))
06430 /* -------- US_FIDI : (USART Offset: 0x0040) FI DI Ratio Register -------- */
06431 #define US_FIDI_FI_DI_RATIO_Pos 0
06432 #define US_FIDI_FI_DI_RATIO_Msk (0x7ffu << US_FIDI_FI_DI_RATIO_Pos) /**< \brief (US_FIDI) FI Over DI Ratio Value */
06433 #define US_FIDI_FI_DI_RATIO(value) ((US_FIDI_FI_DI_RATIO_Msk & ((value) << US_FIDI_FI_DI_RATIO_Pos)))
06434 /* -------- US_NER : (USART Offset: 0x0044) Number of Errors Register -------- */
06435 #define US_NER_NB_ERRORS_Pos 0
06436 #define US_NER_NB_ERRORS_Msk (0xffu << US_NER_NB_ERRORS_Pos) /**< \brief (US_NER) Number of Errors */
06437 /* -------- US_IF : (USART Offset: 0x004C) IrDA Filter Register -------- */
06438 #define US_IF_IRDA_FILTER_Pos 0
06439 #define US_IF_IRDA_FILTER_Msk (0xffu << US_IF_IRDA_FILTER_Pos) /**< \brief (US_IF) IrDA Filter */
06440 #define US_IF_IRDA_FILTER(value) ((US_IF_IRDA_FILTER_Msk & ((value) << US_IF_IRDA_FILTER_Pos)))
06441 /* -------- US_MAN : (USART Offset: 0x0050) Manchester Encoder Decoder Register -------- */
06442 #define US_MAN_TX_PL_Pos 0
06443 #define US_MAN_TX_PL_Msk (0xfu << US_MAN_TX_PL_Pos) /**< \brief (US_MAN) Transmitter Preamble Length */
06444 #define US_MAN_TX_PL(value) ((US_MAN_TX_PL_Msk & ((value) << US_MAN_TX_PL_Pos)))
06445 #define US_MAN_TX_PP_Pos 8
06446 #define US_MAN_TX_PP_Msk (0x3u << US_MAN_TX_PP_Pos) /**< \brief (US_MAN) Transmitter Preamble Pattern */
06447 #define   US_MAN_TX_PP_ALL_ONE (0x0u << 8) /**< \brief (US_MAN) The preamble is composed of '1's */
06448 #define   US_MAN_TX_PP_ALL_ZERO (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (US_MAN) The preamble is composed of '0's */
06449 #define   US_MAN_TX_PP_ZERO_ONE (0x2u << 8) /**< \brief (US_MAN) The preamble is composed of '01's */
06450 #define   US_MAN_TX_PP_ONE_ZERO (0x3u << 8) /**< \brief (US_MAN) The preamble is composed of '10's */
06451 #define US_MAN_TX_MPOL (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (US_MAN) Transmitter Manchester Polarity */
06452 #define US_MAN_RX_PL_Pos 16
06453 #define US_MAN_RX_PL_Msk (0xfu << US_MAN_RX_PL_Pos) /**< \brief (US_MAN) Receiver Preamble Length */
06454 #define US_MAN_RX_PL(value) ((US_MAN_RX_PL_Msk & ((value) << US_MAN_RX_PL_Pos)))
06455 #define US_MAN_RX_PP_Pos 24
06456 #define US_MAN_RX_PP_Msk (0x3u << US_MAN_RX_PP_Pos) /**< \brief (US_MAN) Receiver Preamble Pattern detected */
06457 #define   US_MAN_RX_PP_ALL_ONE (0x0u << 24) /**< \brief (US_MAN) The preamble is composed of '1's */
06458 #define   US_MAN_RX_PP_ALL_ZERO (0x1u << 24) /**< \brief (US_MAN) The preamble is composed of '0's */
06459 #define   US_MAN_RX_PP_ZERO_ONE (0x2u << 24) /**< \brief (US_MAN) The preamble is composed of '01's */
06460 #define   US_MAN_RX_PP_ONE_ZERO (0x3u << 24) /**< \brief (US_MAN) The preamble is composed of '10's */
06461 #define US_MAN_RX_MPOL (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (US_MAN) Receiver Manchester Polarity */
06462 #define US_MAN_STUCKTO1 (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (US_MAN)  */
06463 #define US_MAN_DRIFT (0x1u << 30) /**< \brief (US_MAN) Drift compensation */
06464 /* -------- US_WPMR : (USART Offset: 0xE4) Write Protect Mode Register -------- */
06465 #define US_WPMR_WPEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (US_WPMR) Write Protect Enable */
06466 #define US_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos 8
06467 #define US_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk (0xffffffu << US_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos) /**< \brief (US_WPMR) Write Protect KEY */
06468 #define US_WPMR_WPKEY(value) ((US_WPMR_WPKEY_Msk & ((value) << US_WPMR_WPKEY_Pos)))
06469 /* -------- US_WPSR : (USART Offset: 0xE8) Write Protect Status Register -------- */
06470 #define US_WPSR_WPVS (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (US_WPSR) Write Protect Violation Status */
06471 #define US_WPSR_WPVSRC_Pos 8
06472 #define US_WPSR_WPVSRC_Msk (0xffffu << US_WPSR_WPVSRC_Pos) /**< \brief (US_WPSR) Write Protect Violation Source */
06473 /* -------- US_RPR : (USART Offset: 0x100) Receive Pointer Register -------- */
06474 #define US_RPR_RXPTR_Pos 0
06475 #define US_RPR_RXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << US_RPR_RXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (US_RPR) Receive Pointer Register */
06476 #define US_RPR_RXPTR(value) ((US_RPR_RXPTR_Msk & ((value) << US_RPR_RXPTR_Pos)))
06477 /* -------- US_RCR : (USART Offset: 0x104) Receive Counter Register -------- */
06478 #define US_RCR_RXCTR_Pos 0
06479 #define US_RCR_RXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << US_RCR_RXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (US_RCR) Receive Counter Register */
06480 #define US_RCR_RXCTR(value) ((US_RCR_RXCTR_Msk & ((value) << US_RCR_RXCTR_Pos)))
06481 /* -------- US_TPR : (USART Offset: 0x108) Transmit Pointer Register -------- */
06482 #define US_TPR_TXPTR_Pos 0
06483 #define US_TPR_TXPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << US_TPR_TXPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (US_TPR) Transmit Counter Register */
06484 #define US_TPR_TXPTR(value) ((US_TPR_TXPTR_Msk & ((value) << US_TPR_TXPTR_Pos)))
06485 /* -------- US_TCR : (USART Offset: 0x10C) Transmit Counter Register -------- */
06486 #define US_TCR_TXCTR_Pos 0
06487 #define US_TCR_TXCTR_Msk (0xffffu << US_TCR_TXCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (US_TCR) Transmit Counter Register */
06488 #define US_TCR_TXCTR(value) ((US_TCR_TXCTR_Msk & ((value) << US_TCR_TXCTR_Pos)))
06489 /* -------- US_RNPR : (USART Offset: 0x110) Receive Next Pointer Register -------- */
06490 #define US_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos 0
06491 #define US_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << US_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (US_RNPR) Receive Next Pointer */
06492 #define US_RNPR_RXNPTR(value) ((US_RNPR_RXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << US_RNPR_RXNPTR_Pos)))
06493 /* -------- US_RNCR : (USART Offset: 0x114) Receive Next Counter Register -------- */
06494 #define US_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos 0
06495 #define US_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << US_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (US_RNCR) Receive Next Counter */
06496 #define US_RNCR_RXNCTR(value) ((US_RNCR_RXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << US_RNCR_RXNCTR_Pos)))
06497 /* -------- US_TNPR : (USART Offset: 0x118) Transmit Next Pointer Register -------- */
06498 #define US_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos 0
06499 #define US_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk (0xffffffffu << US_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos) /**< \brief (US_TNPR) Transmit Next Pointer */
06500 #define US_TNPR_TXNPTR(value) ((US_TNPR_TXNPTR_Msk & ((value) << US_TNPR_TXNPTR_Pos)))
06501 /* -------- US_TNCR : (USART Offset: 0x11C) Transmit Next Counter Register -------- */
06502 #define US_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos 0
06503 #define US_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk (0xffffu << US_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos) /**< \brief (US_TNCR) Transmit Counter Next */
06504 #define US_TNCR_TXNCTR(value) ((US_TNCR_TXNCTR_Msk & ((value) << US_TNCR_TXNCTR_Pos)))
06505 /* -------- US_PTCR : (USART Offset: 0x120) Transfer Control Register -------- */
06506 #define US_PTCR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (US_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
06507 #define US_PTCR_RXTDIS (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (US_PTCR) Receiver Transfer Disable */
06508 #define US_PTCR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (US_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
06509 #define US_PTCR_TXTDIS (0x1u << 9) /**< \brief (US_PTCR) Transmitter Transfer Disable */
06510 /* -------- US_PTSR : (USART Offset: 0x124) Transfer Status Register -------- */
06511 #define US_PTSR_RXTEN (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (US_PTSR) Receiver Transfer Enable */
06512 #define US_PTSR_TXTEN (0x1u << 8) /**< \brief (US_PTSR) Transmitter Transfer Enable */
06513 
06514 /*@}*/
06515 
06516 /* ============================================================================= */
06517 /**  SOFTWARE API DEFINITION FOR Watchdog Timer */
06518 /* ============================================================================= */
06519 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_WDT Watchdog Timer */
06520 /*@{*/
06521 
06522 #ifndef __ASSEMBLY__
06523 /** \brief Wdt hardware registers */
06524 typedef struct {
06525   WoReg WDT_CR; /**< \brief (Wdt Offset: 0x00) Control Register */
06526   RwReg WDT_MR; /**< \brief (Wdt Offset: 0x04) Mode Register */
06527   RoReg WDT_SR; /**< \brief (Wdt Offset: 0x08) Status Register */
06528 } Wdt;
06529 #endif /* __ASSEMBLY__ */
06530 /* -------- WDT_CR : (WDT Offset: 0x00) Control Register -------- */
06531 #define WDT_CR_WDRSTT (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (WDT_CR) Watchdog Restart */
06532 #define WDT_CR_KEY_Pos 24
06533 #define WDT_CR_KEY_Msk (0xffu << WDT_CR_KEY_Pos) /**< \brief (WDT_CR) Password */
06534 #define WDT_CR_KEY(value) ((WDT_CR_KEY_Msk & ((value) << WDT_CR_KEY_Pos)))
06535 /* -------- WDT_MR : (WDT Offset: 0x04) Mode Register -------- */
06536 #define WDT_MR_WDV_Pos 0
06537 #define WDT_MR_WDV_Msk (0xfffu << WDT_MR_WDV_Pos) /**< \brief (WDT_MR) Watchdog Counter Value */
06538 #define WDT_MR_WDV(value) ((WDT_MR_WDV_Msk & ((value) << WDT_MR_WDV_Pos)))
06539 #define WDT_MR_WDFIEN (0x1u << 12) /**< \brief (WDT_MR) Watchdog Fault Interrupt Enable */
06540 #define WDT_MR_WDRSTEN (0x1u << 13) /**< \brief (WDT_MR) Watchdog Reset Enable */
06541 #define WDT_MR_WDRPROC (0x1u << 14) /**< \brief (WDT_MR) Watchdog Reset Processor */
06542 #define WDT_MR_WDDIS (0x1u << 15) /**< \brief (WDT_MR) Watchdog Disable */
06543 #define WDT_MR_WDD_Pos 16
06544 #define WDT_MR_WDD_Msk (0xfffu << WDT_MR_WDD_Pos) /**< \brief (WDT_MR) Watchdog Delta Value */
06545 #define WDT_MR_WDD(value) ((WDT_MR_WDD_Msk & ((value) << WDT_MR_WDD_Pos)))
06546 #define WDT_MR_WDDBGHLT (0x1u << 28) /**< \brief (WDT_MR) Watchdog Debug Halt */
06547 #define WDT_MR_WDIDLEHLT (0x1u << 29) /**< \brief (WDT_MR) Watchdog Idle Halt */
06548 /* -------- WDT_SR : (WDT Offset: 0x08) Status Register -------- */
06549 #define WDT_SR_WDUNF (0x1u << 0) /**< \brief (WDT_SR) Watchdog Underflow */
06550 #define WDT_SR_WDERR (0x1u << 1) /**< \brief (WDT_SR) Watchdog Error */
06551 
06552 /*@}*/
06553 
06554 /*@}*/
06555 
06556 /* ************************************************************************** */
06557 /*   REGISTER ACCESS DEFINITIONS FOR SAM3S */
06558 /* ************************************************************************** */
06559 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_reg Registers Access Definitions */
06560 /*@{*/
06561 
06562 /* ========== Register definition for HSMCI peripheral ========== */
06563 #define REG_HSMCI_CR        REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40000000U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Control Register */
06564 #define REG_HSMCI_MR        REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40000004U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Mode Register */
06565 #define REG_HSMCI_DTOR      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40000008U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Data Timeout Register */
06566 #define REG_HSMCI_SDCR      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x4000000CU) /**< \brief (HSMCI) SD/SDIO Card Register */
06567 #define REG_HSMCI_ARGR      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40000010U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Argument Register */
06568 #define REG_HSMCI_CMDR      REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40000014U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Command Register */
06569 #define REG_HSMCI_BLKR      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40000018U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Block Register */
06570 #define REG_HSMCI_CSTOR     REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x4000001CU) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Completion Signal Timeout Register */
06571 #define REG_HSMCI_RSPR      REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40000020U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Response Register */
06572 #define REG_HSMCI_RDR       REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40000030U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Receive Data Register */
06573 #define REG_HSMCI_TDR       REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40000034U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Transmit Data Register */
06574 #define REG_HSMCI_SR        REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40000040U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Status Register */
06575 #define REG_HSMCI_IER       REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40000044U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Interrupt Enable Register */
06576 #define REG_HSMCI_IDR       REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40000048U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Interrupt Disable Register */
06577 #define REG_HSMCI_IMR       REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x4000004CU) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Interrupt Mask Register */
06578 #define REG_HSMCI_CFG       REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40000054U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Configuration Register */
06579 #define REG_HSMCI_WPMR      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x400000E4U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Write Protection Mode Register */
06580 #define REG_HSMCI_WPSR      REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x400000E8U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Write Protection Status Register */
06581 #define REG_HSMCI_RPR       REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40000100U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Receive Pointer Register */
06582 #define REG_HSMCI_RCR       REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40000104U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Receive Counter Register */
06583 #define REG_HSMCI_TPR       REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40000108U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Transmit Pointer Register */
06584 #define REG_HSMCI_TCR       REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x4000010CU) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Transmit Counter Register */
06585 #define REG_HSMCI_RNPR      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40000110U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Receive Next Pointer Register */
06586 #define REG_HSMCI_RNCR      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40000114U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Receive Next Counter Register */
06587 #define REG_HSMCI_TNPR      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40000118U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Transmit Next Pointer Register */
06588 #define REG_HSMCI_TNCR      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x4000011CU) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Transmit Next Counter Register */
06589 #define REG_HSMCI_PTCR      REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40000120U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Transfer Control Register */
06590 #define REG_HSMCI_PTSR      REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40000124U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) Transfer Status Register */
06591 #define REG_HSMCI_FIFO      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40000200U) /**< \brief (HSMCI) FIFO Memory Aperture0 */

06768 #define REG_TWI1_TNCR       REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x4001C11CU) /**< \brief (TWI1) Transmit Next Counter Register */
06769 #define REG_TWI1_PTCR       REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x4001C120U) /**< \brief (TWI1) Transfer Control Register */
06770 #define REG_TWI1_PTSR       REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x4001C124U) /**< \brief (TWI1) Transfer Status Register */

06772 #define REG_PWM_CLK         REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40020000U) /**< \brief (PWM) PWM Clock Register */
06773 #define REG_PWM_ENA         REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40020004U) /**< \brief (PWM) PWM Enable Register */
06774 #define REG_PWM_DIS         REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40020008U) /**< \brief (PWM) PWM Disable Register */
06775 #define REG_PWM_SR          REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x4002000CU) /**< \brief (PWM) PWM Status Register */
06776 #define REG_PWM_IER1        REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40020010U) /**< \brief (PWM) PWM Interrupt Enable Register 1 */
06777 #define REG_PWM_IDR1        REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40020014U) /**< \brief (PWM) PWM Interrupt Disable Register 1 */
06778 #define REG_PWM_IMR1        REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40020018U) /**< \brief (PWM) PWM Interrupt Mask Register 1 */
06779 #define REG_PWM_ISR1        REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x4002001CU) /**< \brief (PWM) PWM Interrupt Status Register 1 */
06780 #define REG_PWM_SCM         REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40020020U) /**< \brief (PWM) PWM Sync Channels Mode Register */
06781 #define REG_PWM_SCUC        REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40020028U) /**< \brief (PWM) PWM Sync Channels Update Control Register */

06783 #define REG_PWM_SCUPUPD     REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40020030U) /**< \brief (PWM) PWM Sync Channels Update Period Update Register */

06785 #define REG_PWM_IDR2        REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40020038U) /**< \brief (PWM) PWM Interrupt Disable Register 2 */

06787 #define REG_PWM_ISR2        REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40020040U) /**< \brief (PWM) PWM Interrupt Status Register 2 */
06788 #define REG_PWM_OOV         REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40020044U) /**< \brief (PWM) PWM Output Override Value Register */
06789 #define REG_PWM_OS          REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40020048U) /**< \brief (PWM) PWM Output Selection Register */
06790 #define REG_PWM_OSS         REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x4002004CU) /**< \brief (PWM) PWM Output Selection Set Register */

06793 #define REG_PWM_OSCUPD      REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40020058U) /**< \brief (PWM) PWM Output Selection Clear Update Register */

06795 #define REG_PWM_FSR         REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40020060U) /**< \brief (PWM) PWM Fault Status Register */

06878 /* ========== Register definition for USART0 peripheral ========== */
06879 #define REG_USART0_CR       REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40024000U) /**< \brief (USART0) Control Register */
06880 #define REG_USART0_MR       REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40024004U) /**< \brief (USART0) Mode Register */
06881 #define REG_USART0_IER      REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40024008U) /**< \brief (USART0) Interrupt Enable Register */
06882 #define REG_USART0_IDR      REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x4002400CU) /**< \brief (USART0) Interrupt Disable Register */
06883 #define REG_USART0_IMR      REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40024010U) /**< \brief (USART0) Interrupt Mask Register */
06884 #define REG_USART0_CSR      REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40024014U) /**< \brief (USART0) Channel Status Register */
06885 #define REG_USART0_RHR      REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40024018U) /**< \brief (USART0) Receiver Holding Register */
06886 #define REG_USART0_THR      REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x4002401CU) /**< \brief (USART0) Transmitter Holding Register */
06887 #define REG_USART0_BRGR     REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40024020U) /**< \brief (USART0) Baud Rate Generator Register */
06888 #define REG_USART0_RTOR     REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40024024U) /**< \brief (USART0) Receiver Time-out Register */
06889 #define REG_USART0_TTGR     REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40024028U) /**< \brief (USART0) Transmitter Timeguard Register */
06890 #define REG_USART0_FIDI     REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40024040U) /**< \brief (USART0) FI DI Ratio Register */
06891 #define REG_USART0_NER      REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40024044U) /**< \brief (USART0) Number of Errors Register */
06892 #define REG_USART0_IF       REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x4002404CU) /**< \brief (USART0) IrDA Filter Register */
06893 #define REG_USART0_MAN      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40024050U) /**< \brief (USART0) Manchester Encoder Decoder Register */
06894 #define REG_USART0_WPMR     REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x400240E4U) /**< \brief (USART0) Write Protect Mode Register */
06895 #define REG_USART0_WPSR     REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x400240E8U) /**< \brief (USART0) Write Protect Status Register */
06896 #define REG_USART0_RPR      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40024100U) /**< \brief (USART0) Receive Pointer Register */
06897 #define REG_USART0_RCR      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40024104U) /**< \brief (USART0) Receive Counter Register */
06898 #define REG_USART0_TPR      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40024108U) /**< \brief (USART0) Transmit Pointer Register */
06899 #define REG_USART0_TCR      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x4002410CU) /**< \brief (USART0) Transmit Counter Register */
06900 #define REG_USART0_RNPR     REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40024110U) /**< \brief (USART0) Receive Next Pointer Register */
06901 #define REG_USART0_RNCR     REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40024114U) /**< \brief (USART0) Receive Next Counter Register */
06902 #define REG_USART0_TNPR     REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40024118U) /**< \brief (USART0) Transmit Next Pointer Register */
06903 #define REG_USART0_TNCR     REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x4002411CU) /**< \brief (USART0) Transmit Next Counter Register */
06904 #define REG_USART0_PTCR     REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40024120U) /**< \brief (USART0) Transfer Control Register */
06905 #define REG_USART0_PTSR     REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40024124U) /**< \brief (USART0) Transfer Status Register */

06934 /* ========== Register definition for UDP peripheral ========== */
06935 #define REG_UDP_FRM_NUM     REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40034000U) /**< \brief (UDP) Frame Number Register */
06936 #define REG_UDP_GLB_STAT    REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40034004U) /**< \brief (UDP) Global State Register */
06937 #define REG_UDP_FADDR       REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40034008U) /**< \brief (UDP) Function Address Register */
06938 #define REG_UDP_IER         REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40034010U) /**< \brief (UDP) Interrupt Enable Register */
06939 #define REG_UDP_IDR         REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40034014U) /**< \brief (UDP) Interrupt Disable Register */
06940 #define REG_UDP_IMR         REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40034018U) /**< \brief (UDP) Interrupt Mask Register */
06941 #define REG_UDP_ISR         REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x4003401CU) /**< \brief (UDP) Interrupt Status Register */
06942 #define REG_UDP_ICR         REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40034020U) /**< \brief (UDP) Interrupt Clear Register */
06943 #define REG_UDP_RST_EP      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40034028U) /**< \brief (UDP) Reset Endpoint Register */
06944 #define REG_UDP_CSR         REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40034030U) /**< \brief (UDP) Endpoint Control and Status Register */
06945 #define REG_UDP_FDR         REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40034050U) /**< \brief (UDP) Endpoint FIFO Data Register */
06946 #define REG_UDP_TXVC        REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40034074U) /**< \brief (UDP) Transceiver Control Register */
06947 /* ========== Register definition for ADC peripheral ========== */
06948 #define REG_ADC_CR          REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40038000U) /**< \brief (ADC) Control Register */
06949 #define REG_ADC_MR          REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40038004U) /**< \brief (ADC) Mode Register */
06950 #define REG_ADC_SEQR1       REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40038008U) /**< \brief (ADC) Channel Sequence Register 1 */
06951 #define REG_ADC_SEQR2       REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x4003800CU) /**< \brief (ADC) Channel Sequence Register 2 */
06952 #define REG_ADC_CHER        REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40038010U) /**< \brief (ADC) Channel Enable Register */
06953 #define REG_ADC_CHDR        REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40038014U) /**< \brief (ADC) Channel Disable Register */
06954 #define REG_ADC_CHSR        REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40038018U) /**< \brief (ADC) Channel Status Register */
06955 #define REG_ADC_LCDR        REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40038020U) /**< \brief (ADC) Last Converted Data Register */
06956 #define REG_ADC_IER         REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40038024U) /**< \brief (ADC) Interrupt Enable Register */
06957 #define REG_ADC_IDR         REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40038028U) /**< \brief (ADC) Interrupt Disable Register */
06958 #define REG_ADC_IMR         REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x4003802CU) /**< \brief (ADC) Interrupt Mask Register */
06959 #define REG_ADC_ISR         REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40038030U) /**< \brief (ADC) Interrupt Status Register */
06960 #define REG_ADC_OVER        REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x4003803CU) /**< \brief (ADC) Overrun Status Register */
06961 #define REG_ADC_EMR         REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40038040U) /**< \brief (ADC) Extended Mode Register */
06962 #define REG_ADC_CWR         REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40038044U) /**< \brief (ADC) Compare Window Register */
06963 #define REG_ADC_CGR         REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40038048U) /**< \brief (ADC) Channel Gain Register */
06964 #define REG_ADC_COR         REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x4003804CU) /**< \brief (ADC) Channel Offset Register */
06965 #define REG_ADC_CDR         REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40038050U) /**< \brief (ADC) Channel Data Register */
06966 #define REG_ADC_ACR         REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40038094U) /**< \brief (ADC) Analog Control Register */
06967 #define REG_ADC_WPMR        REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x400380E4U) /**< \brief (ADC) Write Protect Mode Register */
06968 #define REG_ADC_WPSR        REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x400380E8U) /**< \brief (ADC) Write Protect Status Register */
06969 #define REG_ADC_RPR         REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40038100U) /**< \brief (ADC) Receive Pointer Register */
06970 #define REG_ADC_RCR         REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40038104U) /**< \brief (ADC) Receive Counter Register */
06971 #define REG_ADC_TPR         REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40038108U) /**< \brief (ADC) Transmit Pointer Register */
06972 #define REG_ADC_TCR         REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x4003810CU) /**< \brief (ADC) Transmit Counter Register */
06973 #define REG_ADC_RNPR        REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40038110U) /**< \brief (ADC) Receive Next Pointer Register */
06974 #define REG_ADC_RNCR        REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40038114U) /**< \brief (ADC) Receive Next Counter Register */
06975 #define REG_ADC_TNPR        REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x40038118U) /**< \brief (ADC) Transmit Next Pointer Register */
06976 #define REG_ADC_TNCR        REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x4003811CU) /**< \brief (ADC) Transmit Next Counter Register */
06977 #define REG_ADC_PTCR        REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x40038120U) /**< \brief (ADC) Transfer Control Register */
06978 #define REG_ADC_PTSR        REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x40038124U) /**< \brief (ADC) Transfer Status Register */
06979 /* ========== Register definition for DACC peripheral ========== */
06980 #define REG_DACC_CR         REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x4003C000U) /**< \brief (DACC) Control Register */
06981 #define REG_DACC_MR         REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x4003C004U) /**< \brief (DACC) Mode Register */

06984 #define REG_DACC_CHSR       REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x4003C018U) /**< \brief (DACC) Channel Status Register */

07334 /* ========== Register definition for RTC peripheral ========== */
07335 #define REG_RTC_CR          REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x400E1460U) /**< \brief (RTC) Control Register */
07336 #define REG_RTC_MR          REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x400E1464U) /**< \brief (RTC) Mode Register */
07337 #define REG_RTC_TIMR        REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x400E1468U) /**< \brief (RTC) Time Register */
07338 #define REG_RTC_CALR        REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x400E146CU) /**< \brief (RTC) Calendar Register */
07339 #define REG_RTC_TIMALR      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x400E1470U) /**< \brief (RTC) Time Alarm Register */
07340 #define REG_RTC_CALALR      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x400E1474U) /**< \brief (RTC) Calendar Alarm Register */
07341 #define REG_RTC_SR          REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x400E1478U) /**< \brief (RTC) Status Register */
07342 #define REG_RTC_SCCR        REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x400E147CU) /**< \brief (RTC) Status Clear Command Register */
07343 #define REG_RTC_IER         REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x400E1480U) /**< \brief (RTC) Interrupt Enable Register */
07344 #define REG_RTC_IDR         REG_ACCESS(WoReg, 0x400E1484U) /**< \brief (RTC) Interrupt Disable Register */
07345 #define REG_RTC_IMR         REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x400E1488U) /**< \brief (RTC) Interrupt Mask Register */
07346 #define REG_RTC_VER         REG_ACCESS(RoReg, 0x400E148CU) /**< \brief (RTC) Valid Entry Register */
07347 /* ========== Register definition for GPBR peripheral ========== */
07348 #define REG_GPBR_GPBR0      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x400E1490U) /**< \brief (GPBR) General Purpose Backup Register 0 */
07349 #define REG_GPBR_GPBR1      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x400E1494U) /**< \brief (GPBR) General Purpose Backup Register 1 */
07350 #define REG_GPBR_GPBR2      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x400E1498U) /**< \brief (GPBR) General Purpose Backup Register 2 */
07351 #define REG_GPBR_GPBR3      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x400E149CU) /**< \brief (GPBR) General Purpose Backup Register 3 */
07352 #define REG_GPBR_GPBR4      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x400E14A0U) /**< \brief (GPBR) General Purpose Backup Register 4 */
07353 #define REG_GPBR_GPBR5      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x400E14A4U) /**< \brief (GPBR) General Purpose Backup Register 5 */
07354 #define REG_GPBR_GPBR6      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x400E14A8U) /**< \brief (GPBR) General Purpose Backup Register 6 */
07355 #define REG_GPBR_GPBR7      REG_ACCESS(RwReg, 0x400E14ACU) /**< \brief (GPBR) General Purpose Backup Register 7 */
07356 /*@}*/
07357 
07358 /* ************************************************************************** */
07359 /*   PERIPHERAL ID DEFINITIONS FOR SAM3S */
07360 /* ************************************************************************** */
07361 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_id Peripheral Ids Definitions */
07362 /*@{*/
07363 
07364 #define ID_SUPC   ( 0) /**< \brief Supply Controller (SUPC) */
07365 #define ID_RSTC   ( 1) /**< \brief Reset Controller (RSTC) */
07366 #define ID_RTC    ( 2) /**< \brief Real Time Clock (RTC) */
07367 #define ID_RTT    ( 3) /**< \brief Real Time Timer (RTT) */
07368 #define ID_WDT    ( 4) /**< \brief Watchdog Timer (WDT) */
07369 #define ID_PMC    ( 5) /**< \brief Power Management Controller (PMC) */
07370 #define ID_EFC    ( 6) /**< \brief Enhanced Embedded Flash Controller (EFC) */
07371 #define ID_UART0  ( 8) /**< \brief UART 0 (UART0) */
07372 #define ID_UART1  ( 9) /**< \brief UART 1 (UART1) */
07373 #define ID_SMC    (10) /**< \brief Static Memory Controller (SMC) */
07374 #define ID_PIOA   (11) /**< \brief Parallel I/O Controller A (PIOA) */
07375 #define ID_PIOB   (12) /**< \brief Parallel I/O Controller B (PIOB) */
07376 #define ID_PIOC   (13) /**< \brief Parallel I/O Controller C (PIOC) */
07377 #define ID_USART0 (14) /**< \brief USART 0 (USART0) */
07378 #define ID_USART1 (15) /**< \brief USART 1 (USART1) */
07379 #define ID_HSMCI  (18) /**< \brief Multimedia Card Interface (HSMCI) */
07380 #define ID_TWI0   (19) /**< \brief Two Wire Interface 0 (TWI0) */
07381 #define ID_TWI1   (20) /**< \brief Two Wire Interface 1 (TWI1) */
07382 #define ID_SPI    (21) /**< \brief Serial Peripheral Interface (SPI) */
07383 #define ID_SSC    (22) /**< \brief Synchronous Serial Controler (SSC) */
07384 #define ID_TC0    (23) /**< \brief Timer/Counter 0 (TC0) */
07385 #define ID_TC1    (24) /**< \brief Timer/Counter 1 (TC1) */
07386 #define ID_TC2    (25) /**< \brief Timer/Counter 2 (TC2) */
07387 #define ID_TC3    (26) /**< \brief Timer/Counter 3 (TC3) */
07388 #define ID_TC4    (27) /**< \brief Timer/Counter 4 (TC4) */
07389 #define ID_TC5    (28) /**< \brief Timer/Counter 5 (TC5) */
07390 #define ID_ADC    (29) /**< \brief Analog To Digital Converter (ADC) */
07391 #define ID_DACC   (30) /**< \brief Digital To Analog Converter (DACC) */
07392 #define ID_PWM    (31) /**< \brief Pulse Width Modulation (PWM) */
07393 #define ID_CRCCU  (32) /**< \brief CRC Calculation Unit (CRCCU) */
07394 #define ID_ACC    (33) /**< \brief Analog Comparator (ACC) */
07395 #define ID_UDP    (34) /**< \brief USB Device Port (UDP) */
07396 /*@}*/
07397 
07398 /* ************************************************************************** */
07399 /*   BASE ADDRESS DEFINITIONS FOR SAM3S */
07400 /* ************************************************************************** */
07401 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_base Peripheral Base Address Definitions */
07402 /*@{*/
07403 
07404 #define HSMCI      CAST(Hsmci     , 0x40000000U) /**< \brief (HSMCI     ) Base Address */
07405 #define PDC_HSMCI  CAST(Pdc       , 0x40000100U) /**< \brief (PDC_HSMCI ) Base Address */
07406 #define SSC        CAST(Ssc       , 0x40004000U) /**< \brief (SSC       ) Base Address */
07407 #define PDC_SSC    CAST(Pdc       , 0x40004100U) /**< \brief (PDC_SSC   ) Base Address */
07408 #define SPI        CAST(Spi       , 0x40008000U) /**< \brief (SPI       ) Base Address */
07409 #define PDC_SPI    CAST(Pdc       , 0x40008100U) /**< \brief (PDC_SPI   ) Base Address */
07410 #define TC0        CAST(Tc        , 0x40010000U) /**< \brief (TC0       ) Base Address */
07411 #define TC1        CAST(Tc        , 0x40014000U) /**< \brief (TC1       ) Base Address */
07412 #define TWI0       CAST(Twi       , 0x40018000U) /**< \brief (TWI0      ) Base Address */
07413 #define PDC_TWI0   CAST(Pdc       , 0x40018100U) /**< \brief (PDC_TWI0  ) Base Address */
07414 #define TWI1       CAST(Twi       , 0x4001C000U) /**< \brief (TWI1      ) Base Address */
07415 #define PDC_TWI1   CAST(Pdc       , 0x4001C100U) /**< \brief (PDC_TWI1  ) Base Address */
07416 #define PWM        CAST(Pwm       , 0x40020000U) /**< \brief (PWM       ) Base Address */
07417 #define PDC_PWM    CAST(Pdc       , 0x40020100U) /**< \brief (PDC_PWM   ) Base Address */
07418 #define USART0     CAST(Usart     , 0x40024000U) /**< \brief (USART0    ) Base Address */
07419 #define PDC_USART0 CAST(Pdc       , 0x40024100U) /**< \brief (PDC_USART0) Base Address */
07420 #define USART1     CAST(Usart     , 0x40028000U) /**< \brief (USART1    ) Base Address */
07421 #define PDC_USART1 CAST(Pdc       , 0x40028100U) /**< \brief (PDC_USART1) Base Address */
07422 #define UDP        CAST(Udp       , 0x40034000U) /**< \brief (UDP       ) Base Address */
07423 #define ADC        CAST(Adc       , 0x40038000U) /**< \brief (ADC       ) Base Address */
07424 #define PDC_ADC    CAST(Pdc       , 0x40038100U) /**< \brief (PDC_ADC   ) Base Address */
07425 #define DACC       CAST(Dacc      , 0x4003C000U) /**< \brief (DACC      ) Base Address */
07426 #define PDC_DACC   CAST(Pdc       , 0x4003C100U) /**< \brief (PDC_DACC  ) Base Address */
07427 #define ACC        CAST(Acc       , 0x40040000U) /**< \brief (ACC       ) Base Address */
07428 #define CRCCU      CAST(Crccu     , 0x40044000U) /**< \brief (CRCCU     ) Base Address */
07429 #define SMC        CAST(Smc       , 0x400E0000U) /**< \brief (SMC       ) Base Address */
07430 #define MATRIX     CAST(Matrix    , 0x400E0200U) /**< \brief (MATRIX    ) Base Address */
07431 #define PMC        CAST(Pmc       , 0x400E0400U) /**< \brief (PMC       ) Base Address */
07432 #define UART0      CAST(Uart      , 0x400E0600U) /**< \brief (UART0     ) Base Address */
07433 #define PDC_UART0  CAST(Pdc       , 0x400E0700U) /**< \brief (PDC_UART0 ) Base Address */
07434 #define CHIPID     CAST(Chipid    , 0x400E0740U) /**< \brief (CHIPID    ) Base Address */
07435 #define UART1      CAST(Uart      , 0x400E0800U) /**< \brief (UART1     ) Base Address */
07436 #define PDC_UART1  CAST(Pdc       , 0x400E0900U) /**< \brief (PDC_UART1 ) Base Address */
07437 #define EFC        CAST(Efc       , 0x400E0A00U) /**< \brief (EFC       ) Base Address */
07438 #define PIOA       CAST(Pio       , 0x400E0E00U) /**< \brief (PIOA      ) Base Address */
07439 #define PDC_PIOA   CAST(Pdc       , 0x400E0F00U) /**< \brief (PDC_PIOA  ) Base Address */
07440 #define PIOB       CAST(Pio       , 0x400E1000U) /**< \brief (PIOB      ) Base Address */
07441 #define PIOC       CAST(Pio       , 0x400E1200U) /**< \brief (PIOC      ) Base Address */
07442 #define RSTC       CAST(Rstc      , 0x400E1400U) /**< \brief (RSTC      ) Base Address */
07443 #define SUPC       CAST(Supc      , 0x400E1410U) /**< \brief (SUPC      ) Base Address */
07444 #define RTT        CAST(Rtt       , 0x400E1430U) /**< \brief (RTT       ) Base Address */
07445 #define WDT        CAST(Wdt       , 0x400E1450U) /**< \brief (WDT       ) Base Address */
07446 #define RTC        CAST(Rtc       , 0x400E1460U) /**< \brief (RTC       ) Base Address */
07447 #define GPBR       CAST(Gpbr      , 0x400E1490U) /**< \brief (GPBR      ) Base Address */
07448 /*@}*/
07449 
07450 /* ************************************************************************** */
07451 /*   PIO DEFINITIONS FOR SAM3S */
07452 /* ************************************************************************** */
07453 /** \addtogroup SAM3S_pio Peripheral Pio Definitions */
07454 /*@{*/
07455 
07456 #define PIO_PA0                (1u << 0) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA0 */
07457 #define PIO_PA1                (1u << 1) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA1 */
07458 #define PIO_PA2                (1u << 2) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA2 */
07459 #define PIO_PA3                (1u << 3) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA3 */
07460 #define PIO_PA4                (1u << 4) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA4 */
07461 #define PIO_PA5                (1u << 5) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA5 */
07462 #define PIO_PA6                (1u << 6) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA6 */
07463 #define PIO_PA7                (1u << 7) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA7 */
07464 #define PIO_PA8                (1u << 8) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA8 */
07465 #define PIO_PA9                (1u << 9) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA9 */
07466 #define PIO_PA10               (1u << 10) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA10 */
07467 #define PIO_PA11               (1u << 11) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA11 */
07468 #define PIO_PA12               (1u << 12) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA12 */
07469 #define PIO_PA13               (1u << 13) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA13 */
07470 #define PIO_PA14               (1u << 14) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA14 */
07471 #define PIO_PA15               (1u << 15) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA15 */
07472 #define PIO_PA16               (1u << 16) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA16 */
07473 #define PIO_PA17               (1u << 17) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA17 */
07474 #define PIO_PA18               (1u << 18) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA18 */
07475 #define PIO_PA19               (1u << 19) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA19 */
07476 #define PIO_PA20               (1u << 20) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA20 */
07477 #define PIO_PA21               (1u << 21) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA21 */
07478 #define PIO_PA22               (1u << 22) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA22 */
07479 #define PIO_PA23               (1u << 23) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA23 */
07480 #define PIO_PA24               (1u << 24) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA24 */
07481 #define PIO_PA25               (1u << 25) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA25 */
07482 #define PIO_PA26               (1u << 26) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA26 */
07483 #define PIO_PA27               (1u << 27) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA27 */
07484 #define PIO_PA28               (1u << 28) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA28 */
07485 #define PIO_PA29               (1u << 29) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA29 */
07486 #define PIO_PA30               (1u << 30) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA30 */
07487 #define PIO_PA31               (1u << 31) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PA31 */
07488 #define PIO_PB0                (1u << 0) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PB0 */
07489 #define PIO_PB1                (1u << 1) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PB1 */
07490 #define PIO_PB2                (1u << 2) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PB2 */
07491 #define PIO_PB3                (1u << 3) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PB3 */
07492 #define PIO_PB4                (1u << 4) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PB4 */
07493 #define PIO_PB5                (1u << 5) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PB5 */
07494 #define PIO_PB6                (1u << 6) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PB6 */
07495 #define PIO_PB7                (1u << 7) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PB7 */
07496 #define PIO_PB8                (1u << 8) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PB8 */
07497 #define PIO_PB9                (1u << 9) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PB9 */
07498 #define PIO_PB10               (1u << 10) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PB10 */
07499 #define PIO_PB11               (1u << 11) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PB11 */
07500 #define PIO_PB12               (1u << 12) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PB12 */
07501 #define PIO_PB13               (1u << 13) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PB13 */
07502 #define PIO_PB14               (1u << 14) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PB14 */
07503 #define PIO_PC0                (1u << 0) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC0 */
07504 #define PIO_PC1                (1u << 1) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC1 */
07505 #define PIO_PC2                (1u << 2) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC2 */
07506 #define PIO_PC3                (1u << 3) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC3 */
07507 #define PIO_PC4                (1u << 4) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC4 */
07508 #define PIO_PC5                (1u << 5) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC5 */
07509 #define PIO_PC6                (1u << 6) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC6 */
07510 #define PIO_PC7                (1u << 7) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC7 */
07511 #define PIO_PC8                (1u << 8) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC8 */
07512 #define PIO_PC9                (1u << 9) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC9 */
07513 #define PIO_PC10               (1u << 10) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC10 */
07514 #define PIO_PC11               (1u << 11) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC11 */
07515 #define PIO_PC12               (1u << 12) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC12 */
07516 #define PIO_PC13               (1u << 13) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC13 */
07517 #define PIO_PC14               (1u << 14) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC14 */
07518 #define PIO_PC15               (1u << 15) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC15 */
07519 #define PIO_PC16               (1u << 16) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC16 */
07520 #define PIO_PC17               (1u << 17) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC17 */
07521 #define PIO_PC18               (1u << 18) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC18 */
07522 #define PIO_PC19               (1u << 19) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC19 */
07523 #define PIO_PC20               (1u << 20) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC20 */
07524 #define PIO_PC21               (1u << 21) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC21 */
07525 #define PIO_PC22               (1u << 22) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC22 */
07526 #define PIO_PC23               (1u << 23) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC23 */
07527 #define PIO_PC24               (1u << 24) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC24 */
07528 #define PIO_PC25               (1u << 25) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC25 */
07529 #define PIO_PC26               (1u << 26) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC26 */
07530 #define PIO_PC27               (1u << 27) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC27 */
07531 #define PIO_PC28               (1u << 28) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC28 */
07532 #define PIO_PC29               (1u << 29) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC29 */
07533 #define PIO_PC30               (1u << 30) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC30 */
07534 #define PIO_PC31               (1u << 31) /**< \brief Pin Controlled by PC31 */
07535 /* ========== Pio definition for HSMCI peripheral ========== */
07536 #define PIO_PA28C_MCCDA      (1u << 28)  /**< \brief Hsmci signal: MCCDA */
07537 #define PIO_PA29C_MCCK       (1u << 29)  /**< \brief Hsmci signal: MCCK */
07538 #define PIO_PA30C_MCDA0      (1u << 30)  /**< \brief Hsmci signal: MCDA0 */
07539 #define PIO_PA31C_MCDA1      (1u << 31)  /**< \brief Hsmci signal: MCDA1 */
07540 #define PIO_PA26C_MCDA2      (1u << 26)  /**< \brief Hsmci signal: MCDA2 */
07541 #define PIO_PA27C_MCDA3      (1u << 27)  /**< \brief Hsmci signal: MCDA3 */
07542 /* ========== Pio definition for SSC peripheral ========== */
07543 #define PIO_PA18A_RD         (1u << 18)  /**< \brief Ssc signal: RD */
07544 #define PIO_PA20A_RF         (1u << 20)  /**< \brief Ssc signal: RF */
07545 #define PIO_PA19A_RK         (1u << 19)  /**< \brief Ssc signal: RK */
07546 #define PIO_PA17A_TD         (1u << 17)  /**< \brief Ssc signal: TD */
07547 #define PIO_PA15A_TF         (1u << 15)  /**< \brief Ssc signal: TF */
07548 #define PIO_PA16A_TK         (1u << 16)  /**< \brief Ssc signal: TK */
07549 /* ========== Pio definition for SPI peripheral ========== */
07550 #define PIO_PA12A_MISO       (1u << 12)  /**< \brief Spi signal: MISO */
07551 #define PIO_PA13A_MOSI       (1u << 13)  /**< \brief Spi signal: MOSI */
07552 #define PIO_PA11A_NPCS0      (1u << 11)  /**< \brief Spi signal: NPCS0 */
07553 #define PIO_PA9B_NPCS1       (1u << 9)   /**< \brief Spi signal: NPCS1 */
07554 #define PIO_PA31A_NPCS1      (1u << 31)  /**< \brief Spi signal: NPCS1 */
07555 #define PIO_PB14A_NPCS1      (1u << 14)  /**< \brief Spi signal: NPCS1 */
07556 #define PIO_PC4B_NPCS1       (1u << 4)   /**< \brief Spi signal: NPCS1 */
07557 #define PIO_PA10B_NPCS2      (1u << 10)  /**< \brief Spi signal: NPCS2 */
07558 #define PIO_PA30B_NPCS2      (1u << 30)  /**< \brief Spi signal: NPCS2 */
07559 #define PIO_PB2B_NPCS2       (1u << 2)   /**< \brief Spi signal: NPCS2 */
07560 #define PIO_PA3B_NPCS3       (1u << 3)   /**< \brief Spi signal: NPCS3 */
07561 #define PIO_PA5B_NPCS3       (1u << 5)   /**< \brief Spi signal: NPCS3 */
07562 #define PIO_PA22B_NPCS3      (1u << 22)  /**< \brief Spi signal: NPCS3 */
07563 #define PIO_PA14A_SPCK       (1u << 14)  /**< \brief Spi signal: SPCK */
07564 /* ========== Pio definition for TC0 peripheral ========== */
07565 #define PIO_PA4B_TCLK0       (1u << 4)   /**< \brief Tc0 signal: TCLK0 */
07566 #define PIO_PA28B_TCLK1      (1u << 28)  /**< \brief Tc0 signal: TCLK1 */
07567 #define PIO_PA29B_TCLK2      (1u << 29)  /**< \brief Tc0 signal: TCLK2 */
07568 #define PIO_PA0B_TIOA0       (1u << 0)   /**< \brief Tc0 signal: TIOA0 */
07569 #define PIO_PA15B_TIOA1      (1u << 15)  /**< \brief Tc0 signal: TIOA1 */
07570 #define PIO_PA26B_TIOA2      (1u << 26)  /**< \brief Tc0 signal: TIOA2 */
07571 #define PIO_PA1B_TIOB0       (1u << 1)   /**< \brief Tc0 signal: TIOB0 */
07572 #define PIO_PA16B_TIOB1      (1u << 16)  /**< \brief Tc0 signal: TIOB1 */
07573 #define PIO_PA27B_TIOB2      (1u << 27)  /**< \brief Tc0 signal: TIOB2 */
07574 /* ========== Pio definition for TC1 peripheral ========== */
07575 #define PIO_PC25B_TCLK3      (1u << 25)  /**< \brief Tc1 signal: TCLK3 */
07576 #define PIO_PC28B_TCLK4      (1u << 28)  /**< \brief Tc1 signal: TCLK4 */
07577 #define PIO_PC31B_TCLK5      (1u << 31)  /**< \brief Tc1 signal: TCLK5 */
07578 #define PIO_PC23B_TIOA3      (1u << 23)  /**< \brief Tc1 signal: TIOA3 */
07579 #define PIO_PC26B_TIOA4      (1u << 26)  /**< \brief Tc1 signal: TIOA4 */
07580 #define PIO_PC29B_TIOA5      (1u << 29)  /**< \brief Tc1 signal: TIOA5 */
07581 #define PIO_PC24B_TIOB3      (1u << 24)  /**< \brief Tc1 signal: TIOB3 */
07582 #define PIO_PC27B_TIOB4      (1u << 27)  /**< \brief Tc1 signal: TIOB4 */
07583 #define PIO_PC30B_TIOB5      (1u << 30)  /**< \brief Tc1 signal: TIOB5 */
07584 /* ========== Pio definition for TWI0 peripheral ========== */
07585 #define PIO_PA4A_TWCK0       (1u << 4)   /**< \brief Twi0 signal: TWCK0 */
07586 #define PIO_PA3A_TWD0        (1u << 3)   /**< \brief Twi0 signal: TWD0 */
07587 /* ========== Pio definition for TWI1 peripheral ========== */
07588 #define PIO_PB5A_TWCK1       (1u << 5)   /**< \brief Twi1 signal: TWCK1 */
07589 #define PIO_PB4A_TWD1        (1u << 4)   /**< \brief Twi1 signal: TWD1 */
07590 /* ========== Pio definition for PWM peripheral ========== */
07591 #define PIO_PA9C_PWMFI0      (1u << 9)   /**< \brief Pwm signal: PWMFI0 */
07592 #define PIO_PA0A_PWMH0       (1u << 0)   /**< \brief Pwm signal: PWMH0 */
07593 #define PIO_PA11B_PWMH0      (1u << 11)  /**< \brief Pwm signal: PWMH0 */
07594 #define PIO_PA23B_PWMH0      (1u << 23)  /**< \brief Pwm signal: PWMH0 */
07595 #define PIO_PB0A_PWMH0       (1u << 0)   /**< \brief Pwm signal: PWMH0 */
07596 #define PIO_PC18B_PWMH0      (1u << 18)  /**< \brief Pwm signal: PWMH0 */
07597 #define PIO_PA1A_PWMH1       (1u << 1)   /**< \brief Pwm signal: PWMH1 */
07598 #define PIO_PA12B_PWMH1      (1u << 12)  /**< \brief Pwm signal: PWMH1 */
07599 #define PIO_PA24B_PWMH1      (1u << 24)  /**< \brief Pwm signal: PWMH1 */
07600 #define PIO_PB1A_PWMH1       (1u << 1)   /**< \brief Pwm signal: PWMH1 */
07601 #define PIO_PC19B_PWMH1      (1u << 19)  /**< \brief Pwm signal: PWMH1 */
07602 #define PIO_PA2A_PWMH2       (1u << 2)   /**< \brief Pwm signal: PWMH2 */
07603 #define PIO_PA13B_PWMH2      (1u << 13)  /**< \brief Pwm signal: PWMH2 */
07604 #define PIO_PA25B_PWMH2      (1u << 25)  /**< \brief Pwm signal: PWMH2 */

07607 #define PIO_PA7B_PWMH3       (1u << 7)   /**< \brief Pwm signal: PWMH3 */
07608 #define PIO_PA14B_PWMH3      (1u << 14)  /**< \brief Pwm signal: PWMH3 */
07609 #define PIO_PA17C_PWMH3      (1u << 17)  /**< \brief Pwm signal: PWMH3 */
07610 #define PIO_PB14B_PWMH3      (1u << 14)  /**< \brief Pwm signal: PWMH3 */

07688 #define PIO_PA15D_PIODCEN1   (1u << 15)  /**< \brief Pioa signal: PIODCEN1 */
07689 #define PIO_PA16D_PIODCEN2   (1u << 16)  /**< \brief Pioa signal: PIODCEN2 */
07690 /*@}*/
07691 
07692 /* ************************************************************************** */
07693 /*   MEMORY MAPPING DEFINITIONS FOR SAM3S */
07694 /* ************************************************************************** */
07695 
07696 #define IFLASH_ADDR  (0x00400000u) /**< Internal Flash base address */
07697 #define IROM_ADDR    (0x00800000u) /**< Internal ROM base address */
07698 #define IRAM_ADDR    (0x20000000u) /**< Internal RAM base address */
07699 #define EBI_CS0_ADDR (0x60000000u) /**< EBI Chip Select 0 base address */
07700 #define EBI_CS1_ADDR (0x61000000u) /**< EBI Chip Select 1 base address */
07701 #define EBI_CS2_ADDR (0x62000000u) /**< EBI Chip Select 2 base address */
07702 #define EBI_CS3_ADDR (0x63000000u) /**< EBI Chip Select 3 base address */
07703 
07704 #if defined sam3s1
07705 #define IFLASH_SIZE 0x10000
07706 #define IFLASH_PAGE_SIZE              (256) /* Internal FLASH 0 Page Size: 256 bytes */
07707 #define IFLASH_LOCK_REGION_SIZE     (16384) /* Internal FLASH 0 Lock Region Size: 16 Kbytes */
07708 #define IFLASH_NB_OF_PAGES            (256) /* Internal FLASH 0 Number of Pages: 256 */
07709 #define IFLASH_NB_OF_LOCK_BITS          (4) /* Internal FLASH 0 Number of Lock Bits: 4 */
07710 #define IRAM_SIZE 0x4000
07711 #elif defined sam3s2
07712 #define IFLASH_SIZE 0x20000
07713 #define IFLASH_PAGE_SIZE              (256) /* Internal FLASH 0 Page Size: 256 bytes */
07714 #define IFLASH_LOCK_REGION_SIZE     (16384) /* Internal FLASH 0 Lock Region Size: 16 Kbytes */
07715 #define IFLASH_NB_OF_PAGES            (512) /* Internal FLASH 0 Number of Pages: 512 */
07716 #define IFLASH_NB_OF_LOCK_BITS          (8) /* Internal FLASH 0 Number of Lock Bits: 8 */
07717 #define IRAM_SIZE 0x8000
07718 #elif defined sam3s4
07719 #define IFLASH_SIZE 0x40000
07720 #define IFLASH_PAGE_SIZE              (256) /* Internal FLASH 0 Page Size: 256 bytes */
07721 #define IFLASH_LOCK_REGION_SIZE     (16384) /* Internal FLASH 0 Lock Region Size: 16 Kbytes */
07722 #define IFLASH_NB_OF_PAGES           (1024) /* Internal FLASH 0 Number of Pages: 1024 */
07723 #define IFLASH_NB_OF_LOCK_BITS         (16) /* Internal FLASH 0 Number of Lock Bits: 16 */
07724 #define IRAM_SIZE 0xC000
07725 #else
07726   #error Library does not support the specified device.
07727 #endif
07728 
07729 #ifdef __cplusplus
07730 }
07731 #endif
07732 
07733 /*@}*/
07734 
07735 #endif /* SAM3S_H */
